I-Ejensi yemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika  
I-Ejensi  yesiBonelelo somPhakathi seSewula Afrika
I-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi eSewula Afrika
IPhiko leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo
I-Ejensi  yesiBonelelo somPhakathi seSewula Afrika
I-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi eSewula Afrika
IPhiko leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo
I-Ejensi yemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika  
I-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi eSewula Afrika

INcwadi yesiVumelwano yokuTlhogomela umThengi

Siyakwamukela kuTjhatha yethu yezokuTlhogonyelwa kwamaKhastama
Siyakwamukela kumTlolomalungelo wamaKhastama
Wamukelekile emTlolwenethu wamaKhastama
Siyakwamukela eNcwadini yethu yesiVumelwano yomThengi
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, bona usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwuveza kilomtlolomalungelo. 
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwethulako emtlolwenethu.
Sifuna wena, mthengi wethu, ukobana usahlulele ngokwezinga lomsebenzi esitlole ngawo kileNcwadi yesiVumelwano.
Sifuna wena, ikhastama lethu, usijaje ngezinga lomsebenzi wethu esilibeke kiletjhatha.  
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwethulako emtlolwenethu.
Sifuna wena, mthengi wethu, ukobana usahlulele ngokwezinga lomsebenzi esitlole ngawo kileNcwadi yesiVumelwano.
Sifuna wena, ikhastama lethu, usijaje ngezinga lomsebenzi wethu esilibeke kiletjhatha.  
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, bona usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwuveza kilomtlolomalungelo. 
Sifuna wena, mthengi wethu, ukobana usahlulele ngokwezinga lomsebenzi esitlole ngawo kileNcwadi yesiVumelwano.
Sifuna wena, ikhastama lethu, usijaje ngezinga lomsebenzi wethu esilibeke kiletjhatha.  
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, bona usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwuveza kilomtlolomalungelo. 
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwethulako emtlolwenethu.
Sifuna wena, ikhastama lethu, usijaje ngezinga lomsebenzi wethu esilibeke kiletjhatha.  
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, bona usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwuveza kilomtlolomalungelo. 
Sifuna wena, njengekhastama lethu, usahlulele ngezinga lomsebenzi esiwethulako emtlolwenethu.
Sifuna wena, mthengi wethu, ukobana usahlulele ngokwezinga lomsebenzi esitlole ngawo kileNcwadi yesiVumelwano.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle ngokukhambisana nekambisolawulo ye-BATHO PELE. 
Sizokusebenzela ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana nemigomo ye-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele ngomsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizokusebenzela ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana nemigomo ye-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele ngomsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle ngokukhambisana nekambisolawulo ye-BATHO PELE. 
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana nemigomo ye-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele ngomsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle ngokukhambisana nekambisolawulo ye-BATHO PELE. 
Sizokusebenzela ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele ngomsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle ngokukhambisana nekambisolawulo ye-BATHO PELE. 
Sizokusebenzela ngehlonipho begodu sikwenzele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana neenkambisolawulo ze-BATHO PELE.
Sizakuphatha ngehlonipho begodu sikunikele umsebenzi omuhle okhambisana nemigomo ye-BATHO PELE.
Siyazibopha njengengcenye yesibopho sethu sokwethula umsebenzi osezingeni lephasi, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, sikuyelelise begodu sisize kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Sizibophelela njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ukukwenzela  umsebenzi osezingeni eliphezulu, sikunikele nelwazi elinqophileko, sikululeke begodu sikusize kiyo yoke imisebenzethu.
Siyazibophelela njengengcenye yomsebenzi wethu ukukunikela umsebenzi okhamba phambili, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, isiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu.
Sizibophelele njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ekukunikeleni ngomsebenzi wezinga eliphezulu, sikunikele ngesiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Sizibophelela njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ukukwenzela  umsebenzi osezingeni eliphezulu, sikunikele nelwazi elinqophileko, sikululeke begodu sikusize kiyo yoke imisebenzethu.
Siyazibophelela njengengcenye yomsebenzi wethu ukukunikela umsebenzi okhamba phambili, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, isiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu.
Sizibophelele njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ekukunikeleni ngomsebenzi wezinga eliphezulu, sikunikele ngesiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Siyazibopha njengengcenye yesibopho sethu sokwethula umsebenzi osezingeni lephasi, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, sikuyelelise begodu sisize kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Siyazibophelela njengengcenye yomsebenzi wethu ukukunikela umsebenzi okhamba phambili, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, isiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu.
Sizibophelele njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ekukunikeleni ngomsebenzi wezinga eliphezulu, sikunikele ngesiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Siyazibopha njengengcenye yesibopho sethu sokwethula umsebenzi osezingeni lephasi, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, sikuyelelise begodu sisize kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Sizibophelela njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ukukwenzela  umsebenzi osezingeni eliphezulu, sikunikele nelwazi elinqophileko, sikululeke begodu sikusize kiyo yoke imisebenzethu.
Sizibophelele njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ekukunikeleni ngomsebenzi wezinga eliphezulu, sikunikele ngesiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Siyazibopha njengengcenye yesibopho sethu sokwethula umsebenzi osezingeni lephasi, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, sikuyelelise begodu sisize kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu. 
Sizibophelela njengengcenye yesibopho sethu ukukwenzela  umsebenzi osezingeni eliphezulu, sikunikele nelwazi elinqophileko, sikululeke begodu sikusize kiyo yoke imisebenzethu.
Siyazibophelela njengengcenye yomsebenzi wethu ukukunikela umsebenzi okhamba phambili, sikunikele ilwazi elinembako, isiyeleliso nesizo kiyo yoke imisebenzi yethu.
IHloso yomTlolomalungelo
Umnqopho womTlolo
Umnqopho weNcwadi le yesiVumelwano
Umqopho weTjhatha
Umnqopho womTlolo
Umnqopho weNcwadi le yesiVumelwano
Umqopho weTjhatha
IHloso yomTlolomalungelo
Umnqopho weNcwadi le yesiVumelwano
Umqopho weTjhatha
IHloso yomTlolomalungelo
Umnqopho womTlolo
Umqopho weTjhatha
IHloso yomTlolomalungelo
Umnqopho womTlolo
Umnqopho weNcwadi le yesiVumelwano
UmTlolomalungelo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela ku- I-Ejensi yemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika (SASSA) .   
Umtlolo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela e-Ejensini yesiBonelelo somPhakathi seSewula Afrika (i-SASSA).
Incwadi le yesivumelwano ikutjela ngamazinga womsebenzi ongawalindela ku-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi (i-SASSA).
Letjhatha ikutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongawulindela ePhikweni leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo (i-SASSA). 
Umtlolo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela e-Ejensini yesiBonelelo somPhakathi seSewula Afrika (i-SASSA).
Incwadi le yesivumelwano ikutjela ngamazinga womsebenzi ongawalindela ku-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi (i-SASSA).
Letjhatha ikutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongawulindela ePhikweni leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo (i-SASSA). 
UmTlolomalungelo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela ku- I-Ejensi yemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika (SASSA) .   
Incwadi le yesivumelwano ikutjela ngamazinga womsebenzi ongawalindela ku-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi (i-SASSA).
Letjhatha ikutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongawulindela ePhikweni leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo (i-SASSA). 
UmTlolomalungelo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela ku- I-Ejensi yemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika (SASSA) .   
Umtlolo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela e-Ejensini yesiBonelelo somPhakathi seSewula Afrika (i-SASSA).
Letjhatha ikutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongawulindela ePhikweni leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo (i-SASSA). 
UmTlolomalungelo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela ku- I-Ejensi yemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika (SASSA) .   
Umtlolo lo ukutjela ngezinga lomsebenzi ongalilindela e-Ejensini yesiBonelelo somPhakathi seSewula Afrika (i-SASSA).
Incwadi le yesivumelwano ikutjela ngamazinga womsebenzi ongawalindela ku-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi (i-SASSA).
I-SASSA iliphiko likarhulumende eliphethe ukwethulwa kwemindende ezakhamuzini zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA liphiko elingezelelweko lombuso elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zezehlalakuhle emiphakathini yeSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA liphiko lombuso elingeziweko lokuphakela eliphethe ukunikelwa kweemali zezondlo kubahlali beSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA sinabiso sephiko lombuso lokwethulwa kweensiza elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zehlalakuhle kuzakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA liphiko elingezelelweko lombuso elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zezehlalakuhle emiphakathini yeSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA liphiko lombuso elingeziweko lokuphakela eliphethe ukunikelwa kweemali zezondlo kubahlali beSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA sinabiso sephiko lombuso lokwethulwa kweensiza elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zehlalakuhle kuzakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA iliphiko likarhulumende eliphethe ukwethulwa kwemindende ezakhamuzini zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA liphiko lombuso elingeziweko lokuphakela eliphethe ukunikelwa kweemali zezondlo kubahlali beSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA sinabiso sephiko lombuso lokwethulwa kweensiza elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zehlalakuhle kuzakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA iliphiko likarhulumende eliphethe ukwethulwa kwemindende ezakhamuzini zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA liphiko elingezelelweko lombuso elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zezehlalakuhle emiphakathini yeSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA sinabiso sephiko lombuso lokwethulwa kweensiza elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zehlalakuhle kuzakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA iliphiko likarhulumende eliphethe ukwethulwa kwemindende ezakhamuzini zeSewula Afrika. 
I-SASSA liphiko elingezelelweko lombuso elilawula ukwethulwa kweembonelelo zezehlalakuhle emiphakathini yeSewula Afrika.
I-SASSA liphiko lombuso elingeziweko lokuphakela eliphethe ukunikelwa kweemali zezondlo kubahlali beSewula Afrika.

Sizibophelela
Siyazibopha
Sizibophelela
Sizibophelele
Ekuphatheni imisebenzi eyikhwalithi yevikeleko lezehlalakuhle, ngokungabiziko nangokusebenzisa iindlela eziphuma phambili ngepumelelo.
Ekuthulweni kwemisebenzi yekhwalithi yeembonelelo zesondlo, ngokwaneleko nangepumelelo ngokusebenzisa iindlela ezingcono.
Ukuphatha imisebenzi yevikeleko lomphakathi esezingeni eliphezulu, engabizi khulu nokusebenzisa imikghwa yokuziphatha emihle efaneleko.
Ekulawuleni ikhwalithi yemisebenzi yeembonelelo zehlalakuhle, ukubeka amanani kuhle godu nangokunetlha sisebenzisa imikghwa ephuma phambili. 
Ekuthulweni kwemisebenzi yekhwalithi yeembonelelo zesondlo, ngokwaneleko nangepumelelo ngokusebenzisa iindlela ezingcono.
Ukuphatha imisebenzi yevikeleko lomphakathi esezingeni eliphezulu, engabizi khulu nokusebenzisa imikghwa yokuziphatha emihle efaneleko.
Ekulawuleni ikhwalithi yemisebenzi yeembonelelo zehlalakuhle, ukubeka amanani kuhle godu nangokunetlha sisebenzisa imikghwa ephuma phambili. 
Ekuphatheni imisebenzi eyikhwalithi yevikeleko lezehlalakuhle, ngokungabiziko nangokusebenzisa iindlela eziphuma phambili ngepumelelo.
Ukuphatha imisebenzi yevikeleko lomphakathi esezingeni eliphezulu, engabizi khulu nokusebenzisa imikghwa yokuziphatha emihle efaneleko.
Ekulawuleni ikhwalithi yemisebenzi yeembonelelo zehlalakuhle, ukubeka amanani kuhle godu nangokunetlha sisebenzisa imikghwa ephuma phambili. 
Ekuphatheni imisebenzi eyikhwalithi yevikeleko lezehlalakuhle, ngokungabiziko nangokusebenzisa iindlela eziphuma phambili ngepumelelo.
Ekuthulweni kwemisebenzi yekhwalithi yeembonelelo zesondlo, ngokwaneleko nangepumelelo ngokusebenzisa iindlela ezingcono.
Ekulawuleni ikhwalithi yemisebenzi yeembonelelo zehlalakuhle, ukubeka amanani kuhle godu nangokunetlha sisebenzisa imikghwa ephuma phambili. 
Ekuphatheni imisebenzi eyikhwalithi yevikeleko lezehlalakuhle, ngokungabiziko nangokusebenzisa iindlela eziphuma phambili ngepumelelo.
Ekuthulweni kwemisebenzi yekhwalithi yeembonelelo zesondlo, ngokwaneleko nangepumelelo ngokusebenzisa iindlela ezingcono.
Ukuphatha imisebenzi yevikeleko lomphakathi esezingeni eliphezulu, engabizi khulu nokusebenzisa imikghwa yokuziphatha emihle efaneleko.

Ongakulindela kithi
Khuyini ongakulindela kithi
Khuyini ongakulindela kithi
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikela isithunzi sabantu, uBufihlo, ukuDzimelela emigomeni yethu, uFeya, Ukwenzela izinto epepeneneni kanye nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, ukuziThemba, ukuDzimelela emigomenethu, ukungaThathihlangothi, ukwenza izinto Pepenene nangokuLingana.
Kuthuthukiswa kanye nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi somuntu, iFihlo, isiThunzi, indlela eHle, ukwenza izinto Tjhatjhalazi kanye nangokuLinganako.
Ukukhutjhulwa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, Ukuphathwa ngefihlo kwelwazi lakho, Isithunzi, Ukulunga, Ukwenzela izinto tjhatjhalaza nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, ukuziThemba, ukuDzimelela emigomenethu, ukungaThathihlangothi, ukwenza izinto Pepenene nangokuLingana.
Kuthuthukiswa kanye nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi somuntu, iFihlo, isiThunzi, indlela eHle, ukwenza izinto Tjhatjhalazi kanye nangokuLinganako.
Ukukhutjhulwa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, Ukuphathwa ngefihlo kwelwazi lakho, Isithunzi, Ukulunga, Ukwenzela izinto tjhatjhalaza nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikela isithunzi sabantu, uBufihlo, ukuDzimelela emigomeni yethu, uFeya, Ukwenzela izinto epepeneneni kanye nokuLingana.
Kuthuthukiswa kanye nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi somuntu, iFihlo, isiThunzi, indlela eHle, ukwenza izinto Tjhatjhalazi kanye nangokuLinganako.
Ukukhutjhulwa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, Ukuphathwa ngefihlo kwelwazi lakho, Isithunzi, Ukulunga, Ukwenzela izinto tjhatjhalaza nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikela isithunzi sabantu, uBufihlo, ukuDzimelela emigomeni yethu, uFeya, Ukwenzela izinto epepeneneni kanye nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, ukuziThemba, ukuDzimelela emigomenethu, ukungaThathihlangothi, ukwenza izinto Pepenene nangokuLingana.
Ukukhutjhulwa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, Ukuphathwa ngefihlo kwelwazi lakho, Isithunzi, Ukulunga, Ukwenzela izinto tjhatjhalaza nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikela isithunzi sabantu, uBufihlo, ukuDzimelela emigomeni yethu, uFeya, Ukwenzela izinto epepeneneni kanye nokuLingana.
Ukuthuthukiswa nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sobuntu, ukuziThemba, ukuDzimelela emigomenethu, ukungaThathihlangothi, ukwenza izinto Pepenene nangokuLingana.
Kuthuthukiswa kanye nokuvikelwa kwesithunzi somuntu, iFihlo, isiThunzi, indlela eHle, ukwenza izinto Tjhatjhalazi kanye nangokuLinganako.
Ngokusebenzisa i-Ejensi yeemBonelelo zezeHlalakuhle yeSewula Afrika siza
Nge-Ejensi yeemBonelelo zomPhakathi yeSewula Afrika,  sizimisele
Kiyo yoke i-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi eSewula Afrika, siza
Kilo loke iPhiko leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo, siza
Nge-Ejensi yeemBonelelo zomPhakathi yeSewula Afrika,  sizimisele
Kiyo yoke i-Ejensi yeVikeleko lomPhakathi eSewula Afrika, siza
Kilo loke iPhiko leSewula Afrika lokuBhadelwa kweemBonelelo, siza

kunikela ilwazi nesiyeleliso mayelana neembonelelo zemirholo zoke ongafaka isibawo malungana nazo.
Ukukunikela ilwazi neseluleko mayelana nazo zoke izondlo ongazenzela isibawo.
Kunikela ilwazi neeyeleliso ngazo zoke iimali zezondlo okungenzeka ufake iimbawo zazo.
Kunikela ngelwazi nesiyeleliso ngeembonelelo ongazenzela isibawo. 
Ukukunikela ilwazi neseluleko mayelana nazo zoke izondlo ongazenzela isibawo.
Kunikela ilwazi neeyeleliso ngazo zoke iimali zezondlo okungenzeka ufake iimbawo zazo.
Kunikela ngelwazi nesiyeleliso ngeembonelelo ongazenzela isibawo. 
kunikela ilwazi nesiyeleliso mayelana neembonelelo zemirholo zoke ongafaka isibawo malungana nazo.
Kunikela ilwazi neeyeleliso ngazo zoke iimali zezondlo okungenzeka ufake iimbawo zazo.
Kunikela ngelwazi nesiyeleliso ngeembonelelo ongazenzela isibawo. 
kunikela ilwazi nesiyeleliso mayelana neembonelelo zemirholo zoke ongafaka isibawo malungana nazo.
Ukukunikela ilwazi neseluleko mayelana nazo zoke izondlo ongazenzela isibawo.
Kunikela ngelwazi nesiyeleliso ngeembonelelo ongazenzela isibawo. 
kunikela ilwazi nesiyeleliso mayelana neembonelelo zemirholo zoke ongafaka isibawo malungana nazo.
Ukukunikela ilwazi neseluleko mayelana nazo zoke izondlo ongazenzela isibawo.
Kunikela ilwazi neeyeleliso ngazo zoke iimali zezondlo okungenzeka ufake iimbawo zazo.
Sikuthumele kezinye iinkhungo ezingaqalana neendingo zakho. 
Ukukuthumela kwezinye iinhlangano ezingahlangabezana neemfuneko zakho.
Dlulisela kwamanye amaziko okungenzeka akusize ngalokho okutlhogako.
Kudlulisela kwezinye iinkhungo ezingatjheja iindingo zakho.  
Ukukuthumela kwezinye iinhlangano ezingahlangabezana neemfuneko zakho.
Dlulisela kwamanye amaziko okungenzeka akusize ngalokho okutlhogako.
Kudlulisela kwezinye iinkhungo ezingatjheja iindingo zakho.  
Sikuthumele kezinye iinkhungo ezingaqalana neendingo zakho. 
Dlulisela kwamanye amaziko okungenzeka akusize ngalokho okutlhogako.
Kudlulisela kwezinye iinkhungo ezingatjheja iindingo zakho.  
Sikuthumele kezinye iinkhungo ezingaqalana neendingo zakho. 
Ukukuthumela kwezinye iinhlangano ezingahlangabezana neemfuneko zakho.
Kudlulisela kwezinye iinkhungo ezingatjheja iindingo zakho.  
Sikuthumele kezinye iinkhungo ezingaqalana neendingo zakho. 
Ukukuthumela kwezinye iinhlangano ezingahlangabezana neemfuneko zakho.
Dlulisela kwamanye amaziko okungenzeka akusize ngalokho okutlhogako.
Sikusize ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu bewufake isibawo sesibonelelo 
Ukukusiza bona uzalise/uqedelele amaforomethu bese wenza isibawo sesondlo.
Kobana uzalise amaforomo wethu bese ufaka isibawo semali yesondlo.
Kusiza ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu nokwenza isibawo sesibonelelo. 
Ukukusiza bona uzalise/uqedelele amaforomethu bese wenza isibawo sesondlo.
Kobana uzalise amaforomo wethu bese ufaka isibawo semali yesondlo.
Kusiza ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu nokwenza isibawo sesibonelelo. 
Sikusize ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu bewufake isibawo sesibonelelo 
Kobana uzalise amaforomo wethu bese ufaka isibawo semali yesondlo.
Kusiza ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu nokwenza isibawo sesibonelelo. 
Sikusize ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu bewufake isibawo sesibonelelo 
Ukukusiza bona uzalise/uqedelele amaforomethu bese wenza isibawo sesondlo.
Kusiza ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu nokwenza isibawo sesibonelelo. 
Sikusize ukuzalisa amaforomo wethu bewufake isibawo sesibonelelo 
Ukukusiza bona uzalise/uqedelele amaforomethu bese wenza isibawo sesondlo.
Kobana uzalise amaforomo wethu bese ufaka isibawo semali yesondlo.
Sigcine ilwazi osinikela lona liyifihlo
Ukuthatha ilwazi osinikela lona njengeliyifihlo.
Kubeka ilwazi osinikela lona libe yifihlo.
Kugcina ilwazi osinikela lona ngefihlo.  
Ukuthatha ilwazi osinikela lona njengeliyifihlo.
Kubeka ilwazi osinikela lona libe yifihlo.
Kugcina ilwazi osinikela lona ngefihlo.  
Sigcine ilwazi osinikela lona liyifihlo
Kubeka ilwazi osinikela lona libe yifihlo.
Kugcina ilwazi osinikela lona ngefihlo.  
Sigcine ilwazi osinikela lona liyifihlo
Ukuthatha ilwazi osinikela lona njengeliyifihlo.
Kugcina ilwazi osinikela lona ngefihlo.  
Sigcine ilwazi osinikela lona liyifihlo
Ukuthatha ilwazi osinikela lona njengeliyifihlo.
Kubeka ilwazi osinikela lona libe yifihlo.
Sihlale sisekela umThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika, imithetho elawula imisebenzi karhulumende kanye nendlela yokuziphatha emisebenzini karhulumende.
Sihlala njalo sitjheja umThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika, imithetho elawula imisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nokuziphatha komsebenzi womphakathi
Ngaso soke isikhathi sizakusekela umThethosisekelo weRiphabliki yeSewula Afrika, imithetho elawula imisebenzi yomphakathi nendlela yokuziphatha komsebenzi womphakathi
Kuhlala siphakamisa umThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika, imithetho elawula abasebenzi bombuso kanye nekhodi yokuziphatha yabasebenzi bombuso

Sisebenze ngokubambisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Sisebenza ngokuhlanganyela  nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nabanye ababahlanganyeli.
Sebenzisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Kusebenza ngokubambisana nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nababambisani abanye. 
Sisebenza ngokuhlanganyela  nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nabanye ababahlanganyeli.
Sebenzisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Kusebenza ngokubambisana nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nababambisani abanye. 
Sisebenze ngokubambisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Sebenzisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Kusebenza ngokubambisana nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nababambisani abanye. 
Sisebenze ngokubambisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Sisebenza ngokuhlanganyela  nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nabanye ababahlanganyeli.
Kusebenza ngokubambisana nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nababambisani abanye. 
Sisebenze ngokubambisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Sisebenza ngokuhlanganyela  nabantu esibasebenzelako kanye nabanye ababahlanganyeli.
Sebenzisana nabantu esibasizako kanye nabanye abahlanganyeli.
Sitjhotjholozele ukwenza ngcono okuragela phambili ekwethulweni kwezenzelwa ukuze sihlangabezane nalokho okulindeleko.
Silwela ukuthuthuka njalo ngomsebenzi esiwenzako ukuze sikwazi ukuhlangabezana neemfiso zakho
Sizakuzama ngamandla wethu ukuragela phambili nokwenza ngcono ukuphakelwa kwemisebenzi ukuze sihlangabezane nalokho enikulindeleko
Kulwela ukuthuthukiswa ngcono kokwethulwa kweensiza khona sizakuhlangabezana nokulindeleko.  
Silwela ukuthuthuka njalo ngomsebenzi esiwenzako ukuze sikwazi ukuhlangabezana neemfiso zakho

Lokha nawuthintana nathi siqu sakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nofana nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzokwenzeka:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawuthintana nathi bunqopha, ngomrhala, ngencwadi nofana ngeposommoya kuzokwenzeka okulandelako:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawusithinta ngokwakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nanyana nge-imeyili kuzakwenzeka lokhu okulandelako:
Nanyana kunini nawusithinta ngenyama, ngomtato, ngencwadi namkha nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzakwenzeka: 
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawuthintana nathi bunqopha, ngomrhala, ngencwadi nofana ngeposommoya kuzokwenzeka okulandelako:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawusithinta ngokwakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nanyana nge-imeyili kuzakwenzeka lokhu okulandelako:
Nanyana kunini nawusithinta ngenyama, ngomtato, ngencwadi namkha nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzakwenzeka: 
Lokha nawuthintana nathi siqu sakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nofana nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzokwenzeka:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawusithinta ngokwakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nanyana nge-imeyili kuzakwenzeka lokhu okulandelako:
Nanyana kunini nawusithinta ngenyama, ngomtato, ngencwadi namkha nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzakwenzeka: 
Lokha nawuthintana nathi siqu sakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nofana nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzokwenzeka:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawuthintana nathi bunqopha, ngomrhala, ngencwadi nofana ngeposommoya kuzokwenzeka okulandelako:
Nanyana kunini nawusithinta ngenyama, ngomtato, ngencwadi namkha nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzakwenzeka: 
Lokha nawuthintana nathi siqu sakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nofana nge-imeyili okulandelako kuzokwenzeka:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawuthintana nathi bunqopha, ngomrhala, ngencwadi nofana ngeposommoya kuzokwenzeka okulandelako:
Ngaso soke isikhathi nawusithinta ngokwakho, ngomtato, ngencwadi nanyana nge-imeyili kuzakwenzeka lokhu okulandelako:
Isisebenzi esizobe sikusiza sizozazisa kuwe.
Isisebenzi esisebenza ngamakhastama sizo/ziveza kuwe bona singubani.
Umenzeli womsebenzi wabathengi osebenzisana naye uzazitjho bona ungubani.
Umsebenzeli wamakhastama ozakutjheja uzazazisa kuwe. 
Isisebenzi esisebenza ngamakhastama sizo/ziveza kuwe bona singubani.
Umenzeli womsebenzi wabathengi osebenzisana naye uzazitjho bona ungubani.
Umsebenzeli wamakhastama ozakutjheja uzazazisa kuwe. 
Isisebenzi esizobe sikusiza sizozazisa kuwe.
Umenzeli womsebenzi wabathengi osebenzisana naye uzazitjho bona ungubani.
Umsebenzeli wamakhastama ozakutjheja uzazazisa kuwe. 
Isisebenzi esizobe sikusiza sizozazisa kuwe.
Isisebenzi esisebenza ngamakhastama sizo/ziveza kuwe bona singubani.
Umsebenzeli wamakhastama ozakutjheja uzazazisa kuwe. 
Isisebenzi esizobe sikusiza sizozazisa kuwe.
Isisebenzi esisebenza ngamakhastama sizo/ziveza kuwe bona singubani.
Umenzeli womsebenzi wabathengi osebenzisana naye uzazitjho bona ungubani.
Imibuzo ebuzwa ebuzwa ngomtato naleyo ebuzwa mumuntu siqu sakhe, sizoyiphendula khonokho.
Mayelana nemibuzo yomrhala noyibuza bunqopha ngokuzizela  wena qobo, siyirarulula khonokho.
Mayelana nomtato nemibuzo okungeyakho, sizakuphendula imibuzo yakho msinya.
Emibuzweni yomtato neyeposo, sizakurarulula imibuzo yakho khonokho. 
Mayelana nemibuzo yomrhala noyibuza bunqopha ngokuzizela  wena qobo, siyirarulula khonokho.
Mayelana nomtato nemibuzo okungeyakho, sizakuphendula imibuzo yakho msinya.
Emibuzweni yomtato neyeposo, sizakurarulula imibuzo yakho khonokho. 
Imibuzo ebuzwa ebuzwa ngomtato naleyo ebuzwa mumuntu siqu sakhe, sizoyiphendula khonokho.
Mayelana nomtato nemibuzo okungeyakho, sizakuphendula imibuzo yakho msinya.
Emibuzweni yomtato neyeposo, sizakurarulula imibuzo yakho khonokho. 
Imibuzo ebuzwa ebuzwa ngomtato naleyo ebuzwa mumuntu siqu sakhe, sizoyiphendula khonokho.
Mayelana nemibuzo yomrhala noyibuza bunqopha ngokuzizela  wena qobo, siyirarulula khonokho.
Emibuzweni yomtato neyeposo, sizakurarulula imibuzo yakho khonokho. 
Imibuzo ebuzwa ebuzwa ngomtato naleyo ebuzwa mumuntu siqu sakhe, sizoyiphendula khonokho.
Mayelana nemibuzo yomrhala noyibuza bunqopha ngokuzizela  wena qobo, siyirarulula khonokho.
Mayelana nomtato nemibuzo okungeyakho, sizakuphendula imibuzo yakho msinya.
Nasingakghoni ukuphendula khonokho, sizakunikela iinzathu besazise itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo. 
Nangabe kuyenzeka bona sibhalelwa kurarulula umrarwakho khonokho sizokunikela abonobangela bokubhalelwa bese sitjela itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nangabe siyabhalelwa kukuphendula msinya sizakunikela iinzathu begodu sazise umthengi bona angayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nayikuthi asikghoni ukuwurarulula khonokho sizakunikela ngamabanga begodu sazise itlayenti bona lilindele nini ipendulo.   
Nangabe kuyenzeka bona sibhalelwa kurarulula umrarwakho khonokho sizokunikela abonobangela bokubhalelwa bese sitjela itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nangabe siyabhalelwa kukuphendula msinya sizakunikela iinzathu begodu sazise umthengi bona angayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nayikuthi asikghoni ukuwurarulula khonokho sizakunikela ngamabanga begodu sazise itlayenti bona lilindele nini ipendulo.   
Nasingakghoni ukuphendula khonokho, sizakunikela iinzathu besazise itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo. 
Nangabe siyabhalelwa kukuphendula msinya sizakunikela iinzathu begodu sazise umthengi bona angayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nayikuthi asikghoni ukuwurarulula khonokho sizakunikela ngamabanga begodu sazise itlayenti bona lilindele nini ipendulo.   
Nasingakghoni ukuphendula khonokho, sizakunikela iinzathu besazise itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo. 
Nangabe kuyenzeka bona sibhalelwa kurarulula umrarwakho khonokho sizokunikela abonobangela bokubhalelwa bese sitjela itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nayikuthi asikghoni ukuwurarulula khonokho sizakunikela ngamabanga begodu sazise itlayenti bona lilindele nini ipendulo.   
Nasingakghoni ukuphendula khonokho, sizakunikela iinzathu besazise itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo. 
Nangabe kuyenzeka bona sibhalelwa kurarulula umrarwakho khonokho sizokunikela abonobangela bokubhalelwa bese sitjela itlayenti bona lingayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nangabe siyabhalelwa kukuphendula msinya sizakunikela iinzathu begodu sazise umthengi bona angayilindela nini ipendulo.
Sizakunikela inomborombuzo ezakusiza bona wenze ilandelela ngombuzo wakho.
Sizokunikela inomboro yereferensi ukuze ukwazi ukwenza ilandelela yombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ukwenzela bona ukghone ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ezakukghonakalisa ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho 
Sizokunikela inomboro yereferensi ukuze ukwazi ukwenza ilandelela yombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ukwenzela bona ukghone ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ezakukghonakalisa ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho 
Sizakunikela inomborombuzo ezakusiza bona wenze ilandelela ngombuzo wakho.
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ukwenzela bona ukghone ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ezakukghonakalisa ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho 
Sizakunikela inomborombuzo ezakusiza bona wenze ilandelela ngombuzo wakho.
Sizokunikela inomboro yereferensi ukuze ukwazi ukwenza ilandelela yombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ezakukghonakalisa ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho 
Sizakunikela inomborombuzo ezakusiza bona wenze ilandelela ngombuzo wakho.
Sizokunikela inomboro yereferensi ukuze ukwazi ukwenza ilandelela yombuzo wakho
Sizakunikela inomboro yereferensi ukwenzela bona ukghone ukwenza ilandelela ngombuzo wakho
Sizakuthumela umlayezo otjengisako bona samukele ukusithinta kwakho begodu sizakusebenza ngombuzo wakho emalangeni ali-7 wokusebenza.
Sizokuqinisekisela ngelwazi esilitholileko olithumela kithi begodu sizokusebenzana nombuzo phakathi kwamalanga ali-7 wokusebenza.
Sizakutlolela sivume bona sikufumene okhunye nokhunye okuthumeleko begodu sizakuqalana nakho hlangana namalanga ali-7 womsebenzi.
Sizakuvuma bona sifumene okhunye nokhunye ukuthintana okuthumelako begodu sizakatjheja indaba kungakapheli amalanga wokusebenza ali-7. 
Sizokuqinisekisela ngelwazi esilitholileko olithumela kithi begodu sizokusebenzana nombuzo phakathi kwamalanga ali-7 wokusebenza.

Nasingakghoni ukukuphendula emalangeni azeleko ali-7 wokusebenza, sizakutjela isizathu salokho begodu siveze bona ungayithola nini ipendulo.
Nangabe sibhalelwa ukukuphendula ngokuzeleko phakathi kwamalanga ali-7 wokusebenza, sizokutjela unobangela nokobana ungayithola nini ipendulo.
Nangabe angeze sikuphendule ngokuzeleko hlangana namalanga ali-7 womsebenzi, sizakutjela bona kubayini nokobana ungayilindela nini ipendulo.
Nayikuthi asikghoni ukukuphendula ngokuzeleko emalangeni wokusebenza ali-7, sizakutjela ukobana kungani godu nokobana ungayilindela nini ipendulo. 
Nangabe sibhalelwa ukukuphendula ngokuzeleko phakathi kwamalanga ali-7 wokusebenza, sizokutjela unobangela nokobana ungayithola nini ipendulo.

Sizakuzama ukurarulula umbuzo wakho emalangeni ama-21 wokusebenza.
Sizokuzama ukuphendula umbuzwakho phakathi kwamalanga ama-21 wokusebenza.
Sizakuzama ukuphendula umbuzo wakho hlangana namalanga ama-21 womsebenzi.
Sizakulinga ukurarulula indaba yakho kungakapheli amalanga wokusebenza ama-21.

Sizakuzama ukuphendula umbuzo wakho hlangana namalanga ama-21 womsebenzi.
Nawusidosela umtato, sinqophe ukuphendula umtato wakho msinya ngendlela esingakghona ngayo ngelimi elisemthethweni elifunwa nguwe.
Nawusibethela umrhala, umnqopho wethu ukukuphendula msinyana ngendlela okungakghonakala ngayo nangelimi olenyulako.
Nangabe usibethela umtato, sinqophe ukuphendula umtato wakho msinyazana ngendlela esingakghona ngakhona ngelimi elisemthethweni elithandwa nguwe. 
Nayikuthi usidosela umtato, sihlose ukuphendula umtato wakho ngokurhaba okukghonekako ngelimi langokomthetho olikhethako.

Sizakuthintana nawe ngokomtlolo mayelana nesiqunto ngesibonelelo sakho.
Sizokuphendula isiqunto esinye nesinye esisithathako ngokukutlolela incwadi
Sizakutjela esinye nesinye isiqunto esimayelana nemali yakho yesondlo ngokukutlolela
Sizakutjela ngesinye nesinye isiqunto esiphathelene nesibonelelo sakho ngomtlolo

Nawufika kelinye lama-ofisi wethu, isisebenzi sethu setafula yesizo sizakusiza khonokho. 
Nawufika e-ofisini elinye lama-Ofisethu, isisebenzi esisebenza ngaphambili sizokusiza khonokho.
Lokha nawufika kwenye yama-ofisi wethu, isisebenzi esisizanako esihlezi phasi sizakusiza msinya.
Lokha nawufika ema-ofisini wethu, abasebenzi bedeski lethu elinikela ngesizo bazakusiza khonokho.  
Nawufika e-ofisini elinye lama-Ofisethu, isisebenzi esisebenza ngaphambili sizokusiza khonokho.

Nawufika e-ofisini elinye lama-Ofisethu, isisebenzi esisebenza ngaphambili sizokusiza khonokho.
Lokha nawufika kwenye yama-ofisi wethu, isisebenzi esisizanako esihlezi phasi sizakusiza msinya.
Woke ama-ofisi wethu avulwa ngo-08h00 bekube ngo-16h30, ngoMvulo bekube ngeLesine begodu kusukela ngo-08h00 bekube ngo-16h00 ngeLesihlanu.
Ama-ofisethu woke avulwa ukusukela ngo-8h00 ukufikela ngo-16h30, ukusukela ngoMvulo ukuya ngeLesine begodu ukusukela ngo-08h00 ukufikela ngo-16h00 ngeLesihlanu.
Woke ama-ofisi wethu avulwa ukusukela nge-iri lobu-08h00 ukuyokufikela nge-iri le-16h30, ngoMvulo ukuya ngeLesine begodu ukusukela nge-iri lobu-08h00 ukuyokufika nge-iri lobu-16h00 ngeLesihlanu.
Woke ama-ofisi wethu avulwa ukuthoma ngo-08h00 bekube ngu-16h30, ngoMvulo ukufika ngeLesine kanye nango-08h00 ukufika ngo-16h00 ngeLesihlanu.

Iinkghonakalisi zeendlwana zangasese
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nasaziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo. 
Isizo ngezokwelapha nangabe kwazeke isikhathi sisese khona.
Isizo ngemitjhoga nasitjelwe kusesenesikhathi bona iyafuneka
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nayikuthi saziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo
Isizo ngezokwelapha nangabe kwazeke isikhathi sisese khona.
Isizo ngemitjhoga nasitjelwe kusesenesikhathi bona iyafuneka
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nayikuthi saziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nasaziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo. 
Isizo ngemitjhoga nasitjelwe kusesenesikhathi bona iyafuneka
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nayikuthi saziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nasaziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo. 
Isizo ngezokwelapha nangabe kwazeke isikhathi sisese khona.
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nayikuthi saziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo
Isizo lezokwelatjhwa nasaziswe kusese nesikhathi ngesidingo esinjalo. 
Isizo ngezokwelapha nangabe kwazeke isikhathi sisese khona.
Isizo ngemitjhoga nasitjelwe kusesenesikhathi bona iyafuneka
Sizakuza kuwe nakube ngeenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza kithi.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngobuthakathaka bepilo ubhalelwe kukuza ema-ofisini.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngokweenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu.
Sizakuza kuwe nayikuthi ngamabanga wezokwelatjhwa awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu. 
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngobuthakathaka bepilo ubhalelwe kukuza ema-ofisini.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngokweenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu.
Sizakuza kuwe nayikuthi ngamabanga wezokwelatjhwa awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu. 
Sizakuza kuwe nakube ngeenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza kithi.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngokweenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu.
Sizakuza kuwe nayikuthi ngamabanga wezokwelatjhwa awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu. 
Sizakuza kuwe nakube ngeenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza kithi.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngobuthakathaka bepilo ubhalelwe kukuza ema-ofisini.
Sizakuza kuwe nayikuthi ngamabanga wezokwelatjhwa awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu. 
Sizakuza kuwe nakube ngeenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza kithi.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngobuthakathaka bepilo ubhalelwe kukuza ema-ofisini.
Sizakuza kuwe nangabe ngokweenzathu zokungakaphili kuhle awukghoni ukuza ema-ofisini wethu.
Ungasidosela umtato bese sizakuhlela ukukuvakatjhela ekhaya.
Ungasibethela umrhala bese thina sizakuvakatjhela ekhaya.
Ungasithinta ngomtato begodu sizakuhlela ivakatjho lokuzokubona ekhaya.
Ungasidosela umtato begodu sizakuhlela ukuza kuwe. 
Ungasibethela umrhala bese thina sizakuvakatjhela ekhaya.
Ungasithinta ngomtato begodu sizakuhlela ivakatjho lokuzokubona ekhaya.

Ukusebenza ngesibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle.
Ukusebenzana nesibawo sesibonelelo sakho sesondlo
Ukuqalana nesibawo sakho semali yesondlo
Ukutjheja isibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle
Ukusebenzana nesibawo sesibonelelo sakho sesondlo
Ukuqalana nesibawo sakho semali yesondlo
Ukutjheja isibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle
Ukusebenza ngesibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle.
Ukuqalana nesibawo sakho semali yesondlo
Ukutjheja isibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle
Ukusebenza ngesibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle.
Ukusebenzana nesibawo sesibonelelo sakho sesondlo
Ukutjheja isibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle
Ukusebenza ngesibawo sakho sesibonelelo sezehlalakuhle.
Ukusebenzana nesibawo sesibonelelo sakho sesondlo
Ukuqalana nesibawo sakho semali yesondlo
Sizakuthoma ukusenza isibawo sakho ngelanga osifake ngaso.
Sizokuthoma ngokusebenzana nesibawo sakho ngalo lelo langa.
Sizakuthoma ngekambiso yokutjheja isibawo sakho khona mhlokho.
Sizakuthoma ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho khona mhlokho. 
Sizokuthoma ngokusebenzana nesibawo sakho ngalo lelo langa.
Sizakuthoma ngekambiso yokutjheja isibawo sakho khona mhlokho.
Sizakuthoma ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho khona mhlokho. 
Sizakuthoma ukusenza isibawo sakho ngelanga osifake ngaso.
Sizakuthoma ngekambiso yokutjheja isibawo sakho khona mhlokho.
Sizakuthoma ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho khona mhlokho. 
Sizakuthoma ukusenza isibawo sakho ngelanga osifake ngaso.
Sizokuthoma ngokusebenzana nesibawo sakho ngalo lelo langa.
Sizakuthoma ukusebenzana nesibawo sakho khona mhlokho. 
Sizakuthoma ukusenza isibawo sakho ngelanga osifake ngaso.
Sizokuthoma ngokusebenzana nesibawo sakho ngalo lelo langa.
Sizakuthoma ngekambiso yokutjheja isibawo sakho khona mhlokho.
Sifuna bona siqinisekise ukuthi uvumelekile ngokomthetho bona uthole isibonelelo.
Sifuna ukwenza isiqinisekiso bona unelungelo lesondlo ngokomthetho.
Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokobana ngokomthetho ufanele ukuthola imali yesondlo.
Kufanele siqinisekise bonyana kwamambala uyafaneleka kufumana isibonelelo sehlalakuhle.

Sizibekela iqothelo lokusebenza ngetleyimu yakho besibhadele isibonelelo sakho emalangeni ama-90.
Sizibekela isikhathi sokusebenzana netleyimi yakho begodu sibhadele isondlo phakathi kwamalanga ama-90.
Sizibekela iinkhathi ukobana siqalane netleyimu yakho bese sibhadala imali yakho yesondlo hlangana namalanga ama-90.
Sizibekela okunqotjhiweko ukuze siqalane nesibawo sakho begodu sibhadele isibonelelo sakho kungakapheli amalanga ama-90.

Sizokweluleka ngelungelo lakho lokuzibilayeza esahlakalweni sokwaliwa, sokujanyiswa kanye nokukhanselwa kwesibawo sakho.
Sizokweluleka ngelungelo lakho lokunghonghoyila nangabe uyaliwa, ubekelwa eqadi begodu uyasulwa
Sizakuyelelisa ngelungelo lakho  ukobana ufake isililo lokha nasaliweko, nasijanyisiweko begodu nasisuliweko.
Sizakuyelelisa ngelungelo lakho lokudlulisa isiqunto nakungenzeka saliwe, sijanyiswe godu sisulwe

Ukwenza isiqunto.
Ukuthatha isiqunto.
Nasithethe isiqunto ngesibawo sakho sesibonelelo begodu ucabanga bona asikalungi, nofana ungafuna ilwazi elinabileko ngesiqunto, ungenza okulandelako:
Nangabe senza isiqunto mayelana nesibawo sakho sesondlo begodu ucabanga bona akukalungi, nofana udinga ilwazi elingezelelweko elimayelana nesiqunto, ungenza okulandelako:
Nangabe sithatha isiqunto ngesibawo sakho semali yesondlo begodu ucabanga bona asikalungi, nanyana ungathanda ukuthola elinye ilwazi elinengana mayelana nesiqunto, ungenza lokhu okulandelako:
Nayikuthi senza isiqunto ngesibawo sakho sesibonelelo begodu ucabanga bona asikalungi, namkha ungathanda ukunikelwa ilwazi elinye ngesiqunto, ungenza okulandelako: 
Nangabe senza isiqunto mayelana nesibawo sakho sesondlo begodu ucabanga bona akukalungi, nofana udinga ilwazi elingezelelweko elimayelana nesiqunto, ungenza okulandelako:
Nangabe sithatha isiqunto ngesibawo sakho semali yesondlo begodu ucabanga bona asikalungi, nanyana ungathanda ukuthola elinye ilwazi elinengana mayelana nesiqunto, ungenza lokhu okulandelako:

Sibawa bona sihlathulule ngesiqunto kabanzi begodu sizakubambisana nesibawo sakhe.
Sibawe bona sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko, sizokwenza lokho.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakwenza lokho okubawako.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakukhambisana nesibawo sakho. 
Sibawe bona sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko, sizokwenza lokho.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakwenza lokho okubawako.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakukhambisana nesibawo sakho. 
Sibawa bona sihlathulule ngesiqunto kabanzi begodu sizakubambisana nesibawo sakhe.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakwenza lokho okubawako.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakukhambisana nesibawo sakho. 
Sibawa bona sihlathulule ngesiqunto kabanzi begodu sizakubambisana nesibawo sakhe.
Sibawe bona sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko, sizokwenza lokho.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakukhambisana nesibawo sakho. 
Sibawa bona sihlathulule ngesiqunto kabanzi begodu sizakubambisana nesibawo sakhe.
Sibawe bona sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko, sizokwenza lokho.
Sibawa sikuhlathululele isiqunto ngokuzeleko begodu sizakwenza lokho okubawako.
Ungazibilayeza ngesiqunto sethu emalangeneni ama-30 wedeyidi evela encwadini yesiqunto.
Ungakwazi ukunghonghoyila ngesiqunto sethu phakathi kwamalanga ama-30 ngelanga okuphume ngalo incwadi yesiqunto.
Ungafaka isililo sesiqunto sethu kwaphela hlangana namalanga ama-30 welanga elisencwadini yesiqunto.
Ungadlulisa isiqunto kuphela kungakapheli amalanga ama-30 ngemva kwelanga lencwadi eyazisa ngesiqunto.

Ungalithola ifayili lakho mayelana nginanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalidinga.
Ungakwazi ukuthola ifayili ngelwazi elinye nelinye  olidingako.
Ungathola ifayili yakho nawufuna nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi okungenzeka ulitlhoge.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho ukuze ufumane nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalitlhoga. 
Ungakwazi ukuthola ifayili ngelwazi elinye nelinye  olidingako.
Ungathola ifayili yakho nawufuna nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi okungenzeka ulitlhoge.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho ukuze ufumane nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalitlhoga. 
Ungalithola ifayili lakho mayelana nginanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalidinga.
Ungathola ifayili yakho nawufuna nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi okungenzeka ulitlhoge.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho ukuze ufumane nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalitlhoga. 
Ungalithola ifayili lakho mayelana nginanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalidinga.
Ungakwazi ukuthola ifayili ngelwazi elinye nelinye  olidingako.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho ukuze ufumane nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalitlhoga. 
Ungalithola ifayili lakho mayelana nginanyana ngiliphi ilwazi ongalidinga.
Ungakwazi ukuthola ifayili ngelwazi elinye nelinye  olidingako.
Ungathola ifayili yakho nawufuna nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi okungenzeka ulitlhoge.

Kusinikela:
Ngewokusinikela:
Kuzakuba kukusinikela: 
Kusinikela:
Ngewokusinikela:
Kusinikela lokhu:
I-adresi yakho yeposo neyalapha uhlala khona.
Isiphande sakho sokuposa nesokuhlala esilungileko.
Isiphande sakho seposo esifaneleko nesendawo ohlala kiyo.
Nge-adresi yakho yeposo neyokuhlala elungileko.  
Isiphande sakho sokuposa nesokuhlala esilungileko.
Isiphande sakho seposo esifaneleko nesendawo ohlala kiyo.
Nge-adresi yakho yeposo neyokuhlala elungileko.  
I-adresi yakho yeposo neyalapha uhlala khona.
Isiphande sakho seposo esifaneleko nesendawo ohlala kiyo.
Nge-adresi yakho yeposo neyokuhlala elungileko.  
I-adresi yakho yeposo neyalapha uhlala khona.
Isiphande sakho sokuposa nesokuhlala esilungileko.
Nge-adresi yakho yeposo neyokuhlala elungileko.  
I-adresi yakho yeposo neyalapha uhlala khona.
Isiphande sakho sokuposa nesokuhlala esilungileko.
Isiphande sakho seposo esifaneleko nesendawo ohlala kiyo.
Amatjhuguluko amayelana nawe siqu sakho afana nemirholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wobujamo bakho obufana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezepilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wezinto zakho ezifana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Ngamatjhuguluko ebujameni bakho obufana nengeniso, i-adresi, ubujamo bezokwelatjhwa, njll. 
Amatjhuguluko wobujamo bakho obufana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezepilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wezinto zakho ezifana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Ngamatjhuguluko ebujameni bakho obufana nengeniso, i-adresi, ubujamo bezokwelatjhwa, njll. 
Amatjhuguluko amayelana nawe siqu sakho afana nemirholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wezinto zakho ezifana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Ngamatjhuguluko ebujameni bakho obufana nengeniso, i-adresi, ubujamo bezokwelatjhwa, njll. 
Amatjhuguluko amayelana nawe siqu sakho afana nemirholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wobujamo bakho obufana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezepilo njll.
Ngamatjhuguluko ebujameni bakho obufana nengeniso, i-adresi, ubujamo bezokwelatjhwa, njll. 
Amatjhuguluko amayelana nawe siqu sakho afana nemirholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wobujamo bakho obufana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezepilo njll.
Amatjhuguluko wezinto zakho ezifana nomrholo, isiphande, ubujamo bezamaphilo njll.
Ilwazi elithembekako, eliliqiniso, elinembako begodu nelipheleleko nofana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ihlathululo nofana ilwazi elithembekileko, eliyiqiniso, elinqophileko ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ukuthembeka, ukuba neqiniso, ilwazi elinembako nelipheleleko nanyana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi.
Ngehlathululo namkha ilwazi elinokuthembeka, eliliqiniso, elinembako nelipheleleko ngazo zoke iinkhathi.  
Ihlathululo nofana ilwazi elithembekileko, eliyiqiniso, elinqophileko ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ukuthembeka, ukuba neqiniso, ilwazi elinembako nelipheleleko nanyana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi.
Ngehlathululo namkha ilwazi elinokuthembeka, eliliqiniso, elinembako nelipheleleko ngazo zoke iinkhathi.  
Ilwazi elithembekako, eliliqiniso, elinembako begodu nelipheleleko nofana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ukuthembeka, ukuba neqiniso, ilwazi elinembako nelipheleleko nanyana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi.
Ngehlathululo namkha ilwazi elinokuthembeka, eliliqiniso, elinembako nelipheleleko ngazo zoke iinkhathi.  
Ilwazi elithembekako, eliliqiniso, elinembako begodu nelipheleleko nofana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ihlathululo nofana ilwazi elithembekileko, eliyiqiniso, elinqophileko ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ngehlathululo namkha ilwazi elinokuthembeka, eliliqiniso, elinembako nelipheleleko ngazo zoke iinkhathi.  
Ilwazi elithembekako, eliliqiniso, elinembako begodu nelipheleleko nofana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ihlathululo nofana ilwazi elithembekileko, eliyiqiniso, elinqophileko ngaso soke isikhathi. 
Ukuthembeka, ukuba neqiniso, ilwazi elinembako nelipheleleko nanyana ihlathululo ngaso soke isikhathi.
Ukuphendula ngesikhathi ekutlolelaneni nathi okufakahlangana ukubuyekezwa nofana nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ukuphendula ngaso soke isikhathi imibuzo esikubuza yona efaka hlangana iimbuyekezo nofana ilwazi elinye nelinye elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ukuphendula ngesikhathi kikho koke othunyelwa khona kufakwe hlangana ukubuyekezwa nanyana elinye nelinye ilwazi elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ngependulo ngesikhathi kikho koke ukuthintana kufaka ukubuyekeza namkha elinye ilwazi elibawiwa kuwe.   
Ukuphendula ngaso soke isikhathi imibuzo esikubuza yona efaka hlangana iimbuyekezo nofana ilwazi elinye nelinye elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ukuphendula ngesikhathi kikho koke othunyelwa khona kufakwe hlangana ukubuyekezwa nanyana elinye nelinye ilwazi elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ngependulo ngesikhathi kikho koke ukuthintana kufaka ukubuyekeza namkha elinye ilwazi elibawiwa kuwe.

Ngependulo ngesikhathi kikho koke ukuthintana kufaka ukubuyekeza namkha elinye ilwazi elibawiwa kuwe.   
Ukuphendula ngesikhathi ekutlolelaneni nathi okufakahlangana ukubuyekezwa nofana nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ukuphendula ngaso soke isikhathi imibuzo esikubuza yona efaka hlangana iimbuyekezo nofana ilwazi elinye nelinye elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ngependulo ngesikhathi kikho koke ukuthintana kufaka ukubuyekeza namkha elinye ilwazi elibawiwa kuwe.   
Ukuphendula ngesikhathi ekutlolelaneni nathi okufakahlangana ukubuyekezwa nofana nanyana ngiliphi ilwazi elikhonjelwa kuwe.
Ukuphendula ngaso soke isikhathi imibuzo esikubuza yona efaka hlangana iimbuyekezo nofana ilwazi elinye nelinye elikhonjelwa kuwe.

Sithethe isikhathi eside ukusebenza ngesibawo sakho begodu/nofana azange uthole isibonelelo sakho ngesikhathi.
Wokobana sithatha isikhathi eside ukusebenzana nesondlo begodu/nofana awukatholi imbadelo ngesikhathi.
Sithethe isikhathi eside ukutjheja imali yakho yesondlo begodu/nanyana akhange ufumane imali yakho ngesikhathi esifaneleko.
Sithethe isikhathi eside khulu ukusebenzana nesibonelelo sakho kanye/namkha awukafumani imbhadelo yakho ngesikhathi. 
Wokobana sithatha isikhathi eside ukusebenzana nesondlo begodu/nofana awukatholi imbadelo ngesikhathi.

Sithethe isikhathi eside ukusebenza ngesibawo sakho begodu/nofana azange uthole isibonelelo sakho ngesikhathi.

Iinsebenzi zethu zenze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana zikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana sikunikele isiluleko esingakalungi. 
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso encwadini yakho yesibawo nanyana sikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Abasebenzi bethu benze iphoso esibaweni sakho namkha bakunikele ngesiyeleliso esingakalungi. 
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana sikunikele isiluleko esingakalungi. 
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso encwadini yakho yesibawo nanyana sikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Abasebenzi bethu benze iphoso esibaweni sakho namkha bakunikele ngesiyeleliso esingakalungi. 
Iinsebenzi zethu zenze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana zikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso encwadini yakho yesibawo nanyana sikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Abasebenzi bethu benze iphoso esibaweni sakho namkha bakunikele ngesiyeleliso esingakalungi. 
Iinsebenzi zethu zenze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana zikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana sikunikele isiluleko esingakalungi. 
Abasebenzi bethu benze iphoso esibaweni sakho namkha bakunikele ngesiyeleliso esingakalungi. 
Iinsebenzi zethu zenze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana zikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso esibaweni sakho nofana sikunikele isiluleko esingakalungi. 
Isisebenzi sethu senze iphoso encwadini yakho yesibawo nanyana sikunikele isiyeleliso esingakalungi.

sazisa ngayo, sizakulungisa nanyana ngiyiphi iphoso esiyenzileko khonokho.
Sazise ngako koke sizokulungisa iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngakho sizakulungisa msinya elinye nelinye iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngayo begodu msinyana sizakulungisa enye nenye iphoso esiyenzileko.  
Sazise ngako koke sizokulungisa iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngakho sizakulungisa msinya elinye nelinye iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngayo begodu msinyana sizakulungisa enye nenye iphoso esiyenzileko.  
sazisa ngayo, sizakulungisa nanyana ngiyiphi iphoso esiyenzileko khonokho.
sazisa ngakho sizakulungisa msinya elinye nelinye iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngayo begodu msinyana sizakulungisa enye nenye iphoso esiyenzileko.  
sazisa ngayo, sizakulungisa nanyana ngiyiphi iphoso esiyenzileko khonokho.
Sazise ngako koke sizokulungisa iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngayo begodu msinyana sizakulungisa enye nenye iphoso esiyenzileko.  
sazisa ngayo, sizakulungisa nanyana ngiyiphi iphoso esiyenzileko khonokho.
Sazise ngako koke sizokulungisa iphoso esilenzileko.
sazisa ngakho sizakulungisa msinya elinye nelinye iphoso esilenzileko.
Nawufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela nofana usidosele umtato bese ubawa ukudluliselwa ezikweni letjhejo lamakhastama.
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, ngibawa usitlolele namtjhana usibethele umrhala begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa ezikweni lokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama.
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, sibawa usitlolele nanyana usibethele umtato ukobana sikudlulisele ezikweni lethu lokutlhogomela abathengi.
Nayikuthi ufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela namkha sidosela umtato begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa kuyunidi yethu yokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama. 
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, ngibawa usitlolele namtjhana usibethele umrhala begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa ezikweni lokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama.
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, sibawa usitlolele nanyana usibethele umtato ukobana sikudlulisele ezikweni lethu lokutlhogomela abathengi.
Nayikuthi ufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela namkha sidosela umtato begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa kuyunidi yethu yokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama. 
Nawufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela nofana usidosele umtato bese ubawa ukudluliselwa ezikweni letjhejo lamakhastama.
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, sibawa usitlolele nanyana usibethele umtato ukobana sikudlulisele ezikweni lethu lokutlhogomela abathengi.
Nayikuthi ufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela namkha sidosela umtato begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa kuyunidi yethu yokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama. 
Nawufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela nofana usidosele umtato bese ubawa ukudluliselwa ezikweni letjhejo lamakhastama.
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, ngibawa usitlolele namtjhana usibethele umrhala begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa ezikweni lokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama.
Nayikuthi ufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela namkha sidosela umtato begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa kuyunidi yethu yokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama. 
Nawufuna ukwenza isinghonghoyilo, sitlolela nofana usidosele umtato bese ubawa ukudluliselwa ezikweni letjhejo lamakhastama.
Nangabe ufuna ukufaka isinghonghoyilo, ngibawa usitlolele namtjhana usibethele umrhala begodu ubawe ukudluliselwa ezikweni lokutlhogonyelwa kwamakhastama.

Sithumela umbiko obuyako ngokusebenzisa nanyana ngiyiphi yeendlela ezivezwe ngenzasi:
Sibawa uthumele umbiko obuyako ngendlela enye nenye kezilandela ngenzasi:
Sibawa usithumele umbiko obuyako ngenye nenye yeendlela ezilandelako ngenzasi:
Ngobuhle sithumela imibiko ebuyako ngenye nenye yeendlela ezilandela ngenzasi:

Sibawa uthumele umbiko obuyako ngendlela enye nenye kezilandela ngenzasi:
Sibawa usithumele umbiko obuyako ngenye nenye yeendlela ezilandelako ngenzasi:
Dosela isentha yemitato yethu enomborweni yasimahla i-0800 601 011
Bethela iziko lethu lemirhala yasimahla-0800 601 011
Bethela isentha yethu yemitato yasimahla yenomboro -0800 601 011

Bethela iziko lethu lemirhala yasimahla-0800 601 011
Bethela isentha yethu yemitato yasimahla yenomboro -0800 601 011

Dosela isentha yemitato yethu enomborweni yasimahla i-0800 601 011

Dosela isentha yemitato yethu enomborweni yasimahla i-0800 601 011

Dosela inomboro yomtato ongabhadelwako yesentha yethu ethi-0800 601 011

Zalisa ikarada lokuphawula kwekhastama elitholakala ema-ofisini wethu neendaweni zokurholela.
Zalisa ikarada leemphakamiso zamakhastama elitholakala kokubili ema-ofisinethu neendaweni zokubhadalela.
Zalisa ikarada lomthengi leemphakamiso elikhona kiwo womabili ama-ofisi wethu neendawo ekubhadalwa kizo.
Zalisa ikarada lemibono yamakhastama elitholakala kokubili ema-ofisini wethu kanye neendaweni zethu zokubhadelwa kweembonelelo. 
Zalisa ikarada leemphakamiso zamakhastama elitholakala kokubili ema-ofisinethu neendaweni zokubhadalela.

Vakatjhela nanyana ngiziphi iindawo zethu zokuthintana. 
Vakatjhela ezinye nezinye iindawo zokuthintana zethu.
Vakatjhela ezinye nezinye iindawo zethu osithinta kizo.
Vakatjhela enye yeendawo zethu zokuthintanela.
Vakatjhela ezinye nezinye iindawo zokuthintana zethu.

Faka isethulo sakho esitloliweko kinanyana ngiwaphi ama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka okutloliweko e-ofisini elinye nelinye  ema-ofisinethu.
Thumela iimphakamiso ezitloliweko kwenye nenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Letha isethulo esitloliweko kwelinye nelinye lama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka okutloliweko e-ofisini elinye nelinye  ema-ofisinethu.
Thumela iimphakamiso ezitloliweko kwenye nenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Letha isethulo esitloliweko kwelinye nelinye lama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka isethulo sakho esitloliweko kinanyana ngiwaphi ama-ofisi wethu. 
Thumela iimphakamiso ezitloliweko kwenye nenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Letha isethulo esitloliweko kwelinye nelinye lama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka isethulo sakho esitloliweko kinanyana ngiwaphi ama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka okutloliweko e-ofisini elinye nelinye  ema-ofisinethu.
Letha isethulo esitloliweko kwelinye nelinye lama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka isethulo sakho esitloliweko kinanyana ngiwaphi ama-ofisi wethu. 
Faka okutloliweko e-ofisini elinye nelinye  ema-ofisinethu.
Thumela iimphakamiso ezitloliweko kwenye nenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Imibuzo nofana ukuphawula ngomtlolomalungelo 
Imibuzo nofana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nalomtlolo
Imibuzo nanyana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nencwadi yesivumelwano le
Imibuzo namkha iimphakamiso ngaletjhatha
Imibuzo nofana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nalomtlolo
Imibuzo nanyana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nencwadi yesivumelwano le
Imibuzo namkha iimphakamiso ngaletjhatha
Imibuzo nofana ukuphawula ngomtlolomalungelo 
Imibuzo nanyana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nencwadi yesivumelwano le
Imibuzo namkha iimphakamiso ngaletjhatha
Imibuzo nofana ukuphawula ngomtlolomalungelo 
Imibuzo nofana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nalomtlolo
Imibuzo namkha iimphakamiso ngaletjhatha
Imibuzo nofana ukuphawula ngomtlolomalungelo 
Imibuzo nofana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nalomtlolo
Imibuzo nanyana iimphakamiso ezimayelana nencwadi yesivumelwano le
Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko ngomtlolomalungelo lo, dosela umtato kenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nangabe udinga ilwazi elingezelelweko mayelana nalomtlolo, bethela enye nenye i-yama-ofisethu.
Nangabe ufuna elinye nelinye ilwazi elinengana ngencwadi yesivumelwano le, sibethela kwenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nayikuthi ufuna elinye ilwazi ngaletjhatha, yiza kwelinye lama-ofisi wethu.
Nangabe udinga ilwazi elingezelelweko mayelana nalomtlolo, bethela enye nenye i-yama-ofisethu.
Nangabe ufuna elinye nelinye ilwazi elinengana ngencwadi yesivumelwano le, sibethela kwenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nayikuthi ufuna elinye ilwazi ngaletjhatha, yiza kwelinye lama-ofisi wethu.
Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko ngomtlolomalungelo lo, dosela umtato kenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nangabe ufuna elinye nelinye ilwazi elinengana ngencwadi yesivumelwano le, sibethela kwenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nayikuthi ufuna elinye ilwazi ngaletjhatha, yiza kwelinye lama-ofisi wethu.
Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko ngomtlolomalungelo lo, dosela umtato kenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nangabe udinga ilwazi elingezelelweko mayelana nalomtlolo, bethela enye nenye i-yama-ofisethu.
Nayikuthi ufuna elinye ilwazi ngaletjhatha, yiza kwelinye lama-ofisi wethu.
Nawufuna ilwazi elinabileko ngomtlolomalungelo lo, dosela umtato kenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Nangabe udinga ilwazi elingezelelweko mayelana nalomtlolo, bethela enye nenye i-yama-ofisethu.
Nangabe ufuna elinye nelinye ilwazi elinengana ngencwadi yesivumelwano le, sibethela kwenye yama-ofisi wethu.
Umtlolomalungelo lo ungawuthola ngeBreyili, ngetheyibhu elalelwako kanye nange-CD, nawukhombelako.
Ungathola umTlolo lo ngeBhreyili, ngesigadangisilalelwa ne-CD, nawungenza isibawo.
Incwadi yesivumelwano le ungayithola ngeBreyili, ngetheyibhu elalelwako kanye nange-CD nangabe uyakubawa.
Ungafumana letjhatha nge-Braille, itheyibhu elalelwako kanye ne-CD, nawubawako.
Ungathola umTlolo lo ngeBhreyili, ngesigadangisilalelwa ne-CD, nawungenza isibawo.
Incwadi yesivumelwano le ungayithola ngeBreyili, ngetheyibhu elalelwako kanye nange-CD nangabe uyakubawa.
Ungafumana letjhatha nge-Braille, itheyibhu elalelwako kanye ne-CD, nawubawako.

Ungafumana letjhatha nge-Braille, itheyibhu elalelwako kanye ne-CD, nawubawako.
Umtlolomalungelo lo ungawuthola ngeBreyili, ngetheyibhu elalelwako kanye nange-CD, nawukhombelako.

Ungafumana letjhatha nge-Braille, itheyibhu elalelwako kanye ne-CD, nawubawako.
Umtlolomalungelo lo ungawuthola ngeBreyili, ngetheyibhu elalelwako kanye nange-CD, nawukhombelako.
Ungathola umTlolo lo ngeBhreyili, ngesigadangisilalelwa ne-CD, nawungenza isibawo.
Incwadi yesivumelwano le ungayithola ngeBreyili, ngetheyibhu elalelwako kanye nange-CD nangabe uyakubawa.
Umtlolomalungelo lo uzokuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu uzakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze kufakwe ukuphawula kwakho.
UmTlolo lo uzokuthoma ngezi-01/04/2007 begodu uzokubuyekezwa qobe ngomnyaka ukuze ufake hlangana iimphakamiso zenu.
INcwadi yesiVumelwano le izakuthoma ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa qobe mnyaka ukobana kufakwe iimphakamiso zakho.
LeTjhatha izakuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka 01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze ifake imibono yakho. 
UmTlolo lo uzokuthoma ngezi-01/04/2007 begodu uzokubuyekezwa qobe ngomnyaka ukuze ufake hlangana iimphakamiso zenu.
INcwadi yesiVumelwano le izakuthoma ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa qobe mnyaka ukobana kufakwe iimphakamiso zakho.
LeTjhatha izakuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka 01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze ifake imibono yakho. 
Umtlolomalungelo lo uzokuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu uzakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze kufakwe ukuphawula kwakho.
INcwadi yesiVumelwano le izakuthoma ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa qobe mnyaka ukobana kufakwe iimphakamiso zakho.
LeTjhatha izakuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka 01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze ifake imibono yakho. 
Umtlolomalungelo lo uzokuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu uzakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze kufakwe ukuphawula kwakho.
UmTlolo lo uzokuthoma ngezi-01/04/2007 begodu uzokubuyekezwa qobe ngomnyaka ukuze ufake hlangana iimphakamiso zenu.
LeTjhatha izakuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka 01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze ifake imibono yakho. 
Umtlolomalungelo lo uzokuthoma ukusebenza ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu uzakubuyekezwa njalo ngomnyaka ukuze kufakwe ukuphawula kwakho.
UmTlolo lo uzokuthoma ngezi-01/04/2007 begodu uzokubuyekezwa qobe ngomnyaka ukuze ufake hlangana iimphakamiso zenu.
INcwadi yesiVumelwano le izakuthoma ngomhlaka-01/04/2007 begodu izakubuyekezwa qobe mnyaka ukobana kufakwe iimphakamiso zakho.

IZiko leemBalobalo zeSewula Afrika - Iindaba
Iimbalobalo zeSewula Afrika - IiNdaba
Ngaphakathi kwemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yembalobalo izokukhuphuka njengoba idemokhrasi iqina.
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Isidingo seembalobalo sizokhuphuka njengobana intando yenengi ilokhu ijula nje
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko leemBalobalo lizakwanda njengombana intando yenengi ingenelela
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yeembalobalo izakwanda lokha intando yenengi nayidephako  
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Isidingo seembalobalo sizokhuphuka njengobana intando yenengi ilokhu ijula nje
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko leemBalobalo lizakwanda njengombana intando yenengi ingenelela
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yeembalobalo izakwanda lokha intando yenengi nayidephako  
Ngaphakathi kwemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yembalobalo izokukhuphuka njengoba idemokhrasi iqina.
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko leemBalobalo lizakwanda njengombana intando yenengi ingenelela
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yeembalobalo izakwanda lokha intando yenengi nayidephako  
Ngaphakathi kwemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yembalobalo izokukhuphuka njengoba idemokhrasi iqina.
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Isidingo seembalobalo sizokhuphuka njengobana intando yenengi ilokhu ijula nje
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yeembalobalo izakwanda lokha intando yenengi nayidephako  
Ngaphakathi kwemBalobalo: Itlhogeko yembalobalo izokukhuphuka njengoba idemokhrasi iqina.
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Isidingo seembalobalo sizokhuphuka njengobana intando yenengi ilokhu ijula nje
Ngaphakathi kweemBalobalo: Itlhogeko leemBalobalo lizakwanda njengombana intando yenengi ingenelela

Umtlolo-ndaba lo wathonywa ukuvezwa ku-Business Report ngezi-05 Rhoboyi 2004
I-athikili le kokuthoma yakhutjhwa ku-Business Report ngomhlaka-05 kuRhoboyi 2004
Le-athikili yakhutjhwa kokuthoma ku-Business Report ngomhlaka 05 Arhostosi 2004

Le-athikili yakhutjhwa kokuthoma ku-Business Report ngomhlaka 05 Arhostosi 2004

Le-athikili yakhutjhwa kokuthoma ku-Business Report ngomhlaka 05 Arhostosi 2004

Le-athikili yakhutjhwa kokuthoma ku-Business Report ngomhlaka 05 Arhostosi 2004
I-atikili le yagadangiswa kokuthoma emBikweni wezamaBhizinisi ngomhlaka 05 kuRhoboyi 2004.
Umtlolo-ndaba lo wathonywa ukuvezwa ku-Business Report ngezi-05 Rhoboyi 2004
I-athikili le kokuthoma yakhutjhwa ku-Business Report ngomhlaka-05 kuRhoboyi 2004
Iveke ephelileko ngikhambele umhlangano wesifunda wokubonisa kwebhodo  yeSentha yokuBandula malungana neemBalobalo zeenarha ezingePumalanga ye-Afrika            ese-Tanzania, lapho ngibe nethuba lokukhambela umnyanya womnyaka wokuthola iziqu wama-39 wesentha le, lapho amalunga amahlanu weensebenzi zeZiko lemBalobalo le-SA bekazibandakanye khona.
Iveke ephelileko ngiye emhlanganweni webhodi yokululeka yesifunda eZikweni lokuBandula ngeemBalobalo lePumalanga ye-Afrika eliseTanzania, lapho ngibe nethuba lokuya emnyanyeni wokuthweswa kweziqu waqobe mnyaka wama-39, lapho amalunga amahlanu wabasebenzi beemBalobalo ze-SA ahlanganyele khona.
Ngeveke egadungileko ngikhambele umhlangano webhodi wesifunda wokululeka we-Sentha eBandula ngeemBalobalo yePumalanga Afrika eTanzania, lapha ngathola khona ithuba lokukhambela umnyanya waqobe mnyaka wama-39 wokwembeswa iziqu wesentha, lapha iinsebenzi ezihlanu zeemBalobalo ze-SA zizibandakanye khona.
Ngeveke ephelileko ngikhambele umhlangano webhodo yesifunda yokuyelelisa yeSentha yezeBandulo leemBalobalo yePumalanga Afrika e-Tanzania, lapho ngaba nethuba lokukhambela umnyanya wama-39 wanjalo ngonyaka wokuthweswa kweziqu, lapho abasebenzi abahlanu beZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika bazibandakanya khona.  
Iveke ephelileko ngiye emhlanganweni webhodi yokululeka yesifunda eZikweni lokuBandula ngeemBalobalo lePumalanga ye-Afrika eliseTanzania, lapho ngibe nethuba lokuya emnyanyeni wokuthweswa kweziqu waqobe mnyaka wama-39, lapho amalunga amahlanu wabasebenzi beemBalobalo ze-SA ahlanganyele khona.
Ngeveke egadungileko ngikhambele umhlangano webhodi wesifunda wokululeka we-Sentha eBandula ngeemBalobalo yePumalanga Afrika eTanzania, lapha ngathola khona ithuba lokukhambela umnyanya waqobe mnyaka wama-39 wokwembeswa iziqu wesentha, lapha iinsebenzi ezihlanu zeemBalobalo ze-SA zizibandakanye khona.
Ngeveke ephelileko ngikhambele umhlangano webhodo yesifunda yokuyelelisa yeSentha yezeBandulo leemBalobalo yePumalanga Afrika e-Tanzania, lapho ngaba nethuba lokukhambela umnyanya wama-39 wanjalo ngonyaka wokuthweswa kweziqu, lapho abasebenzi abahlanu beZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika bazibandakanya khona.  
Iveke ephelileko ngikhambele umhlangano wesifunda wokubonisa kwebhodo  yeSentha yokuBandula malungana neemBalobalo zeenarha ezingePumalanga ye-Afrika            ese-Tanzania, lapho ngibe nethuba lokukhambela umnyanya womnyaka wokuthola iziqu wama-39 wesentha le, lapho amalunga amahlanu weensebenzi zeZiko lemBalobalo le-SA bekazibandakanye khona.
Ngeveke egadungileko ngikhambele umhlangano webhodi wesifunda wokululeka we-Sentha eBandula ngeemBalobalo yePumalanga Afrika eTanzania, lapha ngathola khona ithuba lokukhambela umnyanya waqobe mnyaka wama-39 wokwembeswa iziqu wesentha, lapha iinsebenzi ezihlanu zeemBalobalo ze-SA zizibandakanye khona.

Ngeveke egadungileko ngikhambele umhlangano webhodi wesifunda wokululeka we-Sentha eBandula ngeemBalobalo yePumalanga Afrika eTanzania, lapha ngathola khona ithuba lokukhambela umnyanya waqobe mnyaka wama-39 wokwembeswa iziqu wesentha, lapha iinsebenzi ezihlanu zeemBalobalo ze-SA zizibandakanye khona.
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi be-Stats SA  kuyitjisakalo yehlangano.
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi beZiko leemBalobalo ze-SA yinto eyitjisakalo yeziko.
Ukubandulwa kweensebenzi ze-Stats SA kuyinto  eyitjisakalo ehlanganweni.
Ibandulo labasebenzi be-Stas SA yinto ethandwa khulu yihlangano. 
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi beZiko leemBalobalo ze-SA yinto eyitjisakalo yeziko.
Ukubandulwa kweensebenzi ze-Stats SA kuyinto  eyitjisakalo ehlanganweni.
Ibandulo labasebenzi be-Stas SA yinto ethandwa khulu yihlangano. 
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi be-Stats SA  kuyitjisakalo yehlangano.
Ukubandulwa kweensebenzi ze-Stats SA kuyinto  eyitjisakalo ehlanganweni.
Ibandulo labasebenzi be-Stas SA yinto ethandwa khulu yihlangano. 
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi be-Stats SA  kuyitjisakalo yehlangano.
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi beZiko leemBalobalo ze-SA yinto eyitjisakalo yeziko.
Ibandulo labasebenzi be-Stas SA yinto ethandwa khulu yihlangano. 
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi be-Stats SA  kuyitjisakalo yehlangano.
Ukubandulwa kwabasebenzi beZiko leemBalobalo ze-SA yinto eyitjisakalo yeziko.
Ukubandulwa kweensebenzi ze-Stats SA kuyinto  eyitjisakalo ehlanganweni.
Kafitjhazana ngemva kokuthi ngiqatjhwe njengosombalobalo zombelele, i-Stats SA , ngokuhlanganyela nomKhandlu weemBalobalo, bahloma ukufunisisa kwamsinya kweenkhungo ezinikela ngebandulo elifaneleko ngedatha esemthethweni.
Ngemvanyana kokuqatjhwa njengosombalobalo mazombe, liZiko leemBalobalo ze-SA, ngokukhambisana nomKhandlu weemBalobalo, ngiye ngahloma iphenyo elirhabileko lokufuna amaziko athula ibandulo elifaneleko elimayelana nedatha yangokomthetho.
Msinyazana nje ngemva kobana ngiqatjhwe njengomtlhogomeli weembalobalo ezivamileko, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana nomKhandlu weemBalobalo, bahlome isetjho elirhabako leenhlangano ezinikela ibandulo elifaneleko kumininingwana esemthethweni.
Msinyana ngemva kobana ngiqatjhwe njengoSombalobalo Mazombe, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana nomKhandlu weemBalobalo yahloma ijima elirhabako lokufuna iinkhungo ezinikela ngebandulo kudatha yangokomthetho.   
Ngemvanyana kokuqatjhwa njengosombalobalo mazombe, liZiko leemBalobalo ze-SA, ngokukhambisana nomKhandlu weemBalobalo, ngiye ngahloma iphenyo elirhabileko lokufuna amaziko athula ibandulo elifaneleko elimayelana nedatha yangokomthetho.
Msinyazana nje ngemva kobana ngiqatjhwe njengomtlhogomeli weembalobalo ezivamileko, i-Stats SA, ngokubambisana nomKhandlu weemBalobalo, bahlome isetjho elirhabako leenhlangano ezinikela ibandulo elifaneleko kumininingwana esemthethweni.

Sakhomba iinkhungo ezimbili: isentha yokubandula e-Dares Salaam, eTanzania, kanye neHlangano yeemBalobalo neenKambisolawulo zezomNotho e-Uganda.
Sikhombe amaziko amabili: iziko lokubandula eliseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kanye neHlangano yeemBalobalo nokuPhathekako komNotho okwenzeka e-Uganda.
Sabona iinhlangano ezimbili: isentha yokubandula e-Dar es Salaam, eTanzania neHlangano yeemBalobalo  nomNotho eseTjenziswako e-Uganda.
Sifanise iinkhungo ezimbili: isentha yezebandulo e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, kanye ne-Institjuti yeemBalobalo nezomNotho eziSetjenziswa eBujameni bamaMbala e-Uganda.
Sikhombe amaziko amabili: iziko lokubandula eliseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kanye neHlangano yeemBalobalo nokuPhathekako komNotho okwenzeka e-Uganda.

Isentha yokubandula yasungulwa yiKomitjhani yezomNotho yeenHlangano eziBumbeneko ngo-1965,  iHlangano yemiSebenzi eFanako yeenarha ezingePumalanga ye-Afrika kanye neHlelo lokuThuthukisa leeNarha eziBumbeneko.
Iziko lokubandula lahlonywa ngo-1965 yiKhomitjhini yezomNotho ye-UN yama-Afrika, iHlangano yemiSebenzi eJayekileko yePumalanga ese-Afrika kanye neHlelo lokuThuthukiswa kwe-UN.
Isentha yokubandula yahlonywa ngomnyaka we-1965 yiKomitjhini yezomNotho we-Africa i-UN, iHlangano yomSebenzi oVamileko e-East Africa neHlelo lokuThuthukisa le-UN.
Isentha yebandulo yahlonywa ngo-1965 yiKomitjhini yezomNotho eqalene ne-Afrika ye-UN, iHlangano yemiSebenzi eJayelekileko yePumalanga Afrika kanye neHlelo lezeTuthuko le-UN.
Iziko lokubandula lahlonywa ngo-1965 yiKhomitjhini yezomNotho ye-UN yama-Afrika, iHlangano yemiSebenzi eJayekileko yePumalanga ese-Afrika kanye neHlelo lokuThuthukiswa kwe-UN.

Ngomnyaka ka-1977 urhulumende                 we-Tanzania besele athethe intambo zokuraga umsebenzi wesentha, begodu wangezelela nenani leenarha ze-Afrika isentha ezozenzela umsebenzi lafika kezi-13.
Ngo-1977, umbuso weTanzania wathatha ilawulo leziko, wabese ukhulisa inani lamazwe we-Afrika eliwalawulako ukufikela kwali-13. 
Ngomnyaka we-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania besele ulawula isentha, begodu wangezelela inani leenarha ze-Afrika elizitjhejako laba yi-13.
Ngo-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania wathatha ilawulo lesentha begodu wanabisa isibalo seenarha ze-Afrika ebeyizisebenzela ukufika ku-13. 
Ngo-1977, umbuso weTanzania wathatha ilawulo leziko, wabese ukhulisa inani lamazwe we-Afrika eliwalawulako ukufikela kwali-13. 
Ngomnyaka we-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania besele ulawula isentha, begodu wangezelela inani leenarha ze-Afrika elizitjhejako laba yi-13.
Ngo-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania wathatha ilawulo lesentha begodu wanabisa isibalo seenarha ze-Afrika ebeyizisebenzela ukufika ku-13.

Ngomnyaka we-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania besele ulawula isentha, begodu wangezelela inani leenarha ze-Afrika elizitjhejako laba yi-13.
Ngo-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania wathatha ilawulo lesentha begodu wanabisa isibalo seenarha ze-Afrika ebeyizisebenzela ukufika ku-13.

Ngomnyaka we-1977, umbuso we-Tanzania besele ulawula isentha, begodu wangezelela inani leenarha ze-Afrika elizitjhejako laba yi-13.
Isikhungo se-Uganda sahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphasi komleyo osemthethweni                 we-University i-Makerere
Ihlangano ye-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komakhiwo wezomthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Ihlangano ese-Uganda yahlonywa ngomnyaka we-1969 hlangana nephahla elisemthethweni leYunivesithi yeMakerere.
I-institjuti e-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komleyo womthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Ihlangano ye-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komakhiwo wezomthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Ihlangano ese-Uganda yahlonywa ngomnyaka we-1969 hlangana nephahla elisemthethweni leYunivesithi yeMakerere.
I-institjuti e-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komleyo womthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Isikhungo se-Uganda sahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphasi komleyo osemthethweni                 we-University i-Makerere
Ihlangano ese-Uganda yahlonywa ngomnyaka we-1969 hlangana nephahla elisemthethweni leYunivesithi yeMakerere.
I-institjuti e-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komleyo womthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Isikhungo se-Uganda sahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphasi komleyo osemthethweni                 we-University i-Makerere
Ihlangano ye-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komakhiwo wezomthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
I-institjuti e-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komleyo womthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Isikhungo se-Uganda sahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphasi komleyo osemthethweni                 we-University i-Makerere
Ihlangano ye-Uganda yahlonywa ngo-1969, ngaphakathi komakhiwo wezomthetho weYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Ihlangano ese-Uganda yahlonywa ngomnyaka we-1969 hlangana nephahla elisemthethweni leYunivesithi yeMakerere.
Iminqopho yayo eyayiveziwe bekukubandulwa kwezinga eliphezulu labosolwazi ngembalobalo kanye nezomnotho ezisebenzisekako.
Umnqophwayo otjhiweko bekungewezinga eliphezulu lokubanduka amaphrofetjhinari eembalabalweni nokuphathekako okwenzeka emnothweni.
Umnqopho wayo otloliweko bekulizinga eliphezulu lokubandula iimfundiswa kumbalobalo kanye nomnotho osetjenziswako.
Umnqopho wayo obekiweko kwakulizinga eliphezulu lebandulo labasebenzi beembalobalo kanye nokusetjenziswa kwezomnotho ebujameni bamambala. 
Umnqophwayo otjhiweko bekungewezinga eliphezulu lokubanduka amaphrofetjhinari eembalabalweni nokuphathekako okwenzeka emnothweni.
Umnqopho wayo otloliweko bekulizinga eliphezulu lokubandula iimfundiswa kumbalobalo kanye nomnotho osetjenziswako.

Iminqopho yayo eyayiveziwe bekukubandulwa kwezinga eliphezulu labosolwazi ngembalobalo kanye nezomnotho ezisebenzisekako.

Eminyakeni emithathu edlulileko, i-Stats SA beyithumela abasebenzi bayo kilezi iinkhungo.
Eminyakeni emithathu edlulileko, iZiko leemBalobalo le-SA belilokhu lithumela abasebenzi kiwo amaziko la.
Eminyakeni emithathu egadundileko, i-Stats SA beyithumela iinsebenzi zayo kileziinhlangano.
Eminyakeni emithathu edlulileko, i-Stats SA beyithumela abasebenzi kileziinkhungo.

Umnyako ophelileko, isiqhema sokuthoma sithole iziqu.

Solo babuyileko, batjengise ituthuko ekulu ekwenzeni umsebenzi, abanye babo sele baseenkhundleni zokuphatha.
Soloko babuyileko, batjengise ukuthuthuka okukhulu ekusebenzeni kwabo abanye babo baseenkhundleni zokulawula.
Soloko zibuyile, zitjengise ukusebenza ngcono khulu, abanye babo njenganje sebangene eenkhundleni zokuphatha.
Solo sabuyako, sitjengise ituthuko ekulu ekusebenzeni, ngokobana abanye bafumane iinkhundla zokuphatha.

Itlhogeko yelwazi leembalobalo ekuthatheni iinqunto, emikhakheni emithathu karhulumende ikhuphuke khulu.
Isidingo sokuthola ilwazi leembalobalo elimayelana nokuthathwa kweenqunto, kizo zoke iinkoro ezintathu zombuso, sikhule ngendlela erarako.
Itlhogeko lelwazi leembalobalo mayelana nokuthatha iinqunto, kiyo yomithathu imikhakha yombuso, selingezeke khulu.
Itlhogeko yelwazi lezamabubulo ekuthathweni kweenqunto, kiwo womathathu amazinga wombuso, lande khulu.

Khulu khulu, kufuneka abantu ababandulelwe ukubuthelela kanye nokusebenzisa ilwazi leembalobalo kibomasipalada.
Khulukhulu, ebantwini ebabandulelwe ukubuthelela nokusebenzisa ilwazi ezingeni lakamasipala sekuthoma ukuba yinto ebudisi. 
Khulukhulu, abantu ababandulelwe ukubuthelela nokusebenzisa ilwazi leembalobalo ezingeni likamasipala sekuba yinto embi.
Khulukhulu, abantu ababandulwe ekubuthelelweni nekusetjenzisweni kwelwazi leembalobalo ezingeni lakamasipala baba ngabaqakatheke khulu.

Ukuhlangabezana netlhogeko le, kuzokufuneka bona sibandule abantu esilinganisweni       esizi-2 000 ngomnyaka.
Ukuze sanelise isidingwesi, kuzokufanele  sibandule abantu abangalinganiselwa ee-2 000 ngomnyaka.
Ukwanelisa isidingo lesi, kuzokufuneka bona sibandule abantu ngokwenani okungasenani le-2 000 ngomnyaka.
Ukwanelisa isidingwesi, kuzakufanela bona sibandule abantu ngezinga ubuncani bakhona labazi-2000 ngomnyaka.

Isentha yokubandula ye-Tanzania kanye        neHlangano yeemBalobalo neenKambisolawulo zezomNotho ye-Uganda angeze zakghona ukujamelana nezinga eliphezulu kangaka lefuneko yokubandula.
Iziko lokubandula lamaTanzania neHlangano yama-Uganda yeemBalobalo begodu nokuphathekako okwenzeka emnothweni angeze kwakghona ukujamelana nesidingo esiphezulwesi.
Isentha yokubandula yeHlangano yeemBalobalo kanye neyomNotho osetjenziswako ye-Tanzania neye-Uganda kuhlekuhle angeze zakghona  ukuqalana nesifuno esiphezulu ngaleyondlela. 
Isentha yezebandulo ye-Tanzania kanye ne- Institjuti yeemBalobalo nezomNotho eziSetjenziswa eBujameni bamaMbala e-Uganda ngeze zaqalana nalefuneko ekulu.  
Iziko lokubandula lamaTanzania neHlangano yama-Uganda yeemBalobalo begodu nokuphathekako okwenzeka emnothweni angeze kwakghona ukujamelana nesidingo esiphezulwesi.
Isentha yokubandula yeHlangano yeemBalobalo kanye neyomNotho osetjenziswako ye-Tanzania neye-Uganda kuhlekuhle angeze zakghona  ukuqalana nesifuno esiphezulu ngaleyondlela.
