IsiTatimende sokuFihla iLwazi senzeka kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu begodu silawula ukubuthelelwa kwedatha nokusetjenziswa kwayo.
Isitatimende sokuba Wedwa sisebenza kubuNzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu begodu bulawula ukubuthelelwa kwemininingwana kanye nokuyisebenzisa.
Ngokusebenzisa ubuNzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana neendlela zokusebenzisa idatha ezivezwe esiTatimendeni lesi.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nedatha ehlathululwe kilesisitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nemininingwana esetjenziswako ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu uvumela imikghwa ephathelene nedatha ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.  
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nedatha ehlathululwe kilesisitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nemininingwana esetjenziswako ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu uvumela imikghwa ephathelene nedatha ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.  
Ngokusebenzisa ubuNzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana neendlela zokusebenzisa idatha ezivezwe esiTatimendeni lesi.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nemininingwana esetjenziswako ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu uvumela imikghwa ephathelene nedatha ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.  
Ngokusebenzisa ubuNzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana neendlela zokusebenzisa idatha ezivezwe esiTatimendeni lesi.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nedatha ehlathululwe kilesisitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu uvumela imikghwa ephathelene nedatha ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.  
Ngokusebenzisa ubuNzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana neendlela zokusebenzisa idatha ezivezwe esiTatimendeni lesi.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nedatha ehlathululwe kilesisitatimende.
Ngokusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, uvumelana nemininingwana esetjenziswako ehlathululwe kilesi sitatimende.
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi eliMayelana nawe
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwAzi okungelomuNtu
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi eliMayelana nawe
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwAzi okungelomuNtu
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwAzi okungelomuNtu
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi eliMayelana nawe
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ukubuthelelwa kweLwazi eliMayelana nawe
Ukubuthelelwa kwelwAzi okungelomuNtu
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elimayelana nomuntu siqu sakhe, elifana       ne-adresi ye-imeyili, ibizo lomuntu, i-adresi yekhaya neyemsebenzini nofana iinomboro zomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzibuthelelela ngokwawo ilwazi elimayelana nawe, elifana neposommoya yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nofana semsebenzini nofana inomboro yomrhala.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi okungelomuntu elibonakalako, elifana nesiphande se-imeyili yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nanyana somsebenzi nanyana inomboro yomtato.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elifaniswa nawe, elifana ne-adresi yakho ye-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi yekhaya namkha yemsebenzini namkha inomboro yomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzibuthelelela ngokwawo ilwazi elimayelana nawe, elifana neposommoya yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nofana semsebenzini nofana inomboro yomrhala.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi okungelomuntu elibonakalako, elifana nesiphande se-imeyili yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nanyana somsebenzi nanyana inomboro yomtato.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elifaniswa nawe, elifana ne-adresi yakho ye-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi yekhaya namkha yemsebenzini namkha inomboro yomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elimayelana nomuntu siqu sakhe, elifana       ne-adresi ye-imeyili, ibizo lomuntu, i-adresi yekhaya neyemsebenzini nofana iinomboro zomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi okungelomuntu elibonakalako, elifana nesiphande se-imeyili yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nanyana somsebenzi nanyana inomboro yomtato.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elifaniswa nawe, elifana ne-adresi yakho ye-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi yekhaya namkha yemsebenzini namkha inomboro yomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elimayelana nomuntu siqu sakhe, elifana       ne-adresi ye-imeyili, ibizo lomuntu, i-adresi yekhaya neyemsebenzini nofana iinomboro zomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzibuthelelela ngokwawo ilwazi elimayelana nawe, elifana neposommoya yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nofana semsebenzini nofana inomboro yomrhala.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elifaniswa nawe, elifana ne-adresi yakho ye-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi yekhaya namkha yemsebenzini namkha inomboro yomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi elimayelana nomuntu siqu sakhe, elifana       ne-adresi ye-imeyili, ibizo lomuntu, i-adresi yekhaya neyemsebenzini nofana iinomboro zomtato. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzibuthelelela ngokwawo ilwazi elimayelana nawe, elifana neposommoya yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nofana semsebenzini nofana inomboro yomrhala.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela ilwazi okungelomuntu elibonakalako, elifana nesiphande se-imeyili yakho, ibizo, isiphande sekhaya nanyana somsebenzi nanyana inomboro yomtato.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu godi ubuthelela ilwazi eliyifihlo elimayelana nokuhlala kwabantu, elingasi mayelana nawe wedwa, njenge-ZIP khowudi, iminyaka yobudala, ubulili, okukhethwa abantu, iinkareko kanye nalokho okuthandwa babantu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuye ubuthelele ilwazi eliyifihlo lesitjhaba, ongalaziko wena, elifana nekhowudu yakho ye-ZIP, umnyaka, ubulili, okuthandako, iinrhuluphelo nokuthandako kunokunye.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela godu nelwazi leenthombe ezinganabanikazi, elingasiyo into erarako kuwe, elifana nekhowudu yakho ye-ZIP, umnyaka wobudala, ubulili, okunyulako, iinkareko nokuthandako.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu godu ubuthelela ilwazi elingakafaniswa lobunjalo besitjhaba, eliqalene kuphela nawe, elifana nekhodi ye-ZIP, ubudala, ubulili, ukwenyula, iinkareko nokuthandako. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuye ubuthelele ilwazi eliyifihlo lesitjhaba, ongalaziko wena, elifana nekhowudu yakho ye-ZIP, umnyaka, ubulili, okuthandako, iinrhuluphelo nokuthandako kunokunye.

Godu kunelwazi elimayelana nengaphandlengqondomtjhini  kanye nengaphakathingqondomtjhi lekhomphyutha yakho elibuthelelwa mNyango wezeziNdlu. 
Kubuye kube nelwazi elimayelana nekhomphyuthakho kanye nokungaphakathi okuzenzakalelako bona kubuthelelwe mNyango wezeziNdlu.
Kukhona godu nelwazi elimayelana neensetjenziswa zangaphandle zomtjhini-ngqondo namahlelo womtjhini-ngqondo amane abuthelelwe mNyango wezeziNdlu.
Godu kunelwazi eliphathelene nomtjhini wekhomphyutha yakho kanye nehlelo layo elibuthelelwa ngokuzenzakalela mNyango wezeziNdlu.
Kubuye kube nelwazi elimayelana nekhomphyuthakho kanye nokungaphakathi okuzenzakalelako bona kubuthelelwe mNyango wezeziNdlu.
Kukhona godu nelwazi elimayelana neensetjenziswa zangaphandle zomtjhini-ngqondo namahlelo womtjhini-ngqondo amane abuthelelwe mNyango wezeziNdlu.

Ilwazeli lingafakahlangana: i-IP adresi yakho, umhlobo wesiphenyi sakho, amabizo wedomeyini, iinkhathi zokufikelela ilwazi kanye nama-adresi wobunzinzolwazi lapho uthola khona ilwazi. 
Ilwazi leli lingafaka hlangana: isiphande sakho se-IP, indlela yokubhrawuza, amabizo, isikhathi sokuthola ilwazi kanye nokulayelwa eemphandeni zobunzinzolwazi.
Ilwazeli lingafaka: isiphande sakho se-IP, umhlobo webhrawuza, amabizo weziko, iinkhathi zokungena neemphande zobunzinzolwazi ezikulayelako.
Ilwazeli lingafaka: i-adresi yakho ye-IP, umhlobo webhrawuza, amagama wamadomeyini, iinkhathi zokufikelela kanye nama-adresi wamawebhusayidi wokudlulisela. 
Ilwazi leli lingafaka hlangana: isiphande sakho se-IP, indlela yokubhrawuza, amabizo, isikhathi sokuthola ilwazi kanye nokulayelwa eemphandeni zobunzinzolwazi.
Ilwazeli lingafaka: isiphande sakho se-IP, umhlobo webhrawuza, amabizo weziko, iinkhathi zokungena neemphande zobunzinzolwazi ezikulayelako.

Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu ekwenzeni umsebenzi wayo, ukugcina ikhwalithi emsebenzini wayo, kanye nangokunikela imbalobalo mazombe ngokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu ukwenza umsebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yomsebenzi, begodu nokunikela iimbalobalo mazombe mayelana nokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu mayelana nokwenziwa komsebenzi, ukutjheja izinga lomsebenzi, begodu nokunikela iimbalobalo ezivamileko mayelana nokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze kusetjenziswe lomsebenzi, ukugcina ikhwalithi yomsebenzi mayelana nokusetjenziswa kanye nokunikela ngeembalobalo mayelana nokusetjenziswa kwewebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu. 
Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu ukwenza umsebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yomsebenzi, begodu nokunikela iimbalobalo mazombe mayelana nokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu mayelana nokwenziwa komsebenzi, ukutjheja izinga lomsebenzi, begodu nokunikela iimbalobalo ezivamileko mayelana nokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.

Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu ukwenza umsebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yomsebenzi, begodu nokunikela iimbalobalo mazombe mayelana nokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Ilwazeli lisetjenziswa mNyango wezeziNdlu mayelana nokwenziwa komsebenzi, ukutjheja izinga lomsebenzi, begodu nokunikela iimbalobalo ezivamileko mayelana nokusetjenziswa kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Yelela bona nawuveza ilwazi elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho nofana idatha emayelana nawe wedwa ebhodini yemilayezo yomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazeli lingathathwa lisetjenziswe ngabanye. 
Tjheja bona nawuveza ilwazi elimayelana nawe bunqopha nofana ilwazi eliyifihlo ngamabhodi womNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazelo lingabuthelelwa begodu lisetjenziswe ngabanye.
Sibawa ukhumbule bona nangabe utjho ilwazi okungelakho bunqopha nanyana unikela ngemininingwana emasikizi ngokungena kumabhodi wemilayezo yomphakathi yomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi leli kungenzeka lithathwe bese lisetjenziswa ngabanye.
Sibawa uhlale ukhumbula bona nayikuthi uveza bunqopha ilwazi elingafaniswa nawe namkha idatha yakho elumelako ngamabhodo wemilayezo yomphakathi womNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazeli lingabuthelelwa belisetjenziswe ngabanye. 
Tjheja bona nawuveza ilwazi elimayelana nawe bunqopha nofana ilwazi eliyifihlo ngamabhodi womNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazelo lingabuthelelwa begodu lisetjenziswe ngabanye.

Yelela: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuzifundi iinkulumiswano zakho zethungelelwaneni lakho langeqadi.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ilwazi lakho eliyifihlo lokuthintana langasese eliku-inthanede.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi nanyana ngikuphi ukuthintana kwangasese okwenza kumtjhini-ngqondo.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ukuthintana kwakho kwangeqadi ku-inthanethi.  
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ilwazi lakho eliyifihlo lokuthintana langasese eliku-inthanede.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi nanyana ngikuphi ukuthintana kwangasese okwenza kumtjhini-ngqondo.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ukuthintana kwakho kwangeqadi ku-inthanethi.  
Yelela: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuzifundi iinkulumiswano zakho zethungelelwaneni lakho langeqadi.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi nanyana ngikuphi ukuthintana kwangasese okwenza kumtjhini-ngqondo.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ukuthintana kwakho kwangeqadi ku-inthanethi.  
Yelela: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuzifundi iinkulumiswano zakho zethungelelwaneni lakho langeqadi.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ilwazi lakho eliyifihlo lokuthintana langasese eliku-inthanede.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ukuthintana kwakho kwangeqadi ku-inthanethi.  
Yelela: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuzifundi iinkulumiswano zakho zethungelelwaneni lakho langeqadi.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi ilwazi lakho eliyifihlo lokuthintana langasese eliku-inthanede.
Tjheja: UmNyango wezeziNdlu awufundi nanyana ngikuphi ukuthintana kwangasese okwenza kumtjhini-ngqondo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze iintatimende zelwazi elimayelana nawe wedwa kubunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuthintanisa nomNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze uzwisise bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bulibuthelela, bulisebenzise begodu babelane njani ngelwazi. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona wenze ibuyekezo leentatimende zelwazi eliyifihlo kubunzinzolwazi ozikhela bona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu ukuze ukwazi ukuzwisisa indlela ubunzinzolwazobo bubuthelela ngayo ilwazi, busebenzisa begodu babelana ngayo ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze isitatimende sokuba wedwa sobunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuhlanganisa ukusuka kumNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze ukghone ukuzwisisa bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bubuthelela njani, bulisebenzisa njani begodu bulaba njani ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza ukubuyekezwa kweentatimende zefihlo zamawebhusayidi okhetha ukuwathinta ukusuka emNyangweni wezeziNdlu khona uzakuzwisisa ukobana amawebhusayidi lawo abuthelela, asebenzisa begodu abelana njani ngelwazi lakho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona wenze ibuyekezo leentatimende zelwazi eliyifihlo kubunzinzolwazi ozikhela bona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu ukuze ukwazi ukuzwisisa indlela ubunzinzolwazobo bubuthelela ngayo ilwazi, busebenzisa begodu babelana ngayo ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze isitatimende sokuba wedwa sobunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuhlanganisa ukusuka kumNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze ukghone ukuzwisisa bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bubuthelela njani, bulisebenzisa njani begodu bulaba njani ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza ukubuyekezwa kweentatimende zefihlo zamawebhusayidi okhetha ukuwathinta ukusuka emNyangweni wezeziNdlu khona uzakuzwisisa ukobana amawebhusayidi lawo abuthelela, asebenzisa begodu abelana njani ngelwazi lakho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze iintatimende zelwazi elimayelana nawe wedwa kubunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuthintanisa nomNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze uzwisise bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bulibuthelela, bulisebenzise begodu babelane njani ngelwazi. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze isitatimende sokuba wedwa sobunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuhlanganisa ukusuka kumNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze ukghone ukuzwisisa bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bubuthelela njani, bulisebenzisa njani begodu bulaba njani ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza ukubuyekezwa kweentatimende zefihlo zamawebhusayidi okhetha ukuwathinta ukusuka emNyangweni wezeziNdlu khona uzakuzwisisa ukobana amawebhusayidi lawo abuthelela, asebenzisa begodu abelana njani ngelwazi lakho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze iintatimende zelwazi elimayelana nawe wedwa kubunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuthintanisa nomNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze uzwisise bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bulibuthelela, bulisebenzise begodu babelane njani ngelwazi. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona wenze ibuyekezo leentatimende zelwazi eliyifihlo kubunzinzolwazi ozikhela bona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu ukuze ukwazi ukuzwisisa indlela ubunzinzolwazobo bubuthelela ngayo ilwazi, busebenzisa begodu babelana ngayo ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza ukubuyekezwa kweentatimende zefihlo zamawebhusayidi okhetha ukuwathinta ukusuka emNyangweni wezeziNdlu khona uzakuzwisisa ukobana amawebhusayidi lawo abuthelela, asebenzisa begodu abelana njani ngelwazi lakho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze iintatimende zelwazi elimayelana nawe wedwa kubunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuthintanisa nomNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze uzwisise bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bulibuthelela, bulisebenzise begodu babelane njani ngelwazi. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona wenze ibuyekezo leentatimende zelwazi eliyifihlo kubunzinzolwazi ozikhela bona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu ukuze ukwazi ukuzwisisa indlela ubunzinzolwazobo bubuthelela ngayo ilwazi, busebenzisa begodu babelana ngayo ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ubuyekeze isitatimende sokuba wedwa sobunzinzolwazi okhetha ukubuhlanganisa ukusuka kumNyango wezeziNdlu ukuze ukghone ukuzwisisa bona ubunzinzolwazi lobo bubuthelela njani, bulisebenzisa njani begodu bulaba njani ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awunasibopho mayelana neentatimende zelwazi elimayelana nawe uwedwa nofana okhunye okumumethwe bunzinzolwazi obunye obungaphandle kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nobunzinzolwazi obunesikhozi nomNyango wezeziNdlu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awunakuziphendulela ngeentatimende zokufihla ilwazi nofana okumumethwe  ko okusebunzinzolwazini obungaphandle kobomNyango wezeziNdlu nobunzinzolwazi obuhlobana nomNyango wezeziNdlu. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awunaso isibopho mayelana nesitatimende sokuba wedwa nanyana okhunye okumunyethweko kubunzinzolwazi engaphandle komndeni wobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awunakuziphendulela ngeentatimende zefihlo namkha okhunye nokhunye okumumethweko kumawebhusayidi angaphandle komNyango wezeziNdlu kanye namawebhusayidi womndeni womNyango wezeziNdlu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awunakuziphendulela ngeentatimende zokufihla ilwazi nofana okumumethwe  ko okusebunzinzolwazini obungaphandle kobomNyango wezeziNdlu nobunzinzolwazi obuhlobana nomNyango wezeziNdlu.

Ukusetjenziswa kweLwazi elimayelana Nawe
Ukusetjenziswa kwelwAzi okungelakho
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela bewusebenzise ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho ukuze ilisebenzise kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu begodu ukwethulele umsebenzi owubawileko. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela bowusebenzise ilwazi elimayelana nawe ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu begodu uthule iinsetjenzelwa njengobana ubawile.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela begodu usebenzisa ilwazi okungelakho ukusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nokwenza imisebenzi oyikhombeleko.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela bewusebenzisa ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ukusebenzisa iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nokwethula imisebenzi oyibawileko. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela bowusebenzise ilwazi elimayelana nawe ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu begodu uthule iinsetjenzelwa njengobana ubawile.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela begodu usebenzisa ilwazi okungelakho ukusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nokwenza imisebenzi oyikhombeleko.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuthelela begodu usebenzisa ilwazi okungelakho ukusebenzisa ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nokwenza imisebenzi oyikhombeleko.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu godi usebenzisa ilwazi elikhombekako lakho ukukwazisa ngeminye imikhiqizo nofana ezinye izenzelwa ezitholakala emNyangweni wezeZindlu nalabo umnyango osebenzisana nabo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuye usebenzise ilwazi elimayelana nawe ukukwazisa ngeminye imikhiqizo nofana imisebenzi ekhona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu nakwezinye iinhlangazo ezenza umsebenzi ofanako. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu okhunye godu usebenzisa ilwazi lakho elaziwako ukukutjela ngeminye imikhiqizo nanyana imisebenzi ekhona kumNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nakweminye esebenzisana nayo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu godu usebenzisa ilwazi lakho elifanisiweko ukukwazisa ngeminye imikhiqizo namkha imisebenzi ebuya emNyangweni wezeziNdlu kanye nabawela ngaphasi kwawo.  
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuye usebenzise ilwazi elimayelana nawe ukukwazisa ngeminye imikhiqizo nofana imisebenzi ekhona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu nakwezinye iinhlangazo ezenza umsebenzi ofanako.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu ubuye usebenzise ilwazi elimayelana nawe ukukwazisa ngeminye imikhiqizo nofana imisebenzi ekhona emNyangweni wezeziNdlu nakwezinye iinhlangazo ezenza umsebenzi ofanako. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu okhunye godu usebenzisa ilwazi lakho elaziwako ukukutjela ngeminye imikhiqizo nanyana imisebenzi ekhona kumNyango wezeziNdlu kanye nakweminye esebenzisana nayo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungakuthinta ngephenyo lokwenza irhubhululo ngombonwakho ngezenzelwa zanje nofana izenzelwa ezitjha ezingaba khona ezingethulwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungabuye uthintane nawe ngamaphenyo wokwenza irhubhululo elimayelana nombonwakho ngomsebenzi owenziwako nofana imibono ngemisebenzi emitjha engenziwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungakuthinta godu ngokwenza ukuhlola ukobana wenze irhubhululo elimayelana nombono wakho ngemisebenzi yanje nanyana imisebenzi emitjha okungenzeka inikelwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu godu ungakuthinta ngokusebenzisa amaphenyo ukwenza amarhubhululo ngombono wakho ngemibono yanjesi namkha ikghonakalo yemisebenzi emitjha enganikelwa. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungabuye uthintane nawe ngamaphenyo wokwenza irhubhululo elimayelana nombonwakho ngomsebenzi owenziwako nofana imibono ngemisebenzi emitjha engenziwa.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungakuthinta godu ngokwenza ukuhlola ukobana wenze irhubhululo elimayelana nombono wakho ngemisebenzi yanje nanyana imisebenzi emitjha okungenzeka inikelwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, nofana awuqatjhiseli abanye abantu irhelo lamakhastama walo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, urentise nofana uqatjhise irhelo lamakhastamalo emntwini wesithathu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengisi, awurendisi nanyana awuqatjhisi amarhelo wabathengi bayo kwabanye abantu abangeqadi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli,  awurentiseli namkha awuqatjhisi amarhemo wamakhastama wawo kwabanye abantu. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, urentise nofana uqatjhise irhelo lamakhastamalo emntwini wesithathu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengisi, awurendisi nanyana awuqatjhisi amarhelo wabathengi bayo kwabanye abantu abangeqadi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli,  awurentiseli namkha awuqatjhisi amarhemo wamakhastama wawo kwabanye abantu. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, nofana awuqatjhiseli abanye abantu irhelo lamakhastama walo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengisi, awurendisi nanyana awuqatjhisi amarhelo wabathengi bayo kwabanye abantu abangeqadi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli,  awurentiseli namkha awuqatjhisi amarhemo wamakhastama wawo kwabanye abantu. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, nofana awuqatjhiseli abanye abantu irhelo lamakhastama walo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, urentise nofana uqatjhise irhelo lamakhastamalo emntwini wesithathu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli,  awurentiseli namkha awuqatjhisi amarhemo wamakhastama wawo kwabanye abantu. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, nofana awuqatjhiseli abanye abantu irhelo lamakhastama walo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengiseli, urentise nofana uqatjhise irhelo lamakhastamalo emntwini wesithathu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awuthengisi, awurendisi nanyana awuqatjhisi amarhelo wabathengi bayo kwabanye abantu abangeqadi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokusebenzela abasebenzisani bawo, ungakuthinta ngezinye iinkhathi mayelana nokuthileko ongaba nekareko kikho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungathintana nawe ngesikhathi esinye nesinye esikhundleni sabahlanganyeli bokurhweba bangaphandle ngomnqopho wokukutjela ngokungahle kube yikareko kuwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu unganande ukuthinta ngaso soke isikhathi, ukhulume nawe ngokujamela abanye abalingani bamarhwebo wangaphandle mayelana nokuthile abakunikelako okungenzeka ube nekareko kikho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokukhamba kwesikhathi, ungakuthinta ukwenzela abalingani ngokwebhizinisi bangeqadi ngento enikelwako engakukara. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungathintana nawe ngesikhathi esinye nesinye esikhundleni sabahlanganyeli bokurhweba bangaphandle ngomnqopho wokukutjela ngokungahle kube yikareko kuwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu unganande ukuthinta ngaso soke isikhathi, ukhulume nawe ngokujamela abanye abalingani bamarhwebo wangaphandle mayelana nokuthile abakunikelako okungenzeka ube nekareko kikho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokukhamba kwesikhathi, ungakuthinta ukwenzela abalingani ngokwebhizinisi bangeqadi ngento enikelwako engakukara. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokusebenzela abasebenzisani bawo, ungakuthinta ngezinye iinkhathi mayelana nokuthileko ongaba nekareko kikho.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokukhamba kwesikhathi, ungakuthinta ukwenzela abalingani ngokwebhizinisi bangeqadi ngento enikelwako engakukara. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokusebenzela abasebenzisani bawo, ungakuthinta ngezinye iinkhathi mayelana nokuthileko ongaba nekareko kikho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungathintana nawe ngesikhathi esinye nesinye esikhundleni sabahlanganyeli bokurhweba bangaphandle ngomnqopho wokukutjela ngokungahle kube yikareko kuwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokukhamba kwesikhathi, ungakuthinta ukwenzela abalingani ngokwebhizinisi bangeqadi ngento enikelwako engakukara. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu, ngokusebenzela abasebenzisani bawo, ungakuthinta ngezinye iinkhathi mayelana nokuthileko ongaba nekareko kikho. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ungathintana nawe ngesikhathi esinye nesinye esikhundleni sabahlanganyeli bokurhweba bangaphandle ngomnqopho wokukutjela ngokungahle kube yikareko kuwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu unganande ukuthinta ngaso soke isikhathi, ukhulume nawe ngokujamela abanye abalingani bamarhwebo wangaphandle mayelana nokuthile abakunikelako okungenzeka ube nekareko kikho.
Eenkhathini ezinjalo, ilwazi elikhethekileko elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho (i-imeyili, i-adresi, inomboro yomtato) alidluliselwa komunye umuntu. 
Eentweni ezifana nalezo, ilwazi elitjengisa ubungawe (iposommoya, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomrhala) alidluliselwa emntwini wesithathu. 
Nakunjalo-ke, ilwazi lakho owaziwa ngalo elaziwa nguwe (i-imeyili, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomtato) ayidluliselwa emuntwini wangeqadi.
Ebujameni lobo, ilwazi lakho elihlukileko elifanisekako (i-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi, inomboro yomtato) alidluliselwa kowesithathu othintekako. 
Eentweni ezifana nalezo, ilwazi elitjengisa ubungawe (iposommoya, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomrhala) alidluliselwa emntwini wesithathu. 
Nakunjalo-ke, ilwazi lakho owaziwa ngalo elaziwa nguwe (i-imeyili, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomtato) ayidluliselwa emuntwini wangeqadi.
Ebujameni lobo, ilwazi lakho elihlukileko elifanisekako (i-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi, inomboro yomtato) alidluliselwa kowesithathu othintekako.

Nakunjalo-ke, ilwazi lakho owaziwa ngalo elaziwa nguwe (i-imeyili, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomtato) ayidluliselwa emuntwini wangeqadi.

Ebujameni lobo, ilwazi lakho elihlukileko elifanisekako (i-imeyili, ibizo, i-adresi, inomboro yomtato) alidluliselwa kowesithathu othintekako. 
Eenkhathini ezinjalo, ilwazi elikhethekileko elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho (i-imeyili, i-adresi, inomboro yomtato) alidluliselwa komunye umuntu. 
Eentweni ezifana nalezo, ilwazi elitjengisa ubungawe (iposommoya, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomrhala) alidluliselwa emntwini wesithathu. 
Nakunjalo-ke, ilwazi lakho owaziwa ngalo elaziwa nguwe (i-imeyili, ibizo, isiphande, inomboro yomtato) ayidluliselwa emuntwini wangeqadi.
Ukungezelela, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana idatha nabasebenzisani abathembekileko ukusisiza ukwenza ihlaziyo leembalobalo, ukukuthumela i-imeyili nofana incwadi ngeposo, ukunikela isekelo emakhastamini, nofana ukuhlelela ukwethula. 
Ukungezelela kilokho, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana ngedatha nabahlanganyeli abathembakeleko bakwazi ukusisiza ukwenza icozululo leembalobalo, bathumele iposommoyakho nofana iposo, banikele isekelo lamakhastama, nofana bahlelele amadilivari.
Ukwengezelela, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana ngemininingwana nabalingani obathembako ukusisiza ukwenza ihlaziyo leembalobalo, usithumele i-imeyili yakho nanyana isiphande sakho seposo, unganikela isekelo lomthengi, nanyana uhlele ukulethelwa.
Ukungezelela, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana ngedatha nabalingani obathembekako ukusisiza ukucozulula iimbalobalo, ukukuthumela i-imeyili namkha ukukuposela incwadi, ukukunikela ngesekelo lamakhastama namkha ukuhlela ukulethwa kwento kuwe. 
Ukungezelela kilokho, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana ngedatha nabahlanganyeli abathembakeleko bakwazi ukusisiza ukwenza icozululo leembalobalo, bathumele iposommoyakho nofana iposo, banikele isekelo lamakhastama, nofana bahlelele amadilivari.

Ukungezelela kilokho, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana ngedatha nabahlanganyeli abathembakeleko bakwazi ukusisiza ukwenza icozululo leembalobalo, bathumele iposommoyakho nofana iposo, banikele isekelo lamakhastama, nofana bahlelele amadilivari.
Ukwengezelela, umNyango wezeziNdlu ungabelana ngemininingwana nabalingani obathembako ukusisiza ukwenza ihlaziyo leembalobalo, usithumele i-imeyili yakho nanyana isiphande sakho seposo, unganikela isekelo lomthengi, nanyana uhlele ukulethelwa.
Boke abanye abantu laba nofana iinhlangano zangeqadi azikavunyelwa ukusebenzisa ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho ngaphandle kokuthi zenzele umNyango wezeziNdlu umsebenzi begodu zikhonjelwa bona zigcine ubufihlo belwazi lakho.
Boke abantu besithathwaba abakavunyelwa ukusebenzisa ilwazi elimayelana nawe ngaphandle kobana benzela umNyango wezeziNdlu, begodu balindeleke ukwenza lokho ngokuthatha ilwazi lakho njengeliyifihlo.
Boke abantu bangeqadi abafana nalabo bayalelwa ukobana basebenzise ilwazi elingelakho ngaphandle kokunikela imisebenzi le kumNyango wezeziNdlu, begodu kufuneka batjheje ukuba yifihlo kwelwazi elingelakho.
Boke besithathu abathintekako abakavunyelwa ukusebenzisa ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ngaphandle kokunikela ngalemisebenzi emNyangweni wezeziNdlu begodu kufuneka bagcine ifihlo yelwazi lakho. 
Boke abantu besithathwaba abakavunyelwa ukusebenzisa ilwazi elimayelana nawe ngaphandle kobana benzela umNyango wezeziNdlu, begodu balindeleke ukwenza lokho ngokuthatha ilwazi lakho njengeliyifihlo.
Boke abantu bangeqadi abafana nalabo bayalelwa ukobana basebenzise ilwazi elingelakho ngaphandle kokunikela imisebenzi le kumNyango wezeziNdlu, begodu kufuneka batjheje ukuba yifihlo kwelwazi elingelakho.

Boke abantu besithathwaba abakavunyelwa ukusebenzisa ilwazi elimayelana nawe ngaphandle kobana benzela umNyango wezeziNdlu, begodu balindeleke ukwenza lokho ngokuthatha ilwazi lakho njengeliyifihlo.
Boke abantu bangeqadi abafana nalabo bayalelwa ukobana basebenzise ilwazi elingelakho ngaphandle kokunikela imisebenzi le kumNyango wezeziNdlu, begodu kufuneka batjheje ukuba yifihlo kwelwazi elingelakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awusebenzisi nofana awuvezi ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho, njengobuhlanga, ikolelo,  nofana ubulunga bezepolotiki ngaphandle kokuthi kuvume wena. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awusebenzisi nofana uveze ilwazi elimayelana nawe eliyifihlo, elinjengobuhlanga, ikolo, nofana ukuba lilunga lehlangano yezepolotiki, ngaphandle kwevumo ecacileko evela kuwe.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awusebenzisi nanyana awunikeli muntu ilwazi elingelakho osabana nalo, elifana nobuhlanga, ikolo, nanyana ihlangano yepolotiki okiyo, ngaphandle kokunikelwa nguwe imvumo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awusebenzisi namkha uveze ilwazi lakho elilumelako, elifana nobutjhaba, ikolelo, namkha ukuqhema ngokwepolitiki ngaphandle kwemvumo yakho ecacileko. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu awusebenzisi nofana uveze ilwazi elimayelana nawe eliyifihlo, elinjengobuhlanga, ikolo, nofana ukuba lilunga lehlangano yezepolotiki, ngaphandle kwevumo ecacileko evela kuwe.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu awusebenzisi nanyana awunikeli muntu ilwazi elingelakho osabana nalo, elifana nobuhlanga, ikolo, nanyana ihlangano yepolotiki okiyo, ngaphandle kokunikelwa nguwe imvumo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ulandelela umtlhala wobunzinzolwazi kanye namakhasi avakatjhelwa makhastama ngaphakathi kobunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, ukwenzela bona ubone ukuthi ngimiphi imisebenzi eyazeka khulu yomNyango wezeziNdlu. 
SimNyango wezeziNdlu silandelela okutlolwe kubunzinzolwazi sivule namaphepha wamakhastamethu womNyango wezeziNdlu, ukuze kulinganiswe imisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu edume khulu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uhlala utjheje ubunzinzolwazi kanye namakhasi avakatjhelwa bathengi bethu ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu, ukuze ukghone ukubona bona ngimiphi imisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu eyaziwa khulu.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uhlala ulandelela amawebhusayidi namakhasi amakhastama wethu awakatjhela ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu, khona kuzakuquntwa ngokuthi khuyini imisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu ethandwa khulu. 
SimNyango wezeziNdlu silandelela okutlolwe kubunzinzolwazi sivule namaphepha wamakhastamethu womNyango wezeziNdlu, ukuze kulinganiswe imisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu edume khulu.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu uhlala utjheje ubunzinzolwazi kanye namakhasi avakatjhelwa bathengi bethu ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu, ukuze ukghone ukubona bona ngimiphi imisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu eyaziwa khulu.
Idatha le isetjenziselwa ukwethula ilwazi elitjhugululweko kanye nokukhangisa ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu emakhastameni lawo ukuziphatha kwawo kutjengisa bona anekareko emkhakheni othileko.
Idatha le isetjenziselwa ukwethulwa ngokuya ngokokumumethweko nokukhangisa emakhastameni womNyango wezeziNdlu lawo atjengisa ukuba nerhuluphelo esihlokweni esithize.
Imininingwana isetjenziselwa okumunyethweko okukhethekileko begodu nokukhangisa ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu kubathengi labo ukuziphatha kwabo kutjengisa bona banekareko endaweni yesifundo esithileko.
Ledatha isetjenziselwa ukwethula okumumethweko nokukhangisa ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu kumakhastama ukuziphatha kwawo okutjengisa bona anekareko esifundweni esithileko.

Idatha le isetjenziselwa ukwethulwa ngokuya ngokokumumethweko nokukhangisa emakhastameni womNyango wezeziNdlu lawo atjengisa ukuba nerhuluphelo esihlokweni esithize.
Ledatha isetjenziselwa ukwethula okumumethweko nokukhangisa ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu kumakhastama ukuziphatha kwawo okutjengisa bona anekareko esifundweni esithileko. 
Idatha le isetjenziselwa ukwethula ilwazi elitjhugululweko kanye nokukhangisa ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu emakhastameni lawo ukuziphatha kwawo kutjengisa bona anekareko emkhakheni othileko.
Idatha le isetjenziselwa ukwethulwa ngokuya ngokokumumethweko nokukhangisa emakhastameni womNyango wezeziNdlu lawo atjengisa ukuba nerhuluphelo esihlokweni esithize.
Imininingwana isetjenziselwa okumunyethweko okukhethekileko begodu nokukhangisa ngaphakathi komNyango wezeziNdlu kubathengi labo ukuziphatha kwabo kutjengisa bona banekareko endaweni yesifundo esithileko.
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu buzakuveza ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho, ngaphandle kokukwazisa, kwaphela nangabe kungokwefuneko yomthetho nofana ngommoya omuhle wokukholwa bona isenzo esinjalo sifanele ukwenzeka ukuze: (a) kuthotjelwe umlayo womthetho nofana kukhanjiswane nekambiso yomthetho eyethulwe kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu; (b) kuvikelwe amalungelo nofana ipahla yomNyango wezeziNdlu; begodu (c) nalokha  kusetjenzwa ngaphasi kwamajamo abudisi ukuvikela ukuphepha kwabasebenzisi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, nofana umphakathi.
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu buzokuveza ilwazi ngawe, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuzokwenzeka lokho nangabe kulifuneko lomthetho nofana ngekolelo yokobana igadango elinjalo liqakathekile (a) ukuvumela isimemezelo somthetho nofana ukuthobela ikambiso yomthetho esetjenziswe emNyangweni wezeziNdlu nofana kubunzinzolwazi; (b) ukuvikela amalungelo nofana ipahla yomNyango wezeziNdlu; begodu, (c) ukwenza njalo ngaphasi kwamajamo arhabekileko wokuvikela ubuvikelo babasebenzisi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, nofana umphakathi.
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu buzakuveza ilwazi okungelakho, ngaphandle kwesaziso,  kwaphela nangabe bakhonjelwa mthetho ukwenza njalo nanyana ngommoya omuhle bakholwa bona isenzo esinjalo siyafuneka uku: (a) ukulandela imilayo yomthetho nanyana ukukhambisana  nerherho langokomthetho elisiza umNyango wezeziNdlu nanyana indawo; (b) ukuvikela begodu nokuvikela amalungelo nanyana ipahla yomNyango wezeziNdlu; (c) ukusikimela ubujamo oburhabako ukobana uvikele ukuphepha kwabasebenzisi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, nanyana komphakathi. 
Amawebhusayidi womNyango wezeziNdlu azakuveza ilwazi eliphathelene nawe, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela nayikuthi ubawiwa ukwenza njalo mthetho namkha ekolelweni ehle yokobana isenzo esinjalo siyatlhogeka: (a) ukukhambisana nemilayo yomthetho namkha ukukhambisana nekambiso yomthetho enikelwe umNyango wezeziNdlu namkha isayithi; (b) ukuvikela amalungelo namkha ipahla yomNyango wezeziNdlu; begodu (c) ukusebenza ngaphasi kobujamo oburhabako ukuvikela ukuphepha kwabasebenzisi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, namkha nomphakathi.    
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu buzokuveza ilwazi ngawe, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuzokwenzeka lokho nangabe kulifuneko lomthetho nofana ngekolelo yokobana igadango elinjalo liqakathekile (a) ukuvumela isimemezelo somthetho nofana ukuthobela ikambiso yomthetho esetjenziswe emNyangweni wezeziNdlu nofana kubunzinzolwazi; (b) ukuvikela amalungelo nofana ipahla yomNyango wezeziNdlu; begodu, (c) ukwenza njalo ngaphasi kwamajamo arhabekileko wokuvikela ubuvikelo babasebenzisi bomNyango wezeziNdlu, nofana umphakathi.

Ukusetjenziswa kwamakhuki
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu busebenzisa "amakhokhisi" ukukusiza ukwenza ilemuko lethungelelwano. 
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu busebenzisa amakhukhisi ukuzijayeza ngelemuko lokusebenzisa i-inthanede.
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu busebenzisa amakhuki ukukusiza bona enze ilemuko lakhe ngokwezinto ezikumtjhini-ngqondo libe ngelakhe yedwa.
Iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu isebenzisa amakhuki ukukusiza ukwenza ilwazi lakho liqalane nawe ekusebenziseni kwakho i-inthanethi.
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu busebenzisa amakhukhisi ukuzijayeza ngelemuko lokusebenzisa i-inthanede.
Ubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu busebenzisa amakhuki ukukusiza bona enze ilemuko lakhe ngokwezinto ezikumtjhini-ngqondo libe ngelakhe yedwa.
Iwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu isebenzisa amakhuki ukukusiza ukwenza ilwazi lakho liqalane nawe ekusebenziseni kwakho i-inthanethi.

Ikhokhi yifayili yokutlolweko ebekwa yiseva yekhasi lethungelelwano kuhadiski yakho.  
Ikhukhi ifayela eyitheksti ebekwa ediskini eliqinileko yiseva yephepha lobunzinzolwazi.
Ikhuki  yifayili yetheksti ebekwa yiseva yekhasi lewebhu kudiski.
Ikhuki yifayili yomtlolo efakwa ku-hard disk yakho yiseva yekhasi lewebhusayidi. 
Ikhukhi ifayela eyitheksti ebekwa ediskini eliqinileko yiseva yephepha lobunzinzolwazi.

Ikhuki yifayili yomtlolo efakwa ku-hard disk yakho yiseva yekhasi lewebhusayidi.

Ikhuki  yifayili yetheksti ebekwa yiseva yekhasi lewebhu kudiski.
Amakhokhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo wekhomphyutha nofana ukufaka amavayirasi ekhomphiyutheni yakho.  
Amakhukhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukuvula amaphrogremu nofana ukufaka amavariyasi ekhomphyuthenakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukwenza amahlelo nanyana ukudlulisela amavayirasi kumtjhini-ngqondo wakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo namkha ukuthumela amavayirasi ekhomphyutheni yakho. 
Amakhukhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukuvula amaphrogremu nofana ukufaka amavariyasi ekhomphyuthenakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukwenza amahlelo nanyana ukudlulisela amavayirasi kumtjhini-ngqondo wakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo namkha ukuthumela amavayirasi ekhomphyutheni yakho. 
Amakhokhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo wekhomphyutha nofana ukufaka amavayirasi ekhomphiyutheni yakho.  
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukwenza amahlelo nanyana ukudlulisela amavayirasi kumtjhini-ngqondo wakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo namkha ukuthumela amavayirasi ekhomphyutheni yakho. 
Amakhokhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo wekhomphyutha nofana ukufaka amavayirasi ekhomphiyutheni yakho.  
Amakhukhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukuvula amaphrogremu nofana ukufaka amavariyasi ekhomphyuthenakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo namkha ukuthumela amavayirasi ekhomphyutheni yakho. 
Amakhokhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukukhambisa amahlelo wekhomphyutha nofana ukufaka amavayirasi ekhomphiyutheni yakho.  
Amakhukhisi angeze asetjenziselwa ukuvula amaphrogremu nofana ukufaka amavariyasi ekhomphyuthenakho.
Amakhuki angeze asetjenziselwa ukwenza amahlelo nanyana ukudlulisela amavayirasi kumtjhini-ngqondo wakho.
Amakhokhisi abelwa wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu ekudomeyini ethumele ikhokhi kuwe.
Amakhukhisi enzelwe wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yobunzinzolwazi endlwaneni ekukhiphela ikhukhi.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngendlela ekhethekileko, begodu akghona ukufundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu endaweni ekhuphe amakhuki yawanikela wena.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngokuhlukileko begodu angafundwa kuphela yiseva yewebhusayidi kudomeyini ekhuphe ikhuki yaliqalisa kuwe.  
Amakhukhisi enzelwe wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yobunzinzolwazi endlwaneni ekukhiphela ikhukhi.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngendlela ekhethekileko, begodu akghona ukufundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu endaweni ekhuphe amakhuki yawanikela wena.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngokuhlukileko begodu angafundwa kuphela yiseva yewebhusayidi kudomeyini ekhuphe ikhuki yaliqalisa kuwe.  
Amakhokhisi abelwa wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu ekudomeyini ethumele ikhokhi kuwe.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngendlela ekhethekileko, begodu akghona ukufundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu endaweni ekhuphe amakhuki yawanikela wena.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngokuhlukileko begodu angafundwa kuphela yiseva yewebhusayidi kudomeyini ekhuphe ikhuki yaliqalisa kuwe.  
Amakhokhisi abelwa wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu ekudomeyini ethumele ikhokhi kuwe.
Amakhukhisi enzelwe wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yobunzinzolwazi endlwaneni ekukhiphela ikhukhi.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngokuhlukileko begodu angafundwa kuphela yiseva yewebhusayidi kudomeyini ekhuphe ikhuki yaliqalisa kuwe.  
Amakhokhisi abelwa wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu ekudomeyini ethumele ikhokhi kuwe.
Amakhukhisi enzelwe wena ngokukhethekileko, begodu angafundwa kwaphela yiseva yobunzinzolwazi endlwaneni ekukhiphela ikhukhi.
Amakhuki anikelwa wena ngendlela ekhethekileko, begodu akghona ukufundwa kwaphela yiseva yewebhu endaweni ekhuphe amakhuki yawanikela wena.
Ihloso yinye eqakathekileko yamakhokhisi kukwenzela ubujamo obulula ukuze ubulunge isikhathi. 
Omunye weminqopho esisekelo yamakhukhisi ukukunikela indlela elula yokukubulungela isikhathi.
Omunye weminqopho wokuthoma wamakhuki kunikela itshwayo elifaneleko ukobana wonge isikhathi.
Eminye yeminqopho emikhulu yamakhuki kunikela ngento engakubulungela isikhathi. 
Omunye weminqopho esisekelo yamakhukhisi ukukunikela indlela elula yokukubulungela isikhathi.
Omunye weminqopho wokuthoma wamakhuki kunikela itshwayo elifaneleko ukobana wonge isikhathi.
Eminye yeminqopho emikhulu yamakhuki kunikela ngento engakubulungela isikhathi. 
Ihloso yinye eqakathekileko yamakhokhisi kukwenzela ubujamo obulula ukuze ubulunge isikhathi. 
Omunye weminqopho wokuthoma wamakhuki kunikela itshwayo elifaneleko ukobana wonge isikhathi.
Eminye yeminqopho emikhulu yamakhuki kunikela ngento engakubulungela isikhathi. 
Ihloso yinye eqakathekileko yamakhokhisi kukwenzela ubujamo obulula ukuze ubulunge isikhathi. 
Omunye weminqopho esisekelo yamakhukhisi ukukunikela indlela elula yokukubulungela isikhathi.
Eminye yeminqopho emikhulu yamakhuki kunikela ngento engakubulungela isikhathi. 
Ihloso yinye eqakathekileko yamakhokhisi kukwenzela ubujamo obulula ukuze ubulunge isikhathi. 
Omunye weminqopho esisekelo yamakhukhisi ukukunikela indlela elula yokukubulungela isikhathi.
Omunye weminqopho wokuthoma wamakhuki kunikela itshwayo elifaneleko ukobana wonge isikhathi.
Ihloso yekhokhi kutjela iseva yewebhu bona ubuyele ekhasini elinqophileko. 
Umnqopho wekhukhi kutjela iseva yobunzinzolwazi bona wena sewubuyele ephepheni elithize.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhu bona sewubuyele ekhasini elithileko.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhusayidi bona ubuyele ekhasini elithileko.  
Umnqopho wekhukhi kutjela iseva yobunzinzolwazi bona wena sewubuyele ephepheni elithize.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhu bona sewubuyele ekhasini elithileko.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhusayidi bona ubuyele ekhasini elithileko.  
Ihloso yekhokhi kutjela iseva yewebhu bona ubuyele ekhasini elinqophileko. 
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhu bona sewubuyele ekhasini elithileko.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhusayidi bona ubuyele ekhasini elithileko.  
Ihloso yekhokhi kutjela iseva yewebhu bona ubuyele ekhasini elinqophileko. 
Umnqopho wekhukhi kutjela iseva yobunzinzolwazi bona wena sewubuyele ephepheni elithize.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhusayidi bona ubuyele ekhasini elithileko.  
Ihloso yekhokhi kutjela iseva yewebhu bona ubuyele ekhasini elinqophileko. 
Umnqopho wekhukhi kutjela iseva yobunzinzolwazi bona wena sewubuyele ephepheni elithize.
Umnqopho wekhuki kutjela iseva yewebhu bona sewubuyele ekhasini elithileko.
Isibonelo, nawenza amakhasi womNyango wezeziNdlu abe ngewakho, nofana ubhalise kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana emisebenzini yawo, ikhokhi lisiza umNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhumbula ilwazi lakho elinqophileko lamuva lokuvakatjhela ubunzinzolwazi bomnyango. 
Isibonelo, nawusebenzisa amaphepha womNyango wezeziNdlu, nofana utlolise esayidini lomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana emisebenzini, ikhukhi izokusiza umNyango wezeziNdlu bona ikhumbule ilwazi lakho elithile lamavakatjho owenze ngokulandelana.
Isibonelo, nangabe wenza amakhasi womNyango wezeziNdlu abe ngewakho, nanyana uzitlolisa nendawo nanyana nemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu, ikhukhi isiza umNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhumbula ilwazi lakho elithileko ngamavakatjho alandelako.
Isibonelo, nayikuthi wenza amakhasi womNyango wezeziNdlu akhambelane neemfuno zakho, namkha uzitlolisa kuwebhusayidi yomNyango wezeziNdlu namkha imisebenzi, ikhuki isiza umNyango wezeziNdlu ukubuyisa ilwazi lakho elikhethekileko ngokuvakatjha okulandelako.
Isibonelo, nawusebenzisa amaphepha womNyango wezeziNdlu, nofana utlolise esayidini lomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana emisebenzini, ikhukhi izokusiza umNyango wezeziNdlu bona ikhumbule ilwazi lakho elithile lamavakatjho owenze ngokulandelana.

Lokhu kwenza ihlelo lokurekhoda ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho libe lula,          nje-adresi ekuthunyelwa kiyo ibhili, i-adresi yalapha ungalethelwa khona ipahla, njll. 
Lokhu kwenza ikambiso yokurekhoda ilwazi elimayelana nawe ibe lula, ilwazi elifana neemphande ozivakatjheleko, neemphande ozithumeleko, njalonjalo.
Lokhu kwenza bona irherho lokugadangisa ilwazi okungelakho libe lula, okufana neemphande zama-akhawundi, iimphande zokulethwa ngeenkepe, njll.
Lokhu kwenza ikambiso yokurekhoda ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ibe lula, elifana nama-adresi weenkolodo, ama-adresi wokuthenga ngelwandle, njll. 
Lokhu kwenza ikambiso yokurekhoda ilwazi elimayelana nawe ibe lula, ilwazi elifana neemphande ozivakatjheleko, neemphande ozithumeleko, njalonjalo.
Lokhu kwenza bona irherho lokugadangisa ilwazi okungelakho libe lula, okufana neemphande zama-akhawundi, iimphande zokulethwa ngeenkepe, njll.
Lokhu kwenza ikambiso yokurekhoda ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ibe lula, elifana nama-adresi weenkolodo, ama-adresi wokuthenga ngelwandle, njll.

Lokhu kwenza bona irherho lokugadangisa ilwazi okungelakho libe lula, okufana neemphande zama-akhawundi, iimphande zokulethwa ngeenkepe, njll.
Lokha nawubuyela kubunzinzolwazi obufanako bomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi olinikele ngaphambilini lingatholakala, njeke ungasebenzisa ngobulula amajamo owenze abangewakho womNyango wezeziNdlu.
Nawubuyela kubunzinzolwazi obufanako bomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi olinikele ekuthomeni lingarhujululwa, ngalokho ungasebenzisa lula iindawo zomNyango wezezindlu okhe wazisebenzisa.
Nawubuyela kubunzinzolwazi obufanako bomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi olifake ngaphambilini lingakhutjhwa, yeke ungamane usebenzise amatshwayo womNyango wezeziNdlu ozitjhugululele wona. 
Lokha nawubuyela kuwebhusayidi efanako yomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi olinikele esikhathini esadlulako lingabuyiswa, ngalokho ungasebenzisa lula ubujamo obubonako bomNyango wezeziNdlu. 
Nawubuyela kubunzinzolwazi obufanako bomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi olinikele ekuthomeni lingarhujululwa, ngalokho ungasebenzisa lula iindawo zomNyango wezezindlu okhe wazisebenzisa.

Lokha nawubuyela kubunzinzolwazi obufanako bomNyango wezeziNdlu, ilwazi olinikele ngaphambilini lingatholakala, njeke ungasebenzisa ngobulula amajamo owenze abangewakho womNyango wezeziNdlu.

Uyakghona ukwamukela nokwala amakhokhisi.  
Unelungelo lokwamukela nofana ukwala amakhukhisi.
Unekghono lokwamukela nanyana lokwala amakhuki.
Unekghono lokwamukela namkha lokwala amakhuki. 
Unelungelo lokwamukela nofana ukwala amakhukhisi.
Unekghono lokwamukela nanyana lokwala amakhuki.
Unekghono lokwamukela namkha lokwala amakhuki. 
Uyakghona ukwamukela nokwala amakhokhisi.  
Unekghono lokwamukela nanyana lokwala amakhuki.
Unekghono lokwamukela namkha lokwala amakhuki. 
Uyakghona ukwamukela nokwala amakhokhisi.  
Unelungelo lokwamukela nofana ukwala amakhukhisi.
Unekghono lokwamukela namkha lokwala amakhuki. 
Uyakghona ukwamukela nokwala amakhokhisi.  
Unelungelo lokwamukela nofana ukwala amakhukhisi.
Unekghono lokwamukela nanyana lokwala amakhuki.
Iimphenyi zobunzinzolwazi ezinengi zamukela amakhokhisi ngokuzenzakalelako, kodwana ngokwevamisa ungenza isiphenyi sakho bona sale amakhokhisi nawufunako.  
Abarhubhululi bewebhu vane benze kuzenzakalele ukwamukela amakhukhisi, kodwana ungenza ibhrawuza yakho inine ukusebenzisa amakhukhi nangabe unyula ukwenza njalo.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wewebhu amane amukele amakhuki, kodwana esikhathini esinengi ungalungisalungisa ukuhleleka kwebhrawuza yakho ukobana yale amakhuki nawunyula lokho.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wamawebhusayidi amukela ngokuzenzakalela amakhuki, kodwana ungatjhugulula ibhrawuza yakho ukuze ukwazi ukwala amakhuki nayikuthi unyula lokho.  
Abarhubhululi bewebhu vane benze kuzenzakalele ukwamukela amakhukhisi, kodwana ungenza ibhrawuza yakho inine ukusebenzisa amakhukhi nangabe unyula ukwenza njalo.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wewebhu amane amukele amakhuki, kodwana esikhathini esinengi ungalungisalungisa ukuhleleka kwebhrawuza yakho ukobana yale amakhuki nawunyula lokho.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wamawebhusayidi amukela ngokuzenzakalela amakhuki, kodwana ungatjhugulula ibhrawuza yakho ukuze ukwazi ukwala amakhuki nayikuthi unyula lokho.  
Iimphenyi zobunzinzolwazi ezinengi zamukela amakhokhisi ngokuzenzakalelako, kodwana ngokwevamisa ungenza isiphenyi sakho bona sale amakhokhisi nawufunako.  
Inengi lamabhrawuza wewebhu amane amukele amakhuki, kodwana esikhathini esinengi ungalungisalungisa ukuhleleka kwebhrawuza yakho ukobana yale amakhuki nawunyula lokho.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wamawebhusayidi amukela ngokuzenzakalela amakhuki, kodwana ungatjhugulula ibhrawuza yakho ukuze ukwazi ukwala amakhuki nayikuthi unyula lokho.  
Iimphenyi zobunzinzolwazi ezinengi zamukela amakhokhisi ngokuzenzakalelako, kodwana ngokwevamisa ungenza isiphenyi sakho bona sale amakhokhisi nawufunako.  
Abarhubhululi bewebhu vane benze kuzenzakalele ukwamukela amakhukhisi, kodwana ungenza ibhrawuza yakho inine ukusebenzisa amakhukhi nangabe unyula ukwenza njalo.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wamawebhusayidi amukela ngokuzenzakalela amakhuki, kodwana ungatjhugulula ibhrawuza yakho ukuze ukwazi ukwala amakhuki nayikuthi unyula lokho.  
Iimphenyi zobunzinzolwazi ezinengi zamukela amakhokhisi ngokuzenzakalelako, kodwana ngokwevamisa ungenza isiphenyi sakho bona sale amakhokhisi nawufunako.  
Abarhubhululi bewebhu vane benze kuzenzakalele ukwamukela amakhukhisi, kodwana ungenza ibhrawuza yakho inine ukusebenzisa amakhukhi nangabe unyula ukwenza njalo.
Inengi lamabhrawuza wewebhu amane amukele amakhuki, kodwana esikhathini esinengi ungalungisalungisa ukuhleleka kwebhrawuza yakho ukobana yale amakhuki nawunyula lokho.
Nawukhetha ukwala amakhokhisi, kungenzeka ungakghoni ukuthola ilemuko elizeleko lamajamo wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana amanzinzolwazi owavakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukunina amakhukhisi, angeze ube nelemuko elaneleko lokusebenza ngamajamo ahlukahlukeneko wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, angeze wakghona ukuba nelemuko elizeleko lamakghono akhulumisanako wemisebenzi nanyana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Nayikuthi ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, kungenzeka ungakghona ukusebenzisa ngokuzeleko ubujamo bokuthintana bemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu namkha amawebhusayidi owavakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukunina amakhukhisi, angeze ube nelemuko elaneleko lokusebenza ngamajamo ahlukahlukeneko wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, angeze wakghona ukuba nelemuko elizeleko lamakghono akhulumisanako wemisebenzi nanyana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Nayikuthi ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, kungenzeka ungakghona ukusebenzisa ngokuzeleko ubujamo bokuthintana bemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu namkha amawebhusayidi owavakatjhelako.
Nawukhetha ukwala amakhokhisi, kungenzeka ungakghoni ukuthola ilemuko elizeleko lamajamo wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana amanzinzolwazi owavakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, angeze wakghona ukuba nelemuko elizeleko lamakghono akhulumisanako wemisebenzi nanyana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Nayikuthi ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, kungenzeka ungakghona ukusebenzisa ngokuzeleko ubujamo bokuthintana bemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu namkha amawebhusayidi owavakatjhelako.
Nawukhetha ukwala amakhokhisi, kungenzeka ungakghoni ukuthola ilemuko elizeleko lamajamo wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana amanzinzolwazi owavakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukunina amakhukhisi, angeze ube nelemuko elaneleko lokusebenza ngamajamo ahlukahlukeneko wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako.
Nayikuthi ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, kungenzeka ungakghona ukusebenzisa ngokuzeleko ubujamo bokuthintana bemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu namkha amawebhusayidi owavakatjhelako.
Nawukhetha ukwala amakhokhisi, kungenzeka ungakghoni ukuthola ilemuko elizeleko lamajamo wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana amanzinzolwazi owavakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukunina amakhukhisi, angeze ube nelemuko elaneleko lokusebenza ngamajamo ahlukahlukeneko wemisebenzi yomNyango wezeziNdlu nofana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako.
Nangabe ukhetha ukwala amakhuki, angeze wakghona ukuba nelemuko elizeleko lamakghono akhulumisanako wemisebenzi nanyana ubunzinzolwazi obuvakatjhelako bomNyango wezeziNdlu.
Ivikeleko leLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.

Ivikelo leLwazi elimayelana Nawe
Ukuvikeleka kwelwAzi okungeLakho
Ukuphepha kweLwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ivikeleko leLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ukuvikeleka kwelwAzi okungeLakho
Ukuphepha kweLwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ivikeleko leLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ivikelo leLwazi elimayelana Nawe
Ukuphepha kweLwazi eliPhathelene Nawe 
Ivikeleko leLwazi elimayelana nawe Siqu sakho.
Ivikelo leLwazi elimayelana Nawe
Ukuvikeleka kwelwAzi okungeLakho
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho ekufikelelekeni, ekusetjenzisweni nofana ekuvezweni okungakagunyazwa. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe ekusetjenzisweni babantu abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ekuthini lifikelelwe ngokungakavunyelwa, lisetjenziswe namkha livezwe. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe ekusetjenzisweni babantu abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ekuthini lifikelelwe ngokungakavunyelwa, lisetjenziswe namkha livezwe. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho ekufikelelekeni, ekusetjenzisweni nofana ekuvezweni okungakagunyazwa. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ekuthini lifikelelwe ngokungakavunyelwa, lisetjenziswe namkha livezwe. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho ekufikelelekeni, ekusetjenzisweni nofana ekuvezweni okungakagunyazwa. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe ekusetjenzisweni babantu abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nawe ekuthini lifikelelwe ngokungakavunyelwa, lisetjenziswe namkha livezwe. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho ekufikelelekeni, ekusetjenzisweni nofana ekuvezweni okungakagunyazwa. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe ekusetjenzisweni babantu abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho olifaka kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako nelivikelweko, nelivikelwe ekusetjenzisweni okungakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuvezwa kwelwazelo.   
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe onikela ngalo emaseveni wekhomphyutha ngendlela yokulawula, yebhoduluko elivikelekileko, ukulivikela ebantwini abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho elingabonakala olifake kumaseva womtjhini-ngqondo ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelekileko, elivikelwe ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nomuntu elibonakalako olinikela kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelweko neliphephileko ekufikelelweni, ekusetjenzisweni namkha ekuvezweni okungakavunyelwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe onikela ngalo emaseveni wekhomphyutha ngendlela yokulawula, yebhoduluko elivikelekileko, ukulivikela ebantwini abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho elingabonakala olifake kumaseva womtjhini-ngqondo ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelekileko, elivikelwe ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nomuntu elibonakalako olinikela kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelweko neliphephileko ekufikelelweni, ekusetjenzisweni namkha ekuvezweni okungakavunyelwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho olifaka kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako nelivikelweko, nelivikelwe ekusetjenzisweni okungakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuvezwa kwelwazelo.   
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho elingabonakala olifake kumaseva womtjhini-ngqondo ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelekileko, elivikelwe ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nomuntu elibonakalako olinikela kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelweko neliphephileko ekufikelelweni, ekusetjenzisweni namkha ekuvezweni okungakavunyelwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho olifaka kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako nelivikelweko, nelivikelwe ekusetjenzisweni okungakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuvezwa kwelwazelo.   
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe onikela ngalo emaseveni wekhomphyutha ngendlela yokulawula, yebhoduluko elivikelekileko, ukulivikela ebantwini abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi eliphathelene nomuntu elibonakalako olinikela kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelweko neliphephileko ekufikelelweni, ekusetjenzisweni namkha ekuvezweni okungakavunyelwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elikhombekako elimayelana nawe siqu sakho olifaka kumaseva wamakhomphyutha ebhodulukweni elilawulwako nelivikelweko, nelivikelwe ekusetjenzisweni okungakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuvezwa kwelwazelo.   
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi elimayelana nawe onikela ngalo emaseveni wekhomphyutha ngendlela yokulawula, yebhoduluko elivikelekileko, ukulivikela ebantwini abangakavunyelwa, ukusetjenziswa nofana ukuveza ifihlo.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela ilwazi okungelakho elingabonakala olifake kumaseva womtjhini-ngqondo ebhodulukweni elilawulwako, elivikelekileko, elivikelwe ukobana kungangeni abantu abangakagunyazwa, ukusetjenziswa nanyana ukuveza ifihlo. 
Lokha ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho (njengenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelwa ngokuthi kusetjenziswe ihlelo lokufihla ilwazi, njengesisetjenziswa sephrothokholi yeLeya yeSokethi eVikelwako (SSL). 
Nangabe ilwazi elimayelana nawe (njengenomboro yekarada lesikolodo) ligadangiswa kubunzinzolwazi obunye, yazi bona livikelwe ngokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-ensirayiptjhini, njengehlelo leLeya yeSekhyo Sokede-(i-SSL).
Lokha ilwazi okungelakho (elifana nenomboro yekarada lekhredithi) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelekile ngokusetjenziswa kokutjhugululwa kwemininingwana, okufana neSokhethe yeLarha eliVikelekileko (i-SSL) leemphakamiso.
Lokha ilwazi eliphathelene nawe (elifana nenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliswa ukuya kwamanye amawebhusayidi, livikelwa ngokusetjenziswa kwekambiso yokutjhugululelwa kwedatha kukhodi, okufana nekambiso yeSivikelilwazi (okuyi-SSL).
Nangabe ilwazi elimayelana nawe (njengenomboro yekarada lesikolodo) ligadangiswa kubunzinzolwazi obunye, yazi bona livikelwe ngokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-ensirayiptjhini, njengehlelo leLeya yeSekhyo Sokede-(i-SSL).
Lokha ilwazi okungelakho (elifana nenomboro yekarada lekhredithi) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelekile ngokusetjenziswa kokutjhugululwa kwemininingwana, okufana neSokhethe yeLarha eliVikelekileko (i-SSL) leemphakamiso.
Lokha ilwazi eliphathelene nawe (elifana nenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliswa ukuya kwamanye amawebhusayidi, livikelwa ngokusetjenziswa kwekambiso yokutjhugululelwa kwedatha kukhodi, okufana nekambiso yeSivikelilwazi (okuyi-SSL).
Lokha ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho (njengenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelwa ngokuthi kusetjenziswe ihlelo lokufihla ilwazi, njengesisetjenziswa sephrothokholi yeLeya yeSokethi eVikelwako (SSL).

Lokha ilwazi eliphathelene nawe (elifana nenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliswa ukuya kwamanye amawebhusayidi, livikelwa ngokusetjenziswa kwekambiso yokutjhugululelwa kwedatha kukhodi, okufana nekambiso yeSivikelilwazi (okuyi-SSL).
Lokha ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho (njengenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelwa ngokuthi kusetjenziswe ihlelo lokufihla ilwazi, njengesisetjenziswa sephrothokholi yeLeya yeSokethi eVikelwako (SSL).

Lokha ilwazi elimayelana nawe siqu sakho (njengenomboro yekarada lokuthenga ngesikolodo) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelwa ngokuthi kusetjenziswe ihlelo lokufihla ilwazi, njengesisetjenziswa sephrothokholi yeLeya yeSokethi eVikelwako (SSL). 
Nangabe ilwazi elimayelana nawe (njengenomboro yekarada lesikolodo) ligadangiswa kubunzinzolwazi obunye, yazi bona livikelwe ngokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-ensirayiptjhini, njengehlelo leLeya yeSekhyo Sokede-(i-SSL).
Lokha ilwazi okungelakho (elifana nenomboro yekarada lekhredithi) lidluliselwa kobunye ubunzinzolwazi, livikelekile ngokusetjenziswa kokutjhugululwa kwemininingwana, okufana neSokhethe yeLarha eliVikelekileko (i-SSL) leemphakamiso.

Amatjhuguluko amayelana nesiTatimende lesi
AmaTjhuguluko kilesisiTatimende
Amatjhuguluko ngesiTatimende lesi
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzakuthi ngakanye wenze isiTatimende esimayelana nawe uweDwa sikhambisane nesikhathi samuva ukutjengisa umbiko obuyako wekhamphani namakhastama. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzokunande wenza amatjhugululo wokuhlalisa lesisiTatimende sokuFihla ilwazi ukuze kuhlonyelelwe umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ngaso soke isikhathi uzakunande ungezelela isiTatimende lesi sokuba Wedwa ukutjengisa ikhamphani kanye nombiko obuyako womthengi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzakunande uletha ebujameni banjesi isiTatimende seFihlo ukutjengisa umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzokunande wenza amatjhugululo wokuhlalisa lesisiTatimende sokuFihla ilwazi ukuze kuhlonyelelwe umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ngaso soke isikhathi uzakunande ungezelela isiTatimende lesi sokuba Wedwa ukutjengisa ikhamphani kanye nombiko obuyako womthengi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzakunande uletha ebujameni banjesi isiTatimende seFihlo ukutjengisa umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzokunande wenza amatjhugululo wokuhlalisa lesisiTatimende sokuFihla ilwazi ukuze kuhlonyelelwe umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzakunande uletha ebujameni banjesi isiTatimende seFihlo ukutjengisa umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzakuthi ngakanye wenze isiTatimende esimayelana nawe uweDwa sikhambisane nesikhathi samuva ukutjengisa umbiko obuyako wekhamphani namakhastama. 
UmNyango wezeziNdlu uzokunande wenza amatjhugululo wokuhlalisa lesisiTatimende sokuFihla ilwazi ukuze kuhlonyelelwe umbiko obuyako wekhamphani nekhastama.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ngaso soke isikhathi uzakunande ungezelela isiTatimende lesi sokuba Wedwa ukutjengisa ikhamphani kanye nombiko obuyako womthengi.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona unande ubuyekeze isitatimende selwazi elimayelana nawe wedwa ukuthi uhlale unelwazi lokuthi umNyango wezeziNdlu ulivikela njani ilwazi elimayelana lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukhuthaza wena bona ngaso soke isikhathi wenze ibuyekezo kilesisiTatimende ukuze wazi bona umNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela njani ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza bona ngaso soke isikhathi ubuyekeze isiTatimende lesi ukobana wazi indlela umNyango wezeziNdlu ovikela ngayo ilwazi lakho.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukukhuthaza ukobana uhlale ubuyekeza isiTatimende lesi ukuze wazi ngokuthi ingabe umNyango wezeziNdlu ulivikela njani ilwazi lakho.  
UmNyango wezeziNdlu ukhuthaza wena bona ngaso soke isikhathi wenze ibuyekezo kilesisiTatimende ukuze wazi bona umNyango wezeziNdlu uvikela njani ilwazi lakho.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu wamukela ukuphawula kwakho ngesiTatimende selwazi elimayelana nawe weDwa  
UmNyango wezeziNdlu wamukela iimphakamiso zakho mayelana nesiTatimendesi sokuFihla iLwazi
UmNyango wezeziNdlu wamukela iimphakamiso zakho mayelana nesiTatimende lesi sokuba Wedwa.
UmNyango wezeziNdlu wamukela imibono yakho mayelana nalesi siTatimende seFihlo.

UmNyango wezeziNdlu wamukela iimphakamiso zakho mayelana nesiTatimende lesi sokuba Wedwa.
Nangabe ukholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu awukakhambisani nesiTatimende lesi, thintana nomNyango wezeziNdlu                                     ku-webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Nangabe ukholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu azange wenze njengokutjhiwo siTatimendesi, ngibawa uthintane nomNyango wezeziNdlu lapha webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za
Nangabe uyakholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu awukasilandeli isiTatimende lesi, sibawa uthintane nomNyango wezeziNdlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Nayikuthi ukholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu awukakhambisani nalesi siTatimende, sibawa bona uthintane nomNyango wezeziNdlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.

Nayikuthi ukholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu awukakhambisani nalesi siTatimende, sibawa bona uthintane nomNyango wezeziNdlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Nangabe ukholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu awukakhambisani nesiTatimende lesi, thintana nomNyango wezeziNdlu                                     ku-webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Nangabe ukholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu azange wenze njengokutjhiwo siTatimendesi, ngibawa uthintane nomNyango wezeziNdlu lapha webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za
Nangabe uyakholwa bona umNyango wezeziNdlu awukasilandeli isiTatimende lesi, sibawa uthintane nomNyango wezeziNdlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Sizokwenza imizamo efaneleko ukuthi   sikhombe besilungise umraro msinya.
Sizokusebenzisa amandla wendlela engabiziko ukuphendula nokulungisa msinyana umraro onawo.
Sizakusebenzisa imizamo yerhwebo engabizi khulu ukobana siqunte msinya begodu silungise umraro.
Sizakusebenzisa imizamo ezwakalako ngokweemali ukuqunta khonokho nokurarulula umraro.

Ikulumo kaNdunakulu u-Ebrahim Rasool eMnyanyeni wokuThokozisa labo ebebafunda uMethrigi.

Namhlanje siza la ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bekamethrigi abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size la ukuzokukwakwazelela amamethrikhi aphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bebanga lesumi  abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi siza lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bakamethriki abaphambili.
Namhlanjesi size la ukuzokukwakwazelela amamethrikhi aphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bebanga lesumi  abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi siza lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bakamethriki abaphambili.
Namhlanje siza la ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bekamethrigi abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bebanga lesumi  abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi siza lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bakamethriki abaphambili.
Namhlanje siza la ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bekamethrigi abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size la ukuzokukwakwazelela amamethrikhi aphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi siza lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bakamethriki abaphambili.
Namhlanje siza la ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bekamethrigi abaphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size la ukuzokukwakwazelela amamethrikhi aphume phambili.
Namhlanjesi size lapha ukuzokuthokozisa abafundi bethu bebanga lesumi  abaphume phambili.
Sithi kibo: Basebenze kuhle! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha ziyanithokozisa, ababelethi benu bayanithokozisa, begodu okuqakatheke khulu kukuthi nani kufanele nizikhakhazise.
Sithi kibo: Nenze kuhle! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, isiFunda neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu bayazikhakhazisa ngani, okuqakatheke kunakho koke kukobana kufanele nizikhakhazise nani.
Sithi kibo: Nisebenzile! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu  bayazikhakhazisa ngani, begodu okuqakatheke tle kukobana nina kufanele nizikhakhazise ngani.
Sithi kibo: Nisebenzile! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha ziyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu bayazikhakhazisa ngani, begodu ukudlula lapho kufanele nani nizikhakhazise. 
Sithi kibo: Nenze kuhle! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, isiFunda neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu bayazikhakhazisa ngani, okuqakatheke kunakho koke kukobana kufanele nizikhakhazise nani.
Sithi kibo: Nisebenzile! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu  bayazikhakhazisa ngani, begodu okuqakatheke tle kukobana nina kufanele nizikhakhazise ngani.

Sithi kibo: Nisebenzile! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu  bayazikhakhazisa ngani, begodu okuqakatheke tle kukobana nina kufanele nizikhakhazise ngani.
Sithi kibo: Nisebenzile! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha ziyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu bayazikhakhazisa ngani, begodu ukudlula lapho kufanele nani nizikhakhazise. 
Sithi kibo: Basebenze kuhle! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha ziyanithokozisa, ababelethi benu bayanithokozisa, begodu okuqakatheke khulu kukuthi nani kufanele nizikhakhazise.

Sithi kibo: Basebenze kuhle! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha ziyanithokozisa, ababelethi benu bayanithokozisa, begodu okuqakatheke khulu kukuthi nani kufanele nizikhakhazise.
Sithi kibo: Nenze kuhle! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, isiFunda neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu bayazikhakhazisa ngani, okuqakatheke kunakho koke kukobana kufanele nizikhakhazise nani.
Sithi kibo: Nisebenzile! Siyazikhakhazisa ngani, iPhrovinsi neNarha siyazikhakhazisa ngani, ababelethi benu  bayazikhakhazisa ngani, begodu okuqakatheke tle kukobana nina kufanele nizikhakhazise ngani.
Isizathu  sokuthi sikhulume ngokuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kungokuyelela iphuzu lokuthi ngesikhathi ipumelelo ivela ngemva kokusebenza budisi nokuzinikela isikhathi eside, kukuthi namhlanje sikhathi sokuzwisisa ubujamo obungahlathululwa njengalobo obungazwisisekiko.
Unobangela owenza siveze ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, lokhu kungokufanisa indaba yokobana ithuba lokuphumelela liza esikhathini eside sobudisi nokuzinikela, lokho-ke manje kujamela ithuba lokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa kuhle njengalobo obubudisi.
Isizathu sokobana sifune ukuzikhakhazisa ngalindlela njenganje, kuthokozela indaba yokobana ukuzuza kwesikhathesi kube khona ngemva kobudisi nokuzidela okuthethe isikhathi eside, okuthi namhlanjesi kujamele isikhathi sehlathululo yalezehlakalo ezingahlathululeka kuhle njengezibudisi.
Ibanga lokobana sibawe ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kukuvuma iqiniso lokobana isikhatjhana esifana nalesi kukobana ipumelelo yesikhatjhana ivela ngemva kwesikhathi eside khulu nokuzinikela, ukobana inamhlanjesi lijamele isikhatjhana sokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa khulu njengoburareneko. 
Unobangela owenza siveze ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, lokhu kungokufanisa indaba yokobana ithuba lokuphumelela liza esikhathini eside sobudisi nokuzinikela, lokho-ke manje kujamela ithuba lokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa kuhle njengalobo obubudisi.
Isizathu sokobana sifune ukuzikhakhazisa ngalindlela njenganje, kuthokozela indaba yokobana ukuzuza kwesikhathesi kube khona ngemva kobudisi nokuzidela okuthethe isikhathi eside, okuthi namhlanjesi kujamele isikhathi sehlathululo yalezehlakalo ezingahlathululeka kuhle njengezibudisi.
Ibanga lokobana sibawe ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kukuvuma iqiniso lokobana isikhatjhana esifana nalesi kukobana ipumelelo yesikhatjhana ivela ngemva kwesikhathi eside khulu nokuzinikela, ukobana inamhlanjesi lijamele isikhatjhana sokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa khulu njengoburareneko. 
Isizathu  sokuthi sikhulume ngokuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kungokuyelela iphuzu lokuthi ngesikhathi ipumelelo ivela ngemva kokusebenza budisi nokuzinikela isikhathi eside, kukuthi namhlanje sikhathi sokuzwisisa ubujamo obungahlathululwa njengalobo obungazwisisekiko.
Isizathu sokobana sifune ukuzikhakhazisa ngalindlela njenganje, kuthokozela indaba yokobana ukuzuza kwesikhathesi kube khona ngemva kobudisi nokuzidela okuthethe isikhathi eside, okuthi namhlanjesi kujamele isikhathi sehlathululo yalezehlakalo ezingahlathululeka kuhle njengezibudisi.

Isizathu  sokuthi sikhulume ngokuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kungokuyelela iphuzu lokuthi ngesikhathi ipumelelo ivela ngemva kokusebenza budisi nokuzinikela isikhathi eside, kukuthi namhlanje sikhathi sokuzwisisa ubujamo obungahlathululwa njengalobo obungazwisisekiko.
Unobangela owenza siveze ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, lokhu kungokufanisa indaba yokobana ithuba lokuphumelela liza esikhathini eside sobudisi nokuzinikela, lokho-ke manje kujamela ithuba lokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa kuhle njengalobo obubudisi.
Ibanga lokobana sibawe ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kukuvuma iqiniso lokobana isikhatjhana esifana nalesi kukobana ipumelelo yesikhatjhana ivela ngemva kwesikhathi eside khulu nokuzinikela, ukobana inamhlanjesi lijamele isikhatjhana sokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa khulu njengoburareneko. 
Isizathu  sokuthi sikhulume ngokuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, kungokuyelela iphuzu lokuthi ngesikhathi ipumelelo ivela ngemva kokusebenza budisi nokuzinikela isikhathi eside, kukuthi namhlanje sikhathi sokuzwisisa ubujamo obungahlathululwa njengalobo obungazwisisekiko.
Unobangela owenza siveze ukuzikhakhazisa esikhathini esifana nalesi, lokhu kungokufanisa indaba yokobana ithuba lokuphumelela liza esikhathini eside sobudisi nokuzinikela, lokho-ke manje kujamela ithuba lokucacisa ebujameni obungahlathululwa kuhle njengalobo obubudisi.
Isizathu sokobana sifune ukuzikhakhazisa ngalindlela njenganje, kuthokozela indaba yokobana ukuzuza kwesikhathesi kube khona ngemva kobudisi nokuzidela okuthethe isikhathi eside, okuthi namhlanjesi kujamele isikhathi sehlathululo yalezehlakalo ezingahlathululeka kuhle njengezibudisi.

Ibanga lesumi libudisi.

Ibanga lesumi libudisi.
