Eminyakeni elitjhumi edlulileko safanela ukuthi sitjhugulule irherho loke lezefundo ukuze liphume ekuyameni ku-apariteyidi. 
Eminyakeni engaphezu kwelitjhumi sikateleleke ukutjhidisa irherho loke lefundo lapha belidzimelele khona ebandlululweni.
Eminyakeni egadungileko elisumi kwafuneka bona sitjhugulule ikambiso yezefundo yoke siyikhuphe kileyandlela yebandlululo.
Esikhathini seminyaka elitjhumi edlulileko bekufanele sitjhugulule loke irherho lefundo ekolelweni yalo yebandlululo. 
Eminyakeni engaphezu kwelitjhumi sikateleleke ukutjhidisa irherho loke lefundo lapha belidzimelele khona ebandlululweni.
Eminyakeni egadungileko elisumi kwafuneka bona sitjhugulule ikambiso yezefundo yoke siyikhuphe kileyandlela yebandlululo.
Esikhathini seminyaka elitjhumi edlulileko bekufanele sitjhugulule loke irherho lefundo ekolelweni yalo yebandlululo. 
Eminyakeni elitjhumi edlulileko safanela ukuthi sitjhugulule irherho loke lezefundo ukuze liphume ekuyameni ku-apariteyidi. 
Eminyakeni egadungileko elisumi kwafuneka bona sitjhugulule ikambiso yezefundo yoke siyikhuphe kileyandlela yebandlululo.
Esikhathini seminyaka elitjhumi edlulileko bekufanele sitjhugulule loke irherho lefundo ekolelweni yalo yebandlululo. 
Eminyakeni elitjhumi edlulileko safanela ukuthi sitjhugulule irherho loke lezefundo ukuze liphume ekuyameni ku-apariteyidi. 
Eminyakeni engaphezu kwelitjhumi sikateleleke ukutjhidisa irherho loke lefundo lapha belidzimelele khona ebandlululweni.
Esikhathini seminyaka elitjhumi edlulileko bekufanele sitjhugulule loke irherho lefundo ekolelweni yalo yebandlululo. 
Eminyakeni elitjhumi edlulileko safanela ukuthi sitjhugulule irherho loke lezefundo ukuze liphume ekuyameni ku-apariteyidi. 
Eminyakeni engaphezu kwelitjhumi sikateleleke ukutjhidisa irherho loke lefundo lapha belidzimelele khona ebandlululweni.
Eminyakeni egadungileko elisumi kwafuneka bona sitjhugulule ikambiso yezefundo yoke siyikhuphe kileyandlela yebandlululo.
Singathi kabanzi siphumelele ukuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi nesihlahlubo sinye, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlole bebaphasa umethrigi, begodu nesilemukiso sokuthi ifundo  inikela nangezinye iindingo ezingehla komuntu- ukuthi umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa ethulwa lirherho lezefundo.
Sikwazile ukuphumelela mayelana nokuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi eyodwa nokuhlola, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlola nabaphasa umethrikhi, kanye nelemuko lokobana ifundo ineendingo ezingaphezu komuntu ngamunye - kukobana umnotho woke ulele emakghonweni athize alethwa lirherho lefundo.
Ezintweni ezinengi siphumelele ekuhlanganiseni khulu isilabhasi eyodwa kanye nesihlahlubo, amanani amakhulu walabo abatlola begodu baphumelele ebangeni lesumi, begodu nelemuko lokobana zefundo nazo zitlhogomela ngaphezu komuntu ngamunye  ukobana umNotho woke uyame kumakghono akhona anikelwe yindlela yekambiso yezefundo.
Kanengi siphumelele ngokuya kokuhlanganisa khulu, isilabhasi yinye neenhlahlubo, isibalo esikhulu salabo abatlola bebaphase umethriki, kanye nokwazi kokobana ifundo iqalelela iindingo  ezingehla komuntu  ukobana umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa anikelwa lirherho lezefundo. 
Sikwazile ukuphumelela mayelana nokuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi eyodwa nokuhlola, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlola nabaphasa umethrikhi, kanye nelemuko lokobana ifundo ineendingo ezingaphezu komuntu ngamunye - kukobana umnotho woke ulele emakghonweni athize alethwa lirherho lefundo.
Ezintweni ezinengi siphumelele ekuhlanganiseni khulu isilabhasi eyodwa kanye nesihlahlubo, amanani amakhulu walabo abatlola begodu baphumelele ebangeni lesumi, begodu nelemuko lokobana zefundo nazo zitlhogomela ngaphezu komuntu ngamunye  ukobana umNotho woke uyame kumakghono akhona anikelwe yindlela yekambiso yezefundo.
Kanengi siphumelele ngokuya kokuhlanganisa khulu, isilabhasi yinye neenhlahlubo, isibalo esikhulu salabo abatlola bebaphase umethriki, kanye nokwazi kokobana ifundo iqalelela iindingo  ezingehla komuntu  ukobana umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa anikelwa lirherho lezefundo. 
Singathi kabanzi siphumelele ukuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi nesihlahlubo sinye, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlole bebaphasa umethrigi, begodu nesilemukiso sokuthi ifundo  inikela nangezinye iindingo ezingehla komuntu- ukuthi umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa ethulwa lirherho lezefundo.
Ezintweni ezinengi siphumelele ekuhlanganiseni khulu isilabhasi eyodwa kanye nesihlahlubo, amanani amakhulu walabo abatlola begodu baphumelele ebangeni lesumi, begodu nelemuko lokobana zefundo nazo zitlhogomela ngaphezu komuntu ngamunye  ukobana umNotho woke uyame kumakghono akhona anikelwe yindlela yekambiso yezefundo.
Kanengi siphumelele ngokuya kokuhlanganisa khulu, isilabhasi yinye neenhlahlubo, isibalo esikhulu salabo abatlola bebaphase umethriki, kanye nokwazi kokobana ifundo iqalelela iindingo  ezingehla komuntu  ukobana umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa anikelwa lirherho lezefundo. 
Singathi kabanzi siphumelele ukuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi nesihlahlubo sinye, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlole bebaphasa umethrigi, begodu nesilemukiso sokuthi ifundo  inikela nangezinye iindingo ezingehla komuntu- ukuthi umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa ethulwa lirherho lezefundo.
Sikwazile ukuphumelela mayelana nokuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi eyodwa nokuhlola, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlola nabaphasa umethrikhi, kanye nelemuko lokobana ifundo ineendingo ezingaphezu komuntu ngamunye - kukobana umnotho woke ulele emakghonweni athize alethwa lirherho lefundo.
Kanengi siphumelele ngokuya kokuhlanganisa khulu, isilabhasi yinye neenhlahlubo, isibalo esikhulu salabo abatlola bebaphase umethriki, kanye nokwazi kokobana ifundo iqalelela iindingo  ezingehla komuntu  ukobana umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa anikelwa lirherho lezefundo. 
Singathi kabanzi siphumelele ukuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi nesihlahlubo sinye, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlole bebaphasa umethrigi, begodu nesilemukiso sokuthi ifundo  inikela nangezinye iindingo ezingehla komuntu- ukuthi umnotho woke uyame esedini yamakghonofundwa ethulwa lirherho lezefundo.
Sikwazile ukuphumelela mayelana nokuhlanganisa okukhulu, isilabhasi eyodwa nokuhlola, inani eliphezulu lalabo abatlola nabaphasa umethrikhi, kanye nelemuko lokobana ifundo ineendingo ezingaphezu komuntu ngamunye - kukobana umnotho woke ulele emakghonweni athize alethwa lirherho lefundo.
Ezintweni ezinengi siphumelele ekuhlanganiseni khulu isilabhasi eyodwa kanye nesihlahlubo, amanani amakhulu walabo abatlola begodu baphumelele ebangeni lesumi, begodu nelemuko lokobana zefundo nazo zitlhogomela ngaphezu komuntu ngamunye  ukobana umNotho woke uyame kumakghono akhona anikelwe yindlela yekambiso yezefundo.
Kwamambala umethrigi ubudisi.
Umethrikhi kwamambala ubudisi.
Kwamambala ibanga lesumi libudisi.
Umethriki kwamambala urarene.
Umethrikhi kwamambala ubudisi.
Kwamambala ibanga lesumi libudisi.
Umethriki kwamambala urarene.
Kwamambala umethrigi ubudisi.
Kwamambala ibanga lesumi libudisi.
Umethriki kwamambala urarene.
Kwamambala umethrigi ubudisi.
Umethrikhi kwamambala ubudisi.
Umethriki kwamambala urarene.
Kwamambala umethrigi ubudisi.
Umethrikhi kwamambala ubudisi.
Kwamambala ibanga lesumi libudisi.
Abarholi bethu abahlangene la e-Leeuwenhof ngokungangabazekiko bangabaphuma phambili esinabo, labo abaphumelele kuhle khulu, kanye nalabo abafanelwe bonongorwana boke  i-Phrovinsi le engabapha bona. 
Abarholi bethu esinabo lapha eLeeuwenhof ngokungangabazekiko ngebalungileko esinabo, labo abaphumelele ngepumelelo, begodu nalabo abanelungelo leembongo zoke ezingabuthelelwa ngilesisiFunda.
Abadosiphambili bethu ababuthene lapha e-Leeuwenhof sinethemba lokobana ngibo abafaneleko esinabo, ngilabo abazuze kuhle khulu, begodu ngibo labo abafanele bakwakwazelwe yiPhrovinsi le.
Abadosiphambili bethu ababuthana lapha e- Leeuwenhof ngebezinga eliphezulu kesakhe saba nabo, labo abaphumelele okuphambili kanye nalabo abafanelwe ngikho koke ukuthokozwa iPhrovinsi engakukghona.  
Abarholi bethu esinabo lapha eLeeuwenhof ngokungangabazekiko ngebalungileko esinabo, labo abaphumelele ngepumelelo, begodu nalabo abanelungelo leembongo zoke ezingabuthelelwa ngilesisiFunda.

Abadosiphambili bethu ababuthene lapha e-Leeuwenhof sinethemba lokobana ngibo abafaneleko esinabo, ngilabo abazuze kuhle khulu, begodu ngibo labo abafanele bakwakwazelwe yiPhrovinsi le.
Kodwana imicabango yethu nathi iya ema-71% wabantu abangaphezu kweminyka ema-20 abangazange baqede ifundo yesekhondari, pheze isiquntu  salabo abazi-80 000 abangena kuGreyidi-1 nani eminyakeni eli-12, abangazange batlole neenhlahlubo ngo-2004 ngombana baqindela endleleni, kanye nabanye abatlolileko, kodwana ngebanga ebakhethe ngalo iimfundo namagreyidi wakhona, baneentifiketi ezingakghoni bona zibenze babandakanyeke emnothweni nofana bakghone ukungena emazikweni wefundo ephakemeko.
Nanyana kunjalo imicabangwethu igijimela ema-71% wenani labantu eminyakeni engaphezu kwama-20 abangazange baqede iimfundo zabo zamabanga aphezulu, nabatlolise butjhulweni isiquntu see-80 000 abangene kwaGreyidi 1 eminyakeni eli-12 edlulileko abangazange batlole ihlolo ngo-2004 ngombana balise isikolo endleleni, begodu abanengi batlolile, kodwana ngonobangela weemfundo nokukhethwa kwamagreyidi azange bamukelwe mnotho nofana ifundo ephakamileko.
Imikhumbulo yethu  itjhinga godu nakumaphesende ama-71% wabantu abangehla kweminyaka ema-20 ubudala abangakhange baqede iimfundo sesekhondari, isiquntu sama-80 000 abangene kuGreyidi 1 nawe eminyakeni eli-12 egadungileko abangakhange batlole ngitjho neenhlahlubo zomnyaka we-2004 ngombana balisa kade, begodu nenengi elatlolako, kodwana ngesimanga sekhetho leemfundo namagreyidi, baneentifikeyidi zebanga lesumi ezingeze zamukelwa mnotho nanyana liziko eliphakemeko.
Nanyana kunjalo imicabango yethu iya ku-71% yesitjhaba esineminyaka ema-20 esingakhenge siphethe ifundo yesekhondari, pheze isiquntu se-80 000 esingene kuGreyidi 1 nawe eminyakeni eli-12 eyadlulako engakhenge sitlole iinhlahlubo ngo-2004 ngombana salisa isikolo phakathi, kanye nenengi elatlolako, kodwana ngebanga lokukhetha isifundo negreyidi lineentifikedi zakamethriki ezingeze zangena emnothweni namkha efundweni ephezulu. 
Nanyana kunjalo imicabangwethu igijimela ema-71% wenani labantu eminyakeni engaphezu kwama-20 abangazange baqede iimfundo zabo zamabanga aphezulu, nabatlolise butjhulweni isiquntu see-80 000 abangene kwaGreyidi 1 eminyakeni eli-12 edlulileko abangazange batlole ihlolo ngo-2004 ngombana balise isikolo endleleni, begodu abanengi batlolile, kodwana ngonobangela weemfundo nokukhethwa kwamagreyidi azange bamukelwe mnotho nofana ifundo ephakamileko.
Imikhumbulo yethu  itjhinga godu nakumaphesende ama-71% wabantu abangehla kweminyaka ema-20 ubudala abangakhange baqede iimfundo sesekhondari, isiquntu sama-80 000 abangene kuGreyidi 1 nawe eminyakeni eli-12 egadungileko abangakhange batlole ngitjho neenhlahlubo zomnyaka we-2004 ngombana balisa kade, begodu nenengi elatlolako, kodwana ngesimanga sekhetho leemfundo namagreyidi, baneentifikeyidi zebanga lesumi ezingeze zamukelwa mnotho nanyana liziko eliphakemeko.
Nanyana kunjalo imicabango yethu iya ku-71% yesitjhaba esineminyaka ema-20 esingakhenge siphethe ifundo yesekhondari, pheze isiquntu se-80 000 esingene kuGreyidi 1 nawe eminyakeni eli-12 eyadlulako engakhenge sitlole iinhlahlubo ngo-2004 ngombana salisa isikolo phakathi, kanye nenengi elatlolako, kodwana ngebanga lokukhetha isifundo negreyidi lineentifikedi zakamethriki ezingeze zangena emnothweni namkha efundweni ephezulu.

Umethrigi ubudisi khudlwana nangephuzu lokuthi abantu baqala imisebenzi yethu ngokusebenzisa nina. 
Umethrikhi ubudisi khulukhulu ngombana sikhangisa ngaye.
Ibanga lesumi libudisi khulu ngesimanga sokobana nimafesdere wethu wesitolo.
Umethriki uraraniswa khulu nayindaba yokobana nisithombe sethu sengomuso. 
Umethrikhi ubudisi khulukhulu ngombana sikhangisa ngaye.

Ibanga lesumi libudisi khulu ngesimanga sokobana nimafesdere wethu wesitolo.
Inarha iqala ikusasa lethu ngendlela nina enisebenza ngayo. 
Inarha yenza isahlulelo sengomuso lethu ngokusebenza kwakho.
Isitjhaba sahlulela ikusasa lethu ngemisebenzi yenu
Isitjhaba sijaja ingomuso lethu ngokusebenza kwenu.

Babeka ithemba lokuphumelela ngokusebenza kuhle kwenu. 
Balele ekwenzeni ngokuziphatha kuhle kwakho.
Babeka ithemba labo kuhlalakuhle yenu.
Sisekela ithemba laso ekuphileni kuhle kwenu. 
Balele ekwenzeni ngokuziphatha kuhle kwakho.
Babeka ithemba labo kuhlalakuhle yenu.
Sisekela ithemba laso ekuphileni kuhle kwenu. 
Babeka ithemba lokuphumelela ngokusebenza kuhle kwenu. 
Babeka ithemba labo kuhlalakuhle yenu.
Sisekela ithemba laso ekuphileni kuhle kwenu. 
Babeka ithemba lokuphumelela ngokusebenza kuhle kwenu. 
Balele ekwenzeni ngokuziphatha kuhle kwakho.
Sisekela ithemba laso ekuphileni kuhle kwenu. 
Babeka ithemba lokuphumelela ngokusebenza kuhle kwenu. 
Balele ekwenzeni ngokuziphatha kuhle kwakho.
Babeka ithemba labo kuhlalakuhle yenu.
Babeka ithemba lengomuso ngokusisa kwethu erherhweni lezefundo  elisihlanganise kilesi isikhathi sokugidinga. 
Babeke ithemba labo langomuso ngokusisa kwethu erherhweni lefundo esihlangabezana nalo kilo mgidingo.
Babeka ithemba labo esikhathini esizako ngokusisa kundlela yethu yekambiso esihlanganisileko kilesi sikhathi sokugidinga.
Singasekela ithemba laso engomusweni ngokusisa erherhweni lefundo elihlangana kilesi sikhatjhana sethabo. 
Babeke ithemba labo langomuso ngokusisa kwethu erherhweni lefundo esihlangabezana nalo kilo mgidingo.
Babeka ithemba labo esikhathini esizako ngokusisa kundlela yethu yekambiso esihlanganisileko kilesi sikhathi sokugidinga.
Singasekela ithemba laso engomusweni ngokusisa erherhweni lefundo elihlangana kilesi sikhatjhana sethabo.

Babeke ithemba labo langomuso ngokusisa kwethu erherhweni lefundo esihlangabezana nalo kilo mgidingo.
Singasekela ithemba laso engomusweni ngokusisa erherhweni lefundo elihlangana kilesi sikhatjhana sethabo. 
Babeka ithemba lengomuso ngokusisa kwethu erherhweni lezefundo  elisihlanganise kilesi isikhathi sokugidinga. 
Babeke ithemba labo langomuso ngokusisa kwethu erherhweni lefundo esihlangabezana nalo kilo mgidingo.
Babeka ithemba labo esikhathini esizako ngokusisa kundlela yethu yekambiso esihlanganisileko kilesi sikhathi sokugidinga.
Begodu, iye isigedzu esikhulu sesabelomali senarha nesephrovinsi siya efundweni. 
Iye, iingcezu ezimbili ezikulu zesabelomali ziya kokubili efundweni yelizweloke nesifundeni.
Begodu iye, isineyi esikhulu sawo womabili amabhajede yeliZwe neyephrovinsi sitjhinga kwezefundo.
Begodu iye, isiquntu esikhulu sezabelo zesitjhaba nezephrovinsi ziya efundweni.  
Iye, iingcezu ezimbili ezikulu zesabelomali ziya kokubili efundweni yelizweloke nesifundeni.
Begodu iye, isineyi esikhulu sawo womabili amabhajede yeliZwe neyephrovinsi sitjhinga kwezefundo.
Begodu iye, isiquntu esikhulu sezabelo zesitjhaba nezephrovinsi ziya efundweni.  
Begodu, iye isigedzu esikhulu sesabelomali senarha nesephrovinsi siya efundweni. 
Begodu iye, isineyi esikhulu sawo womabili amabhajede yeliZwe neyephrovinsi sitjhinga kwezefundo.
Begodu iye, isiquntu esikhulu sezabelo zesitjhaba nezephrovinsi ziya efundweni.  
Begodu, iye isigedzu esikhulu sesabelomali senarha nesephrovinsi siya efundweni. 
Iye, iingcezu ezimbili ezikulu zesabelomali ziya kokubili efundweni yelizweloke nesifundeni.
Begodu iye, isiquntu esikhulu sezabelo zesitjhaba nezephrovinsi ziya efundweni.  
Begodu, iye isigedzu esikhulu sesabelomali senarha nesephrovinsi siya efundweni. 
Iye, iingcezu ezimbili ezikulu zesabelomali ziya kokubili efundweni yelizweloke nesifundeni.
Begodu iye, isineyi esikhulu sawo womabili amabhajede yeliZwe neyephrovinsi sitjhinga kwezefundo.
Emnyakeni lo wodwa, ukwenzela bona sikghone ukuqatjha abafundisi aba-2000, sitjhidise imali ebeyibekelwe eminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi, sayisa efundweni. 
Umnyaka lo wodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabotitjhere abazii-2000 kuye kwasifuna bona sitjhidise imali emisebenzini eminye yesifunda siyise efundweni. 
Kilomnyaka uwodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabafundisi abazi-2000 kube netlhogeko yokobana sithathe iimali kweminye imisebenzi yamaphrovinsi siyifake kwezefundo.
Kilonyaka uwodwa, ukuze sibulunge ukuqatjhwa kwabafundisi abazi-2000 kufuneke siphambukise imali siyisuse kweminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi iye efundweni.  
Umnyaka lo wodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabotitjhere abazii-2000 kuye kwasifuna bona sitjhidise imali emisebenzini eminye yesifunda siyise efundweni. 
Kilomnyaka uwodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabafundisi abazi-2000 kube netlhogeko yokobana sithathe iimali kweminye imisebenzi yamaphrovinsi siyifake kwezefundo.
Kilonyaka uwodwa, ukuze sibulunge ukuqatjhwa kwabafundisi abazi-2000 kufuneke siphambukise imali siyisuse kweminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi iye efundweni.  
Emnyakeni lo wodwa, ukwenzela bona sikghone ukuqatjha abafundisi aba-2000, sitjhidise imali ebeyibekelwe eminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi, sayisa efundweni. 
Kilomnyaka uwodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabafundisi abazi-2000 kube netlhogeko yokobana sithathe iimali kweminye imisebenzi yamaphrovinsi siyifake kwezefundo.
Kilonyaka uwodwa, ukuze sibulunge ukuqatjhwa kwabafundisi abazi-2000 kufuneke siphambukise imali siyisuse kweminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi iye efundweni.  
Emnyakeni lo wodwa, ukwenzela bona sikghone ukuqatjha abafundisi aba-2000, sitjhidise imali ebeyibekelwe eminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi, sayisa efundweni. 
Umnyaka lo wodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabotitjhere abazii-2000 kuye kwasifuna bona sitjhidise imali emisebenzini eminye yesifunda siyise efundweni. 
Kilonyaka uwodwa, ukuze sibulunge ukuqatjhwa kwabafundisi abazi-2000 kufuneke siphambukise imali siyisuse kweminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi iye efundweni.  
Emnyakeni lo wodwa, ukwenzela bona sikghone ukuqatjha abafundisi aba-2000, sitjhidise imali ebeyibekelwe eminye imisebenzi yephrovinsi, sayisa efundweni. 
Umnyaka lo wodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabotitjhere abazii-2000 kuye kwasifuna bona sitjhidise imali emisebenzini eminye yesifunda siyise efundweni. 
Kilomnyaka uwodwa, ukubulunga imisebenzi yabafundisi abazi-2000 kube netlhogeko yokobana sithathe iimali kweminye imisebenzi yamaphrovinsi siyifake kwezefundo.
Kufanele bona sisise khudlwana eenkolweni ezitlhayelelwako ukwenzela bona nasingezelela inani lefundo eyikhwalithi, lokho kwamukelwe njengethemba lengomuso eenkolweni zemalokitjhini.
Kudingeke bona sikhulise ukusisa kwethu sikuse eenkolweni ezichakileko ukuze enanini elikhuphukako kuzwakale ikhwalithi yefundo ngekolelo ekulu yangomuso kizo zoke iinkolo zemadorobheni. 
Kufanele sisise ngamandla eenkolweni ezitlhagako ukuze ngokungezelela amanani ukulingana kwezefundo kuzokubonwa ngokukholelwa tle  ekusaseni lesinye nesinye isikolo esikomplasi.
Kufuze siqinise ukusisa kwethu eenkolweni ezinganalitho khona sizakuthi nasandisa iimbalo ikhwalithi yefundo izwakale ngekolelo ekulu engomusweni lesinye nesinye isikolo sesikomplasi. 
Kudingeke bona sikhulise ukusisa kwethu sikuse eenkolweni ezichakileko ukuze enanini elikhuphukako kuzwakale ikhwalithi yefundo ngekolelo ekulu yangomuso kizo zoke iinkolo zemadorobheni. 
Kufanele sisise ngamandla eenkolweni ezitlhagako ukuze ngokungezelela amanani ukulingana kwezefundo kuzokubonwa ngokukholelwa tle  ekusaseni lesinye nesinye isikolo esikomplasi.

Okuqakatheke khulu, Ngqongqotjhe Dugmore kanye noSuparintende-Mazombe uSwartz, silinge kanye ukuveza iQhinga lemiThombo ebaBantu ukuveza iinzathu zokuthi ukusisa okunje bekufanele.
Okuqakatheke kunakho koke, Ngqongqotjhe Dugmore nawe mPhathi mazombe Swartz, sinokukodwa okutlhayelako kokuveza iQhinga labaSebenzi ukuze sikwazi ukusekela koke ukusisokhu.
Okuqakatheke khulu, uNgqongqotjhe u-Dugmore noSupuritende uJenerala Swartz, sisele ngento eyodwa yokukhiqiza amaQhinga wabaNtu ukuvumela koke ukusisa lokhu.
Okuqakatheke khulu, Ngqongqotjhe u-Dugmore kanye nawe Supharinthende-Mazombe Swartz, sinethuba linye lezokuThuthukiswa kwabaSebenzi ukwenza kufanele koke lokhu kusisa. 
Okuqakatheke kunakho koke, Ngqongqotjhe Dugmore nawe mPhathi mazombe Swartz, sinokukodwa okutlhayelako kokuveza iQhinga labaSebenzi ukuze sikwazi ukusekela koke ukusisokhu.

Sidinga ukuveza abafundi bakamethrigi abanzinzileko emigomeni yabo, abahle khulu emiphumeleni yabo, abafanele umnotho, abathembekileko emphakathini, begodu nabazokuba lisizo ebantwini. 
Sidinga ukukhiqiza imiphumela kamethrikhi enzinze emiphumelenayo, enemiphumela edluleleko, ekhambelana nezomnotho, ethembakeleko emphakathini, begodu enesizo ebuntwini.
Kufanele sikhiqize  abafundi bebanga lesumi abaqinileko ngokwemikghwa yabo, abanemiphumela emihle, abakhambisana nomNotho, abathembekako emphakathini wabo, begodu abazakwenza abantu bazuze. 
Sitlhoga ukukhupha amamethriki aqinileko emagugwini wawo, anemiphumela emihle khulu, akhambelana nomnotho, athembekileko emphakathini wawo kanye nekuzuzeni kwabantu. 
Sidinga ukukhiqiza imiphumela kamethrikhi enzinze emiphumelenayo, enemiphumela edluleleko, ekhambelana nezomnotho, ethembakeleko emphakathini, begodu enesizo ebuntwini.

Lokhu ngilokho esizele ukuzokugidinga la namhlanje. 
Ngilokho esikuzele ukuzokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngilokho esizokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngesizele ukuzokuthabela namhlanjesi. 
Ngilokho esikuzele ukuzokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngilokho esizokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngesizele ukuzokuthabela namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu ngilokho esizele ukuzokugidinga la namhlanje. 
Lokhu ngilokho esizokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngesizele ukuzokuthabela namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu ngilokho esizele ukuzokugidinga la namhlanje. 
Ngilokho esikuzele ukuzokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngesizele ukuzokuthabela namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu ngilokho esizele ukuzokugidinga la namhlanje. 
Ngilokho esikuzele ukuzokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Lokhu ngilokho esizokugidinga lapha namhlanjesi.
Nisithombe samathemba la njengoba sakha iKhaya lawo woke umuntu. 
Ujamele amathemba la njengobana sizakhela iKhaya thina SOKE.
Ujamiselele amathemba la njengombana Sakha iKhaya labo boke.
Nijamele lamathemba njengombana sakha iKhaya lomuNtu woKe. 
Ujamele amathemba la njengobana sizakhela iKhaya thina SOKE.
Ujamiselele amathemba la njengombana Sakha iKhaya labo boke.
Nijamele lamathemba njengombana sakha iKhaya lomuNtu woKe. 
Nisithombe samathemba la njengoba sakha iKhaya lawo woke umuntu. 
Ujamiselele amathemba la njengombana Sakha iKhaya labo boke.
Nijamele lamathemba njengombana sakha iKhaya lomuNtu woKe. 
Nisithombe samathemba la njengoba sakha iKhaya lawo woke umuntu. 
Ujamele amathemba la njengobana sizakhela iKhaya thina SOKE.
Nijamele lamathemba njengombana sakha iKhaya lomuNtu woKe. 
Nisithombe samathemba la njengoba sakha iKhaya lawo woke umuntu. 
Ujamele amathemba la njengobana sizakhela iKhaya thina SOKE.
Ujamiselele amathemba la njengombana Sakha iKhaya labo boke.
Sigidinga ukuphumelela kwenu ngombana  nizinikele benasebenza budisi, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu benza bona nihlale nisesikolweni, begodu umphakathi wenu uzinikele bewasisa ekusaseni lenu.
Sigidinga ipumelelwenu ngombana nizinikele benasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazinikele banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi uzinikele wasisa engomusweni lenu.
Sigidinga ukuzuza kwenu ngombana nizinikele begodu nisebenze ngamandla, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi wenu nawo uzinikele begodu wasisa ekusaseni lenu.
Sithabela ipumelelo yenu ngombana nitjhiye koke begodu nasebenza budisi, ababelethi benu batjhiye koke godu banigcina esikolweni, begodu umphakathi wenu ulise koke begodu wasisa engomusweni lenu. 
Sigidinga ipumelelwenu ngombana nizinikele benasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazinikele banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi uzinikele wasisa engomusweni lenu.
Sigidinga ukuzuza kwenu ngombana nizinikele begodu nisebenze ngamandla, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi wenu nawo uzinikele begodu wasisa ekusaseni lenu.
Sithabela ipumelelo yenu ngombana nitjhiye koke begodu nasebenza budisi, ababelethi benu batjhiye koke godu banigcina esikolweni, begodu umphakathi wenu ulise koke begodu wasisa engomusweni lenu. 
Sigidinga ukuphumelela kwenu ngombana  nizinikele benasebenza budisi, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu benza bona nihlale nisesikolweni, begodu umphakathi wenu uzinikele bewasisa ekusaseni lenu.
Sigidinga ukuzuza kwenu ngombana nizinikele begodu nisebenze ngamandla, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi wenu nawo uzinikele begodu wasisa ekusaseni lenu.

Sigidinga ukuphumelela kwenu ngombana  nizinikele benasebenza budisi, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu benza bona nihlale nisesikolweni, begodu umphakathi wenu uzinikele bewasisa ekusaseni lenu.
Sigidinga ipumelelwenu ngombana nizinikele benasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazinikele banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi uzinikele wasisa engomusweni lenu.
Sigidinga ukuzuza kwenu ngombana nizinikele begodu nisebenze ngamandla, ababelethi benu bazinikele begodu banisa esikolweni, begodu nomphakathi wenu nawo uzinikele begodu wasisa ekusaseni lenu.
Abanengi bayakungabaza ukuqakatheka kokugidinga ukuphumelela kwabafundi bakamethrigi nakuqalwa ubudisi bukamethrigi kanye nephuzu lokuthi kungenzeka kubonise iinsalela zerherho lefundo ye-apariteyidi. 
Inengi labantu lizaza ukugidingwa kwepumelelo kamethrikhi ngonobangela wokuhlangahlangana kwawo nokobana kungenzeka kutjengise iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.
Inengi labantu lizaza ubungako bokugidinga imiphumela yebanga lesumi nakuqalwa ngendlela libudisi ngakhona nephuzu lokobana ingatjengisa iinsalela zendlela yekambiso yebandlululo.
Inengi linokungabaza okunengi ngokuthabela ipumelelo kamethriki nasiqala irarano lakhe kanye nendaba yokobana lisengatjengisa iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.   
Inengi labantu lizaza ukugidingwa kwepumelelo kamethrikhi ngonobangela wokuhlangahlangana kwawo nokobana kungenzeka kutjengise iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.
Inengi labantu lizaza ubungako bokugidinga imiphumela yebanga lesumi nakuqalwa ngendlela libudisi ngakhona nephuzu lokobana ingatjengisa iinsalela zendlela yekambiso yebandlululo.
Inengi linokungabaza okunengi ngokuthabela ipumelelo kamethriki nasiqala irarano lakhe kanye nendaba yokobana lisengatjengisa iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.   
Abanengi bayakungabaza ukuqakatheka kokugidinga ukuphumelela kwabafundi bakamethrigi nakuqalwa ubudisi bukamethrigi kanye nephuzu lokuthi kungenzeka kubonise iinsalela zerherho lefundo ye-apariteyidi. 
Inengi labantu lizaza ubungako bokugidinga imiphumela yebanga lesumi nakuqalwa ngendlela libudisi ngakhona nephuzu lokobana ingatjengisa iinsalela zendlela yekambiso yebandlululo.
Inengi linokungabaza okunengi ngokuthabela ipumelelo kamethriki nasiqala irarano lakhe kanye nendaba yokobana lisengatjengisa iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.   
Abanengi bayakungabaza ukuqakatheka kokugidinga ukuphumelela kwabafundi bakamethrigi nakuqalwa ubudisi bukamethrigi kanye nephuzu lokuthi kungenzeka kubonise iinsalela zerherho lefundo ye-apariteyidi. 
Inengi labantu lizaza ukugidingwa kwepumelelo kamethrikhi ngonobangela wokuhlangahlangana kwawo nokobana kungenzeka kutjengise iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.
Inengi linokungabaza okunengi ngokuthabela ipumelelo kamethriki nasiqala irarano lakhe kanye nendaba yokobana lisengatjengisa iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.   
Abanengi bayakungabaza ukuqakatheka kokugidinga ukuphumelela kwabafundi bakamethrigi nakuqalwa ubudisi bukamethrigi kanye nephuzu lokuthi kungenzeka kubonise iinsalela zerherho lefundo ye-apariteyidi. 
Inengi labantu lizaza ukugidingwa kwepumelelo kamethrikhi ngonobangela wokuhlangahlangana kwawo nokobana kungenzeka kutjengise iinsalela zerherho lebandlululo.
Inengi labantu lizaza ubungako bokugidinga imiphumela yebanga lesumi nakuqalwa ngendlela libudisi ngakhona nephuzu lokobana ingatjengisa iinsalela zendlela yekambiso yebandlululo.
Ngini nodwa eningahlula lokhu ngokuthi nizinikele ngokubonakalako nangokwesazelo ekwakheni iKhaya lawo woke umuntu, elinganabandlululo nelilinganako. 
Ningakwazi ukunqoba lokhu ngokuzibophelela nizibandakanye benibabalele ukwakha iKhaya labo BOKE, lelo elingabandlululi ngokobuhlanga nelinokulingana.
Nguwe kwaphela ongehlula lokhu ngokuzibophelela ngokuba maJadu nangokuba nomnqopho ekwakheni iKhaya labo Boke, lelo elinganabandlululo begodu elilinganako.
Nguwe kwaphela ongahlula lokhu ngokuzinikela ngokubonakalako nangabomu ekwakheni iKhaya lomuNtu woKe, elingabandlululi ngokobutjhaba begodu nelinokulingana.   
Ningakwazi ukunqoba lokhu ngokuzibophelela nizibandakanye benibabalele ukwakha iKhaya labo BOKE, lelo elingabandlululi ngokobuhlanga nelinokulingana.
Nguwe kwaphela ongehlula lokhu ngokuzibophelela ngokuba maJadu nangokuba nomnqopho ekwakheni iKhaya labo Boke, lelo elinganabandlululo begodu elilinganako.
Nguwe kwaphela ongahlula lokhu ngokuzinikela ngokubonakalako nangabomu ekwakheni iKhaya lomuNtu woKe, elingabandlululi ngokobutjhaba begodu nelinokulingana.   
Ngini nodwa eningahlula lokhu ngokuthi nizinikele ngokubonakalako nangokwesazelo ekwakheni iKhaya lawo woke umuntu, elinganabandlululo nelilinganako. 
Nguwe kwaphela ongehlula lokhu ngokuzibophelela ngokuba maJadu nangokuba nomnqopho ekwakheni iKhaya labo Boke, lelo elinganabandlululo begodu elilinganako.
Nguwe kwaphela ongahlula lokhu ngokuzinikela ngokubonakalako nangabomu ekwakheni iKhaya lomuNtu woKe, elingabandlululi ngokobutjhaba begodu nelinokulingana.   
Ngini nodwa eningahlula lokhu ngokuthi nizinikele ngokubonakalako nangokwesazelo ekwakheni iKhaya lawo woke umuntu, elinganabandlululo nelilinganako. 
Ningakwazi ukunqoba lokhu ngokuzibophelela nizibandakanye benibabalele ukwakha iKhaya labo BOKE, lelo elingabandlululi ngokobuhlanga nelinokulingana.
Nguwe kwaphela ongahlula lokhu ngokuzinikela ngokubonakalako nangabomu ekwakheni iKhaya lomuNtu woKe, elingabandlululi ngokobutjhaba begodu nelinokulingana.   
Ngini nodwa eningahlula lokhu ngokuthi nizinikele ngokubonakalako nangokwesazelo ekwakheni iKhaya lawo woke umuntu, elinganabandlululo nelilinganako. 
Ningakwazi ukunqoba lokhu ngokuzibophelela nizibandakanye benibabalele ukwakha iKhaya labo BOKE, lelo elingabandlululi ngokobuhlanga nelinokulingana.
Nguwe kwaphela ongehlula lokhu ngokuzibophelela ngokuba maJadu nangokuba nomnqopho ekwakheni iKhaya labo Boke, lelo elinganabandlululo begodu elilinganako.
Lokhu kufanele kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenzako kusukela nje ukuya phambili. 
Lokhu kufanele kuvele kiko koke okukhethako ukusukela gadesi.
Lokhu kufanele kutjengiswe kiwo woke amakhetho owenzako ukutjhinga phambili ukusukela kwanjesi.
Lokhu kufuze kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenza ukusuka namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu kufanele kuvele kiko koke okukhethako ukusukela gadesi.
Lokhu kufanele kutjengiswe kiwo woke amakhetho owenzako ukutjhinga phambili ukusukela kwanjesi.
Lokhu kufuze kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenza ukusuka namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu kufanele kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenzako kusukela nje ukuya phambili. 
Lokhu kufanele kutjengiswe kiwo woke amakhetho owenzako ukutjhinga phambili ukusukela kwanjesi.
Lokhu kufuze kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenza ukusuka namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu kufanele kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenzako kusukela nje ukuya phambili. 
Lokhu kufanele kuvele kiko koke okukhethako ukusukela gadesi.
Lokhu kufuze kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenza ukusuka namhlanjesi. 
Lokhu kufanele kubonakale kikho koke ukukhetha okwenzako kusukela nje ukuya phambili. 
Lokhu kufanele kuvele kiko koke okukhethako ukusukela gadesi.
Lokhu kufanele kutjengiswe kiwo woke amakhetho owenzako ukutjhinga phambili ukusukela kwanjesi.
Bekube nje, bekufunele bona ukhethe bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Ukufikela nje ufanele ukukhetha bona uzokusebenza budisi njani.
Bekufike kwanjesi kufanele ukhethe kwaphela bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani.
Ukufika namhlanjesi bekufanele ukhethe ukobana uzakusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Ukufikela nje ufanele ukukhetha bona uzokusebenza budisi njani.
Bekufike kwanjesi kufanele ukhethe kwaphela bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani.
Ukufika namhlanjesi bekufanele ukhethe ukobana uzakusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Bekube nje, bekufunele bona ukhethe bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Bekufike kwanjesi kufanele ukhethe kwaphela bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani.
Ukufika namhlanjesi bekufanele ukhethe ukobana uzakusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Bekube nje, bekufunele bona ukhethe bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Ukufikela nje ufanele ukukhetha bona uzokusebenza budisi njani.
Ukufika namhlanjesi bekufanele ukhethe ukobana uzakusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Bekube nje, bekufunele bona ukhethe bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani. 
Ukufikela nje ufanele ukukhetha bona uzokusebenza budisi njani.
Bekufike kwanjesi kufanele ukhethe kwaphela bona uzokusebenza budisi kangangani.
Isitifikedi sikamethrigi sikwenza ukghone besikukatelele ukwenza iinqunto nokukhetha umuntu ofuna ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuwudosa phambili.
Isitifiketi sakho sakamethriki sikuvumela besikukatelele bona ukhethe bewenze iinqunto zomhlobo womuntu ofuna ukuba ngiwo begodu nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila.
Isitifikeyidi sakho sebanga lesumi senza bona ukghone begodu sikukatelela bona uthathe iinqunto  ukhethe bona ufuna ukuba mhlobo muphi womuntu nokobana ufuna ukuphila ipilo enjani. 
Isitifikedi sakho sakamethriki sikukghonakalisa begodu sikukatelela ukuthatha iinqunto ngomhlobo womuntu ofisa ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila. 
Isitifiketi sakho sakamethriki sikuvumela besikukatelele bona ukhethe bewenze iinqunto zomhlobo womuntu ofuna ukuba ngiwo begodu nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila.
Isitifikeyidi sakho sebanga lesumi senza bona ukghone begodu sikukatelela bona uthathe iinqunto  ukhethe bona ufuna ukuba mhlobo muphi womuntu nokobana ufuna ukuphila ipilo enjani. 
Isitifikedi sakho sakamethriki sikukghonakalisa begodu sikukatelela ukuthatha iinqunto ngomhlobo womuntu ofisa ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila. 
Isitifikedi sikamethrigi sikwenza ukghone besikukatelele ukwenza iinqunto nokukhetha umuntu ofuna ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuwudosa phambili.
Isitifikeyidi sakho sebanga lesumi senza bona ukghone begodu sikukatelela bona uthathe iinqunto  ukhethe bona ufuna ukuba mhlobo muphi womuntu nokobana ufuna ukuphila ipilo enjani. 
Isitifikedi sakho sakamethriki sikukghonakalisa begodu sikukatelela ukuthatha iinqunto ngomhlobo womuntu ofisa ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila. 
Isitifikedi sikamethrigi sikwenza ukghone besikukatelele ukwenza iinqunto nokukhetha umuntu ofuna ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuwudosa phambili.
Isitifiketi sakho sakamethriki sikuvumela besikukatelele bona ukhethe bewenze iinqunto zomhlobo womuntu ofuna ukuba ngiwo begodu nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila.
Isitifikedi sakho sakamethriki sikukghonakalisa begodu sikukatelela ukuthatha iinqunto ngomhlobo womuntu ofisa ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila. 
Isitifikedi sikamethrigi sikwenza ukghone besikukatelele ukwenza iinqunto nokukhetha umuntu ofuna ukuba nguye kanye nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuwudosa phambili.
Isitifiketi sakho sakamethriki sikuvumela besikukatelele bona ukhethe bewenze iinqunto zomhlobo womuntu ofuna ukuba ngiwo begodu nomhlobo wepilo ofuna ukuyiphila.
Isitifikeyidi sakho sebanga lesumi senza bona ukghone begodu sikukatelela bona uthathe iinqunto  ukhethe bona ufuna ukuba mhlobo muphi womuntu nokobana ufuna ukuphila ipilo enjani.

kukwenza inengi lethuba elikhethekilekweli ukuveza nokwakha ibumbano nokuzikhakhazisa hlangana namaSewula Afrika
kukwenza ithuba eliqakathekilekweli nelikhethekileko lokuveza nokwakha ubunye nokuzikhakhazisa kumaSewula Afrika
ukuphumelelisa ithuba elikhethekileko leli ukutjengisa nokwakha khudlwana ukubumbana nokuzikhakhazisa phakathi kwamaSewula Afrika
kusebenzisa kuhle khulu lelithuba elihlukileko lokuzwakalisa kanye nokwakha ibumbano nokuzikhakhazisa phakathi kwamaSewula Afrika

ukubumba ubujamo bokuthintana obusiza ukusebenzisa ithuba leli ukurhabisa ituthuko begodu nokukhulisa amathuba

ngokuthi kuhlinzekwe ngoburholi nethintaniso mayelana nokuthintana kukarhulumende malungana neBhigiri yePhasi yaka-2010
ngokunikela uburholi nokulawulwa kokuthintana kombuso kweBhigiri yePhasi ye-2010
ngokunikela ubudosiphambili nokuhlanganisa mayelana nokuthintana kombuso ngeBhigiri yePhasi ye-2010
ngokunikela ngobudosiphambili nokukhambelanisa ekuthintaneni kombuso eBheregeni yePhasi yaka-2010

ngokuthi kwakhiwe isebenziswano lenarha labathintanisi bakarhulumende nebangeqadi ngale kokulandela imithetho, kanye nokwakha isikhozi nabathintanisi bekhontinenti kanye nakudayaspora ukwenzela bona inarha nekhontinenti ngokubambisana zingathatha ithuba lokuthintana kilesi isikhathi sokuphila
ngokwakha ihlanganyelo yakazweloke yomphakathi nabathintani bangeqadi  emalawulweni woke, kanye nokukatelela izwano nabathintani enarhakazini  nebantwini bangeqadi, ukuze ngokuhlanganyela ilizwe nenarhakazi ingasebenzisa ithuba lokuthintana lesikhathi soke
ukwakha ihlanganyelo lelizwe labathintanisi bomphakathi nabangasese kiyo yoke imikhakha, begodu nokwakha iinhlanganisela nabathintanisi enarhakazini begodu nangephalalo, ukuze ngokubumbana inarha nenarhakazi zingasebenzisa ithuba leli elingapheliko lokuthintana 
ngokwakha ihlanganyelo lesitjhaba labathintanisi bombuso nebangeqadi ukweqa amabizelo, kanye nokwakhiwa kwesingani nabathintanisi ekhonthinentini kanye nekuphalaleleni kwabantu kwezinye iinarha, ukuze ngokubumbana inarha nekhonthinenti  zisebenzise kuhle lelithuba lokuthintana eliza kanye epilweni
ngokwakha ihlanganyelo yakazweloke yomphakathi nabathintani bangeqadi  emalawulweni woke, kanye nokukatelela izwano nabathintani enarhakazini  nebantwini bangeqadi, ukuze ngokuhlanganyela ilizwe nenarhakazi ingasebenzisa ithuba lokuthintana lesikhathi soke
ukwakha ihlanganyelo lelizwe labathintanisi bomphakathi nabangasese kiyo yoke imikhakha, begodu nokwakha iinhlanganisela nabathintanisi enarhakazini begodu nangephalalo, ukuze ngokubumbana inarha nenarhakazi zingasebenzisa ithuba leli elingapheliko lokuthintana

ngokwakha ihlanganyelo yakazweloke yomphakathi nabathintani bangeqadi  emalawulweni woke, kanye nokukatelela izwano nabathintani enarhakazini  nebantwini bangeqadi, ukuze ngokuhlanganyela ilizwe nenarhakazi ingasebenzisa ithuba lokuthintana lesikhathi soke

ukwenziwa kwephrojekthi eqakathekileko yokuthintana kukarhulumende mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako          yaka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi wokuthintana wombuso aqakathekileko weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako ye-2010. 
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana wombuso mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako ka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana kombuso weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako yaka-2010.  
ukwenza amaphrojekthi wokuthintana wombuso aqakathekileko weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako ye-2010. 
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana wombuso mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako ka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana kombuso weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako yaka-2010.  
ukwenziwa kwephrojekthi eqakathekileko yokuthintana kukarhulumende mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako          yaka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana wombuso mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako ka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana kombuso weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako yaka-2010.  
ukwenziwa kwephrojekthi eqakathekileko yokuthintana kukarhulumende mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako          yaka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi wokuthintana wombuso aqakathekileko weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako ye-2010. 
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana kombuso weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako yaka-2010.  
ukwenziwa kwephrojekthi eqakathekileko yokuthintana kukarhulumende mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako          yaka-2010.
ukwenza amaphrojekthi wokuthintana wombuso aqakathekileko weBhegere yePhasi yeBholo erarhwako ye-2010. 
ukwenza amaphrojekthi amakhulu wokuthintana wombuso mayelana neBhigiri yePhasi yeBholo eRarhwako ka-2010.

ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke iTjhugululelwe ukuthuthukisa ivikeleko eendleleni
ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe iKhibelelwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni iyatjhugululwa ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphepha endleleni 
ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke iTjhugululelwe ukuthuthukisa ivikeleko eendleleni
ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe iKhibelelwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni iyatjhugululwa ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphepha endleleni 
ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe iKhibelelwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni iyatjhugululwa ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphepha endleleni 
ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke iTjhugululelwe ukuthuthukisa ivikeleko eendleleni
ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni iyatjhugululwa ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphepha endleleni 
ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke iTjhugululelwe ukuthuthukisa ivikeleko eendleleni
ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe iKhibelelwe ukwenza ngcono ukuphepha endleleni
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe. 
POLOKWANE: ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke itjhugululiwe.
EPOLOKWANE: ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe ikhibelelwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni itjhugululiwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke itjhugululiwe.
EPOLOKWANE: ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe ikhibelelwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni itjhugululiwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe. 
EPOLOKWANE: ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe ikhibelelwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni itjhugululiwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe. 
POLOKWANE: ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke itjhugululiwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yesiTjhaba yeThrafigi yeNdleleni itjhugululiwe.
POLOKWANE: ImiThetjhwana yeNarha yeThrafiki yeNdleleni iTjhugululiwe. 
POLOKWANE: ImiThetholawulo yeeNdlela kaZweloke itjhugululiwe.
EPOLOKWANE: ImiThetho eLawula ukukhamba kweenKoloyi  eNdleleni yeliZwe ikhibelelwe.
Ubizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhuminekhomba begodu uthome ukusebenza ngesikhathi owaziswe ngaso.
Ibizwa bona liTjhugululo leTjhumi nekhomba begodu seligadangisiwe.
Kubizwa ngokuthiwa kukhibelelwa kwetjhumi nekhomba begodu kwathoma ukusebenza lokha nawukhutjhwako.
Ibizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhumi naKhomba begodu ithoma ukusebenza ngemva kokukhutjhwa. 
Ibizwa bona liTjhugululo leTjhumi nekhomba begodu seligadangisiwe.
Kubizwa ngokuthiwa kukhibelelwa kwetjhumi nekhomba begodu kwathoma ukusebenza lokha nawukhutjhwako.
Ibizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhumi naKhomba begodu ithoma ukusebenza ngemva kokukhutjhwa. 
Ubizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhuminekhomba begodu uthome ukusebenza ngesikhathi owaziswe ngaso.
Kubizwa ngokuthiwa kukhibelelwa kwetjhumi nekhomba begodu kwathoma ukusebenza lokha nawukhutjhwako.
Ibizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhumi naKhomba begodu ithoma ukusebenza ngemva kokukhutjhwa. 
Ubizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhuminekhomba begodu uthome ukusebenza ngesikhathi owaziswe ngaso.
Ibizwa bona liTjhugululo leTjhumi nekhomba begodu seligadangisiwe.
Ibizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhumi naKhomba begodu ithoma ukusebenza ngemva kokukhutjhwa. 
Ubizwa ngeTjhuguluko leTjhuminekhomba begodu uthome ukusebenza ngesikhathi owaziswe ngaso.
Ibizwa bona liTjhugululo leTjhumi nekhomba begodu seligadangisiwe.
Kubizwa ngokuthiwa kukhibelelwa kwetjhumi nekhomba begodu kwathoma ukusebenza lokha nawukhutjhwako.
UmNyango wezeenDlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli ngamatjhuguluko ekungila:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela neenThuthi sewutjele abatjhayeli beemodoro ngamatjhuguluko okungilawa:
UmThetho weeNdlela nezokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngokukhibelelwa okungilokhu:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngamatjhuguluko okunginaka:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela neenThuthi sewutjele abatjhayeli beemodoro ngamatjhuguluko okungilawa:
UmThetho weeNdlela nezokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngokukhibelelwa okungilokhu:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngamatjhuguluko okunginaka:
UmNyango wezeenDlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli ngamatjhuguluko ekungila:
UmThetho weeNdlela nezokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngokukhibelelwa okungilokhu:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngamatjhuguluko okunginaka:
UmNyango wezeenDlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli ngamatjhuguluko ekungila:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela neenThuthi sewutjele abatjhayeli beemodoro ngamatjhuguluko okungilawa:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngamatjhuguluko okunginaka:
UmNyango wezeenDlela nokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli ngamatjhuguluko ekungila:
UmNyango wezeeNdlela neenThuthi sewutjele abatjhayeli beemodoro ngamatjhuguluko okungilawa:
UmThetho weeNdlela nezokuThutha wazisa abatjhayeli beenkoloyi ngokukhibelelwa okungilokhu:
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswa ngemva komhlaka 01 kuRhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namabhorodo weenomboro abotjhwe   ngamapopurividi nofana iinkrufu.  
Iimodere ezitloliswe ngemva kwangezi-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanamba pleyidi afakwe ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitja ezitloliswe ngemva kuka-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanambapleyidi afakwe ngeempikiri ezinetjhada elidumuzako nanyana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswe ngemva komhlaka 01 Arhostosi 2010 kufuze zibe namaplada weenomboro afakwe ngamapop riveti namkha iinkrufu. 
Iimodere ezitloliswe ngemva kwangezi-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanamba pleyidi afakwe ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitja ezitloliswe ngemva kuka-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanambapleyidi afakwe ngeempikiri ezinetjhada elidumuzako nanyana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswe ngemva komhlaka 01 Arhostosi 2010 kufuze zibe namaplada weenomboro afakwe ngamapop riveti namkha iinkrufu. 
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswa ngemva komhlaka 01 kuRhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namabhorodo weenomboro abotjhwe   ngamapopurividi nofana iinkrufu.  
Iinkoloyi ezitja ezitloliswe ngemva kuka-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanambapleyidi afakwe ngeempikiri ezinetjhada elidumuzako nanyana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswe ngemva komhlaka 01 Arhostosi 2010 kufuze zibe namaplada weenomboro afakwe ngamapop riveti namkha iinkrufu. 
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswa ngemva komhlaka 01 kuRhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namabhorodo weenomboro abotjhwe   ngamapopurividi nofana iinkrufu.  
Iimodere ezitloliswe ngemva kwangezi-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanamba pleyidi afakwe ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswe ngemva komhlaka 01 Arhostosi 2010 kufuze zibe namaplada weenomboro afakwe ngamapop riveti namkha iinkrufu. 
Iinkoloyi ezitjha ezitloliswa ngemva komhlaka 01 kuRhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namabhorodo weenomboro abotjhwe   ngamapopurividi nofana iinkrufu.  
Iimodere ezitloliswe ngemva kwangezi-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanamba pleyidi afakwe ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu.
Iinkoloyi ezitja ezitloliswe ngemva kuka-01 Rhoboyi 2010 kufanele zibe namanambapleyidi afakwe ngeempikiri ezinetjhada elidumuzako nanyana iinkrufu.
Nangabe akukghonakali bona ibotjhelelwe ekoloyini, kufanele bona ibotjhelelwe phezu kwebhrakethe elikhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe inamba pleyidi ayikafakwa emodereni ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu ayifakwe ngebhrakede elithobela umthetho we-SANS 973.
Nangabe angeze zafakwa ekoloyini kufanele zifakwe ebhrakethini elikhambisana ne-SANS 973.
Nayikuthi akukghonakali bona ifakwe phezu kwekoloyi kufuze ifakwe kubhrakhethi ekhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe inamba pleyidi ayikafakwa emodereni ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu ayifakwe ngebhrakede elithobela umthetho we-SANS 973.
Nangabe angeze zafakwa ekoloyini kufanele zifakwe ebhrakethini elikhambisana ne-SANS 973.
Nayikuthi akukghonakali bona ifakwe phezu kwekoloyi kufuze ifakwe kubhrakhethi ekhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe akukghonakali bona ibotjhelelwe ekoloyini, kufanele bona ibotjhelelwe phezu kwebhrakethe elikhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe angeze zafakwa ekoloyini kufanele zifakwe ebhrakethini elikhambisana ne-SANS 973.
Nayikuthi akukghonakali bona ifakwe phezu kwekoloyi kufuze ifakwe kubhrakhethi ekhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe akukghonakali bona ibotjhelelwe ekoloyini, kufanele bona ibotjhelelwe phezu kwebhrakethe elikhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe inamba pleyidi ayikafakwa emodereni ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu ayifakwe ngebhrakede elithobela umthetho we-SANS 973.
Nayikuthi akukghonakali bona ifakwe phezu kwekoloyi kufuze ifakwe kubhrakhethi ekhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe akukghonakali bona ibotjhelelwe ekoloyini, kufanele bona ibotjhelelwe phezu kwebhrakethe elikhambisana ne-SANS 973. 
Nangabe inamba pleyidi ayikafakwa emodereni ngamapoprivedi nofana iinkrufu ayifakwe ngebhrakede elithobela umthetho we-SANS 973.
Nangabe angeze zafakwa ekoloyini kufanele zifakwe ebhrakethini elikhambisana ne-SANS 973.
Amatjhugululko la azokunciphisa ubulelesi kanye nobulelesi obenziwa batjhayeli eendleleni, evane bathi bangenza ubulelesi bese bakhupha amabhorodo weenomboro lula ukuze bangafumaneki. 
Itjhugululweli lizokuphungula ubulelesi namacala enziwa batjhayeli beemodere lapho basusa khona amanamba pleyidi ukuze bangatholakali lula. 
Ukukhibelela lokhu kuzakwehlisa izinga lobulelesi nemilandu eyenziwa batjhayeli beenkoloyi endleleni abasusa lula inambapleyidi ukuze bangatholakali.
Itjhugulukweli lizakwehlisa ubulelesi kanye nemilandu yokwephulwa kwemithetho yendlela batjhayeli abasusa lula amaplada weenomboro khona bangazukutholakala. 
Itjhugululweli lizokuphungula ubulelesi namacala enziwa batjhayeli beemodere lapho basusa khona amanamba pleyidi ukuze bangatholakali lula. 
Ukukhibelela lokhu kuzakwehlisa izinga lobulelesi nemilandu eyenziwa batjhayeli beenkoloyi endleleni abasusa lula inambapleyidi ukuze bangatholakali.
Itjhugulukweli lizakwehlisa ubulelesi kanye nemilandu yokwephulwa kwemithetho yendlela batjhayeli abasusa lula amaplada weenomboro khona bangazukutholakala. 
Amatjhugululko la azokunciphisa ubulelesi kanye nobulelesi obenziwa batjhayeli eendleleni, evane bathi bangenza ubulelesi bese bakhupha amabhorodo weenomboro lula ukuze bangafumaneki. 
Ukukhibelela lokhu kuzakwehlisa izinga lobulelesi nemilandu eyenziwa batjhayeli beenkoloyi endleleni abasusa lula inambapleyidi ukuze bangatholakali.
Itjhugulukweli lizakwehlisa ubulelesi kanye nemilandu yokwephulwa kwemithetho yendlela batjhayeli abasusa lula amaplada weenomboro khona bangazukutholakala. 
Amatjhugululko la azokunciphisa ubulelesi kanye nobulelesi obenziwa batjhayeli eendleleni, evane bathi bangenza ubulelesi bese bakhupha amabhorodo weenomboro lula ukuze bangafumaneki. 
Itjhugululweli lizokuphungula ubulelesi namacala enziwa batjhayeli beemodere lapho basusa khona amanamba pleyidi ukuze bangatholakali lula. 
Itjhugulukweli lizakwehlisa ubulelesi kanye nemilandu yokwephulwa kwemithetho yendlela batjhayeli abasusa lula amaplada weenomboro khona bangazukutholakala. 
Amatjhugululko la azokunciphisa ubulelesi kanye nobulelesi obenziwa batjhayeli eendleleni, evane bathi bangenza ubulelesi bese bakhupha amabhorodo weenomboro lula ukuze bangafumaneki. 
Itjhugululweli lizokuphungula ubulelesi namacala enziwa batjhayeli beemodere lapho basusa khona amanamba pleyidi ukuze bangatholakali lula. 
Ukukhibelela lokhu kuzakwehlisa izinga lobulelesi nemilandu eyenziwa batjhayeli beenkoloyi endleleni abasusa lula inambapleyidi ukuze bangatholakali.
Angekhe kube lula ukukhupha nokubuyisela ibhorodo leenomboro ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana kuzokuba neendleko ukwenza njalo. 
Akuzokuba lula ukususa inamba pleyidi bese uyibuyisela emva ngemva kokuthweswa icala lobulelesi ngombana lokho kungangezelela iindleko.
Angeze kwaba lula ukususa inambapleyidi bese uyibuyisela msinya ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana ngaso soke isikhathi izakufuna iindleko ezingeziweko.
Angeze kusaba lula ukususa amaplada weenomboro kanye nokuwabuyisela ngemva kokwenza isenzo sobulelesi ngombana kuzakufuna enye imali lokho.
Akuzokuba lula ukususa inamba pleyidi bese uyibuyisela emva ngemva kokuthweswa icala lobulelesi ngombana lokho kungangezelela iindleko.
Angeze kwaba lula ukususa inambapleyidi bese uyibuyisela msinya ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana ngaso soke isikhathi izakufuna iindleko ezingeziweko.
Angeze kusaba lula ukususa amaplada weenomboro kanye nokuwabuyisela ngemva kokwenza isenzo sobulelesi ngombana kuzakufuna enye imali lokho.
Angekhe kube lula ukukhupha nokubuyisela ibhorodo leenomboro ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana kuzokuba neendleko ukwenza njalo. 
Angeze kwaba lula ukususa inambapleyidi bese uyibuyisela msinya ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana ngaso soke isikhathi izakufuna iindleko ezingeziweko.
Angeze kusaba lula ukususa amaplada weenomboro kanye nokuwabuyisela ngemva kokwenza isenzo sobulelesi ngombana kuzakufuna enye imali lokho.
Angekhe kube lula ukukhupha nokubuyisela ibhorodo leenomboro ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana kuzokuba neendleko ukwenza njalo. 
Akuzokuba lula ukususa inamba pleyidi bese uyibuyisela emva ngemva kokuthweswa icala lobulelesi ngombana lokho kungangezelela iindleko.
Angeze kusaba lula ukususa amaplada weenomboro kanye nokuwabuyisela ngemva kokwenza isenzo sobulelesi ngombana kuzakufuna enye imali lokho.
Angekhe kube lula ukukhupha nokubuyisela ibhorodo leenomboro ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana kuzokuba neendleko ukwenza njalo. 
Akuzokuba lula ukususa inamba pleyidi bese uyibuyisela emva ngemva kokuthweswa icala lobulelesi ngombana lokho kungangezelela iindleko.
Angeze kwaba lula ukususa inambapleyidi bese uyibuyisela msinya ngemva kokwenza ubulelesi ngombana ngaso soke isikhathi izakufuna iindleko ezingeziweko.
Inambapleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu okuzokwenza bona kube budisi bona itjhe lingasabonakali nakwenzeka ingozi.
Inamba pleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu enekani engeze kwaba lula ukuyitjhisa thokgho bekufike lapha ingasafaniseki khona ngesikhathi sengozi.
Inambapleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu ezakwenza bona kube budisi bona itjhe ingasafaniseki  nawungehlelwa yingozi.
Iplada lenomboro lenziwe nge-aluminiyamu eyenza kube budisi ukobana itjhe ingasabonakala ngesikhathi sesehlakalo sengozi.  
Inamba pleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu enekani engeze kwaba lula ukuyitjhisa thokgho bekufike lapha ingasafaniseki khona ngesikhathi sengozi.
Inambapleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu ezakwenza bona kube budisi bona itjhe ingasafaniseki  nawungehlelwa yingozi.
Iplada lenomboro lenziwe nge-aluminiyamu eyenza kube budisi ukobana itjhe ingasabonakala ngesikhathi sesehlakalo sengozi.  
Inambapleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu okuzokwenza bona kube budisi bona itjhe lingasabonakali nakwenzeka ingozi.

Inambapleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu okuzokwenza bona kube budisi bona itjhe lingasabonakali nakwenzeka ingozi.

Inambapleyidi yenziwe nge-aluminiyamu ezakwenza bona kube budisi bona itjhe ingasafaniseki  nawungehlelwa yingozi.
Kuthoma ngomhlaka 1 kumHlolanja 2011 abantu abathola ilayisense yokutjhayela        yekhowudi-C,i-C1, i-EC nofana i-EC1 angeze bavunyelwe ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisense yekhowudi B nofana ikhowudi EB (ngokwamathemu wakade, umuntu onekhowudi 10, 11, 13 nofana ikhowudi 14 akukghonakali bona atjhayele ikoloyi ekufuneka bona itjhayelwe ngelayisense yekhowudi 08).  
Ukusukela ngezi-1 Mhlolanja abantu abathola amalayisense wokutjhayela wekhowudu C, C1, EC nofana EC1 angeze basavunyelwa bona batjhayele iimodere ezidinga ikhowudu B nofana EB (ngesikade umuntu onekhowudu 10, 11, 13 nofana 14 angeze asavunyelwa ukutjhayela imodere edinga ikhowudu 08).
Ukusukela ngomhlaka-1 kuMhlolanja 2011 abantu abathola amalayisensi wokutjhayela wekhowudu C, C1, EC nanyana  EC1 ilayisensi yokutjhayela angeze bavunyelwa ukobana utjhayele ikoloyi efuna ikhowudu B nanyana ikhowudu yelayisense ye-EB (ngokwendlela yakade umuntu onelayisense yekhowudu 10, 11, 13 nanyana 14 angeze akghona ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisensi yekhowudu 08).
Ukuthoma ngomhlaka 1 Febherbari 2011 abantu abafumana amalayisense wokutjhayela wekhodi C, C1, EC namkha EC1 angeze basavunyelwa ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisense yekhodi B namkha ikhodi EB (ngelimi lakade umuntu onekhodi 10, 11, 13 namkha 14 angeze asatjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisense yekhodi 08).
Ukusukela ngezi-1 Mhlolanja abantu abathola amalayisense wokutjhayela wekhowudu C, C1, EC nofana EC1 angeze basavunyelwa bona batjhayele iimodere ezidinga ikhowudu B nofana EB (ngesikade umuntu onekhowudu 10, 11, 13 nofana 14 angeze asavunyelwa ukutjhayela imodere edinga ikhowudu 08).
Ukusukela ngomhlaka-1 kuMhlolanja 2011 abantu abathola amalayisensi wokutjhayela wekhowudu C, C1, EC nanyana  EC1 ilayisensi yokutjhayela angeze bavunyelwa ukobana utjhayele ikoloyi efuna ikhowudu B nanyana ikhowudu yelayisense ye-EB (ngokwendlela yakade umuntu onelayisense yekhowudu 10, 11, 13 nanyana 14 angeze akghona ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisensi yekhowudu 08).
Ukuthoma ngomhlaka 1 Febherbari 2011 abantu abafumana amalayisense wokutjhayela wekhodi C, C1, EC namkha EC1 angeze basavunyelwa ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisense yekhodi B namkha ikhodi EB (ngelimi lakade umuntu onekhodi 10, 11, 13 namkha 14 angeze asatjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisense yekhodi 08).
Kuthoma ngomhlaka 1 kumHlolanja 2011 abantu abathola ilayisense yokutjhayela        yekhowudi-C,i-C1, i-EC nofana i-EC1 angeze bavunyelwe ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisense yekhowudi B nofana ikhowudi EB (ngokwamathemu wakade, umuntu onekhowudi 10, 11, 13 nofana ikhowudi 14 akukghonakali bona atjhayele ikoloyi ekufuneka bona itjhayelwe ngelayisense yekhowudi 08).

Ukusukela ngomhlaka-1 kuMhlolanja 2011 abantu abathola amalayisensi wokutjhayela wekhowudu C, C1, EC nanyana  EC1 ilayisensi yokutjhayela angeze bavunyelwa ukobana utjhayele ikoloyi efuna ikhowudu B nanyana ikhowudu yelayisense ye-EB (ngokwendlela yakade umuntu onelayisense yekhowudu 10, 11, 13 nanyana 14 angeze akghona ukutjhayela ikoloyi efuna ilayisensi yekhowudu 08).
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kilabo abazokuthola amalayisensi kokuthoma. 
Lokhu kuzokwenzeka kwaphela ebantwini abathoma ukuba neencwadi zokutjhayela.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kwaphela kilabo abaphethe amalayisensi amatjha.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kuphela kubaphathi bamalayisense amatjha.
Lokhu kuzokwenzeka kwaphela ebantwini abathoma ukuba neencwadi zokutjhayela.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kwaphela kilabo abaphethe amalayisensi amatjha.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kuphela kubaphathi bamalayisense amatjha.
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kilabo abazokuthola amalayisensi kokuthoma. 
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kwaphela kilabo abaphethe amalayisensi amatjha.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kuphela kubaphathi bamalayisense amatjha.
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kilabo abazokuthola amalayisensi kokuthoma. 
Lokhu kuzokwenzeka kwaphela ebantwini abathoma ukuba neencwadi zokutjhayela.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kuphela kubaphathi bamalayisense amatjha.
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kilabo abazokuthola amalayisensi kokuthoma. 
Lokhu kuzokwenzeka kwaphela ebantwini abathoma ukuba neencwadi zokutjhayela.
Lokhu kuzakusebenza kwaphela kilabo abaphethe amalayisensi amatjha.
Inani eliphezulu lalabo abafunda ukutjhayela bafaka iimbawo zamalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kunokuthi bafake iimbawo zokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ukuze bakhandele ukuhlolelwa ukuphaga okulinganisanako, lokhu sibonelo.  
Banengi khulu abafundi babatjhayeli abenza iimbawo zokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu nakumadaniswa namalayisense weemodere ezincani ngomnqopho wokobana babalekela ukuhlolwa kokuphaga ngeqadi kwendlela.
Inani labatjhayeli abanengi bafaka iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu ukuze babalekele njengesibonelo ukuhlolwa ngokujamisa ikoloyi ilinganise.
Isibalo esikhulu sabatjhayeli abasafundako senza iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu ngokuphikisana neenkoloyi ezincani khona bazakubalekela ihlahlubo yokuphaga bulinganisa, nasenza isibonelo.  
Banengi khulu abafundi babatjhayeli abenza iimbawo zokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu nakumadaniswa namalayisense weemodere ezincani ngomnqopho wokobana babalekela ukuhlolwa kokuphaga ngeqadi kwendlela.
Inani labatjhayeli abanengi bafaka iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu ukuze babalekele njengesibonelo ukuhlolwa ngokujamisa ikoloyi ilinganise.
Isibalo esikhulu sabatjhayeli abasafundako senza iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu ngokuphikisana neenkoloyi ezincani khona bazakubalekela ihlahlubo yokuphaga bulinganisa, nasenza isibonelo.  
Inani eliphezulu lalabo abafunda ukutjhayela bafaka iimbawo zamalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kunokuthi bafake iimbawo zokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ukuze bakhandele ukuhlolelwa ukuphaga okulinganisanako, lokhu sibonelo.  
Inani labatjhayeli abanengi bafaka iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu ukuze babalekele njengesibonelo ukuhlolwa ngokujamisa ikoloyi ilinganise.
Isibalo esikhulu sabatjhayeli abasafundako senza iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu ngokuphikisana neenkoloyi ezincani khona bazakubalekela ihlahlubo yokuphaga bulinganisa, nasenza isibonelo.  
Inani eliphezulu lalabo abafunda ukutjhayela bafaka iimbawo zamalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kunokuthi bafake iimbawo zokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ukuze bakhandele ukuhlolelwa ukuphaga okulinganisanako, lokhu sibonelo.  
Banengi khulu abafundi babatjhayeli abenza iimbawo zokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu nakumadaniswa namalayisense weemodere ezincani ngomnqopho wokobana babalekela ukuhlolwa kokuphaga ngeqadi kwendlela.
Isibalo esikhulu sabatjhayeli abasafundako senza iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu ngokuphikisana neenkoloyi ezincani khona bazakubalekela ihlahlubo yokuphaga bulinganisa, nasenza isibonelo.  
Inani eliphezulu lalabo abafunda ukutjhayela bafaka iimbawo zamalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kunokuthi bafake iimbawo zokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ukuze bakhandele ukuhlolelwa ukuphaga okulinganisanako, lokhu sibonelo.  
Banengi khulu abafundi babatjhayeli abenza iimbawo zokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu nakumadaniswa namalayisense weemodere ezincani ngomnqopho wokobana babalekela ukuhlolwa kokuphaga ngeqadi kwendlela.
Inani labatjhayeli abanengi bafaka iimbawo zamalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu ukuze babalekele njengesibonelo ukuhlolwa ngokujamisa ikoloyi ilinganise.
Iqiniso kukuthi ngemva kokuthi bathole amalayisensi weenkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, okukuthi abakajayeli indlela yokulawula ikoloyi encani bese bagcina babandakanyeke eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukobana ngemva kokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu, babuyela ekutjhayeleni iimodere ezincani lezi abangakazijayeli begodu lokho kugcina kubange neengozi eendleleni.
Okuliqiniso kukobana lokha nasele bathole amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kutholakale bona abakajayeli ukuzilawula nabazitjhayelako bese bagcine babandakanyeka eengozini.
Iqiniso kukobana nasele bafumene ilayisense yekoloyi ekulu khulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ezingakhambisani namalawulo wokutjhayela weenkoloyi abangakawajayeli begodu bagcina babandakanyeka eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukobana ngemva kokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu, babuyela ekutjhayeleni iimodere ezincani lezi abangakazijayeli begodu lokho kugcina kubange neengozi eendleleni.
Okuliqiniso kukobana lokha nasele bathole amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kutholakale bona abakajayeli ukuzilawula nabazitjhayelako bese bagcine babandakanyeka eengozini.
Iqiniso kukobana nasele bafumene ilayisense yekoloyi ekulu khulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ezingakhambisani namalawulo wokutjhayela weenkoloyi abangakawajayeli begodu bagcina babandakanyeka eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukuthi ngemva kokuthi bathole amalayisensi weenkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, okukuthi abakajayeli indlela yokulawula ikoloyi encani bese bagcina babandakanyeke eengozini. 
Okuliqiniso kukobana lokha nasele bathole amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kutholakale bona abakajayeli ukuzilawula nabazitjhayelako bese bagcine babandakanyeka eengozini.
Iqiniso kukobana nasele bafumene ilayisense yekoloyi ekulu khulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ezingakhambisani namalawulo wokutjhayela weenkoloyi abangakawajayeli begodu bagcina babandakanyeka eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukuthi ngemva kokuthi bathole amalayisensi weenkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, okukuthi abakajayeli indlela yokulawula ikoloyi encani bese bagcina babandakanyeke eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukobana ngemva kokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu, babuyela ekutjhayeleni iimodere ezincani lezi abangakazijayeli begodu lokho kugcina kubange neengozi eendleleni.
Iqiniso kukobana nasele bafumene ilayisense yekoloyi ekulu khulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ezingakhambisani namalawulo wokutjhayela weenkoloyi abangakawajayeli begodu bagcina babandakanyeka eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukuthi ngemva kokuthi bathole amalayisensi weenkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, okukuthi abakajayeli indlela yokulawula ikoloyi encani bese bagcina babandakanyeke eengozini. 
Iqiniso kukobana ngemva kokuthola amalayisense weemodere ezikulu, babuyela ekutjhayeleni iimodere ezincani lezi abangakazijayeli begodu lokho kugcina kubange neengozi eendleleni.
Okuliqiniso kukobana lokha nasele bathole amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, batjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kutholakale bona abakajayeli ukuzilawula nabazitjhayelako bese bagcine babandakanyeka eengozini.
Boke abatjhayeli abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kulindeleke bona babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela ngobuQwephetjhe, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa okuhlukileko.  
Kulindeleke bona abatjhayeli abathole iincwadi zokutjhayela iimodere ezikulu babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela buPhrofetjhinari kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okunye okuhlukileko.
Kulindeleke nokobana boke abatjhayeli labo abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu kufanele babe nePhomede yokuTjhayela okuPhrofetjhinali kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okhunye okuhlukileko.
Godu kulindeleke bona boke abatjhayeli abafumene amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu babe nemVumo yokuTjhayela yesiPhrofetjhinali, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa bona akwenzeki lokho.
Kulindeleke bona abatjhayeli abathole iincwadi zokutjhayela iimodere ezikulu babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela buPhrofetjhinari kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okunye okuhlukileko.
Kulindeleke nokobana boke abatjhayeli labo abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu kufanele babe nePhomede yokuTjhayela okuPhrofetjhinali kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okhunye okuhlukileko.
Godu kulindeleke bona boke abatjhayeli abafumene amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu babe nemVumo yokuTjhayela yesiPhrofetjhinali, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa bona akwenzeki lokho.
Boke abatjhayeli abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kulindeleke bona babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela ngobuQwephetjhe, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa okuhlukileko.  
Kulindeleke nokobana boke abatjhayeli labo abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu kufanele babe nePhomede yokuTjhayela okuPhrofetjhinali kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okhunye okuhlukileko.
Godu kulindeleke bona boke abatjhayeli abafumene amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu babe nemVumo yokuTjhayela yesiPhrofetjhinali, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa bona akwenzeki lokho.
Boke abatjhayeli abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kulindeleke bona babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela ngobuQwephetjhe, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa okuhlukileko.  
Kulindeleke bona abatjhayeli abathole iincwadi zokutjhayela iimodere ezikulu babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela buPhrofetjhinari kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okunye okuhlukileko.
Godu kulindeleke bona boke abatjhayeli abafumene amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu khulu babe nemVumo yokuTjhayela yesiPhrofetjhinali, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa bona akwenzeki lokho.
Boke abatjhayeli abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu, kulindeleke bona babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela ngobuQwephetjhe, kodwana iimbalobalo zitjengisa okuhlukileko.  
Kulindeleke bona abatjhayeli abathole iincwadi zokutjhayela iimodere ezikulu babe neemVumo zokuTjhayela buPhrofetjhinari kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okunye okuhlukileko.
Kulindeleke nokobana boke abatjhayeli labo abathole amalayisensi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu kufanele babe nePhomede yokuTjhayela okuPhrofetjhinali kodwana, iimbalobalo zitjengisa okhunye okuhlukileko.
Lokhu kutjengisa ukuthi labo abafaka iimbawo bebazifunela ilayisensi yokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, ingasi yeenkoloyi ezikulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ngokusobala bona ababawi bebadinga amalayisense weemodere ezincani ingasi iimodere ezikulu.
Lokhu kufakazela iphuzu lokobana abafakiimbawo bebafuna amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ingasi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu.
Lokhu kutjengisa bona ababawi bebatlhoga amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kodwana ingasi ezikulu khulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ngokusobala bona ababawi bebadinga amalayisense weemodere ezincani ingasi iimodere ezikulu.
Lokhu kufakazela iphuzu lokobana abafakiimbawo bebafuna amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ingasi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu.
Lokhu kutjengisa bona ababawi bebatlhoga amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kodwana ingasi ezikulu khulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ukuthi labo abafaka iimbawo bebazifunela ilayisensi yokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, ingasi yeenkoloyi ezikulu. 
Lokhu kufakazela iphuzu lokobana abafakiimbawo bebafuna amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ingasi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu.
Lokhu kutjengisa bona ababawi bebatlhoga amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kodwana ingasi ezikulu khulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ukuthi labo abafaka iimbawo bebazifunela ilayisensi yokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, ingasi yeenkoloyi ezikulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ngokusobala bona ababawi bebadinga amalayisense weemodere ezincani ingasi iimodere ezikulu.
Lokhu kutjengisa bona ababawi bebatlhoga amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani kodwana ingasi ezikulu khulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ukuthi labo abafaka iimbawo bebazifunela ilayisensi yokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani, ingasi yeenkoloyi ezikulu. 
Lokhu kutjengisa ngokusobala bona ababawi bebadinga amalayisense weemodere ezincani ingasi iimodere ezikulu.
Lokhu kufakazela iphuzu lokobana abafakiimbawo bebafuna amalayisense wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezincani ingasi wokutjhayela iinkoloyi ezikulu.
AmaDivayisi wokuLawula ukuNqophisa okuNzinzileko ethulwa embhesini ezima-mini nezima-midi ngokwehlelo lesitifiketi eliba yingcenye yokuhlolelwa ukulungela indlela.  
Kwethulwe iinSetjenziswa ezibizwa ngeLawulo lokuNzinzisa ukuGijima kwevili ezenzelwe iimbhesi ezincani neziphakathi okuthi ibhesi nayiphumeleleko inikelwe isitifiketi esiyingcenye yokuhlolwa kweemodere endleleni.
Isisetjenziswa esiLawula ukuNzinza kweLayelo leembhesana ezincani neembhesana eziphakatjhana zethulwe ngokwerherho lesitifikeyidi elibumba  ingcenye yokuhlola ukulungela ukuba sendleleni.
Iinsetjenziswa zokuNqophisa ukuNzinza kwekoloyi ngokweKomba eembhesaneni ezincani kanye neembhesaneni ezilingeneko zaziswa ngekambiso yokuqinisekisa ebumba ingcenye yokuhlolelwa indlela.

Lokhu kuzokusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesi ezima-mini nezima-midi begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisanda ukwenziwa kwaphela. 
Lokhu kusebenza kiwo woke amabhesi amancani naphakathi ingasi eemodereni ezitja kwaphela.
Kusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani neembbhesana eziphakatjhana begodu ingasi kwaphela iinkoloyi eziqeda ukwenziwa.
Zisebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani kanye neembhesaneni ezilingeneko begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisandukwenziwa. 
Lokhu kusebenza kiwo woke amabhesi amancani naphakathi ingasi eemodereni ezitja kwaphela.
Kusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani neembbhesana eziphakatjhana begodu ingasi kwaphela iinkoloyi eziqeda ukwenziwa.
Zisebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani kanye neembhesaneni ezilingeneko begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisandukwenziwa. 
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesi ezima-mini nezima-midi begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisanda ukwenziwa kwaphela. 
Kusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani neembbhesana eziphakatjhana begodu ingasi kwaphela iinkoloyi eziqeda ukwenziwa.
Zisebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani kanye neembhesaneni ezilingeneko begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisandukwenziwa. 
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesi ezima-mini nezima-midi begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisanda ukwenziwa kwaphela. 
Lokhu kusebenza kiwo woke amabhesi amancani naphakathi ingasi eemodereni ezitja kwaphela.
Zisebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani kanye neembhesaneni ezilingeneko begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisandukwenziwa. 
Lokhu kuzokusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesi ezima-mini nezima-midi begodu ingasi eenkoloyini ezisanda ukwenziwa kwaphela. 
Lokhu kusebenza kiwo woke amabhesi amancani naphakathi ingasi eemodereni ezitja kwaphela.
Kusebenza kizo zoke iimbhesana ezincani neembbhesana eziphakatjhana begodu ingasi kwaphela iinkoloyi eziqeda ukwenziwa.
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi nofana iphroksi kufanele ilethe iforomo elizalisiweko  le-DSCD esitetjhini esihlola iinkoloyi. 
Umnikazi wekoloyi etloliswe ngaye nofana umjameli kufanelo azalise iforomo DSCD ngokuzeleko esitetjhini sokuhlolwa kweemodere.
Umnikazi wekoloyi otlolisiweko nanyana okujameleko kufanele athumele iforomo le- DSCD elisemthethweni elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi namkha iphrokzi kufuze ilethe iforomo le-DCSD elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.  
Umnikazi wekoloyi etloliswe ngaye nofana umjameli kufanelo azalise iforomo DSCD ngokuzeleko esitetjhini sokuhlolwa kweemodere.
Umnikazi wekoloyi otlolisiweko nanyana okujameleko kufanele athumele iforomo le- DSCD elisemthethweni elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi namkha iphrokzi kufuze ilethe iforomo le-DCSD elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.  
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi nofana iphroksi kufanele ilethe iforomo elizalisiweko  le-DSCD esitetjhini esihlola iinkoloyi. 
Umnikazi wekoloyi otlolisiweko nanyana okujameleko kufanele athumele iforomo le- DSCD elisemthethweni elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi namkha iphrokzi kufuze ilethe iforomo le-DCSD elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.  
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi nofana iphroksi kufanele ilethe iforomo elizalisiweko  le-DSCD esitetjhini esihlola iinkoloyi. 
Umnikazi wekoloyi etloliswe ngaye nofana umjameli kufanelo azalise iforomo DSCD ngokuzeleko esitetjhini sokuhlolwa kweemodere.
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi namkha iphrokzi kufuze ilethe iforomo le-DCSD elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.  
Umnikazi otlolisiweko wekoloyi nofana iphroksi kufanele ilethe iforomo elizalisiweko  le-DSCD esitetjhini esihlola iinkoloyi. 
Umnikazi wekoloyi etloliswe ngaye nofana umjameli kufanelo azalise iforomo DSCD ngokuzeleko esitetjhini sokuhlolwa kweemodere.
Umnikazi wekoloyi otlolisiweko nanyana okujameleko kufanele athumele iforomo le- DSCD elisemthethweni elizalisiweko esitetjhini sokuhlola.
IDivayisi yokuLawula ukuNqophisa okuNzinzileko sisetjenziswa esikhandela bona itayere lingaphumi erimini lokha itayere nalithuthumba ikoloyi ikhamba.
IsiSetjenziswa seLawulo lokuNzinzisa ukuGijima kwevili sisetjenziswa esivikela itayere bona lingatjhidi erimini lokha itayere nalidumuzako lokha ikoloyi nayikhambako. 
Isisetjenziswa esiLawula ukuNzinza kweLayelo sisetjenziswa esijamele ukukhumuka kwetayere erimini itayere nalithuthumbako lokha ikoloyi nayikhambako
Isisetjenziswa sokuNqophisa ukuNzinza kwekoloyi ngokweKomba sisetjenziswa esikhandela ukuphuma kwetayere erimini lokha itayere nalithuthumba ngesikhathi ikoloyi ikhamba.
IsiSetjenziswa seLawulo lokuNzinzisa ukuGijima kwevili sisetjenziswa esivikela itayere bona lingatjhidi erimini lokha itayere nalidumuzako lokha ikoloyi nayikhambako. 
Isisetjenziswa esiLawula ukuNzinza kweLayelo sisetjenziswa esijamele ukukhumuka kwetayere erimini itayere nalithuthumbako lokha ikoloyi nayikhambako

Isisetjenziswa esiLawula ukuNzinza kweLayelo sisetjenziswa esijamele ukukhumuka kwetayere erimini itayere nalithuthumbako lokha ikoloyi nayikhambako
Itjhuguluko emThetjhwaneni 332 lavezwa begodu larhelisa iinhloli zomphefumulo zobufakazi ezingasetjenziswa ukubuthelela amasampula abufakazi bomphefumula begodi neentifiketi ezikhutjhwa mkhiqizi nofana umsabalalisi zingasetjenziswa njengobufakakazi emacaleni, ngokuthi zivezwe nje kwaphela. 
Itjhuguluko lomThetjhwana 332 limenyezelwe begodu latjho iinhlahlubi zokuhlola umphefumulo ezingasetjenziselwa ukubuthelela amasampula womphefumulo begodu isitifiketi esikhitjhwa mkhiqizi nofana umnikeli ngomsebenzi singasetjenziselwa ukuveza ubufakazi emacaleni, ngomkhiqizo nje kwaphela. 
Ukukhibelelwa komThetho 332 kwakhutjhwa begodu kurheliswa ezintweni ezihlola ubuqiniso bomnuko ezingasetjenziselwa ukubuthelela amasampula abufakazi bomnuko kanye nesitifikeyidi esikhitjhwe mkhiqizi nanyana mthumelipahla singasetjenziswa njengobufakazi kwezinye zezinto, ngokukhiqizwa kwaphela.
Itjhuguluko kumThetjhwana 332 lakhutjhwa begodu litjho ubufakazi beenhlolimmoya ezingasetjenziswa ukubuthelela amasampula wobufakazi bommoya kanye nesitifikethi esikhutjhwa ngumenzi namkha umsabalalisi singasetjenziswa njengobufakazi emilandwini, ngokukhitjhwa kwaso kuphela.  
Itjhuguluko lomThetjhwana 332 limenyezelwe begodu latjho iinhlahlubi zokuhlola umphefumulo ezingasetjenziselwa ukubuthelela amasampula womphefumulo begodu isitifiketi esikhitjhwa mkhiqizi nofana umnikeli ngomsebenzi singasetjenziselwa ukuveza ubufakazi emacaleni, ngomkhiqizo nje kwaphela.

Itjhuguluko kumThetjhwana 332 lakhutjhwa begodu litjho ubufakazi beenhlolimmoya ezingasetjenziswa ukubuthelela amasampula wobufakazi bommoya kanye nesitifikethi esikhutjhwa ngumenzi namkha umsabalalisi singasetjenziswa njengobufakazi emilandwini, ngokukhitjhwa kwaso kuphela.
