Itjhuguluko lomThetjhwana 332 limenyezelwe begodu latjho iinhlahlubi zokuhlola umphefumulo ezingasetjenziselwa ukubuthelela amasampula womphefumulo begodu isitifiketi esikhitjhwa mkhiqizi nofana umnikeli ngomsebenzi singasetjenziselwa ukuveza ubufakazi emacaleni, ngomkhiqizo nje kwaphela. 
Ukukhibelelwa komThetho 332 kwakhutjhwa begodu kurheliswa ezintweni ezihlola ubuqiniso bomnuko ezingasetjenziselwa ukubuthelela amasampula abufakazi bomnuko kanye nesitifikeyidi esikhitjhwe mkhiqizi nanyana mthumelipahla singasetjenziswa njengobufakazi kwezinye zezinto, ngokukhiqizwa kwaphela.
Itjhugululo leli linqophe ukutjheja indaba emayelana nokuba semthethweni kwemvuthelwa ukuya ngokwesigatjana 65(7) somThetho weThrafiki yenDleleni zeNarha, waka-1996 begodu nokuthi zikhambisana      ne-SABS 1793 begodu angeze zasetjenziselwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba khona kwe-alkhoholi emphefumulweni. 
Itjhugululweli lifakelwe ukurarulula umraro owaphakanyiswako omayelana nokusemthethweni kwebhrethalayzasi ngokuya ngokwesigaba 65(7) somThetho weeNdlela kaZweloke, we-1996 begodu lithobela umthetho we-SABS 1793 begodu angasetjenziselwa ukuqinisekisa iningi nofana ubuncani be-alkhoholi emphefumulweni.
Ukukhibelelwa lokhu kufuna ukulungisa indaba eyavezwako mayelana nokuba semthethweni kweensetjenziswa zokuphefumula ngokutjho kwesigaba 65(7) somThetho  oLawula ukukhamba kweenkoloyi eNdleleni, we-1996 begodu ukhambisana ne-SABS 1793 begodu ungasetjenziselwa ukuqinisekisa ukungenelela komnuko wotjwala. 
Itjhugulukweli lifuna ukulungisa indaba eyavezwa mayelana nokuba semthethweni kweenhlolimmoya ngokuya kwesigaba 65(7) somThetho wesiTjhaba weThrafigi yeNdleleni, waka-1996 begodu likhambisana ne-SABS 1793 godu lingasetjenziswa ukuqinisekisa ukunzinza kotjwala emmoyeni. 
Itjhugululweli lifakelwe ukurarulula umraro owaphakanyiswako omayelana nokusemthethweni kwebhrethalayzasi ngokuya ngokwesigaba 65(7) somThetho weeNdlela kaZweloke, we-1996 begodu lithobela umthetho we-SABS 1793 begodu angasetjenziselwa ukuqinisekisa iningi nofana ubuncani be-alkhoholi emphefumulweni.

Okulandelako kuziinsetjenziswa eziquntiweko:
"Lokhu kwenzeka khulu ngesikhathi sefestivi njengombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu  yokulwa nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu", kutjho u-MEC weenDlela nokuThutha uPinky Kekana.
Lokhu kusebenza kamnandi khulu ngesikhathi samaholideyi ngombana singezelela amandla wokulwisana nobudakwa eendleleni zethu uthi uPinky Kekane ongu-MEC weeNdlela neenThuthi.
Lokhu kusikhathi esifaneleko ngesikhathi sehlobo njengombana kunikela umdlandla omnengana emizameni yethu yokulwa nokutjhayela urhamulile eendleleni zethu, kutjho u-MEC weeNdlela nezokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana. 
Lokhu kuhle khulu ngesikhathi sokuzithabisa ngombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu yokulwisana nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu, kwatjho uSomkhandlu wezeeNdlela nokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana.
Lokhu kusebenza kamnandi khulu ngesikhathi samaholideyi ngombana singezelela amandla wokulwisana nobudakwa eendleleni zethu uthi uPinky Kekane ongu-MEC weeNdlela neenThuthi.
Lokhu kusikhathi esifaneleko ngesikhathi sehlobo njengombana kunikela umdlandla omnengana emizameni yethu yokulwa nokutjhayela urhamulile eendleleni zethu, kutjho u-MEC weeNdlela nezokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana. 
Lokhu kuhle khulu ngesikhathi sokuzithabisa ngombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu yokulwisana nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu, kwatjho uSomkhandlu wezeeNdlela nokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana.
"Lokhu kwenzeka khulu ngesikhathi sefestivi njengombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu  yokulwa nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu", kutjho u-MEC weenDlela nokuThutha uPinky Kekana.
Lokhu kusikhathi esifaneleko ngesikhathi sehlobo njengombana kunikela umdlandla omnengana emizameni yethu yokulwa nokutjhayela urhamulile eendleleni zethu, kutjho u-MEC weeNdlela nezokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana. 
Lokhu kuhle khulu ngesikhathi sokuzithabisa ngombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu yokulwisana nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu, kwatjho uSomkhandlu wezeeNdlela nokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana.
"Lokhu kwenzeka khulu ngesikhathi sefestivi njengombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu  yokulwa nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu", kutjho u-MEC weenDlela nokuThutha uPinky Kekana.

Lokhu kuhle khulu ngesikhathi sokuzithabisa ngombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu yokulwisana nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu, kwatjho uSomkhandlu wezeeNdlela nokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana.
"Lokhu kwenzeka khulu ngesikhathi sefestivi njengombana kunikela amandla emizameni yethu  yokulwa nokutjhayela udakiwe eendleleni zethu", kutjho u-MEC weenDlela nokuThutha uPinky Kekana.
Lokhu kusebenza kamnandi khulu ngesikhathi samaholideyi ngombana singezelela amandla wokulwisana nobudakwa eendleleni zethu uthi uPinky Kekane ongu-MEC weeNdlela neenThuthi.
Lokhu kusikhathi esifaneleko ngesikhathi sehlobo njengombana kunikela umdlandla omnengana emizameni yethu yokulwa nokutjhayela urhamulile eendleleni zethu, kutjho u-MEC weeNdlela nezokuThutha u-Pinky Kekana.

Itjhejo lezamaPhilo labaziThweleko (ngaPhambi kokuBeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezePilo yabaziThweleko (ngaphambi kokuBelethwa)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yabomma abasidisi (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yesiDisi (yangaPhambi kokuBeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezePilo yabaziThweleko (ngaphambi kokuBelethwa)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yabomma abasidisi (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yesiDisi (yangaPhambi kokuBeletha)
Itjhejo lezamaPhilo labaziThweleko (ngaPhambi kokuBeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yabomma abasidisi (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yesiDisi (yangaPhambi kokuBeletha)
Itjhejo lezamaPhilo labaziThweleko (ngaPhambi kokuBeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezePilo yabaziThweleko (ngaphambi kokuBelethwa)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yesiDisi (yangaPhambi kokuBeletha)
Itjhejo lezamaPhilo labaziThweleko (ngaPhambi kokuBeletha)
ImiSebenzi yezePilo yabaziThweleko (ngaphambi kokuBelethwa)
ImiSebenzi yezamaPhilo yabomma abasidisi (ngaphambi kokubeletha)
Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa lapho bazakuthola itjhejo labazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaBelethisi ababelethisa nge-Obstethrikhi (ama-MOU) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa emisebenzini ephathelene nabazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaHlekingazi bokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, bese emakhaya kuba ziimbhedlela ezincani nofana imitholapilo yemakhaya.
Abentazana nabomma abasidisi balayelwa emisebenzini yokubelethisa nanyana kumaZiko we-Obstethriki waboDorhodera abaBelethisako (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni begodu kumasathelayidi nanyana kumatlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Abantanzana nabomma abasidisi badluliselwa emisebenzini yezobumma namkha kumaYunidi wezesiDisi nokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, nakumasathelayithi namkha kumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa emisebenzini ephathelene nabazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaHlekingazi bokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, bese emakhaya kuba ziimbhedlela ezincani nofana imitholapilo yemakhaya.
Abentazana nabomma abasidisi balayelwa emisebenzini yokubelethisa nanyana kumaZiko we-Obstethriki waboDorhodera abaBelethisako (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni begodu kumasathelayidi nanyana kumatlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Abantanzana nabomma abasidisi badluliselwa emisebenzini yezobumma namkha kumaYunidi wezesiDisi nokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, nakumasathelayithi namkha kumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa lapho bazakuthola itjhejo labazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaBelethisi ababelethisa nge-Obstethrikhi (ama-MOU) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Abentazana nabomma abasidisi balayelwa emisebenzini yokubelethisa nanyana kumaZiko we-Obstethriki waboDorhodera abaBelethisako (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni begodu kumasathelayidi nanyana kumatlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Abantanzana nabomma abasidisi badluliselwa emisebenzini yezobumma namkha kumaYunidi wezesiDisi nokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, nakumasathelayithi namkha kumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya.

Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa emisebenzini ephathelene nabazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaHlekingazi bokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, bese emakhaya kuba ziimbhedlela ezincani nofana imitholapilo yemakhaya.

Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa lapho bazakuthola itjhejo labazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaBelethisi ababelethisa nge-Obstethrikhi (ama-MOU) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Abantazana nabafazi abazithweleko bathunyelwa emisebenzini ephathelene nabazithweleko nofana emaZikweni wabaHlekingazi bokuBelethisa (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni, bese emakhaya kuba ziimbhedlela ezincani nofana imitholapilo yemakhaya.
Abentazana nabomma abasidisi balayelwa emisebenzini yokubelethisa nanyana kumaZiko we-Obstethriki waboDorhodera abaBelethisako (ama-MOU) eendaweni zemadorobheni begodu kumasathelayidi nanyana kumatlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ama-MOUs amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma. 
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa alawulwa babelethisi bemphakathini abamayelana netjhejo lezamaphilo weengulani.
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo.
Ama-MOU mayunidi wokubelethisela aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukuze kutjhejwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lesizo lokuthoma.
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa alawulwa babelethisi bemphakathini abamayelana netjhejo lezamaphilo weengulani.
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo.
Ama-MOU mayunidi wokubelethisela aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukuze kutjhejwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lesizo lokuthoma.
Ama-MOUs amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma. 
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo.
Ama-MOU mayunidi wokubelethisela aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukuze kutjhejwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lesizo lokuthoma.
Ama-MOUs amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma. 
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa alawulwa babelethisi bemphakathini abamayelana netjhejo lezamaphilo weengulani.
Ama-MOU mayunidi wokubelethisela aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukuze kutjhejwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lesizo lokuthoma.
Ama-MOUs amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma. 
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa alawulwa babelethisi bemphakathini abamayelana netjhejo lezamaphilo weengulani.
Ama-MOU maziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo.
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona babhuge ukuvakatjhela etlinigi kokuthoma ngaphambi kwemveke ezima-20 nofana msinyana ngemva kokuthi bazithole bazithwele.
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona batlolise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma lokuya emtholapilo ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nofana ngokurhabekileko ukusuka lapho.
Kuqakathekile bona abomma abasidisi babhuge ivakatjho labo lokuthoma  etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nanyana  msinya ngemva kwalokho.
Kuyeleliswa bona abomma abasidisi babekise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 namkha msinyana ngemva kwalapho. 
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona batlolise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma lokuya emtholapilo ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nofana ngokurhabekileko ukusuka lapho.
Kuqakathekile bona abomma abasidisi babhuge ivakatjho labo lokuthoma  etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nanyana  msinya ngemva kwalokho.
Kuyeleliswa bona abomma abasidisi babekise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 namkha msinyana ngemva kwalapho. 
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona babhuge ukuvakatjhela etlinigi kokuthoma ngaphambi kwemveke ezima-20 nofana msinyana ngemva kokuthi bazithole bazithwele.
Kuqakathekile bona abomma abasidisi babhuge ivakatjho labo lokuthoma  etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nanyana  msinya ngemva kwalokho.
Kuyeleliswa bona abomma abasidisi babekise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 namkha msinyana ngemva kwalapho. 
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona babhuge ukuvakatjhela etlinigi kokuthoma ngaphambi kwemveke ezima-20 nofana msinyana ngemva kokuthi bazithole bazithwele.
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona batlolise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma lokuya emtholapilo ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nofana ngokurhabekileko ukusuka lapho.
Kuyeleliswa bona abomma abasidisi babekise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 namkha msinyana ngemva kwalapho. 
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona babhuge ukuvakatjhela etlinigi kokuthoma ngaphambi kwemveke ezima-20 nofana msinyana ngemva kokuthi bazithole bazithwele.
Abomma abazithweleko balulekwa bona batlolise ivakatjho labo lokuthoma lokuya emtholapilo ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nofana ngokurhabekileko ukusuka lapho.
Kuqakathekile bona abomma abasidisi babhuge ivakatjho labo lokuthoma  etlinigi ngaphambi kweemveke ezima-20 nanyana  msinya ngemva kwalokho.
Umma uhlolwa ngokuzeleko nakeze evakatjhweni lokuthoma begodu athole nokuthotjwa ngokomkhumbulo evakatjhweni lokuthoma, godu okwaziwa ngevakatjho elibhukhweko. 
Umma unikelwa ihlolo yokuthoma epheleleko kanye nokuthotjwa ngokomkhumbulo lokha nakeza kokuthoma azokuhlolelwa ukuzithwala, begodu lelo vakatjho lazeka ngevakatjho elibhugelwako.
Umma uhlolwa ngokungeneleleko ekuthomeni begodu uyakhanselwa lokha nakaya etlinigi yabomma abasidisi kokuthoma, lokhu kwaziwa godu ngokuthiwa livakatjho lokubhuga.
Umma unikelwa ukuhlolwa okuzeleko kanye nesizo lezomkhumbulo lokha nakeza kokuthoma evakatjhweni eliphathelene nesidisi nokubeletha, godu elaziwa ngevakatjho lokubhukha. 
Umma unikelwa ihlolo yokuthoma epheleleko kanye nokuthotjwa ngokomkhumbulo lokha nakeza kokuthoma azokuhlolelwa ukuzithwala, begodu lelo vakatjho lazeka ngevakatjho elibhugelwako.
Umma uhlolwa ngokungeneleleko ekuthomeni begodu uyakhanselwa lokha nakaya etlinigi yabomma abasidisi kokuthoma, lokhu kwaziwa godu ngokuthiwa livakatjho lokubhuga.
Umma unikelwa ukuhlolwa okuzeleko kanye nesizo lezomkhumbulo lokha nakeza kokuthoma evakatjhweni eliphathelene nesidisi nokubeletha, godu elaziwa ngevakatjho lokubhukha. 
Umma uhlolwa ngokuzeleko nakeze evakatjhweni lokuthoma begodu athole nokuthotjwa ngokomkhumbulo evakatjhweni lokuthoma, godu okwaziwa ngevakatjho elibhukhweko.

Isisu sitjhejwa nofana sibekwa ilihlo ngamavakatjho enziwa ngesikhathi esibekiweko. 
Ukuzithwala kutjhejwa ngokunande uvakatjhela emtholapilo.
Ukuba sidisi kutjhejwa ngokuthi anande eza emavakatjhweni alandelako.
Isidisi seluswa ngamavakatjho welandelela enziwa njalo. 
Ukuzithwala kutjhejwa ngokunande uvakatjhela emtholapilo.

Isidisi seluswa ngamavakatjho welandelela enziwa njalo. 
Isisu sitjhejwa nofana sibekwa ilihlo ngamavakatjho enziwa ngesikhathi esibekiweko.

Ubujamo bezamaphilo bukamma nabo buyatjhejwa. 
Nepilo kamma ozithweleko itjhejwa njalo.
Ipilo kamma nayo ibekwa ilihlo elibukhali.
Ipilo kamma nayo yeluswa ngobuduze. 
Nepilo kamma ozithweleko itjhejwa njalo.
Ipilo kamma nayo ibekwa ilihlo elibukhali.
Ipilo kamma nayo yeluswa ngobuduze. 
Ubujamo bezamaphilo bukamma nabo buyatjhejwa. 
Ipilo kamma nayo ibekwa ilihlo elibukhali.
Ipilo kamma nayo yeluswa ngobuduze. 
Ubujamo bezamaphilo bukamma nabo buyatjhejwa. 
Nepilo kamma ozithweleko itjhejwa njalo.
Ipilo kamma nayo yeluswa ngobuduze. 
Ubujamo bezamaphilo bukamma nabo buyatjhejwa. 
Nepilo kamma ozithweleko itjhejwa njalo.
Ipilo kamma nayo ibekwa ilihlo elibukhali.
Uzokukhwezwa isikali, ahlolwe ukuphakama kweengazi nomthondo wakhe uhlolwe. 
Uzokufakwa esikaleni sobudisi, kuhlolwe ukufuthumela kweengazi begodu kuhlolwe nomhlambuluko.
Uzakukalwa, athathwe iingazi bese uhlolwa nomhlambuluko.
Uzakulinganiswa ubudisi, igandelelo leengazi bekuhlolwe nomhlambuluko. 
Uzokufakwa esikaleni sobudisi, kuhlolwe ukufuthumela kweengazi begodu kuhlolwe nomhlambuluko.
Uzakukalwa, athathwe iingazi bese uhlolwa nomhlambuluko.
Uzakulinganiswa ubudisi, igandelelo leengazi bekuhlolwe nomhlambuluko. 
Uzokukhwezwa isikali, ahlolwe ukuphakama kweengazi nomthondo wakhe uhlolwe. 
Uzakukalwa, athathwe iingazi bese uhlolwa nomhlambuluko.
Uzakulinganiswa ubudisi, igandelelo leengazi bekuhlolwe nomhlambuluko. 
Uzokukhwezwa isikali, ahlolwe ukuphakama kweengazi nomthondo wakhe uhlolwe. 
Uzokufakwa esikaleni sobudisi, kuhlolwe ukufuthumela kweengazi begodu kuhlolwe nomhlambuluko.
Uzakulinganiswa ubudisi, igandelelo leengazi bekuhlolwe nomhlambuluko. 
Uzokukhwezwa isikali, ahlolwe ukuphakama kweengazi nomthondo wakhe uhlolwe. 
Uzokufakwa esikaleni sobudisi, kuhlolwe ukufuthumela kweengazi begodu kuhlolwe nomhlambuluko.
Uzakukalwa, athathwe iingazi bese uhlolwa nomhlambuluko.
Nakunganamiraro, kufanele abuye mayelana nevakatjho eliyilandelela lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili malungana nemiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezenziweko ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha. 
Nangabe koke kulungile, kufanele abuyiselwe evakatjhweni lakhe lelandelela elenzeka ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuyokuthola imiphumela yeenhlolo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho elibhugelwako. 
Nangabe akunamraro, kufanele abuyele ilandelela yevakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukobana azokuthatha imiphumela yokuhlolwa ethethwe ngevakatjho lokubhuga.
Nayikuthi akunararano, uzakubuya eze kwelinye ivakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuze afumane imiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha.  
Nangabe koke kulungile, kufanele abuyiselwe evakatjhweni lakhe lelandelela elenzeka ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuyokuthola imiphumela yeenhlolo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho elibhugelwako. 
Nangabe akunamraro, kufanele abuyele ilandelela yevakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukobana azokuthatha imiphumela yokuhlolwa ethethwe ngevakatjho lokubhuga.
Nayikuthi akunararano, uzakubuya eze kwelinye ivakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuze afumane imiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha.  
Nakunganamiraro, kufanele abuye mayelana nevakatjho eliyilandelela lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili malungana nemiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezenziweko ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha. 
Nangabe akunamraro, kufanele abuyele ilandelela yevakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukobana azokuthatha imiphumela yokuhlolwa ethethwe ngevakatjho lokubhuga.
Nayikuthi akunararano, uzakubuya eze kwelinye ivakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuze afumane imiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha.

Nangabe koke kulungile, kufanele abuyiselwe evakatjhweni lakhe lelandelela elenzeka ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuyokuthola imiphumela yeenhlolo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho elibhugelwako. 
Nayikuthi akunararano, uzakubuya eze kwelinye ivakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuze afumane imiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha.  
Nakunganamiraro, kufanele abuye mayelana nevakatjho eliyilandelela lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili malungana nemiphumela yeenhlahlubo ezenziweko ngesikhathi sevakatjho lokubhukha. 
Nangabe koke kulungile, kufanele abuyiselwe evakatjhweni lakhe lelandelela elenzeka ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukuyokuthola imiphumela yeenhlolo ezithethwe ngesikhathi sevakatjho elibhugelwako. 
Nangabe akunamraro, kufanele abuyele ilandelela yevakatjho lokuthoma ngemva kweemveke ezimbili ukobana azokuthatha imiphumela yokuhlolwa ethethwe ngevakatjho lokubhuga.
Ngemva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele etlinigi njalo emvekeni ezisithandathu bekube zimveke ezi-28, godi enze njalo bekube zimveke ezi-34, ngemva kwalokho njengoba kuvezwe basebenzi betlinigi/MOU (ukubuyelelwa kwamavakatjho kuhluka ngokweendawo).
Emva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele emtholapilo qobe ngeemveke ezisithandathu beze kufike eemvekeni ezima-28, bese kulandela iimveke ezima-34, emva kwalokho wenza njengokululekwa sisebenzi somtholapilo/i-MOU (ukuvakatjhela emitholapilo njalo kuhluka ngeendawo ngeendawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele etlinigi qobe ziimveke ezisithandathu ukuya eemvekeni ezima-28, bese evekeni yama-34, ngemva kwalokho njengombana kutjhiwo yitlinigi/sisebenzi se-MOU (amahlandla wokuya kanengi etlinigi angahluka ngokweendawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kufuze abuyele etlinigi njalo eemvekeni ezisithandathu ukufikela eemvekeni ezima-28, ngemva kwalokho eemvekeni ezima-34, kuthi ngemva kwalapho eze njengokutjengisa kwabasebenzi betlinigi/ be-MOU (ubunjalo bamavakatjho bungahluka ukusuka kwenye indawo ukuya kwenye).
Emva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele emtholapilo qobe ngeemveke ezisithandathu beze kufike eemvekeni ezima-28, bese kulandela iimveke ezima-34, emva kwalokho wenza njengokululekwa sisebenzi somtholapilo/i-MOU (ukuvakatjhela emitholapilo njalo kuhluka ngeendawo ngeendawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele etlinigi qobe ziimveke ezisithandathu ukuya eemvekeni ezima-28, bese evekeni yama-34, ngemva kwalokho njengombana kutjhiwo yitlinigi/sisebenzi se-MOU (amahlandla wokuya kanengi etlinigi angahluka ngokweendawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kufuze abuyele etlinigi njalo eemvekeni ezisithandathu ukufikela eemvekeni ezima-28, ngemva kwalokho eemvekeni ezima-34, kuthi ngemva kwalapho eze njengokutjengisa kwabasebenzi betlinigi/ be-MOU (ubunjalo bamavakatjho bungahluka ukusuka kwenye indawo ukuya kwenye).

Emva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele emtholapilo qobe ngeemveke ezisithandathu beze kufike eemvekeni ezima-28, bese kulandela iimveke ezima-34, emva kwalokho wenza njengokululekwa sisebenzi somtholapilo/i-MOU (ukuvakatjhela emitholapilo njalo kuhluka ngeendawo ngeendawo).
Ngemva kwalokhu, kufanele abuyele etlinigi qobe ziimveke ezisithandathu ukuya eemvekeni ezima-28, bese evekeni yama-34, ngemva kwalokho njengombana kutjhiwo yitlinigi/sisebenzi se-MOU (amahlandla wokuya kanengi etlinigi angahluka ngokweendawo).
Abomma abazithweleko bayahlolwa mayelana nezinto ezingaba yingozi kezamaphilo wabo nezepilo yombungu. 
Abomma abazithweleko bahlolelwa ubungozi obungahle buvele epilwenabo kanye nepilo yombungu.
Abomma abasidisi bayaskrinwa kuhlolwe iingozi ezingahle zibe khona emaphilweni wabo begodu nobuphilo bombungu.
Abomma abasidisi bahlolelwa iingozi ezingavela epilweni yabo kanye nepilweni yombungu.  
Abomma abazithweleko bahlolelwa ubungozi obungahle buvele epilwenabo kanye nepilo yombungu.

Abomma abasidisi bahlolelwa iingozi ezingavela epilweni yabo kanye nepilweni yombungu.

Abomma abazithweleko bahlolelwa ubungozi obungahle buvele epilwenabo kanye nepilo yombungu.
Abomma abasidisi bayaskrinwa kuhlolwe iingozi ezingahle zibe khona emaphilweni wabo begodu nobuphilo bombungu.
Abantazana abasesebancani nabafazi abangehla kweminyaka ema-35 abazithweleko bathathwa njengalabo abasengozini khulu. 
Kokubili abantazanyana abancani nabafazi abangaphezu kweminyaka ema-35 abazithweleko bathathwa njengabantu abasebujameni obuyingozi khulu.
Kokubili abentazana abamatlawana nabomma abaneminyaka yobudala engaphezulu kwama-35 abasidisi bathathwa njengalabo abasengozini khulu.
Kokubili abantazana abasakhulako nabomma abangaphezu kweminyaka yobudala ema-35 abasidisi bathathwa njengabasengozini ekulu.
Kokubili abantazanyana abancani nabafazi abangaphezu kweminyaka ema-35 abazithweleko bathathwa njengabantu abasebujameni obuyingozi khulu.

Kokubili abantazana abasakhulako nabomma abangaphezu kweminyaka yobudala ema-35 abasidisi bathathwa njengabasengozini ekulu.

Kokubili abantazanyana abancani nabafazi abangaphezu kweminyaka ema-35 abazithweleko bathathwa njengabantu abasebujameni obuyingozi khulu.
Kokubili abantazana abasakhulako nabomma abangaphezu kweminyaka yobudala ema-35 abasidisi bathathwa njengabasengozini ekulu.
Abantazana abasesebancani nabafazi abangehla kweminyaka ema-35 abazithweleko bathathwa njengalabo abasengozini khulu. 
Kokubili abantazanyana abancani nabafazi abangaphezu kweminyaka ema-35 abazithweleko bathathwa njengabantu abasebujameni obuyingozi khulu.
Kokubili abentazana abamatlawana nabomma abaneminyaka yobudala engaphezulu kwama-35 abasidisi bathathwa njengalabo abasengozini khulu.
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo yokuthi babe nemiraro ngesikhathi bazithwele nangesikhathi sokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona bangavama ukuba nobudisi ngesikhathi bazithweleko nangesikhathi sokubeletha.
Lokhu kutjho bona kungenzeka babe nemiraro lokha nabazithweleko nalokha nababelethako.
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo ekulu yokobana bangaba nemiraro ngesikhathi basidisi nalokha bayokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona bangavama ukuba nobudisi ngesikhathi bazithweleko nangesikhathi sokubeletha.
Lokhu kutjho bona kungenzeka babe nemiraro lokha nabazithweleko nalokha nababelethako.
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo ekulu yokobana bangaba nemiraro ngesikhathi basidisi nalokha bayokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo yokuthi babe nemiraro ngesikhathi bazithwele nangesikhathi sokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona kungenzeka babe nemiraro lokha nabazithweleko nalokha nababelethako.
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo ekulu yokobana bangaba nemiraro ngesikhathi basidisi nalokha bayokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo yokuthi babe nemiraro ngesikhathi bazithwele nangesikhathi sokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona bangavama ukuba nobudisi ngesikhathi bazithweleko nangesikhathi sokubeletha.
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo ekulu yokobana bangaba nemiraro ngesikhathi basidisi nalokha bayokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona kunekghonakalo yokuthi babe nemiraro ngesikhathi bazithwele nangesikhathi sokubeletha. 
Lokhu kutjho bona bangavama ukuba nobudisi ngesikhathi bazithweleko nangesikhathi sokubeletha.
Lokhu kutjho bona kungenzeka babe nemiraro lokha nabazithweleko nalokha nababelethako.
Abafazi abazithweleko godu bangabonwa njengabasengozini lokha iingazi zabo ziphakamile, banomlando wokugula okuyifuzo, ukuzithwala kanengi kanye nokuthi mhlambe esikhathini esidlulileko bakhe basikwa njengokubeletha ngokusikwa. 
Abafazi abazithweleko nabo babonakala basengozini ekulu nangabe umfutho weengazi uphakamile, kunomlando wamalwele wefuzo, bazithwala kanengana begodu kutholakale bona bathole abantwana ngokusikwa.
Abomma abasidisi abangabonwa godu basengozini khulu nangabe iingazi zabo zikhuphukela phezulu, umlando wokungakhambi kuhle kweenthako zefuzo emzimbeni, babe sidisi amahlandla ambalwa begodu nokobana bakhe basikwa kwakhutjhwa umntwana ngokobana basikwe ngaphambilini.
Abomma abasidisi godu bangabonakala basengozini ekulu nayikuthi igandelelo labo leengazi liphezulu khulu, umlando wefuzo elirareneko, ukuthwala abantwana abadlula babili begodu nayikuthi sebakhe bahlinzwa okufana nokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa ngaphambilini.  
Abafazi abazithweleko nabo babonakala basengozini ekulu nangabe umfutho weengazi uphakamile, kunomlando wamalwele wefuzo, bazithwala kanengana begodu kutholakale bona bathole abantwana ngokusikwa.
Abomma abasidisi abangabonwa godu basengozini khulu nangabe iingazi zabo zikhuphukela phezulu, umlando wokungakhambi kuhle kweenthako zefuzo emzimbeni, babe sidisi amahlandla ambalwa begodu nokobana bakhe basikwa kwakhutjhwa umntwana ngokobana basikwe ngaphambilini.
Abomma abasidisi godu bangabonakala basengozini ekulu nayikuthi igandelelo labo leengazi liphezulu khulu, umlando wefuzo elirareneko, ukuthwala abantwana abadlula babili begodu nayikuthi sebakhe bahlinzwa okufana nokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa ngaphambilini.  
Abafazi abazithweleko godu bangabonwa njengabasengozini lokha iingazi zabo ziphakamile, banomlando wokugula okuyifuzo, ukuzithwala kanengi kanye nokuthi mhlambe esikhathini esidlulileko bakhe basikwa njengokubeletha ngokusikwa. 
Abomma abasidisi abangabonwa godu basengozini khulu nangabe iingazi zabo zikhuphukela phezulu, umlando wokungakhambi kuhle kweenthako zefuzo emzimbeni, babe sidisi amahlandla ambalwa begodu nokobana bakhe basikwa kwakhutjhwa umntwana ngokobana basikwe ngaphambilini.
Abomma abasidisi godu bangabonakala basengozini ekulu nayikuthi igandelelo labo leengazi liphezulu khulu, umlando wefuzo elirareneko, ukuthwala abantwana abadlula babili begodu nayikuthi sebakhe bahlinzwa okufana nokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa ngaphambilini.  
Abafazi abazithweleko godu bangabonwa njengabasengozini lokha iingazi zabo ziphakamile, banomlando wokugula okuyifuzo, ukuzithwala kanengi kanye nokuthi mhlambe esikhathini esidlulileko bakhe basikwa njengokubeletha ngokusikwa. 
Abafazi abazithweleko nabo babonakala basengozini ekulu nangabe umfutho weengazi uphakamile, kunomlando wamalwele wefuzo, bazithwala kanengana begodu kutholakale bona bathole abantwana ngokusikwa.
Abomma abasidisi godu bangabonakala basengozini ekulu nayikuthi igandelelo labo leengazi liphezulu khulu, umlando wefuzo elirareneko, ukuthwala abantwana abadlula babili begodu nayikuthi sebakhe bahlinzwa okufana nokubeletha ngokuhlinzwa ngaphambilini.  
Abafazi abazithweleko godu bangabonwa njengabasengozini lokha iingazi zabo ziphakamile, banomlando wokugula okuyifuzo, ukuzithwala kanengi kanye nokuthi mhlambe esikhathini esidlulileko bakhe basikwa njengokubeletha ngokusikwa. 
Abafazi abazithweleko nabo babonakala basengozini ekulu nangabe umfutho weengazi uphakamile, kunomlando wamalwele wefuzo, bazithwala kanengana begodu kutholakale bona bathole abantwana ngokusikwa.
Abomma abasidisi abangabonwa godu basengozini khulu nangabe iingazi zabo zikhuphukela phezulu, umlando wokungakhambi kuhle kweenthako zefuzo emzimbeni, babe sidisi amahlandla ambalwa begodu nokobana bakhe basikwa kwakhutjhwa umntwana ngokobana basikwe ngaphambilini.
Abomma abatholwa basengozini bathunyelwa ematlinigi wabazithweleko njengesigulani sangaphandle eembhedlela ezikuleveli yesibili nofana yesithathu, lapho iphenyo neenhlahlubo zenziwa khona. 
Abomma abalatjhelwa ubujamo obuyingozi khulu bathunyelwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezikulu nofana eziphakemeko, lapho bazakufika benze khona iphenyo nokuhlola ukuya phambili.
Abomma abathi nabahlolwako kutholakale bona basengozini khulu basiwa etlinigi  yabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiyo kumazinga aphakathi nanyana aphakemeko weembhedlela, lapha okhunye godu ukuhlola nokuskrina kwenziwa khona.
Abomma abahlolwa kutholakale bonyana basengozini ekulu bayadluliswa emjejeni basiwe ematlinigi wesidisi nokubelethisa weenguli zangaphandle ezingeni leembhedlela ezinikela ngetlhogomelo lezazi ezingathintani nesiguli namkha zezinga eliqale ubulwelwe obuthileko eengulini zangaphakathi, lapho iinhlahlubo zokuphenya nokuhlola zenziwa khona.   
Abomma abalatjhelwa ubujamo obuyingozi khulu bathunyelwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezikulu nofana eziphakemeko, lapho bazakufika benze khona iphenyo nokuhlola ukuya phambili.
Abomma abathi nabahlolwako kutholakale bona basengozini khulu basiwa etlinigi  yabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiyo kumazinga aphakathi nanyana aphakemeko weembhedlela, lapha okhunye godu ukuhlola nokuskrina kwenziwa khona.
Abomma abahlolwa kutholakale bonyana basengozini ekulu bayadluliswa emjejeni basiwe ematlinigi wesidisi nokubelethisa weenguli zangaphandle ezingeni leembhedlela ezinikela ngetlhogomelo lezazi ezingathintani nesiguli namkha zezinga eliqale ubulwelwe obuthileko eengulini zangaphakathi, lapho iinhlahlubo zokuphenya nokuhlola zenziwa khona.   
Abomma abatholwa basengozini bathunyelwa ematlinigi wabazithweleko njengesigulani sangaphandle eembhedlela ezikuleveli yesibili nofana yesithathu, lapho iphenyo neenhlahlubo zenziwa khona. 
Abomma abathi nabahlolwako kutholakale bona basengozini khulu basiwa etlinigi  yabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiyo kumazinga aphakathi nanyana aphakemeko weembhedlela, lapha okhunye godu ukuhlola nokuskrina kwenziwa khona.
Abomma abahlolwa kutholakale bonyana basengozini ekulu bayadluliswa emjejeni basiwe ematlinigi wesidisi nokubelethisa weenguli zangaphandle ezingeni leembhedlela ezinikela ngetlhogomelo lezazi ezingathintani nesiguli namkha zezinga eliqale ubulwelwe obuthileko eengulini zangaphakathi, lapho iinhlahlubo zokuphenya nokuhlola zenziwa khona.

Abomma abalatjhelwa ubujamo obuyingozi khulu bathunyelwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezikulu nofana eziphakemeko, lapho bazakufika benze khona iphenyo nokuhlola ukuya phambili.
Abomma abahlolwa kutholakale bonyana basengozini ekulu bayadluliswa emjejeni basiwe ematlinigi wesidisi nokubelethisa weenguli zangaphandle ezingeni leembhedlela ezinikela ngetlhogomelo lezazi ezingathintani nesiguli namkha zezinga eliqale ubulwelwe obuthileko eengulini zangaphakathi, lapho iinhlahlubo zokuphenya nokuhlola zenziwa khona.   
Abomma abatholwa basengozini bathunyelwa ematlinigi wabazithweleko njengesigulani sangaphandle eembhedlela ezikuleveli yesibili nofana yesithathu, lapho iphenyo neenhlahlubo zenziwa khona. 
Abomma abalatjhelwa ubujamo obuyingozi khulu bathunyelwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezikulu nofana eziphakemeko, lapho bazakufika benze khona iphenyo nokuhlola ukuya phambili.
Abomma abathi nabahlolwako kutholakale bona basengozini khulu basiwa etlinigi  yabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiyo kumazinga aphakathi nanyana aphakemeko weembhedlela, lapha okhunye godu ukuhlola nokuskrina kwenziwa khona.
Abomma abanokuzithwala okuyingozi balulekwa bona bakhambele amatlinigi wabazithweleko njengeengulani zangaphandle msinya ngendlela abangakghona ngayo.
Abomma abazithweleko abasebujameni obuphezulu bobungozi balulekwa bona baye emitholapilo yabazithweleko njalo.
Abomma abasengozini khulu lokha nabasidisi bayayeleliswa bona baye kanengana kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo. 
Abomma abanesidisi esiyingozi ekulu bayeleliswa ukukhambela amatlinigi aqalene nesidisi weenguli zangaphandle njalo. 
Abomma abazithweleko abasebujameni obuphezulu bobungozi balulekwa bona baye emitholapilo yabazithweleko njalo.
Abomma abasengozini khulu lokha nabasidisi bayayeleliswa bona baye kanengana kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo. 
Abomma abanesidisi esiyingozi ekulu bayeleliswa ukukhambela amatlinigi aqalene nesidisi weenguli zangaphandle njalo. 
Abomma abanokuzithwala okuyingozi balulekwa bona bakhambele amatlinigi wabazithweleko njengeengulani zangaphandle msinya ngendlela abangakghona ngayo.
Abomma abasengozini khulu lokha nabasidisi bayayeleliswa bona baye kanengana kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo. 
Abomma abanesidisi esiyingozi ekulu bayeleliswa ukukhambela amatlinigi aqalene nesidisi weenguli zangaphandle njalo. 
Abomma abanokuzithwala okuyingozi balulekwa bona bakhambele amatlinigi wabazithweleko njengeengulani zangaphandle msinya ngendlela abangakghona ngayo.
Abomma abazithweleko abasebujameni obuphezulu bobungozi balulekwa bona baye emitholapilo yabazithweleko njalo.
Abomma abanesidisi esiyingozi ekulu bayeleliswa ukukhambela amatlinigi aqalene nesidisi weenguli zangaphandle njalo. 
Abomma abanokuzithwala okuyingozi balulekwa bona bakhambele amatlinigi wabazithweleko njengeengulani zangaphandle msinya ngendlela abangakghona ngayo.
Abomma abazithweleko abasebujameni obuphezulu bobungozi balulekwa bona baye emitholapilo yabazithweleko njalo.
Abomma abasengozini khulu lokha nabasidisi bayayeleliswa bona baye kanengana kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo. 
Nangabe uvakatjha kokuthoma endaweni yezamaphilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo bese kuvulwa nefolda. 
Nangabe usivakatjhi esivakatjhela kokuthoma ezikweni lezepilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo begodu bazokuvulela ifayili.
Nangabe kukokuthoma uvakatjhela kusikghonakalisi samaphilo, uzakukhonjelwa ukobana uzalise iforomo bese uzakuvulelwa ifolda.
Nayikuthi usivakatjhi esithomako esikghonakalisini sezamaphilo, uzakubawiwa ukuzalisa iforomo begodu kuzakuvulwa nefolda.  
Nangabe usivakatjhi esivakatjhela kokuthoma ezikweni lezepilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo begodu bazokuvulela ifayili.
Nangabe kukokuthoma uvakatjhela kusikghonakalisi samaphilo, uzakukhonjelwa ukobana uzalise iforomo bese uzakuvulelwa ifolda.
Nayikuthi usivakatjhi esithomako esikghonakalisini sezamaphilo, uzakubawiwa ukuzalisa iforomo begodu kuzakuvulwa nefolda.  
Nangabe uvakatjha kokuthoma endaweni yezamaphilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo bese kuvulwa nefolda. 
Nangabe kukokuthoma uvakatjhela kusikghonakalisi samaphilo, uzakukhonjelwa ukobana uzalise iforomo bese uzakuvulelwa ifolda.
Nayikuthi usivakatjhi esithomako esikghonakalisini sezamaphilo, uzakubawiwa ukuzalisa iforomo begodu kuzakuvulwa nefolda.  
Nangabe uvakatjha kokuthoma endaweni yezamaphilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo bese kuvulwa nefolda. 
Nangabe usivakatjhi esivakatjhela kokuthoma ezikweni lezepilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo begodu bazokuvulela ifayili.
Nayikuthi usivakatjhi esithomako esikghonakalisini sezamaphilo, uzakubawiwa ukuzalisa iforomo begodu kuzakuvulwa nefolda.  
Nangabe uvakatjha kokuthoma endaweni yezamaphilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo bese kuvulwa nefolda. 
Nangabe usivakatjhi esivakatjhela kokuthoma ezikweni lezepilo, uzokukhonjelwa bona uzalise iforomo begodu bazokuvulela ifayili.
Nangabe kukokuthoma uvakatjhela kusikghonakalisi samaphilo, uzakukhonjelwa ukobana uzalise iforomo bese uzakuvulelwa ifolda.
Iza nomazisi wakho, nanyana ngiziphi iinhlahla ozisebenzisako kanye nekhadi letlinigi nofana lesibhedlela, nangabe wakhe watlolisa ngaphambilini. 
Yiza nencwadakho kamazisi, iinhlahla oziselako kanye nekarada lemtholapilo nofana isibhedlela, nangabe ukhe watlolisa.
Iza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, eminye neminye imitjhoga oyiselako nekarada letlinigi nanyana lesibhedlela, nangabe esikhathini esidlulileko bewuzitlolisile kusikghonakalisi.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yokuzazisa, esinye nesinye isihlahla osiselako kanye nekarada lakho letlinigi namkha lesibhedlela, nayikuthi sekhe wazitlolisa ngaphambilini esikghonakalisini. 
Yiza nencwadakho kamazisi, iinhlahla oziselako kanye nekarada lemtholapilo nofana isibhedlela, nangabe ukhe watlolisa.
Iza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, eminye neminye imitjhoga oyiselako nekarada letlinigi nanyana lesibhedlela, nangabe esikhathini esidlulileko bewuzitlolisile kusikghonakalisi.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yokuzazisa, esinye nesinye isihlahla osiselako kanye nekarada lakho letlinigi namkha lesibhedlela, nayikuthi sekhe wazitlolisa ngaphambilini esikghonakalisini. 
Iza nomazisi wakho, nanyana ngiziphi iinhlahla ozisebenzisako kanye nekhadi letlinigi nofana lesibhedlela, nangabe wakhe watlolisa ngaphambilini. 
Iza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, eminye neminye imitjhoga oyiselako nekarada letlinigi nanyana lesibhedlela, nangabe esikhathini esidlulileko bewuzitlolisile kusikghonakalisi.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yokuzazisa, esinye nesinye isihlahla osiselako kanye nekarada lakho letlinigi namkha lesibhedlela, nayikuthi sekhe wazitlolisa ngaphambilini esikghonakalisini. 
Iza nomazisi wakho, nanyana ngiziphi iinhlahla ozisebenzisako kanye nekhadi letlinigi nofana lesibhedlela, nangabe wakhe watlolisa ngaphambilini. 
Yiza nencwadakho kamazisi, iinhlahla oziselako kanye nekarada lemtholapilo nofana isibhedlela, nangabe ukhe watlolisa.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yokuzazisa, esinye nesinye isihlahla osiselako kanye nekarada lakho letlinigi namkha lesibhedlela, nayikuthi sekhe wazitlolisa ngaphambilini esikghonakalisini. 
Iza nomazisi wakho, nanyana ngiziphi iinhlahla ozisebenzisako kanye nekhadi letlinigi nofana lesibhedlela, nangabe wakhe watlolisa ngaphambilini. 
Yiza nencwadakho kamazisi, iinhlahla oziselako kanye nekarada lemtholapilo nofana isibhedlela, nangabe ukhe watlolisa.
Iza nencwadi yakho kamazisi, eminye neminye imitjhoga oyiselako nekarada letlinigi nanyana lesibhedlela, nangabe esikhathini esidlulileko bewuzitlolisile kusikghonakalisi.
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi obuncani kulawulwa kuma-MOUs (amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ubungozi obungakancami bokuzithwala bulawulwa kuma-MOU (amaziko wokubelethisa alawulwa bomma ababelethisako emphakathini nabatlhogomela iingulani) eendaweni ezimadorobha, bese eembhedlela ezincani kanye nemitholapilweni yekhaya eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba sidisi okunganazo iingozi kuphathwa kuma-MOU (kumaziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo) eendaweni zemakhaya, nakumasathelayidi begodu nematlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba  sidisi okunganangozi khulu kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunidi wokubelethisa aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukwenzela iingulani ezifuna itlhogomelo lesizo lekhaya elijayelekileko) eendaweni zemadorobheni, kanye nakumasathelayithi nakumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Ubungozi obungakancami bokuzithwala bulawulwa kuma-MOU (amaziko wokubelethisa alawulwa bomma ababelethisako emphakathini nabatlhogomela iingulani) eendaweni ezimadorobha, bese eembhedlela ezincani kanye nemitholapilweni yekhaya eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba sidisi okunganazo iingozi kuphathwa kuma-MOU (kumaziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo) eendaweni zemakhaya, nakumasathelayidi begodu nematlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba  sidisi okunganangozi khulu kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunidi wokubelethisa aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukwenzela iingulani ezifuna itlhogomelo lesizo lekhaya elijayelekileko) eendaweni zemadorobheni, kanye nakumasathelayithi nakumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi obuncani kulawulwa kuma-MOUs (amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba sidisi okunganazo iingozi kuphathwa kuma-MOU (kumaziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo) eendaweni zemakhaya, nakumasathelayidi begodu nematlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba  sidisi okunganangozi khulu kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunidi wokubelethisa aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukwenzela iingulani ezifuna itlhogomelo lesizo lekhaya elijayelekileko) eendaweni zemadorobheni, kanye nakumasathelayithi nakumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi obuncani kulawulwa kuma-MOUs (amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ubungozi obungakancami bokuzithwala bulawulwa kuma-MOU (amaziko wokubelethisa alawulwa bomma ababelethisako emphakathini nabatlhogomela iingulani) eendaweni ezimadorobha, bese eembhedlela ezincani kanye nemitholapilweni yekhaya eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba  sidisi okunganangozi khulu kulawulwa kuma-MOU (amayunidi wokubelethisa aphethwe babelethisi emphakathini ukwenzela iingulani ezifuna itlhogomelo lesizo lekhaya elijayelekileko) eendaweni zemadorobheni, kanye nakumasathelayithi nakumatlinigi wemakhiwo eendaweni zemakhaya. 
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi obuncani kulawulwa kuma-MOUs (amaziko wokubelethela aphethwe babelethisi emiphakathini enzelwe iingulani ezifuna itjhejo lokuthoma) eendaweni ezimadorobha, kanye nematlinigi amasathalayithi namatlinigi wasafuthi eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ubungozi obungakancami bokuzithwala bulawulwa kuma-MOU (amaziko wokubelethisa alawulwa bomma ababelethisako emphakathini nabatlhogomela iingulani) eendaweni ezimadorobha, bese eembhedlela ezincani kanye nemitholapilweni yekhaya eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuba sidisi okunganazo iingozi kuphathwa kuma-MOU (kumaziko wokubelethisa aphethwe bodorhodera ababelethisako emphakathini mayelana netlhogomelo leengulani elisisekelo lezamaphilo) eendaweni zemakhaya, nakumasathelayidi begodu nematlinigi akhiweko eendaweni zemakhaya.
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zeemfunda neembhedlela ezikuleveli yesithathu. 
Ubungozi obuphezulu bokuzithwala bulawulwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezisemadorobheni neemfundeni zemakhaya neembhedlela ezikulu.
Ukuba sidisi okuyingozi khulu kuphathwa kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo.
Ukuba sidisi okunengozi khulu kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zemakhaya zeemfunda kanye neembhedlela eziqale ubulwele obuthileko eengulaneni zangaphakathi. 
Ubungozi obuphezulu bokuzithwala bulawulwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezisemadorobheni neemfundeni zemakhaya neembhedlela ezikulu.
Ukuba sidisi okuyingozi khulu kuphathwa kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo.
Ukuba sidisi okunengozi khulu kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zemakhaya zeemfunda kanye neembhedlela eziqale ubulwele obuthileko eengulaneni zangaphakathi. 
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zeemfunda neembhedlela ezikuleveli yesithathu. 
Ukuba sidisi okuyingozi khulu kuphathwa kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo.
Ukuba sidisi okunengozi khulu kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zemakhaya zeemfunda kanye neembhedlela eziqale ubulwele obuthileko eengulaneni zangaphakathi. 
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zeemfunda neembhedlela ezikuleveli yesithathu. 
Ubungozi obuphezulu bokuzithwala bulawulwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezisemadorobheni neemfundeni zemakhaya neembhedlela ezikulu.
Ukuba sidisi okunengozi khulu kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zemakhaya zeemfunda kanye neembhedlela eziqale ubulwele obuthileko eengulaneni zangaphakathi. 
Ukuzithwala okunobungozi kulawulwa ematlinigi weengulani zangaphandle eendaweni zemadorobheni kanye neembhedlela zeemfunda neembhedlela ezikuleveli yesithathu. 
Ubungozi obuphezulu bokuzithwala bulawulwa emitholapilweni yabazithweleko eseembhedlela ezisemadorobheni neemfundeni zemakhaya neembhedlela ezikulu.
Ukuba sidisi okuyingozi khulu kuphathwa kumatlinigi wabomma abasidisi okungalalwa kiwo.

Ihlelo eliHlanganisiweko lokoNdleka
IHlelo lezaKhamzimba eliHlanganisiweko
Ihlelo lokOndleka eliHlanganisiweko
IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla

Ihlelo lokOndleka eliHlanganisiweko
IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla
Ihlelo eliHlanganisiweko lokoNdleka

IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla
Ihlelo eliHlanganisiweko lokoNdleka
IHlelo lezaKhamzimba eliHlanganisiweko
IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla
Ihlelo eliHlanganisiweko lokoNdleka
IHlelo lezaKhamzimba eliHlanganisiweko
Ihlelo lokOndleka eliHlanganisiweko
IHlelo eliHlanganisiweko lokoNdleka (INP) linqophe ukuthuthukisa ubujamo bokondleka kwabo boke abantu abahlala ephrovinsini yeTjingalanga Kapa. 
IHlelo lezaKhamzimba eliHlanganisiweko (i-INP) lihlose ekuthuthukiseni ubujamo bezakhamzimba kibo boke abantu abahlala esifundeni seTjhingalanga Kapa.
Ihlelo lokOndleka eliHlanganisiweko (i-INP) ihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bokondleka babo boke abantu abahlala kuphrovinsi ye-Western Cape.
IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla (okuyi-INP) lihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bezokondla babo boke abantu bephrovinsi ye-Western Cape.
IHlelo lezaKhamzimba eliHlanganisiweko (i-INP) lihlose ekuthuthukiseni ubujamo bezakhamzimba kibo boke abantu abahlala esifundeni seTjhingalanga Kapa.
Ihlelo lokOndleka eliHlanganisiweko (i-INP) ihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bokondleka babo boke abantu abahlala kuphrovinsi ye-Western Cape.
IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla (okuyi-INP) lihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bezokondla babo boke abantu bephrovinsi ye-Western Cape.
IHlelo eliHlanganisiweko lokoNdleka (INP) linqophe ukuthuthukisa ubujamo bokondleka kwabo boke abantu abahlala ephrovinsini yeTjingalanga Kapa. 
Ihlelo lokOndleka eliHlanganisiweko (i-INP) ihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bokondleka babo boke abantu abahlala kuphrovinsi ye-Western Cape.
IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla (okuyi-INP) lihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bezokondla babo boke abantu bephrovinsi ye-Western Cape.

IHlelo eliFaka koke lokOndla (okuyi-INP) lihlose ukwenza ngcono ubujamo bezokondla babo boke abantu bephrovinsi ye-Western Cape.

Khuyini ukungondleki?

Khuyini ukungondleki?

Kutjho ukuthini ukungadli ngefanelo?

Kutjho ukuthini ukungadli ngefanelo?
Kutjho ukuthini ukungondleki?
Ukungondleki kuyikinga ekulu eSewula Afrika begodu kungokhunye okubangela amagulo ebantwaneni nokuhlongakala kwabo. 
Ukungadli ngefanelo yinto emraro eSewula Afrika begodu ngunobangela omkhulu obangela ukugula nokufa kwabantwana.
Ukungondleki kumraro omkhulu eSewula Afrika begodu kungenye yezinto ezikulu ezibangela ukugula kwabentwana kanye nokuhlongakala.
Ukungondleki mraro omkhulu eSewula Afrika begodu ngomunye wabonobangela abakhulu ekuguleni kwabantwana abancani kanye nokuhlongakala. 
Ukungadli ngefanelo yinto emraro eSewula Afrika begodu ngunobangela omkhulu obangela ukugula nokufa kwabantwana.
Ukungondleki kumraro omkhulu eSewula Afrika begodu kungenye yezinto ezikulu ezibangela ukugula kwabentwana kanye nokuhlongakala.
Ukungondleki mraro omkhulu eSewula Afrika begodu ngomunye wabonobangela abakhulu ekuguleni kwabantwana abancani kanye nokuhlongakala.

Ukungondleki mraro omkhulu eSewula Afrika begodu ngomunye wabonobangela abakhulu ekuguleni kwabantwana abancani kanye nokuhlongakala. 
Ukungondleki kuyikinga ekulu eSewula Afrika begodu kungokhunye okubangela amagulo ebantwaneni nokuhlongakala kwabo. 
Ukungadli ngefanelo yinto emraro eSewula Afrika begodu ngunobangela omkhulu obangela ukugula nokufa kwabantwana.
Ukungondleki kumraro omkhulu eSewula Afrika begodu kungenye yezinto ezikulu ezibangela ukugula kwabentwana kanye nokuhlongakala.
Kulinganiswa bona abantwana abayi-30% beSewula Afrika barhonodekile ngebanga lokungadli kuhle eminyakeni yokuthoma yamaphilo wabo.
Kulinganiselwa bona pheze ama-30% wabantwana bamaSewula Afrika abakhuli kuhle ngonobangela wokutlhayela kwezakhamzimba eminyakeni yokuthoma yokukhula.
Kunesilinganiso sokobana pheze amaphesende ama-30% wabentwana beSewula Afrika abakhuli kuhle ngesimanga  sokungadli ukudla okunepilo eminyakeni yokuthoma yamaphilo wabo.
Kulinganiswa bona pheze i-30% yabantwana beSewula Afrika iridile ngebanga lokutlhogeka kokondleka okufaneleko eminyakeni yokuthoma emaphilweni yayo. 
Kulinganiselwa bona pheze ama-30% wabantwana bamaSewula Afrika abakhuli kuhle ngonobangela wokutlhayela kwezakhamzimba eminyakeni yokuthoma yokukhula.
Kunesilinganiso sokobana pheze amaphesende ama-30% wabentwana beSewula Afrika abakhuli kuhle ngesimanga  sokungadli ukudla okunepilo eminyakeni yokuthoma yamaphilo wabo.
Kulinganiswa bona pheze i-30% yabantwana beSewula Afrika iridile ngebanga lokutlhogeka kokondleka okufaneleko eminyakeni yokuthoma emaphilweni yayo. 
Kulinganiswa bona abantwana abayi-30% beSewula Afrika barhonodekile ngebanga lokungadli kuhle eminyakeni yokuthoma yamaphilo wabo.
Kunesilinganiso sokobana pheze amaphesende ama-30% wabentwana beSewula Afrika abakhuli kuhle ngesimanga  sokungadli ukudla okunepilo eminyakeni yokuthoma yamaphilo wabo.

Ukungadli kuhle, ukugula, ukugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukulimala okukhulu zizinto eziphuma phambili ezibonobangela bakhonokho bokungondleki. 
Ukungadli ukudla okwaneleko, ukugula nobujamo bengqondo obubandakanya ukugandeleleka/ ithroma zizinto ezibangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Ukudla  ukudla okungakeneli,  ubulwele kanye nokugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukuzwa ubuhlungu kuzizinto eziqakathekileko ezibangela ukungondleki.
Ukungadli ngokwaneleko, ukugula negandelelo lezomkhumbulo ngebanga lezehlalakuhle nomkhumbulo/ukulimala khulu bonobangela abakhulu bokutlhogeka kokondleka. 
Ukungadli ukudla okwaneleko, ukugula nobujamo bengqondo obubandakanya ukugandeleleka/ ithroma zizinto ezibangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Ukudla  ukudla okungakeneli,  ubulwele kanye nokugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukuzwa ubuhlungu kuzizinto eziqakathekileko ezibangela ukungondleki.
Ukungadli ngokwaneleko, ukugula negandelelo lezomkhumbulo ngebanga lezehlalakuhle nomkhumbulo/ukulimala khulu bonobangela abakhulu bokutlhogeka kokondleka. 
Ukungadli kuhle, ukugula, ukugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukulimala okukhulu zizinto eziphuma phambili ezibonobangela bakhonokho bokungondleki. 
Ukudla  ukudla okungakeneli,  ubulwele kanye nokugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukuzwa ubuhlungu kuzizinto eziqakathekileko ezibangela ukungondleki.
Ukungadli ngokwaneleko, ukugula negandelelo lezomkhumbulo ngebanga lezehlalakuhle nomkhumbulo/ukulimala khulu bonobangela abakhulu bokutlhogeka kokondleka. 
Ukungadli kuhle, ukugula, ukugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukulimala okukhulu zizinto eziphuma phambili ezibonobangela bakhonokho bokungondleki. 
Ukungadli ukudla okwaneleko, ukugula nobujamo bengqondo obubandakanya ukugandeleleka/ ithroma zizinto ezibangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Ukungadli ngokwaneleko, ukugula negandelelo lezomkhumbulo ngebanga lezehlalakuhle nomkhumbulo/ukulimala khulu bonobangela abakhulu bokutlhogeka kokondleka. 
Ukungadli kuhle, ukugula, ukugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukulimala okukhulu zizinto eziphuma phambili ezibonobangela bakhonokho bokungondleki. 
Ukungadli ukudla okwaneleko, ukugula nobujamo bengqondo obubandakanya ukugandeleleka/ ithroma zizinto ezibangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Ukudla  ukudla okungakeneli,  ubulwele kanye nokugandeleleka ngokomkhumbulo/ukuzwa ubuhlungu kuzizinto eziqakathekileko ezibangela ukungondleki.
Ubuchaka nokutlhaga bonobangela abasisekelo abangezelela ukungondleki. 
Umtlhago nokutlhayela kweensetjenziswa bonobangela abasisekelo ababangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Umtlhago nokungabikhona kwemithombo kumatshwayo asisekelo enza bona kube nokungondleki.
Umtlhago nokutlhogeka kwemithombo zizinto ezisisekelo ezinesandla ekutlhogekeni kokondleka.
Umtlhago nokutlhayela kweensetjenziswa bonobangela abasisekelo ababangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Umtlhago nokungabikhona kwemithombo kumatshwayo asisekelo enza bona kube nokungondleki.
Umtlhago nokutlhogeka kwemithombo zizinto ezisisekelo ezinesandla ekutlhogekeni kokondleka.
Ubuchaka nokutlhaga bonobangela abasisekelo abangezelela ukungondleki. 
Umtlhago nokungabikhona kwemithombo kumatshwayo asisekelo enza bona kube nokungondleki.
Umtlhago nokutlhogeka kwemithombo zizinto ezisisekelo ezinesandla ekutlhogekeni kokondleka.

Umtlhago nokutlhayela kweensetjenziswa bonobangela abasisekelo ababangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Umtlhago nokutlhogeka kwemithombo zizinto ezisisekelo ezinesandla ekutlhogekeni kokondleka.
Ubuchaka nokutlhaga bonobangela abasisekelo abangezelela ukungondleki. 
Umtlhago nokutlhayela kweensetjenziswa bonobangela abasisekelo ababangela ukungadli ngefanelo.
Umtlhago nokungabikhona kwemithombo kumatshwayo asisekelo enza bona kube nokungondleki.
I-INP izama ngeendlela ezinengi ezihlukileko ukulwisana nalobu ubulwele.
I-INP izama ukurarulula unorhatjhekile lo ngeendlela ezinengi.
I-INP izama nokuqalana nobulwele oburhatjheka ngeendlela ezinengi. 
I-INP ilinga ukuqalana nalobu bulwele obuthulileko ngeendlela ezimbalwa. 
I-INP izama ukurarulula unorhatjhekile lo ngeendlela ezinengi.
I-INP izama nokuqalana nobulwele oburhatjheka ngeendlela ezinengi. 
I-INP ilinga ukuqalana nalobu bulwele obuthulileko ngeendlela ezimbalwa. 
I-INP izama ngeendlela ezinengi ezihlukileko ukulwisana nalobu ubulwele.
I-INP izama nokuqalana nobulwele oburhatjheka ngeendlela ezinengi. 
I-INP ilinga ukuqalana nalobu bulwele obuthulileko ngeendlela ezimbalwa. 
I-INP izama ngeendlela ezinengi ezihlukileko ukulwisana nalobu ubulwele.
I-INP izama ukurarulula unorhatjhekile lo ngeendlela ezinengi.
I-INP ilinga ukuqalana nalobu bulwele obuthulileko ngeendlela ezimbalwa. 
I-INP izama ngeendlela ezinengi ezihlukileko ukulwisana nalobu ubulwele.
I-INP izama ukurarulula unorhatjhekile lo ngeendlela ezinengi.
I-INP izama nokuqalana nobulwele oburhatjheka ngeendlela ezinengi. 
Iintlhawuselelo zabantwana
Okungangezelela ukudla kwabantwana
Iingezelelo zabentwana
Iinzaliselelo zabantwana 
Okungangezelela ukudla kwabantwana
Iingezelelo zabentwana
Iinzaliselelo zabantwana 
Iintlhawuselelo zabantwana
Iingezelelo zabentwana
Iinzaliselelo zabantwana 
Iintlhawuselelo zabantwana
Okungangezelela ukudla kwabantwana
Iinzaliselelo zabantwana 
Iintlhawuselelo zabantwana
Okungangezelela ukudla kwabantwana
Iingezelelo zabentwana
Etjhejweni lezamaphilo leleveli yokuthoma abantwana abahlolwako bese bakhonjwa njengalabo abangadli kuhle (lokhu kufakahlangana abantwana nabantu abadala abonomulwana we-HIV nalabo abanesifuba  se-TB) bazokunikelwa ukudla okutlhawuselelako okufakahlangana ipuphu efakwe amavithamini namaminerali kanye nesiselo esipha amandla. 
Eleveleni letjhejo lezamaphilo abantwana abahloliweko bebakhonjwa njengabangakondleki kuhle (lokhu kufaka hlangana abantwana nabantu abakhulu ne-HIV nabanesifuba) bazokunikelwa ingezelelo lokudla elifaka hlangana ipuphu eneenthako kanye neenselo eziphana amandla.
Ezingeni elisisekelo setlhogomelo lezamaphilo abentwana abahlolwako begodu kwafunyanwa bona abanapilo (lokhu kufaka hlangana abentwana  nabantu abadala  aba-HIV  phosethivu begodu abanobulwele bamaphaphu) bazakunikelwa iingezelela-kudla kufakwe hlangana ipuphu enamandla kanye nesiselo esinikela amandla.
Ezingeni letlhogomelo lezamaphilo elisisekelo abantwana abahlolwa bebafaniswe njengabangakondleki kuhle (lokhu kufaka abantwana nabantu abadala abanomulwana we-HIV kanye ne-tuberculosis) bazakunikelwa iinzaliselelo zokudla kufaka ipuphu engezwe ngezakhamzimba kanye nesiselo esinamandla khulu.  
Eleveleni letjhejo lezamaphilo abantwana abahloliweko bebakhonjwa njengabangakondleki kuhle (lokhu kufaka hlangana abantwana nabantu abakhulu ne-HIV nabanesifuba) bazokunikelwa ingezelelo lokudla elifaka hlangana ipuphu eneenthako kanye neenselo eziphana amandla.
Ezingeni elisisekelo setlhogomelo lezamaphilo abentwana abahlolwako begodu kwafunyanwa bona abanapilo (lokhu kufaka hlangana abentwana  nabantu abadala  aba-HIV  phosethivu begodu abanobulwele bamaphaphu) bazakunikelwa iingezelela-kudla kufakwe hlangana ipuphu enamandla kanye nesiselo esinikela amandla.
Ezingeni letlhogomelo lezamaphilo elisisekelo abantwana abahlolwa bebafaniswe njengabangakondleki kuhle (lokhu kufaka abantwana nabantu abadala abanomulwana we-HIV kanye ne-tuberculosis) bazakunikelwa iinzaliselelo zokudla kufaka ipuphu engezwe ngezakhamzimba kanye nesiselo esinamandla khulu.  
Etjhejweni lezamaphilo leleveli yokuthoma abantwana abahlolwako bese bakhonjwa njengalabo abangadli kuhle (lokhu kufakahlangana abantwana nabantu abadala abonomulwana we-HIV nalabo abanesifuba  se-TB) bazokunikelwa ukudla okutlhawuselelako okufakahlangana ipuphu efakwe amavithamini namaminerali kanye nesiselo esipha amandla. 
Ezingeni elisisekelo setlhogomelo lezamaphilo abentwana abahlolwako begodu kwafunyanwa bona abanapilo (lokhu kufaka hlangana abentwana  nabantu abadala  aba-HIV  phosethivu begodu abanobulwele bamaphaphu) bazakunikelwa iingezelela-kudla kufakwe hlangana ipuphu enamandla kanye nesiselo esinikela amandla.
Ezingeni letlhogomelo lezamaphilo elisisekelo abantwana abahlolwa bebafaniswe njengabangakondleki kuhle (lokhu kufaka abantwana nabantu abadala abanomulwana we-HIV kanye ne-tuberculosis) bazakunikelwa iinzaliselelo zokudla kufaka ipuphu engezwe ngezakhamzimba kanye nesiselo esinamandla khulu.  
Etjhejweni lezamaphilo leleveli yokuthoma abantwana abahlolwako bese bakhonjwa njengalabo abangadli kuhle (lokhu kufakahlangana abantwana nabantu abadala abonomulwana we-HIV nalabo abanesifuba  se-TB) bazokunikelwa ukudla okutlhawuselelako okufakahlangana ipuphu efakwe amavithamini namaminerali kanye nesiselo esipha amandla. 
Eleveleni letjhejo lezamaphilo abantwana abahloliweko bebakhonjwa njengabangakondleki kuhle (lokhu kufaka hlangana abantwana nabantu abakhulu ne-HIV nabanesifuba) bazokunikelwa ingezelelo lokudla elifaka hlangana ipuphu eneenthako kanye neenselo eziphana amandla.

Iintlhawuselelo zinikelwa amakhastama akhonjiweko ngokwesilinganiso eziwafaneleko. 
Iingezelelo zokudla zinikelwa ematlayendini akhonjiweko ngokuya ngokwemibandela ethize.
Iingezelela-kudla zinikelwa kilezongulani ezikhethiweko ngokwendlela ethileko.
Iinzaliselelo zinikelwa amatlayenti ngokuya kwendlela ethileko.
Iingezelelo zokudla zinikelwa ematlayendini akhonjiweko ngokuya ngokwemibandela ethize.
Iingezelela-kudla zinikelwa kilezongulani ezikhethiweko ngokwendlela ethileko.
Iinzaliselelo zinikelwa amatlayenti ngokuya kwendlela ethileko.

Iingezelela-kudla zinikelwa kilezongulani ezikhethiweko ngokwendlela ethileko.
Iinzaliselelo zinikelwa amatlayenti ngokuya kwendlela ethileko.

Iinzaliselelo zinikelwa amatlayenti ngokuya kwendlela ethileko.

Iingezelelo zokudla zinikelwa ematlayendini akhonjiweko ngokuya ngokwemibandela ethize.
Iingezelela-kudla zinikelwa kilezongulani ezikhethiweko ngokwendlela ethileko.
Abasebenzi bezamaphilo nabo bathoba umkhumbulo, banikela ilwazi nefundiso ngokudla okunepilo kanye neendlela ezinepilo zokulungisa ukudla. 
Abasebenzi bezepilo nabo baphana ngeenluleko zomkhumbulo, ilwazi nefundo mayelana nokudla okunepilo kanye nendlela ehlanzekileko yokwenza ukudla.
Abasebenzi bezamaphilo benza nokukhansela, ilwazi kanye nefundo emayelana nokudla okunepilo begodu neendlela ezinepilo zokwenza amalungiselelo wokudla.
Abasebenzi bezamaphilo godu banikela ngesizo lomkhumbulo, ilwazi nefundiso ngedayethi enepilo kanye nangeendlela ezinepilo khulu zokupheka ukudla.
Abasebenzi bezepilo nabo baphana ngeenluleko zomkhumbulo, ilwazi nefundo mayelana nokudla okunepilo kanye nendlela ehlanzekileko yokwenza ukudla.
Abasebenzi bezamaphilo benza nokukhansela, ilwazi kanye nefundo emayelana nokudla okunepilo begodu neendlela ezinepilo zokwenza amalungiselelo wokudla.

Abeluleki ngokudla nabo banikela ngomsebenzi okhethekileko emphakathini. 
Izazi zemithetho yokudla nazo zinikela ngemisebenzi yokululeka umphakathi.
Isazi semithetho yokudla sinikela godu nangemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini. 
Izazi ngedayethi godu zinikela ngemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini. 
Izazi zemithetho yokudla nazo zinikela ngemisebenzi yokululeka umphakathi.
Isazi semithetho yokudla sinikela godu nangemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini. 
Izazi ngedayethi godu zinikela ngemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini. 
Abeluleki ngokudla nabo banikela ngomsebenzi okhethekileko emphakathini. 
Isazi semithetho yokudla sinikela godu nangemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini. 
Izazi ngedayethi godu zinikela ngemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini.

Izazi zemithetho yokudla nazo zinikela ngemisebenzi yokululeka umphakathi.
Izazi ngedayethi godu zinikela ngemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini. 
Abeluleki ngokudla nabo banikela ngomsebenzi okhethekileko emphakathini. 
Izazi zemithetho yokudla nazo zinikela ngemisebenzi yokululeka umphakathi.
Isazi semithetho yokudla sinikela godu nangemisebenzi ekhethekileko emphakathini.

Ukumunyisa 
Ukumunyisa
Ukumunyisa
Ukumunyisa ibisi lebele
Ukusiza ekulwisaneni nokungondleki ebantwaneni abancani, abasebenzi bezamaphilo bakhuthaza abafazi bona bamunyise abantababo bebabe neenyanga ezisithandathu zobudala bese ngemva kwalokho baragela phambili ngokumunyisa ukungezelela ekudleni okhunye okuzobe kudliwa mntwana bekube lapho umntwana aba neminyaka emibili. 
Ukulwisana nokungondleki kuhle emntwaneni omncani, abasebenzi bezepilo bakhuthaza abomma bona bamunyise abantwababo beze bafinyelele eenyangeni eziyisithandathu zobudala emva kwalokho baragele phambili nokumunyisa kodwana abantwana baphiwe ukudla okuthambileko, umntwana aze abe neminyaka emibili yobudala.
Ukusiza ukulwisana nokungondleki lokha umntwana nakasesemncani abasebenzi bezamaphilo bakhuthaza abomma ukobana bamunyise abentwana babo ukuyokufika eenyangeni ezisithandathu zobudala bese ngemva kwalokho baragele phambili  nokumunyisa ukungezelela ukwethulwa kweengezeleli-kudla okufaneleko, bekufike lapha umntwana aba neminyaka emibili ubudala.
Ukusiza ukuphelisa ukungondleki ebantwaneni abasakhulako, abasebenzi bezamaphilo bakhuthaza abomma ukumunyisa abantwana babo ngaphandle kokubapha okhunye bekufike lapho baneenyanga ezisithandathu begodu baragele phambili nokumunyisa phezu kokufaka ukudla okhunye kokungezelela, bekube kulapho umntwana aneminyaka emibili. 
Ukulwisana nokungondleki kuhle emntwaneni omncani, abasebenzi bezepilo bakhuthaza abomma bona bamunyise abantwababo beze bafinyelele eenyangeni eziyisithandathu zobudala emva kwalokho baragele phambili nokumunyisa kodwana abantwana baphiwe ukudla okuthambileko, umntwana aze abe neminyaka emibili yobudala.

Ezinye iindlela zokupha ukudla kukhulunywa ngazo nabomma abanomulwana we-HIV. 
Ezinye iindlela zokupha umntwana zihlathululwa nabomma aba-HIV phosethivu.
Ezinye iindlela zokondla kucocisanwa ngazo nabomma aba-HIV phosethivu.
Okhunye ukukhetha kokufunza kukhulunywa ngakho nabomma abanomulwana we-HIV. 
Ezinye iindlela zokupha umntwana zihlathululwa nabomma aba-HIV phosethivu.
Ezinye iindlela zokondla kucocisanwa ngazo nabomma aba-HIV phosethivu.

IsiBhedlela i-Vredendal kanye ne-Groote Schuur Maternity Centre ziimBhedlela eziHlangabezana neendingo zabaNtwana ephrovinsini ukuya ngeJima leemBhedlela ezilungele aBantwana.
IsiBhedlela seVredendal neZiko lokuBelethisa leGroote Schuur ziimBhedlela ezitjheja abaNtwana kuhle ezisesifundeni ngokuya ngokweSisungulo seemBhedlela eziTjheja abaNtwana.
IsiBhedlela se-Vredendal neSentha yokuBelethisa ye-Groote Schuur ziimBhedlela zabeNtwana ezinoMusa ephrovinsini ngokuya kwesisungulo seembhedlela zabentwana. 
IsiBhedlela se-Vredendal kanye neSentha yobuMma ye-Groote Schuur ziimBhedlela eziQalelela iinDingo zabaNtwana ephrovinsini ngokuya kwesiSungulo sesiBhedlela sokuQalelela iinDingo zabaNtwana. 
IsiBhedlela seVredendal neZiko lokuBelethisa leGroote Schuur ziimBhedlela ezitjheja abaNtwana kuhle ezisesifundeni ngokuya ngokweSisungulo seemBhedlela eziTjheja abaNtwana.
IsiBhedlela se-Vredendal neSentha yokuBelethisa ye-Groote Schuur ziimBhedlela zabeNtwana ezinoMusa ephrovinsini ngokuya kwesisungulo seembhedlela zabentwana. 
IsiBhedlela se-Vredendal kanye neSentha yobuMma ye-Groote Schuur ziimBhedlela eziQalelela iinDingo zabaNtwana ephrovinsini ngokuya kwesiSungulo sesiBhedlela sokuQalelela iinDingo zabaNtwana.

Ukutjheja ukukhula
Ukwelusa ukukhula
Ukutjheja ukukhula
Ukutjheja ukukhula
Ukwelusa ukukhula
Ukutjhejwa kokukhula
Ukutjheja ukukhula
Ukwelusa ukukhula
Ukutjhejwa kokukhula
Ukutjheja ukukhula
Ukwelusa ukukhula
Ukutjhejwa kokukhula
Ukutjheja ukukhula
Ukutjheja ukukhula
Boke abantwana bayakalwa njalo njengengcenye yehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula, ekusitjengisi esiqakathekileko sokuthi umntwana uyakhula.
Abantwana bakalwa njalo njengehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula kwabo, isitjengiso esiyelelisa bona umntwana uyakhula na.
Boke abentwana bayakalwa ngaso  soke isikhathi njengengcenye yehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula, okusitjengiso sokobana umntwana uyakhula.
Boke abantwana balinganiswa ubudisi njalo njengengcenye yehlelo lokweluswa kokukhula, okusitjengiso esizwelako sokobana ingabe umntwana ukhula kuhle namkha njani.  
Abantwana bakalwa njalo njengehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula kwabo, isitjengiso esiyelelisa bona umntwana uyakhula na.
Boke abentwana bayakalwa ngaso  soke isikhathi njengengcenye yehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula, okusitjengiso sokobana umntwana uyakhula.
Boke abantwana balinganiswa ubudisi njalo njengengcenye yehlelo lokweluswa kokukhula, okusitjengiso esizwelako sokobana ingabe umntwana ukhula kuhle namkha njani.  
Boke abantwana bayakalwa njalo njengengcenye yehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula, ekusitjengisi esiqakathekileko sokuthi umntwana uyakhula.
Boke abentwana bayakalwa ngaso  soke isikhathi njengengcenye yehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula, okusitjengiso sokobana umntwana uyakhula.

Abantwana bakalwa njalo njengehlelo lokutjheja ukukhula kwabo, isitjengiso esiyelelisa bona umntwana uyakhula na.

Abonobangela bokwehla emzimbeni bayaqalwa, okufana namalwele athelelanako, ukutlhayela kokudla ekhaya kanye nokuliselelwa komntwana. 
Abonobangela bokwehla emzimbeni batjhejwa njengamalwele athathelanako, ukutlhayela kokudla ekhaya nokungatjhejwa komntwana. 
Abonobangela abangabonakaliko bokwehla komzimba baqalelelwa  njengamalwele athelelanako, ukutlhayela kokudla ekhaya nokungatjhejwa komntwana. 
Abonobangela bokwehla kobudisi bayatjhejwa okufana namalwelwe athathelwanako, ukutlhayela kokudla ekhaya nokungatjhejwa kwabantana. 
Abonobangela bokwehla emzimbeni batjhejwa njengamalwele athathelanako, ukutlhayela kokudla ekhaya nokungatjhejwa komntwana.

Amalwele athathelanako adlala indima ekulu ekungadlini kuhle begodu amalwele la alatjhwa etjhejweni lezamaphilo leveli yephrayimari. 
Amalwele athathelanako adlala indima ekulu ekungondlekeni kuhle begodu amalwele la angena erhelweni lokutjhejwa lezamaphilo.
Amalwele athelelanako adlala indima ekulu ekutlhayeleni kwezakhamzimba  begodu amalwele la alatjhwa ezingeni elisisekelo lokutlhogonyelwa kwezamaphilo.
Amalwelwe athathelwanako adlala indima ekulu ekungondlekeni begodu amalwelwe la alatjhwa ezingeni letlhogomelo lezamaphilo elisisekelo.

Ubulwele bokurhuda butjhidelene khulu nokungakahlanzeki kwebhoduluko (isanithari nokuphakelwa kwamanzi) begodu nokungadli kuhle kwesana, okungalenza bona libe sengozini  yokuthi lirhude isikhathi eside.
Ubulwele bokurhuda bubandamelene khulu nezokuhlanzeka okungasikuhle kwebhoduluko (ihlwengiso nesabaliso lamanzi) kanye nokungadli kuhle komntwana, okwenza bona umntwana lo athuwelele ngokurhuda.
Ubulwele bokuthulula bukhambisana khulu nebhoduluko elingakahlwengeki (ihlwengiso  nokuphakelwa kwamanzi)  ukwehla komzimba nanyana ukungakondleki kwesana, ekukhambeni kwesikhathi okwenza bona lizithole lithulula khulu begodu lithulula isikhathi eside.
Ubulwelwe bokuthulula buhlobaniswa nokungahlanzeki kwebhoduluko (ukuthuthwa kwesila ngamanzi nokuphakelwa kwamanzi) kanye nokungondleki kuhle namkha okunganamandla kwesana, okungalenza libe sengozini ekulu yokuthulula okungapheliko godu nokumbi. 
Ubulwele bokurhuda bubandamelene khulu nezokuhlanzeka okungasikuhle kwebhoduluko (ihlwengiso nesabaliso lamanzi) kanye nokungadli kuhle komntwana, okwenza bona umntwana lo athuwelele ngokurhuda.

Ukuqeda umtlhago
Ukuphungula umtlhago
Imizi esahlelwe buchaka iyakhonjwa bese ithunyelwa kamanye wamahlelo karhulumende wokunciphisa ubuchaka. 
Imizi ehlaselwe mtlhago iyakhonjwa bese ithunyelwa ehlelweni lamahlelo wokuqeda umtlhago alawulwa mbuso.
Amakhaya atlhagako ayaqalwa begodu athathwe njengelinye lamahlelo wombuso wokuphungula umtlhago.
Amakhaya atlhagako ayafaniswa godu adluliselwa kwelinye lamahlelo wombuso wokupheliswa komtlhago.

Ukubakhona kokudla ngendlini kutjhejwa mahlangothi woke begodu ingenelelo nesekelo elifaneleko liyenziwa.
Ivikeleko lokudla lemizi lirarululwa ngokuhlanganyela begodu kunikelwa ngeendlela zokurarulula ezifaneleko.
Ivikeleko lokudla emakhaya litjhejwa ngokweengaba begodu kuba nokungena phakathi okufaneleko begodu nokunikelwa isekelo.
Ukubakhona kokudla emakhaya kulungiswa ngokweenkoro ezinengi begodu ukungenelela okufaneleko kanye nesekelo kuyanikelwa.
Ivikeleko lokudla lemizi lirarululwa ngokuhlanganyela begodu kunikelwa ngeendlela zokurarulula ezifaneleko.

Iingezelelo zamaVithamini
Iingezeleli zamavithamini

Iingezelelo zamaVithamini
Iingezelela-kudla ezimaVithamini
Ukulawula ukungabi nezakhamzimba ezifunekako yingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.  
Ukulawulwa kokutlhayela kwezakhamzimba ezincani kuyingcenye yomsebenzi oqakathekileko.
Ukulawula ukutlhogela kwezinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuyingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.
Ukulawula ukutlhogeka kwezakhamzimba ezincani yingcenye yomsebenzi. 
Ukulawulwa kokutlhayela kwezakhamzimba ezincani kuyingcenye yomsebenzi oqakathekileko.
Ukulawula ukutlhogela kwezinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuyingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.
Ukulawula ukutlhogeka kwezakhamzimba ezincani yingcenye yomsebenzi. 
Ukulawula ukungabi nezakhamzimba ezifunekako yingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.  
Ukulawula ukutlhogela kwezinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuyingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.
Ukulawula ukutlhogeka kwezakhamzimba ezincani yingcenye yomsebenzi. 
Ukulawula ukungabi nezakhamzimba ezifunekako yingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.  
Ukulawulwa kokutlhayela kwezakhamzimba ezincani kuyingcenye yomsebenzi oqakathekileko.
Ukulawula ukutlhogeka kwezakhamzimba ezincani yingcenye yomsebenzi. 
Ukulawula ukungabi nezakhamzimba ezifunekako yingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.  
Ukulawulwa kokutlhayela kwezakhamzimba ezincani kuyingcenye yomsebenzi oqakathekileko.
Ukulawula ukutlhogela kwezinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuyingcenye eqakathekileko yomsebenzi.
Izakhamzimba zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, atholakala ngobuncani ekudleni begodu aqakathekhe khulu ekubeni nepilo ehle. 
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala emthameni omncani wokudla begodu ziqakatheke khulu ekulawulweni kwepilo ehle.
Izinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuzizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini kanye namaminerali, atholakala ngamani amancani emzimbeni begodu aqakatheke khulu ekutjhejeni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala njengezinto ezincani ekudleni begodu ziqakathekile ekugcineni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala emthameni omncani wokudla begodu ziqakatheke khulu ekulawulweni kwepilo ehle.
Izinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuzizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini kanye namaminerali, atholakala ngamani amancani emzimbeni begodu aqakatheke khulu ekutjhejeni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala njengezinto ezincani ekudleni begodu ziqakathekile ekugcineni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, atholakala ngobuncani ekudleni begodu aqakathekhe khulu ekubeni nepilo ehle. 
Izinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuzizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini kanye namaminerali, atholakala ngamani amancani emzimbeni begodu aqakatheke khulu ekutjhejeni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala njengezinto ezincani ekudleni begodu ziqakathekile ekugcineni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, atholakala ngobuncani ekudleni begodu aqakathekhe khulu ekubeni nepilo ehle. 
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala emthameni omncani wokudla begodu ziqakatheke khulu ekulawulweni kwepilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala njengezinto ezincani ekudleni begodu ziqakathekile ekugcineni ipilo ehle.
Izakhamzimba zizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, atholakala ngobuncani ekudleni begodu aqakathekhe khulu ekubeni nepilo ehle. 
Izakhamzimba ezincani zizizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini namaminerali, ezitholakala emthameni omncani wokudla begodu ziqakatheke khulu ekulawulweni kwepilo ehle.
Izinto ezinengi ezinikela umzimba amandla kuzizinto zemvelo ezifana namavithamini kanye namaminerali, atholakala ngamani amancani emzimbeni begodu aqakatheke khulu ekutjhejeni ipilo ehle.
I-INP inikela ngesitlhawuselelo seVithamini A ebantwaneni abaqothelweko.
I-INP inikela ngengezelelo leVithamini A ebantwaneni abaqothelweko.
I-INP inikela iingezelela-kudla zeVithamini A ebantwaneni abaqothelweko.
I-INP inikela ngokungezelelwa kweVithamini A ebantwaneni abanqotjhiweko. 
I-INP inikela ngengezelelo leVithamini A ebantwaneni abaqothelweko.

Abantwana abanganayo iVithamini A bayehla emzimbeni, babhalelwe kukhula kuhle begodu kunekghonakalo yokuthi bangangenwa magulo bebahlongakale ngonobangela wamagulo layo. 
Abantwana abatlhayela ngeVithamini A bayehla emzimbeni,
Abentwana abanganayo iVithamini A umzimba wabo uyehla, bayabhalelwa kukhula ngendlela efaneleko begodu kungenzeka babe namathelelwano bese babulala ngiwo.
Abantwana abatlhoga iVithamini A balahlekelwa sisindo, babhalelwa kukhula kuhle begodu bangahle bangenwe malwelwe lula begodu bahlongakale. 
Abantwana abatlhayela ngeVithamini A bayehla emzimbeni,

Ukutlhayelelwa yiVithamini A godu kulimaza amehlo begodu kungomunye wabonobangela wokuphophala kwabantwana.
Ukutlhayela kweVithamini A nakho kulimaza amehlo begodu ngikho okungunobangela wokungasaboni ebantwaneni. 
Ukutlhoga iVithamini A kona nelihlo begodu kungunobangela omkhulu wokuphophala kwabentwana.
Ukutlhogeka kweVithamini A godu kumotjha amehlo begodu ngomunye wabonobangela bokuphophala hlangana nabantwana.

Abantwana abanobudisi obuphasi nababelethwako banikelwa amakhepsuli weVithamini A, aphakamisa ivikelomzimba begodu asiza nangetuthuko yokukhula komntwana. 
Abantwana abanobudisi obuphasi banikelwa amapilisi wamakhapsule weVithamini A, okungiwo akhuthaza irherho levikelomzimba begodu asiza ngokuthuthukiswa kokukhula komntwana.
Abentwana abakala phasi khulu nababelethwako banikelwa amapilisi weVithamini A, okungiwo akhuphula ihlelo lokukhuphuma umzimba ezifeni begodu asiza ukuthuthuka kokukhula komntwana.
Abantwana abanobudisi obungaphasi kobufaneleko banikelwa amakhepsuli weVithamini A, akhuthaza irherho lokuzivikela emalweleni begodu nasiza ukukhula kwabantwana.

Amasana wobudala obuthoma eenyangeni     e-6-11 anikelwa idosi yeVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukukhandela ukugula khulu. 
Amasana weenyanga ezisuka kwezisi-6 ukuya kwezili-11 asezwa ithosi linye leVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukuvikela ubulwele obuncamileko. 
Amasana asukela eenyangeni ezisi-6 ukuya kwezili-11 banikelwa idosi elilodwa leVithamini A  (100 000 IU) ukukhandela bona bangaguli khulu.  
Amasana asuka eenyangeni ezisi-6 ukuya kwezili-11 anikelwa isilinganiso sinye seVithamini A (okuyi-100 000 IU) ukukhandela amalwele amambi.

Abantwana abaneenyanga ezili-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu banikelwa idosi yinye   ye-200 000 IU eenyangeni ezili-12 bese banikelwa idosi ye-200 000 IU njalo eenyangeni ezisithandathu bebabe neminyaka emihlanu yobudala.
Abantwana ukusukela eenyangeni ezili-12 ukufikela eminyakeni emihlanu anikelwa ithosi linye le- 200 000 IU enyangeni ezili-12 njalo ngenyanga ezisithandathu bekufike eminyakeni emihlanu yobudala banikelwa ithosi linye le-200 000 IU.
Abentwana abasukela eenyangeni ezili-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu ubudala banikelwa idosi elilodwa le- 200 000 IU  nabaneenyanga ezili-12 bese ngemva kwalokho  banikelwa idosi le-200 000 IU qobe ziinyanga ezisithandathu bebabe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala. 
Abantwana abasuka eenyangeni ezili-12 ukuya eminyakeni emi-5 ubudala banikelwa isilinganiso se-200 000 IU nabaneenyanga ezili-12 kanye ne-200 000 IU njalo ngeenyanga ezisithandathu bekufike eminyakeni yobudala emihlanu.
