Kuhlekuhle iMemorandamu yokuZwisisa (i-MOU)  esizokungena kiyo ingasi kade namhlanjesi ehlangana nomNyango  welizwe wemiSebenzi yomPhakathi neDorobho leTshwane, kusiqiniseko sokubona ngelihlo linye bona kungathonywa kuphi.
Simemezelo sehloso yokusebenzisana ekuzijameleni nakumaphrokthi azokuzuzisa amahlangothi womabili.
Kusiqinisekiso sesibopho sokuhlanganyela iinsungulo namaphrojekthi asiza ngokufanako eenhlanganweni zombili.
Kusiqiniseko sokuzibophelela ekusebenzisaneni  kumizamo namaphrojekthi ukobana iinqhema zombili zizuze ngokulinganako. 
Kusivumelwano sehloso yokubambisana eensungulweni nemaphrojekthini azuzisa woke amahlangothi. 
Kusiqinisekiso sesibopho sokuhlanganyela iinsungulo namaphrojekthi asiza ngokufanako eenhlanganweni zombili.
Kusiqiniseko sokuzibophelela ekusebenzisaneni  kumizamo namaphrojekthi ukobana iinqhema zombili zizuze ngokulinganako. 
Kusivumelwano sehloso yokubambisana eensungulweni nemaphrojekthini azuzisa woke amahlangothi. 
Simemezelo sehloso yokusebenzisana ekuzijameleni nakumaphrokthi azokuzuzisa amahlangothi womabili.
Kusiqiniseko sokuzibophelela ekusebenzisaneni  kumizamo namaphrojekthi ukobana iinqhema zombili zizuze ngokulinganako. 
Kusivumelwano sehloso yokubambisana eensungulweni nemaphrojekthini azuzisa woke amahlangothi. 
Simemezelo sehloso yokusebenzisana ekuzijameleni nakumaphrokthi azokuzuzisa amahlangothi womabili.
Kusiqinisekiso sesibopho sokuhlanganyela iinsungulo namaphrojekthi asiza ngokufanako eenhlanganweni zombili.
Kusivumelwano sehloso yokubambisana eensungulweni nemaphrojekthini azuzisa woke amahlangothi. 
Simemezelo sehloso yokusebenzisana ekuzijameleni nakumaphrokthi azokuzuzisa amahlangothi womabili.
Kusiqinisekiso sesibopho sokuhlanganyela iinsungulo namaphrojekthi asiza ngokufanako eenhlanganweni zombili.
Kusiqiniseko sokuzibophelela ekusebenzisaneni  kumizamo namaphrojekthi ukobana iinqhema zombili zizuze ngokulinganako. 
Umlayezo ovela kithi oza kini namhlenje kukuthi "umsebenzi uthomile" begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako, izokubona ukufakwa kwemali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane (R8 billion) ezokufakwa ngurhulumende wenarha kanye nekoro yangeqadi ngokusebenzisa isabelomali sepahla emumakhiwo, ukwakhiwa kabutjha komakhiwo oqatjhiweko kanye nesebenziswano lomphakathi nelangeqadi. 
Umlayezwethu oya kuwe namhlanjesi ngothi Umsebenzi sele uthomile iminyaka eli-10 ezako ibonakala njengeyengezelelo lamaranda angaphezu kwamamiliyoni abunane (amabhiliyoni ama-R8) mbuso wezweloke nekoro yangeqadi ngezabelomali eziyisekelomali kanye nabahlanganyeli bangeqadi bomphakathi. 
Umlayezo wethu kini namhlanjesi uthi umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakufakelwa iimali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane wamaranda (R8 amabhiliyoni) izakufakwa mbuso welizwe kanye nephiko langasese ngokwamabhajede weemali, ukwenza ngcono iindawo zokuqatjhiswa nokubumbana komphakathi-nangasese.
Umlayezo wethu namhlanjesi kuwe kukobana umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakubona ukufakwa kwamaranda adlula amabhiliyoni abunane (i-R8 bhiliyoni) mbuso wesitjhaba nekoro yangeqadi ngamaphrojekthi wokusikimisa, ukwenziwa ngcono kokuqatjhisa  kanye nesebenziswano phakathi kombuso nekoro yangeqadi. 
Umlayezwethu oya kuwe namhlanjesi ngothi Umsebenzi sele uthomile iminyaka eli-10 ezako ibonakala njengeyengezelelo lamaranda angaphezu kwamamiliyoni abunane (amabhiliyoni ama-R8) mbuso wezweloke nekoro yangeqadi ngezabelomali eziyisekelomali kanye nabahlanganyeli bangeqadi bomphakathi. 
Umlayezo wethu kini namhlanjesi uthi umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakufakelwa iimali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane wamaranda (R8 amabhiliyoni) izakufakwa mbuso welizwe kanye nephiko langasese ngokwamabhajede weemali, ukwenza ngcono iindawo zokuqatjhiswa nokubumbana komphakathi-nangasese.
Umlayezo wethu namhlanjesi kuwe kukobana umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakubona ukufakwa kwamaranda adlula amabhiliyoni abunane (i-R8 bhiliyoni) mbuso wesitjhaba nekoro yangeqadi ngamaphrojekthi wokusikimisa, ukwenziwa ngcono kokuqatjhisa  kanye nesebenziswano phakathi kombuso nekoro yangeqadi. 
Umlayezo ovela kithi oza kini namhlenje kukuthi "umsebenzi uthomile" begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako, izokubona ukufakwa kwemali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane (R8 billion) ezokufakwa ngurhulumende wenarha kanye nekoro yangeqadi ngokusebenzisa isabelomali sepahla emumakhiwo, ukwakhiwa kabutjha komakhiwo oqatjhiweko kanye nesebenziswano lomphakathi nelangeqadi. 
Umlayezo wethu kini namhlanjesi uthi umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakufakelwa iimali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane wamaranda (R8 amabhiliyoni) izakufakwa mbuso welizwe kanye nephiko langasese ngokwamabhajede weemali, ukwenza ngcono iindawo zokuqatjhiswa nokubumbana komphakathi-nangasese.
Umlayezo wethu namhlanjesi kuwe kukobana umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakubona ukufakwa kwamaranda adlula amabhiliyoni abunane (i-R8 bhiliyoni) mbuso wesitjhaba nekoro yangeqadi ngamaphrojekthi wokusikimisa, ukwenziwa ngcono kokuqatjhisa  kanye nesebenziswano phakathi kombuso nekoro yangeqadi. 
Umlayezo ovela kithi oza kini namhlenje kukuthi "umsebenzi uthomile" begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako, izokubona ukufakwa kwemali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane (R8 billion) ezokufakwa ngurhulumende wenarha kanye nekoro yangeqadi ngokusebenzisa isabelomali sepahla emumakhiwo, ukwakhiwa kabutjha komakhiwo oqatjhiweko kanye nesebenziswano lomphakathi nelangeqadi. 
Umlayezwethu oya kuwe namhlanjesi ngothi Umsebenzi sele uthomile iminyaka eli-10 ezako ibonakala njengeyengezelelo lamaranda angaphezu kwamamiliyoni abunane (amabhiliyoni ama-R8) mbuso wezweloke nekoro yangeqadi ngezabelomali eziyisekelomali kanye nabahlanganyeli bangeqadi bomphakathi. 
Umlayezo wethu namhlanjesi kuwe kukobana umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakubona ukufakwa kwamaranda adlula amabhiliyoni abunane (i-R8 bhiliyoni) mbuso wesitjhaba nekoro yangeqadi ngamaphrojekthi wokusikimisa, ukwenziwa ngcono kokuqatjhisa  kanye nesebenziswano phakathi kombuso nekoro yangeqadi. 
Umlayezo ovela kithi oza kini namhlenje kukuthi "umsebenzi uthomile" begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako, izokubona ukufakwa kwemali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane (R8 billion) ezokufakwa ngurhulumende wenarha kanye nekoro yangeqadi ngokusebenzisa isabelomali sepahla emumakhiwo, ukwakhiwa kabutjha komakhiwo oqatjhiweko kanye nesebenziswano lomphakathi nelangeqadi. 
Umlayezwethu oya kuwe namhlanjesi ngothi Umsebenzi sele uthomile iminyaka eli-10 ezako ibonakala njengeyengezelelo lamaranda angaphezu kwamamiliyoni abunane (amabhiliyoni ama-R8) mbuso wezweloke nekoro yangeqadi ngezabelomali eziyisekelomali kanye nabahlanganyeli bangeqadi bomphakathi. 
Umlayezo wethu kini namhlanjesi uthi umsebenzi uthomile begodu iminyaka eli-10 ezako izakufakelwa iimali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni abunane wamaranda (R8 amabhiliyoni) izakufakwa mbuso welizwe kanye nephiko langasese ngokwamabhajede weemali, ukwenza ngcono iindawo zokuqatjhiswa nokubumbana komphakathi-nangasese.
Mayelana nokuLawulwa kweHlelo, iKomidi ezokuKhambisa ihlelo sele isunguliwe hlangana nomNyango wezemiSebenzi kaRhulumende nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomPhakathi , isiKhwama semali seNarha kanye neDorobha le-Tshwane. 
Mayelana neLawulo leHlelo, kujanyiswe iLawulo phakathi komNyango wemiSebenzi nokuLawulwa komBuso, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomBuso, umNyango weeMali kaZweloke kanye neDorobha leTshwane.
NgokweHlelo lokuPhatha, iKomidi eDosa phambili ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezokuLawulwa kwemiSebenzi  yomPhakathi, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomPhakathi, umNyango weliZwe ophethe iimali kanye neDorobho leTshwane.
Ngokuya kokuPhathwa kweHlelo, iKomidi yokuKhambisa umsebenzi ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezabaSebenzi bomBuso nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomBuso, iPhiko lesiTjhaba lokuGcinwa kweeMali kanye neDorobha eliKhulu leTshwane.  
Mayelana neLawulo leHlelo, kujanyiswe iLawulo phakathi komNyango wemiSebenzi nokuLawulwa komBuso, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomBuso, umNyango weeMali kaZweloke kanye neDorobha leTshwane.
NgokweHlelo lokuPhatha, iKomidi eDosa phambili ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezokuLawulwa kwemiSebenzi  yomPhakathi, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomPhakathi, umNyango weliZwe ophethe iimali kanye neDorobho leTshwane.
Ngokuya kokuPhathwa kweHlelo, iKomidi yokuKhambisa umsebenzi ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezabaSebenzi bomBuso nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomBuso, iPhiko lesiTjhaba lokuGcinwa kweeMali kanye neDorobha eliKhulu leTshwane.  
Mayelana nokuLawulwa kweHlelo, iKomidi ezokuKhambisa ihlelo sele isunguliwe hlangana nomNyango wezemiSebenzi kaRhulumende nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomPhakathi , isiKhwama semali seNarha kanye neDorobha le-Tshwane. 
NgokweHlelo lokuPhatha, iKomidi eDosa phambili ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezokuLawulwa kwemiSebenzi  yomPhakathi, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomPhakathi, umNyango weliZwe ophethe iimali kanye neDorobho leTshwane.
Ngokuya kokuPhathwa kweHlelo, iKomidi yokuKhambisa umsebenzi ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezabaSebenzi bomBuso nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomBuso, iPhiko lesiTjhaba lokuGcinwa kweeMali kanye neDorobha eliKhulu leTshwane.  
Mayelana nokuLawulwa kweHlelo, iKomidi ezokuKhambisa ihlelo sele isunguliwe hlangana nomNyango wezemiSebenzi kaRhulumende nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomPhakathi , isiKhwama semali seNarha kanye neDorobha le-Tshwane. 
Mayelana neLawulo leHlelo, kujanyiswe iLawulo phakathi komNyango wemiSebenzi nokuLawulwa komBuso, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomBuso, umNyango weeMali kaZweloke kanye neDorobha leTshwane.
Ngokuya kokuPhathwa kweHlelo, iKomidi yokuKhambisa umsebenzi ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezabaSebenzi bomBuso nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomBuso, iPhiko lesiTjhaba lokuGcinwa kweeMali kanye neDorobha eliKhulu leTshwane.  
Mayelana nokuLawulwa kweHlelo, iKomidi ezokuKhambisa ihlelo sele isunguliwe hlangana nomNyango wezemiSebenzi kaRhulumende nokuPhatha, umNyango wezemiSebenzi yomPhakathi , isiKhwama semali seNarha kanye neDorobha le-Tshwane. 
Mayelana neLawulo leHlelo, kujanyiswe iLawulo phakathi komNyango wemiSebenzi nokuLawulwa komBuso, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomBuso, umNyango weeMali kaZweloke kanye neDorobha leTshwane.
NgokweHlelo lokuPhatha, iKomidi eDosa phambili ihlonyiwe phakathi komNyango wezokuLawulwa kwemiSebenzi  yomPhakathi, umNyango wemiSebenzi yomPhakathi, umNyango weliZwe ophethe iimali kanye neDorobho leTshwane.
Hlangana nokhunye, iKomidi izokusekela beyivikele ihlelo, ibeke ilihlo beyitjheje ukuphunyeleliswa kwehlelo, iqunte ngeqhinga lokusekela ngeemali begodu iqinisekise ukuthi ipumelelo ngeyomuntu woke. 
Hlangana nokhunye iKhomidi izokulawula ihlelo, yeluse beyilawule ikghonakaliso, yenze isiphetho mayelana nokusizwa ngeemali kanye nokuqinisekisa ikghonakaliso elithintanisako.
Hlangana nokhunye iKomidi izakusekela ihlelo, iliphathe begodu itjheje ukuthoma kwalo, iqedelele amaqhinga weemali begodu iqinisekise bona umsebenzi uyahlanganyelwa.
Hlangana nokhunye, iKomidi izakukhambisa ihlelo, iqale beyiluse ukufezakaliswa, ukuphethwa kweqhinga lokusekela ngeemali nokuqinisekisa ukufezakalisa ngokubambisana.
Hlangana nokhunye iKhomidi izokulawula ihlelo, yeluse beyilawule ikghonakaliso, yenze isiphetho mayelana nokusizwa ngeemali kanye nokuqinisekisa ikghonakaliso elithintanisako.
Hlangana nokhunye iKomidi izakusekela ihlelo, iliphathe begodu itjheje ukuthoma kwalo, iqedelele amaqhinga weemali begodu iqinisekise bona umsebenzi uyahlanganyelwa.

Hlangana nokhunye, iKomidi izokusekela beyivikele ihlelo, ibeke ilihlo beyitjheje ukuphunyeleliswa kwehlelo, iqunte ngeqhinga lokusekela ngeemali begodu iqinisekise ukuthi ipumelelo ngeyomuntu woke.

UmNyango uqatjhe uNom Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela lakamQophisi-Mazombe elizokuqalana nokulawulwa kwehlelo loke.
UmNyango uqatjhe uNom. Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela lomNqophisi maZombe eliphathelene nokulawulwa kwehlelo loke.
UmNyango ukhethe uNom. Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela lomNqophisi  zombelele okunguye ozakuphatha ihlelo loke. 
UmNyango ukhombe uNomzana Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela lomNqophisi-Mazombe eliphethe loke ihlelo.
UmNyango uqatjhe uNom. Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela lomNqophisi maZombe eliphathelene nokulawulwa kwehlelo loke.
UmNyango ukhethe uNom. Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela lomNqophisi  zombelele okunguye ozakuphatha ihlelo loke.

Kosikazi Somlomo, uNdunakulu oHloniphekileko, abaSebenzisani abakuKhabinedi, Malunga weNdlu, iimVaktjhi eziHloniphekileko, iimphathiswa zomnyango wezezindlu, malunga wemidiya newomphakathi ngobubanzi boke, sinamukela ngezandla ezifuthumeleko.
Somlomo, Ndunakulu oHloniphekileko, baLingani bami beKhabinethi, maLunga weNdlu, mvakatjhi eziHloniphekileko, basebenzi bomnyango wezezindlu, malunga wabathathiindaba nomphakathi wokana, ngiyanamukela.
Mma uSomlomo, Ndunakulu oHloniphekileko, baLingani beKhabinethi, iinkhulu zomnyango wezezindlu, amalunga weembikiindaba kanye nomphakathi wokana, ngiyanamukela.
Mma uSomlomo, Ndunakulu oHloniphekileko, balingani bami kuKhabhinethi, maLunga weNdlu, mvakatjhi ezihloniphekileko, mphathiswa zomnyango wezezindlu, malunga wemidiya kanye nomphakathi wokana, nginamukela noke ngezandla ezifuthumeleko. 
Somlomo, Ndunakulu oHloniphekileko, baLingani bami beKhabinethi, maLunga weNdlu, mvakatjhi eziHloniphekileko, basebenzi bomnyango wezezindlu, malunga wabathathiindaba nomphakathi wokana, ngiyanamukela.
Mma uSomlomo, Ndunakulu oHloniphekileko, baLingani beKhabinethi, iinkhulu zomnyango wezezindlu, amalunga weembikiindaba kanye nomphakathi wokana, ngiyanamukela.

Amagama la bodade nabafowethu azwakala epolotikini yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjingalanga Kapa.  
Amagama la bodade nabafowethu atholakala epolitikini yamaSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjhingalanga Kapa.
Amezwi la bodade nabobaba atjengisa ipolotiki yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu e-Western Cape.
Lamagama bomma nabobaba asitjengiso sepolitiki yeSewula Afrika, ikakhulukazi e-Western Cape. 
Amagama la bodade nabafowethu atholakala epolitikini yamaSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjhingalanga Kapa.
Amezwi la bodade nabobaba atjengisa ipolotiki yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu e-Western Cape.
Lamagama bomma nabobaba asitjengiso sepolitiki yeSewula Afrika, ikakhulukazi e-Western Cape. 
Amagama la bodade nabafowethu azwakala epolotikini yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjingalanga Kapa.  
Amezwi la bodade nabobaba atjengisa ipolotiki yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu e-Western Cape.
Lamagama bomma nabobaba asitjengiso sepolitiki yeSewula Afrika, ikakhulukazi e-Western Cape.

Amagama la bodade nabafowethu atholakala epolitikini yamaSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjhingalanga Kapa.
Lamagama bomma nabobaba asitjengiso sepolitiki yeSewula Afrika, ikakhulukazi e-Western Cape. 
Amagama la bodade nabafowethu azwakala epolotikini yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjingalanga Kapa.  
Amagama la bodade nabafowethu atholakala epolitikini yamaSewula Afrika, khulukhulu eTjhingalanga Kapa.
Amezwi la bodade nabobaba atjengisa ipolotiki yeSewula Afrika, khulukhulu e-Western Cape.
Nanoma abantu benarha le abazinikeleko nabathanda iragelophambili bangasebenza nzima kangangani,  imitjhini yabanye abantu kuhlala baqalela phasi umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe ngurhulumende onetjhejo lo ngesikhathi esincani solo wathatha intambo.
Nanyana bangasebenza ngokuzikhandla kangangani abantu benarha le, imitjhini yabanye abantu ihlala ikuphungula ukuqakatheka kobuhle bokusebenza ebenziwe mbuso otlhogomelako lo obe se-ofisini isikhatjhana esifitjhazana. 
Akukhathaleki bona abantu benarha le basebenza ngamandla kangangani  nokobana bathanda iragelo phambili kangangani, abanye abantu umsebenzi wabo kunyaza umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe mbuso onetlhogomelo lo ngesikhatjhana esincani sokuba nge-ofisini. 
Ngaphandle kokuqala ukobana abantu balenarha abazimiseleko nabathanda iragelophambili basebenza budisi kangangani, umbono wabanye abantu uhlala uraranisa umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe ngilombuso okhathalako ngesikhathi esifitjhani khulu sokuba nge-ofisini. 
Nanyana bangasebenza ngokuzikhandla kangangani abantu benarha le, imitjhini yabanye abantu ihlala ikuphungula ukuqakatheka kobuhle bokusebenza ebenziwe mbuso otlhogomelako lo obe se-ofisini isikhatjhana esifitjhazana. 
Akukhathaleki bona abantu benarha le basebenza ngamandla kangangani  nokobana bathanda iragelo phambili kangangani, abanye abantu umsebenzi wabo kunyaza umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe mbuso onetlhogomelo lo ngesikhatjhana esincani sokuba nge-ofisini. 
Ngaphandle kokuqala ukobana abantu balenarha abazimiseleko nabathanda iragelophambili basebenza budisi kangangani, umbono wabanye abantu uhlala uraranisa umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe ngilombuso okhathalako ngesikhathi esifitjhani khulu sokuba nge-ofisini.

Ngaphandle kokuqala ukobana abantu balenarha abazimiseleko nabathanda iragelophambili basebenza budisi kangangani, umbono wabanye abantu uhlala uraranisa umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe ngilombuso okhathalako ngesikhathi esifitjhani khulu sokuba nge-ofisini.

Nanyana bangasebenza ngokuzikhandla kangangani abantu benarha le, imitjhini yabanye abantu ihlala ikuphungula ukuqakatheka kobuhle bokusebenza ebenziwe mbuso otlhogomelako lo obe se-ofisini isikhatjhana esifitjhazana.

Nanoma abantu benarha le abazinikeleko nabathanda iragelophambili bangasebenza nzima kangangani,  imitjhini yabanye abantu kuhlala baqalela phasi umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe ngurhulumende onetjhejo lo ngesikhathi esincani solo wathatha intambo.
Nanyana bangasebenza ngokuzikhandla kangangani abantu benarha le, imitjhini yabanye abantu ihlala ikuphungula ukuqakatheka kobuhle bokusebenza ebenziwe mbuso otlhogomelako lo obe se-ofisini isikhatjhana esifitjhazana. 
Akukhathaleki bona abantu benarha le basebenza ngamandla kangangani  nokobana bathanda iragelo phambili kangangani, abanye abantu umsebenzi wabo kunyaza umsebenzi omuhle owenziwe mbuso onetlhogomelo lo ngesikhatjhana esincani sokuba nge-ofisini. 
Bodade nabafowethu, abantu abanengi baphikisene ngokuthi izindlu zimayelana nani, kodwana ngivumelani bona nginiphe elinye ihlangothi.
Bodade nabafowethu, abantu abanengi baphikisana ngokobana khuyini ukwakhelwa izindlu, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele nenye ihlathululo.
Bodade nabobaba, inengi labantu liphikisene ngokuthi zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngibawa ningivumele ngininikele elinye godu ihlangothi.
Bomma nabobaba, inengi labantu khelatjho ukobana zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele esinye isithombe.  
Bodade nabafowethu, abantu abanengi baphikisana ngokobana khuyini ukwakhelwa izindlu, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele nenye ihlathululo.
Bodade nabobaba, inengi labantu liphikisene ngokuthi zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngibawa ningivumele ngininikele elinye godu ihlangothi.
Bomma nabobaba, inengi labantu khelatjho ukobana zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele esinye isithombe.

Bomma nabobaba, inengi labantu khelatjho ukobana zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele esinye isithombe.

Bodade nabafowethu, abantu abanengi baphikisana ngokobana khuyini ukwakhelwa izindlu, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele nenye ihlathululo.
Bomma nabobaba, inengi labantu khelatjho ukobana zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele esinye isithombe.  
Bodade nabafowethu, abantu abanengi baphikisene ngokuthi izindlu zimayelana nani, kodwana ngivumelani bona nginiphe elinye ihlangothi.
Bodade nabafowethu, abantu abanengi baphikisana ngokobana khuyini ukwakhelwa izindlu, kodwana ngivumelani ngininikele nenye ihlathululo.
Bodade nabobaba, inengi labantu liphikisene ngokuthi zezindlu ziphathelene nani, kodwana ngibawa ningivumele ngininikele elinye godu ihlangothi.
Kimi, izindlu azisi ngezokuhlala kwaphela. 
Mina ngesingami, ukwakhiwa kwezindlu akukaphathelani nendawo yokuhlala kwaphela.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kwaphela nobusithelo.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kuphela nobuphephelo. 
Mina ngesingami, ukwakhiwa kwezindlu akukaphathelani nendawo yokuhlala kwaphela.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kwaphela nobusithelo.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kuphela nobuphephelo. 
Kimi, izindlu azisi ngezokuhlala kwaphela. 
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kwaphela nobusithelo.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kuphela nobuphephelo. 
Kimi, izindlu azisi ngezokuhlala kwaphela. 
Mina ngesingami, ukwakhiwa kwezindlu akukaphathelani nendawo yokuhlala kwaphela.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kuphela nobuphephelo. 
Kimi, izindlu azisi ngezokuhlala kwaphela. 
Mina ngesingami, ukwakhiwa kwezindlu akukaphathelani nendawo yokuhlala kwaphela.
Kimi, zezindlu azikaphathelani kwaphela nobusithelo.
Zimayelana nokuthi abantu ngokwabo batha isibopho sokugcina ibhoduluko labo boke nokulungisa ikusasa labo.
Kuphathelene nangabantu uqobo labo lokha nabaziphendulelako ekutlhogomeleni ibhoduluko labo begodu bakhe nengomuso labo.
Zikhuluma ngabantu uqobo lwabo nabathatha isibopho sokusekela ibhoduluko labo begodu balungisa namaphilo wabo.
Ziphathelene nokuthi abantu ngokwabo bathathe isibopho sokugcina ibhoduluko labo elijayelekileko kanye nokubumba ingomuso labo.

Kumayelana nokwakha imiphakathi ezijameleko kanye nebhoduluko lokuphila isikhathi eside. 
Kumayelana nokwenza ngepumelelo ipilo eragela phambili yemiphakathi namabhoduluko anepilo araga njalo.
Zimayelana nokubumba imiphakathi enepumelelo begodu neendawo zokuhlala ezisezingeni elifaneleko.
Ziphathelene nemiphakathi esebenzako namabhoduluko wokuphila anzinzileko.

Kumayelana nepumelelo ekubumbaneni ngesebenziswano hlangana nekoro yangeqadi neyomphakathi, iinHlangano ekungaSizo zakaRhulumende, kodwana ngokuqakatheke khulu, kumayelana nomphakathi.
Kumayelana nepumelelo ebumbeneko ngehlanganyelo phakathi kweziko langeqadi, iziko lomphakathi, iinHlangano eziNgasi ngezomBuso, okuqakatheke khulu kunakho koke imiphakathi.
Zimayelana nepumelelo ngokubumbana ngokuhlanganyela hlangana nephiko langasese, nephiko lomphakathi, iHlangano engasiyo yomBuso, kodwana okuqakatheke khulu, miphakathi.
Ziphathelene nepumelelo ekubumbaneni ngokubambisana phakathi kwekoro yombuso, ikoro yangeqadi, iinHlangano okuNgasizo zomBuso, kodwana okuqathake khulu, imiphakathi.

Kimi izindlu zingahlathululwa ngcono njengehlelo, elifaka hlangana ukuplana nabantu, sekunokuthi uplanele abantu. 
Ukwakhelwa izindlu ngesingami kungahlathululwa njengendlela yekambiso, ebandakanya ukuhlela nabantu kunokuhlelela abantu.
Zezindlu kimi zingahlathululwa kuhle njengekambiso, efaka hlangana ukutlama nabantu ngokungakhambisani nokutlamela abantu.
Zezindlu kimi zingahlathululwa njengekambiso, ebandakanya ukutlama nabantu ukuphikisana nokutlamela abantu.

Izindlu ebujameni beSewula Afrika azisi yipahla nje kwaphela, kodwana lihlelo elinzinze emigomeni yedemokhrasi abantu benarha le abayilwela budisi.
Ukwakhelwa izindlu ngobujamo bamaSewula Afrika akusimkhiqizo kwaphela, kodwana ikambiso eyeyame emikghweni yentando yenengi elwelwe babantu benarha le kabudisi khulu.
Zezindlu ebujameni beSewula Afrika akusiwo umkhiqizo kwaphela, kodwana yindlela yekambiso eyame emikghweni yentando yenengi abantu benarha le abawulwela ngamandla.
Zezindlu ebujameni beSewula Afrika akusi mkhiqizo kuphela, kodwana godu yikambiso esekelwe emagugwini wentando yenengi abantu balenarha abawalwelako.

Lihlelo elilalela abantu, livumela abantu bona basebenzise ilungelo labo ledemokhrasi lokukhetha umhlobo wezindlu kanye neendawo lapho bafuna zakhiwe khona.
Yikambiso yokulalela abantu, evumela abantu bona basebenzise amalungelwabo wentando yenengi wokukhetha umhlobo wezindlu nendawo abafuna bona izindlu zakhiwe khona.
Kuyikambiso yendlela elalela abantu, ivumela abantu ukobana basebenzise amalungelo wabo ngokwentando yenengi bona bakhethe umhlobo wezindlu neendawo abafuna bona izindlu zabo zakhiwe kizo.
Yikambiso elalela abantu, evumela abantu ukusebenzisa ilungelo labo lentando yenengi lokukhetha umhlobo wezindlu kanye neendawo abafuna ukwakhelwa kizo. 
Yikambiso yokulalela abantu, evumela abantu bona basebenzise amalungelwabo wentando yenengi wokukhetha umhlobo wezindlu nendawo abafuna bona izindlu zakhiwe khona.

Lihlelo elilalela abantu, livumela abantu bona basebenzise ilungelo labo ledemokhrasi lokukhetha umhlobo wezindlu kanye neendawo lapho bafuna zakhiwe khona.
Yikambiso yokulalela abantu, evumela abantu bona basebenzise amalungelwabo wentando yenengi wokukhetha umhlobo wezindlu nendawo abafuna bona izindlu zakhiwe khona.
Kuyikambiso yendlela elalela abantu, ivumela abantu ukobana basebenzise amalungelo wabo ngokwentando yenengi bona bakhethe umhlobo wezindlu neendawo abafuna bona izindlu zabo zakhiwe kizo.
Ngalokho ke, ayikho into eyehlisa isithunzi nokungakhambisani nedemokhrasi, njengodima abantu ilungelo labo lokuzikhethela. 
Ngalokho akunanto esilinga nethathela phasi begodu nengathatheli phezulu intando yenengi kunaleyo yokuphula amalungelo wobuntu asisekelo abazikhethela wona.
Akunanto eyehlisa isithunzi nengakhambi ngokwentando yenengi  efana nokwemuka abantu amalungelo wabo aqakathekileko wokukhetha.
Ngalokho akunanto eyehlisa isithunzi sobuntu nokungabi nentando yenengi ukudlula ukwalela abantu ilungelo labo elisisekelo lokuzikhethela.

Ngokungafani nombuso webandlululo, njengomtjhotjhozeli olisotjhalisti, abantu basekabeni yombono namaqhinga wami wokwethulwa kwezindlu.
Ngokungafaniko nesikhathi sebandlululo, njengomtjhotjhozeli weendaba zomphakathi, abantu bayikaba yenembo-lami neqhinga lokwethulwa kwezindlu.
Ngokungafani nombuso webandlululo, njengomphakathi owenza izinto zenzeke, abantu basesentha yebhudango neqhinga lokubakhela izindlu.
Ngokungafani nombuso webandlululo, njengomtjhotjhozeli womphakathi, abantu bamummongo wombono nehlelo lami lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Ngokungafaniko nesikhathi sebandlululo, njengomtjhotjhozeli weendaba zomphakathi, abantu bayikaba yenembo-lami neqhinga lokwethulwa kwezindlu.

Bodade nabafowethu, kulithabo kimi kilentambama ukunethulela ikulumo yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu wePhrovinsi le. 
Bodade nabafowethu, ngithabe khulu ngemva kwamadina nje ukunethulela ikulumami yesibili yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wesiFunda weziNdlu. 
Bodade nabobaba, kuyangithabisa ntambama nje ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu ePhrovinsini.
Bomma nabobaba, ngithabile ngemva kwedina namhlanjesi ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wePhrovinsi wezeziNdlu. 
Bodade nabafowethu, ngithabe khulu ngemva kwamadina nje ukunethulela ikulumami yesibili yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wesiFunda weziNdlu. 
Bodade nabobaba, kuyangithabisa ntambama nje ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu ePhrovinsini.
Bomma nabobaba, ngithabile ngemva kwedina namhlanjesi ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wePhrovinsi wezeziNdlu. 
Bodade nabafowethu, kulithabo kimi kilentambama ukunethulela ikulumo yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu wePhrovinsi le. 
Bodade nabobaba, kuyangithabisa ntambama nje ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu ePhrovinsini.
Bomma nabobaba, ngithabile ngemva kwedina namhlanjesi ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wePhrovinsi wezeziNdlu. 
Bodade nabafowethu, kulithabo kimi kilentambama ukunethulela ikulumo yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu wePhrovinsi le. 
Bodade nabafowethu, ngithabe khulu ngemva kwamadina nje ukunethulela ikulumami yesibili yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wesiFunda weziNdlu. 
Bomma nabobaba, ngithabile ngemva kwedina namhlanjesi ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wePhrovinsi wezeziNdlu. 
Bodade nabafowethu, kulithabo kimi kilentambama ukunethulela ikulumo yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu wePhrovinsi le. 
Bodade nabafowethu, ngithabe khulu ngemva kwamadina nje ukunethulela ikulumami yesibili yesabelomali njengoNgqongqotjhe wesiFunda weziNdlu. 
Bodade nabobaba, kuyangithabisa ntambama nje ukobana nginethulele ikulumo yami yesibili yesabelo seemali njengoNgqongqotjhe wezeziNdlu ePhrovinsini.
Ngiyazikhakhazisa nangokuthi nginethulela ikulumo yesabelomali le ilanga ngaphambi kwesiKhumbuzo se-10 sedemokhrasi yethu. 
Ngibuye ngizikhakhazise khulu ekwethuleni ikulumo le yesabelomali ngelanga elingaphambi kwehlandla le-10 lokuGidingwa kwentando yenengi yethu.
Ngiyazikhakhazisa ngokobana ngethula ikulumo yesabelo seemali le ngelanga elandulela ukuKhunjulwa kwe-10 kwentando yenengi yethu.
Godu ngithabile ukobana ngethula lekulumo yesabelo ilanga ngaphambi kwesiKhumbuzo semiNyaka eliTjhumi sentando yenengi yethu. 
Ngibuye ngizikhakhazise khulu ekwethuleni ikulumo le yesabelomali ngelanga elingaphambi kwehlandla le-10 lokuGidingwa kwentando yenengi yethu.
Ngiyazikhakhazisa ngokobana ngethula ikulumo yesabelo seemali le ngelanga elandulela ukuKhunjulwa kwe-10 kwentando yenengi yethu.
Godu ngithabile ukobana ngethula lekulumo yesabelo ilanga ngaphambi kwesiKhumbuzo semiNyaka eliTjhumi sentando yenengi yethu. 
Ngiyazikhakhazisa nangokuthi nginethulela ikulumo yesabelomali le ilanga ngaphambi kwesiKhumbuzo se-10 sedemokhrasi yethu. 
Ngiyazikhakhazisa ngokobana ngethula ikulumo yesabelo seemali le ngelanga elandulela ukuKhunjulwa kwe-10 kwentando yenengi yethu.
Godu ngithabile ukobana ngethula lekulumo yesabelo ilanga ngaphambi kwesiKhumbuzo semiNyaka eliTjhumi sentando yenengi yethu.

Ngibuye ngizikhakhazise khulu ekwethuleni ikulumo le yesabelomali ngelanga elingaphambi kwehlandla le-10 lokuGidingwa kwentando yenengi yethu.
Godu ngithabile ukobana ngethula lekulumo yesabelo ilanga ngaphambi kwesiKhumbuzo semiNyaka eliTjhumi sentando yenengi yethu.

Kunobufakazi obuphathekako bokuthi urhulumende udoswa phambili yi-ANC uphumelele kokunengi ngesikhathi esingaphasi kweminyaka elitjhumi sokubusa kwawo ngokwedemokhrasi sekunalokho okukhe kwenziwa ngezinye iinarha iphasi mazombe. 
Kunobufakazi obuphathekako bona i-ANC yethu embuso osirholako ithuthukise izinto ezinengi ngaphasi kweminyaka elitjhumi yokubusa kwayo ngentando yenengi kunenye inarha ekwenze lokhu iphasi mazombe.
Kunobufakazi obuqinileko bokuthi umbuso odoswa phambili yi-ANC  uzuze okunengi ngaphasi nje kweminyaka elisumi yomthetho wentando yenengi kunangendlela ezinye iinarha ezakhe zenza ngakhona ephasini mazombe.
Kunobufakazi obuqinileko bokobana umbuso odoswa phambili yi-ANC ufikelele okunengi ngaphasi kweminyaka elitjhumi yokubusa ngentando yenengi ukudlula ezinye iinarha ephasini loke.  
Kunobufakazi obuphathekako bona i-ANC yethu embuso osirholako ithuthukise izinto ezinengi ngaphasi kweminyaka elitjhumi yokubusa kwayo ngentando yenengi kunenye inarha ekwenze lokhu iphasi mazombe.
Kunobufakazi obuqinileko bokuthi umbuso odoswa phambili yi-ANC  uzuze okunengi ngaphasi nje kweminyaka elisumi yomthetho wentando yenengi kunangendlela ezinye iinarha ezakhe zenza ngakhona ephasini mazombe.
Kunobufakazi obuqinileko bokobana umbuso odoswa phambili yi-ANC ufikelele okunengi ngaphasi kweminyaka elitjhumi yokubusa ngentando yenengi ukudlula ezinye iinarha ephasini loke.

Ngokwemibandela ephathekako, phezu kwamathuba wezezindlu ayi-1,4 miliyon ethulwe ngurhulumende, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela bona iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko, yethule amayunidi ali-167 000, okuma-11%  wezindlu ezethulweko enarheni. 
Ngamagama aphathekako, eendlini ezimamiliyoni ayi-1.4 wamathuba wezindlu umbuso owathulileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela bona isifunda sethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko, sethule izindlu ezizi-167 000, ezenza ama-11% wekhekhe lenarha kazweloke.
 Ngokobufakazi obunamandla, kumathuba aziingidi eziyi-1.4  wezindlu umbuso ozakhileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukutjho bona iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba egadungileko, yakhe amayunidi azi-167 000, okumaphesende ali-11% wekhekhe lelizwe.
Ngamagama aqinileko, emathubeni wezindlu we-1.4 yesigidi umbuso owathulileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ukobana iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko yethule izindlu ezili-167 000, okuyi-11% esabelweni senarha.  
Ngamagama aphathekako, eendlini ezimamiliyoni ayi-1.4 wamathuba wezindlu umbuso owathulileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela bona isifunda sethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko, sethule izindlu ezizi-167 000, ezenza ama-11% wekhekhe lenarha kazweloke.
 Ngokobufakazi obunamandla, kumathuba aziingidi eziyi-1.4  wezindlu umbuso ozakhileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukutjho bona iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba egadungileko, yakhe amayunidi azi-167 000, okumaphesende ali-11% wekhekhe lelizwe.
Ngamagama aqinileko, emathubeni wezindlu we-1.4 yesigidi umbuso owathulileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ukobana iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko yethule izindlu ezili-167 000, okuyi-11% esabelweni senarha.  
Ngokwemibandela ephathekako, phezu kwamathuba wezezindlu ayi-1,4 miliyon ethulwe ngurhulumende, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela bona iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko, yethule amayunidi ali-167 000, okuma-11%  wezindlu ezethulweko enarheni. 
 Ngokobufakazi obunamandla, kumathuba aziingidi eziyi-1.4  wezindlu umbuso ozakhileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukutjho bona iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba egadungileko, yakhe amayunidi azi-167 000, okumaphesende ali-11% wekhekhe lelizwe.
Ngamagama aqinileko, emathubeni wezindlu we-1.4 yesigidi umbuso owathulileko, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ukobana iphrovinsi yethu eminyakeni elithoba edlulileko yethule izindlu ezili-167 000, okuyi-11% esabelweni senarha.

Lokhu, ngokubona kwami, kusebenza kuhle khulu ngaphezu kwananyana ngiwaphi amazinga.
Lokhu, ngokuya ngami kusebenza okudluleleko ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokombono wami kumsebenzi omuhle ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kukusebenza okuhle khulu nanyana kungaliphi izinga. 
Lokhu, ngokuya ngami kusebenza okudluleleko ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokombono wami kumsebenzi omuhle ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kukusebenza okuhle khulu nanyana kungaliphi izinga. 
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami, kusebenza kuhle khulu ngaphezu kwananyana ngiwaphi amazinga.
Lokhu, ngokombono wami kumsebenzi omuhle ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kukusebenza okuhle khulu nanyana kungaliphi izinga. 
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami, kusebenza kuhle khulu ngaphezu kwananyana ngiwaphi amazinga.
Lokhu, ngokuya ngami kusebenza okudluleleko ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami kukusebenza okuhle khulu nanyana kungaliphi izinga. 
Lokhu, ngokubona kwami, kusebenza kuhle khulu ngaphezu kwananyana ngiwaphi amazinga.
Lokhu, ngokuya ngami kusebenza okudluleleko ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Lokhu, ngokombono wami kumsebenzi omuhle ngokwezinga elinye nelinye.
Ngithanda nokuveza bona umnyaka ophelileko bewunentjhitjhilo ezinengi, ezithinte kumbi ukwethulwa kwezindlu inarha yoke, kodwana kukhulu khulu ephrovinsini.
Ngithanda ukunitjela godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuzele ngeentjhitjhilo, eziye zaba nomthelela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni mazombe, kodwana khulukhulu esifundeni .
Ngibawa ukutjho godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuneentjhijilo ezinengi, ezenze bona sibhalelwe kukwakhela abantu izindlu enarheni yokana, kodwana kuhlekuhle kilephrovinsi.
Godu ngingathanda ukuveza bona unyaka ophelileko bewuneenselela ezinengi, okube nomphumela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni yoke, kodwana khulukhulu ephrovinsini.  
Ngithanda ukunitjela godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuzele ngeentjhitjhilo, eziye zaba nomthelela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni mazombe, kodwana khulukhulu esifundeni .
Ngibawa ukutjho godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuneentjhijilo ezinengi, ezenze bona sibhalelwe kukwakhela abantu izindlu enarheni yokana, kodwana kuhlekuhle kilephrovinsi.
Godu ngingathanda ukuveza bona unyaka ophelileko bewuneenselela ezinengi, okube nomphumela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni yoke, kodwana khulukhulu ephrovinsini.  
Ngithanda nokuveza bona umnyaka ophelileko bewunentjhitjhilo ezinengi, ezithinte kumbi ukwethulwa kwezindlu inarha yoke, kodwana kukhulu khulu ephrovinsini.
Ngibawa ukutjho godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuneentjhijilo ezinengi, ezenze bona sibhalelwe kukwakhela abantu izindlu enarheni yokana, kodwana kuhlekuhle kilephrovinsi.
Godu ngingathanda ukuveza bona unyaka ophelileko bewuneenselela ezinengi, okube nomphumela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni yoke, kodwana khulukhulu ephrovinsini.  
Ngithanda nokuveza bona umnyaka ophelileko bewunentjhitjhilo ezinengi, ezithinte kumbi ukwethulwa kwezindlu inarha yoke, kodwana kukhulu khulu ephrovinsini.
Ngithanda ukunitjela godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuzele ngeentjhitjhilo, eziye zaba nomthelela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni mazombe, kodwana khulukhulu esifundeni .
Godu ngingathanda ukuveza bona unyaka ophelileko bewuneenselela ezinengi, okube nomphumela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni yoke, kodwana khulukhulu ephrovinsini.  
Ngithanda nokuveza bona umnyaka ophelileko bewunentjhitjhilo ezinengi, ezithinte kumbi ukwethulwa kwezindlu inarha yoke, kodwana kukhulu khulu ephrovinsini.
Ngithanda ukunitjela godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuzele ngeentjhitjhilo, eziye zaba nomthelela omumbi ekwethulweni kwezindlu enarheni mazombe, kodwana khulukhulu esifundeni .
Ngibawa ukutjho godu bona umnyaka ogadungileko bewuneentjhijilo ezinengi, ezenze bona sibhalelwe kukwakhela abantu izindlu enarheni yokana, kodwana kuhlekuhle kilephrovinsi.
Iintjhijilo lezi zibemphumela wokwethulwa kwemigomo emitjha kanye namahlelo afana nokufaka isandla nge-R2 479 kwaloyo ozokwamukela indlu kanye nokwethulwa kweSkimu sokuQinisekisa somKhandlu wokuTloliswa kwaBakhizindlu beNarha ezindlini ezisekelwa ngeemali ngurhulumende.
Iintjhitjhilwezi bezimphumela wokwethulwa kwemithetjhwana neendlela zokurarulula ezifana nemali efakwa bazuzi ema-R2 479 kanye nokwethulwa kweHlelo leWaranti lomKhandlu wokuTlolisa abaKhi bezindlu kaZweloke eendlini ezinemali yokusiza evela embusweni. 
Iintjhijilo lezi  zabangelwa kukwethulwa kwemithetho yemigomo emitjha neendlela ezifana nokunikela kumamukelilifa kwama- R2 479 nokwethulwa nesiKimu  seLizwe sencwadi yobufakazi yesiGungu sokuTlolisa abAkhi bezindlu ezindlini zombuso ezisizwe mbuso ngeemali.
Iinselela lezi zibe mphumela wokwaziswa kwemilayo yomthethomgomo omutjha kanye neendlela zokwenza ezifana nokufaka isandla kwabazuzi okuyi-R2 479 kanye nokwaziswa kweHlelo leWaranthi yomKhandlu wesiTjhaba wokuTloliswa kwabAkhi beziNdlu ezindlwini ezisekelwe ngesibonelelo mbuso.

Iintjhijilo lezi zibemphumela wokwethulwa kwemigomo emitjha kanye namahlelo afana nokufaka isandla nge-R2 479 kwaloyo ozokwamukela indlu kanye nokwethulwa kweSkimu sokuQinisekisa somKhandlu wokuTloliswa kwaBakhizindlu beNarha ezindlini ezisekelwa ngeemali ngurhulumende.
Iintjhitjhilwezi bezimphumela wokwethulwa kwemithetjhwana neendlela zokurarulula ezifana nemali efakwa bazuzi ema-R2 479 kanye nokwethulwa kweHlelo leWaranti lomKhandlu wokuTlolisa abaKhi bezindlu kaZweloke eendlini ezinemali yokusiza evela embusweni. 
Iinselela lezi zibe mphumela wokwaziswa kwemilayo yomthethomgomo omutjha kanye neendlela zokwenza ezifana nokufaka isandla kwabazuzi okuyi-R2 479 kanye nokwaziswa kweHlelo leWaranthi yomKhandlu wesiTjhaba wokuTloliswa kwabAkhi beziNdlu ezindlwini ezisekelwe ngesibonelelo mbuso. 
Iintjhijilo lezi zibemphumela wokwethulwa kwemigomo emitjha kanye namahlelo afana nokufaka isandla nge-R2 479 kwaloyo ozokwamukela indlu kanye nokwethulwa kweSkimu sokuQinisekisa somKhandlu wokuTloliswa kwaBakhizindlu beNarha ezindlini ezisekelwa ngeemali ngurhulumende.
Iintjhitjhilwezi bezimphumela wokwethulwa kwemithetjhwana neendlela zokurarulula ezifana nemali efakwa bazuzi ema-R2 479 kanye nokwethulwa kweHlelo leWaranti lomKhandlu wokuTlolisa abaKhi bezindlu kaZweloke eendlini ezinemali yokusiza evela embusweni. 
Iintjhijilo lezi  zabangelwa kukwethulwa kwemithetho yemigomo emitjha neendlela ezifana nokunikela kumamukelilifa kwama- R2 479 nokwethulwa nesiKimu  seLizwe sencwadi yobufakazi yesiGungu sokuTlolisa abAkhi bezindlu ezindlini zombuso ezisizwe mbuso ngeemali.
Iinjamiso lezi azikanqophi ekukhambiseni buthaka ukwethulwa kwezindlu, kodwana ukuqinisekisa bona abantu bethu bathola izindlu zekhwalithi nebazikghonako. 
Iindlelezi azikanqophi ekwenzeni ukukhamba kabuthaka kwezindlu kodwana kuqinisekisa bona abantu bethu bathola izindlu eziqinileko nokukghonakala ukuhlala kizo.
Iindlela lezi azikanqophi ekwenzeni ukwakhiwa kukhambe kabuthaka kodwana ukwenza isiqiniseko sokobana abantu bathola izindlu ezisezingeni eliphezulu ezithengekako.
Lamagadango awakahlosi ukunanabisa ukwethulwa kweensiza kodwana ahlose ukwenza isiqiniseko sokobana abantu bethu bafumana izindlu zekhwalithi ezithengekako.

Ukufunda esingaphasi kwakho ekuphumeleliseni imigomo le, kwenze bona kube buthaka ukwethulwa kwezindlu.
Isifundo esikiswesi sokukghonakalisa imithetjhwana le, wenze ukwethulwa kwezindlu kwakhamba kabuthaka.
Ukufunda esisakwenzako ekusebenziseni imigomo le kwenze bona ukunikela abantu kube buthaka.
Kodwana lokhu kufunda esikikho ekufezakaliseni lemithethomgomo kunanabise ukwethulwa kweensiza.

Okwenze izinto zathuwelela kukobana umnyangwami usebenze ngaphandle komNqophisi omKhulu iinyanga ezilithoba.

Njeke sengiqatjhe, uNom. Seth Maqethuka, obelethwe bewakhulela khona la eKapa, onelemuko likarhulumende wenarha newemakhaya, ngithanda ukumthokozisa bengimamukele, nanoma sele ngikwenze kanengi lokhu.
Soloko ngaqatjha, uNom Seth Maqethuka, obelethwe bewabeletha ama-Cape Tonian ngelemuko lombuso kaZweloke nowekhaya, ekunguye engithanda ukumkwakwazelela begodu ngimamukele nanyana sengikwenze kanengana lokhu.
Njenganje sengibeke uNom. Seth Maqethuka esikhundleni lesi, wabelethelwa eKapa unamalemuko wombuso welizwe newendawo, ekunguye engifuna ukumthokozisa begodu ngimamukele nalokha besele ngikwenzile lokhu amahlandla amanengana.
Manje ngigcine ngikhombe uNomzana Seth Maqethuka, owabelethelwa bewakhulela e-Cape Town onelemuko embusweni wesitjhaba newemakhaya, engithanda ukumthokozisa nokumamukela nanyana sele ngikwenze amahlandla amanengi lokho.

Nangaphezu kwazo zoke iintjhijilwezi neenqabo, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ebantwini bethu bona umnyango wami ukghonile ukusebenzisa imali engange-R348 million, ekuma-92% wesabelo sezezindlu eTjingalanga Kapa. 
Ngaphandle kwazo zoke iintjhijilo neenthiywezi, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ebantwini bethu bona umnyangwami ukwazile ukusebenzisa ama-R348 wamamiliyoni, okuma-92% wehlinzekelo lezindlu eTjhingalanga Kapa.
Ngaphandle kweentjhijilo lezi kanye nemikhawulo, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukutjela abantu bethu bona umnyango wami  ukghone ukusebenzisa iingidi ezima-R348, okumaphesende ama-92% wesabelo sezindlu e-Western Cape.
Nangaphandle kwazo zoke iintjhijilo neenqabo lezi, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ebantwini bethu bonyana umnyango wami ukghonile ukusebenzisa i-R348 yeengidi, okuyi-92% yesabelo sezindlu se-Western Cape. 
Ngaphandle kwazo zoke iintjhijilo neenthiywezi, ngiyazikhakhazisa ukumemezela ebantwini bethu bona umnyangwami ukwazile ukusebenzisa ama-R348 wamamiliyoni, okuma-92% wehlinzekelo lezindlu eTjhingalanga Kapa.

Ezinye iimfunda kube budisi nokusebenzisa ama-52% wesabelomali waso.
Amanye wamaphrovinsi akhange asebenzise ngitjho amaphesende ama-52%  wesabelo semali yazo.

Lokhu kube nomphumela wokuphasiswa kwesekelo leemali malungana nezindlu elipheze libe zizindlu ezima-25 000. 
Lokhu kwenze bona kuphasiswe okungasenani izindlu zamasabsidi ezizi-25 000.
Lokhu kugcine ekutheni kuphumeleliswe pheze isekelo lemali yezindlu ezima-25 000.
Lokhu kube nomphumela wokuvunywa pheze kweembonelelo zezindlu ezizi-25 000.

Imindeni eminengi etlhagako izobe ithola ithuba lokuthokozela iinthelo zedemokhrasi yethu. 
Inengi lemindeni eminengi etlhagako izokuthola ithuba lokuzithabisa ngeenthelo zentando yenengi 
Inengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakube lithola ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Inengi nenengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakufumana ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Inengi lemindeni eminengi etlhagako izokuthola ithuba lokuzithabisa ngeenthelo zentando yenengi 
Inengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakube lithola ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Inengi nenengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakufumana ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Imindeni eminengi etlhagako izobe ithola ithuba lokuthokozela iinthelo zedemokhrasi yethu. 
Inengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakube lithola ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Inengi nenengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakufumana ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Imindeni eminengi etlhagako izobe ithola ithuba lokuthokozela iinthelo zedemokhrasi yethu. 
Inengi lemindeni eminengi etlhagako izokuthola ithuba lokuzithabisa ngeenthelo zentando yenengi 
Inengi nenengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakufumana ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Imindeni eminengi etlhagako izobe ithola ithuba lokuthokozela iinthelo zedemokhrasi yethu. 
Inengi lemindeni eminengi etlhagako izokuthola ithuba lokuzithabisa ngeenthelo zentando yenengi 
Inengi lemindeni etlhagako lizakube lithola ithuba lokuthabela iinthelo zentando yenengi yethu.
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjengisa ukukhuphuka okukhulu kwamayunidi azi-3000, nakuqathaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko. 
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjho ukungezeleleka okubonakalako kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko.
Lokhu bodade nabobaba, kujamele ukungezeleleka okunamandla kwamayunidi ama-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ogadungileko.
Lokhu bomma nabobaba, kujamele ukwanda okukhulu kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nonyaka odlulileko.  
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjho ukungezeleleka okubonakalako kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko.
Lokhu bodade nabobaba, kujamele ukungezeleleka okunamandla kwamayunidi ama-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ogadungileko.
Lokhu bomma nabobaba, kujamele ukwanda okukhulu kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nonyaka odlulileko.  
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjengisa ukukhuphuka okukhulu kwamayunidi azi-3000, nakuqathaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko. 
Lokhu bodade nabobaba, kujamele ukungezeleleka okunamandla kwamayunidi ama-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ogadungileko.
Lokhu bomma nabobaba, kujamele ukwanda okukhulu kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nonyaka odlulileko.  
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjengisa ukukhuphuka okukhulu kwamayunidi azi-3000, nakuqathaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko. 
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjho ukungezeleleka okubonakalako kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko.
Lokhu bomma nabobaba, kujamele ukwanda okukhulu kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nonyaka odlulileko.  
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjengisa ukukhuphuka okukhulu kwamayunidi azi-3000, nakuqathaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko. 
Lokhu bodade nabafowethu, kutjho ukungezeleleka okubonakalako kwezindlu ezizi-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ophelileko.
Lokhu bodade nabobaba, kujamele ukungezeleleka okunamandla kwamayunidi ama-3000 nakumadaniswa nomnyaka ogadungileko.
Mayelana nalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipalada bephrovinsi le. 
Njeke, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipala esifundeni sethu soke.
Ngalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokozela indima eqakathekileko edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi yethu.
Kilokhu, ngithanda ukuvuma ukuqakatheka kwendima edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi. 
Njeke, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipala esifundeni sethu soke.
Ngalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokozela indima eqakathekileko edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi yethu.
Kilokhu, ngithanda ukuvuma ukuqakatheka kwendima edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi. 
Mayelana nalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipalada bephrovinsi le. 
Ngalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokozela indima eqakathekileko edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi yethu.
Kilokhu, ngithanda ukuvuma ukuqakatheka kwendima edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi. 
Mayelana nalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipalada bephrovinsi le. 
Njeke, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipala esifundeni sethu soke.
Kilokhu, ngithanda ukuvuma ukuqakatheka kwendima edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi. 
Mayelana nalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipalada bephrovinsi le. 
Njeke, ngithanda ukuthokoza indima eqakathekileko edlalwe bomasipala esifundeni sethu soke.
Ngalokhu, ngithanda ukuthokozela indima eqakathekileko edlalwa bomasipala ngaphakathi kwephrovinsi yethu.
Ngaphandle kokuzimisela nomsebenzabo omuhle, bengeze sakghona ukusebenzisa imali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela nokuzinikela emsebenzini, bengekhe sikwazi ukusebenzisa isabelomali yethu.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nangomsebenzi omuhle, besingeze sakghona ukusebenzisa iimali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nomsebenzi omuhle khulu, besingeze sikghone ukusebenzisa lemali.  
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela nokuzinikela emsebenzini, bengekhe sikwazi ukusebenzisa isabelomali yethu.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nangomsebenzi omuhle, besingeze sakghona ukusebenzisa iimali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nomsebenzi omuhle khulu, besingeze sikghone ukusebenzisa lemali.  
Ngaphandle kokuzimisela nomsebenzabo omuhle, bengeze sakghona ukusebenzisa imali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nangomsebenzi omuhle, besingeze sakghona ukusebenzisa iimali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nomsebenzi omuhle khulu, besingeze sikghone ukusebenzisa lemali.  
Ngaphandle kokuzimisela nomsebenzabo omuhle, bengeze sakghona ukusebenzisa imali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela nokuzinikela emsebenzini, bengekhe sikwazi ukusebenzisa isabelomali yethu.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nomsebenzi omuhle khulu, besingeze sikghone ukusebenzisa lemali.  
Ngaphandle kokuzimisela nomsebenzabo omuhle, bengeze sakghona ukusebenzisa imali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela nokuzinikela emsebenzini, bengekhe sikwazi ukusebenzisa isabelomali yethu.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nangomsebenzi omuhle, besingeze sakghona ukusebenzisa iimali.
Ngisese lapho, ngithanda ukuthokozisa iDorobha leKapa elikghone ukusebenzisa imali engaba-70% wesabelomali salo. 
Ngayo leyo ndlela, ngithanda ukukwakwazelela iDorobha leKapa ngokusebenzisa ama-70% wesabelomali sethu.
Ngokufanako, ngithanda ukuthokozisa iDorobho le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa amaphesende ama-70% yesabelo sethu seemali.
Ngokufanako, ngingathanda ukuthokozisa iDorobha le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa i-70% yesabelo sethu.  
Ngayo leyo ndlela, ngithanda ukukwakwazelela iDorobha leKapa ngokusebenzisa ama-70% wesabelomali sethu.
Ngokufanako, ngithanda ukuthokozisa iDorobho le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa amaphesende ama-70% yesabelo sethu seemali.
Ngokufanako, ngingathanda ukuthokozisa iDorobha le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa i-70% yesabelo sethu.

Ngokufanako, ngithanda ukuthokozisa iDorobho le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa amaphesende ama-70% yesabelo sethu seemali.
Ngokufanako, ngingathanda ukuthokozisa iDorobha le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa i-70% yesabelo sethu.

Ngokufanako, ngingathanda ukuthokozisa iDorobha le-Cape Town ngokusebenzisa i-70% yesabelo sethu.

Angeze ngakhohlwa iimphathiswa zami ngokusebenza budisi kwazo kanye negalelo lazo embonweni wethu wokwakhela isitjhaba izindlu.
Ngingakhohlwa abasebenzi bami ekusebenzeni ngokuzikhandla nekunikeleni kunembo-mbono lethu lokwakhela isitjhaba izindlu.
Ngingazikhohlwa iinkhulu zami ngokusebenza kwabo ngamandla nokunikela embonweni wethu wokwakhela isitjhaba izindlu.
Godu angikhohlwa iimphathiswa zami ngokusebenza kwazo budisi kanye nokufaka isandla embonweni wethu wokufaka ngeendlini isitjhaba sethu. 
Ngingakhohlwa abasebenzi bami ekusebenzeni ngokuzikhandla nekunikeleni kunembo-mbono lethu lokwakhela isitjhaba izindlu.

Bodade nabafowethu,  ngizobe nginganaqinso kunembeza wami nanginikela isithombe esihle sodwa ngehlelo lokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Bodade nabafowethu, angeze ngaba neqiniso eenlayelweni zomkhumbulwami nangininikela ngesithombe esihle ngokwethulwa kwezindlu kwaphela. 
Bodade nabobaba, ngizabe ngingakhulumi iqiniso ehliziyweni yami nangabe nginikele isithombe esihle kwaphela sekambiso yokunikelwa kwezindlu.
Bomma nabobaba, ngizabe nginganaqiniso kunembeza wami nayikuthi benginganikela kuphela ngesithombe esihle ngekambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu. 
Bodade nabafowethu, angeze ngaba neqiniso eenlayelweni zomkhumbulwami nangininikela ngesithombe esihle ngokwethulwa kwezindlu kwaphela.

Kusese neenkhala eziseleko ehlelweni lethu lokwethula izindlu. 
Kusese khona okutlhayelako ekambiswenethu yokwethula.
Kuseseneenkhala ezisesekhona endleleni yekambiso yethu yokunikela.
Kuneenkhala ezisaleleko ekambisweni yethu yokwethulwa kweensiza. 
Kusese khona okutlhayelako ekambiswenethu yokwethula.
Kuseseneenkhala ezisesekhona endleleni yekambiso yethu yokunikela.
Kuneenkhala ezisaleleko ekambisweni yethu yokwethulwa kweensiza. 
Kusese neenkhala eziseleko ehlelweni lethu lokwethula izindlu. 
Kuseseneenkhala ezisesekhona endleleni yekambiso yethu yokunikela.
Kuneenkhala ezisaleleko ekambisweni yethu yokwethulwa kweensiza. 
Kusese neenkhala eziseleko ehlelweni lethu lokwethula izindlu. 
Kusese khona okutlhayelako ekambiswenethu yokwethula.
Kuneenkhala ezisaleleko ekambisweni yethu yokwethulwa kweensiza. 
Kusese neenkhala eziseleko ehlelweni lethu lokwethula izindlu. 
Kusese khona okutlhayelako ekambiswenethu yokwethula.
Kuseseneenkhala ezisesekhona endleleni yekambiso yethu yokunikela.

Kuze kube lapha, sidinga ukuthuthukisa besigandelele eendaweni ezilandelako:

Ukufika lapha, sisatlhoga ukwenza ngcono eendaweni ezirhabekileko ezilandelako:

Bekufike lapha, sisatlhoga ukobana senze ngcono kileziindawo  ezirhabekileko ezilandelako:
Izindlu zethu ezinengi azikathomi ukukhambisana netjhuguluko lomgomo kusuka ebunengini bezindlu ukuya ekhwalithini yezindlu.
Ezinye zezindlu zethu azikathobeli umthetho wokutjheja othi kufanele kutjhejwe ikhwalithi yezindlu kunokutjheja inani lazo.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikabi ukukhambisana nomgomo wokutjhida kumanani ukuya ezindlini ezisezingeni eliphezulu.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikakhambisani nokutjhuguluka komthethomgomo ukusuka ebunengini ukuya kukhwalithi. 
Ezinye zezindlu zethu azikathobeli umthetho wokutjheja othi kufanele kutjhejwe ikhwalithi yezindlu kunokutjheja inani lazo.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikabi ukukhambisana nomgomo wokutjhida kumanani ukuya ezindlini ezisezingeni eliphezulu.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikakhambisani nokutjhuguluka komthethomgomo ukusuka ebunengini ukuya kukhwalithi. 
Izindlu zethu ezinengi azikathomi ukukhambisana netjhuguluko lomgomo kusuka ebunengini bezindlu ukuya ekhwalithini yezindlu.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikabi ukukhambisana nomgomo wokutjhida kumanani ukuya ezindlini ezisezingeni eliphezulu.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikakhambisani nokutjhuguluka komthethomgomo ukusuka ebunengini ukuya kukhwalithi. 
Izindlu zethu ezinengi azikathomi ukukhambisana netjhuguluko lomgomo kusuka ebunengini bezindlu ukuya ekhwalithini yezindlu.
Ezinye zezindlu zethu azikathobeli umthetho wokutjheja othi kufanele kutjhejwe ikhwalithi yezindlu kunokutjheja inani lazo.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikakhambisani nokutjhuguluka komthethomgomo ukusuka ebunengini ukuya kukhwalithi. 
Izindlu zethu ezinengi azikathomi ukukhambisana netjhuguluko lomgomo kusuka ebunengini bezindlu ukuya ekhwalithini yezindlu.
Ezinye zezindlu zethu azikathobeli umthetho wokutjheja othi kufanele kutjhejwe ikhwalithi yezindlu kunokutjheja inani lazo.
Inengi lezindlu zethu alikabi ukukhambisana nomgomo wokutjhida kumanani ukuya ezindlini ezisezingeni eliphezulu.
Kusatlhogeka bona sitjhugulule ihlelo lokwethula izindlu kusuka kilelo lokunikela ngobusithelo, kube ngilelo eliragela phambili ngokuhlalisa abantu kuhle.
Sifanele sitjhugulule ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu yokunikela ngendawo yokuhlala kwaphela siyenze ibe yindawo yokuhlala yabantu yasafuthi. 
Kusafuneka sitjhugulule ikambiso yokunikelwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ubusithelo ukuya kileyo yokwakha izindlu ezifaneleko zokuhlala abantu.
Sisatlhoga ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ngobuphephelo ukuya kileyo yokwenza iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezinzinzileko. 
Sifanele sitjhugulule ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu yokunikela ngendawo yokuhlala kwaphela siyenze ibe yindawo yokuhlala yabantu yasafuthi. 
Kusafuneka sitjhugulule ikambiso yokunikelwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ubusithelo ukuya kileyo yokwakha izindlu ezifaneleko zokuhlala abantu.
Sisatlhoga ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ngobuphephelo ukuya kileyo yokwenza iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezinzinzileko. 
Kusatlhogeka bona sitjhugulule ihlelo lokwethula izindlu kusuka kilelo lokunikela ngobusithelo, kube ngilelo eliragela phambili ngokuhlalisa abantu kuhle.
Kusafuneka sitjhugulule ikambiso yokunikelwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ubusithelo ukuya kileyo yokwakha izindlu ezifaneleko zokuhlala abantu.
Sisatlhoga ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ngobuphephelo ukuya kileyo yokwenza iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezinzinzileko. 
Kusatlhogeka bona sitjhugulule ihlelo lokwethula izindlu kusuka kilelo lokunikela ngobusithelo, kube ngilelo eliragela phambili ngokuhlalisa abantu kuhle.
Sifanele sitjhugulule ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu yokunikela ngendawo yokuhlala kwaphela siyenze ibe yindawo yokuhlala yabantu yasafuthi. 
Sisatlhoga ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ngobuphephelo ukuya kileyo yokwenza iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezinzinzileko. 
Kusatlhogeka bona sitjhugulule ihlelo lokwethula izindlu kusuka kilelo lokunikela ngobusithelo, kube ngilelo eliragela phambili ngokuhlalisa abantu kuhle.
Sifanele sitjhugulule ikambiso yokwethulwa kwezindlu yokunikela ngendawo yokuhlala kwaphela siyenze ibe yindawo yokuhlala yabantu yasafuthi. 
Kusafuneka sitjhugulule ikambiso yokunikelwa kwezindlu ukusuka kileyo yokunikela ubusithelo ukuya kileyo yokwakha izindlu ezifaneleko zokuhlala abantu.
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya kwalabo abazuzako, kusuka ekuzibandakanyeni sidu, ukuya ekuzibandakanyeni okumajadu.
Sifuna ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi kusuka ekubeni buthuntu bube ngobumajadu.
Kufanele sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya okwenziwa bamukelilifa balise ukuzibandakanya ngesidu babe babantu abazibandakanya ngokumajadu.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi ukusuka ekuzibandakanyeni kokubukela ukuya kokuzibandakanya. 
Sifuna ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi kusuka ekubeni buthuntu bube ngobumajadu.
Kufanele sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya okwenziwa bamukelilifa balise ukuzibandakanya ngesidu babe babantu abazibandakanya ngokumajadu.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi ukusuka ekuzibandakanyeni kokubukela ukuya kokuzibandakanya. 
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya kwalabo abazuzako, kusuka ekuzibandakanyeni sidu, ukuya ekuzibandakanyeni okumajadu.
Kufanele sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya okwenziwa bamukelilifa balise ukuzibandakanya ngesidu babe babantu abazibandakanya ngokumajadu.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi ukusuka ekuzibandakanyeni kokubukela ukuya kokuzibandakanya. 
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya kwalabo abazuzako, kusuka ekuzibandakanyeni sidu, ukuya ekuzibandakanyeni okumajadu.
Sifuna ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi kusuka ekubeni buthuntu bube ngobumajadu.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi ukusuka ekuzibandakanyeni kokubukela ukuya kokuzibandakanya. 
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya kwalabo abazuzako, kusuka ekuzibandakanyeni sidu, ukuya ekuzibandakanyeni okumajadu.
Sifuna ukutjhugulula ukuzibandakanya kwabazuzi kusuka ekubeni buthuntu bube ngobumajadu.
Kufanele sitjhugulule ukuzibandakanya okwenziwa bamukelilifa balise ukuzibandakanya ngesidu babe babantu abazibandakanya ngokumajadu.
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze bathome ukuqala izindlu ebasizwa ngurhulunde ngazo, ingasi njengomkhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla yesikhathi eside.
Kufanele sitjhugulule lokhu okucatjangwa babantu bona bangathathi izindlu zesabsidi njengemikhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla. 
Kufanele sitjhugulule imikhumbulo yabantu bethu ukuze bakghone ukuqala izindlu ezisekelwa mbuso ngeemali ingasi njengemikhiqizo kwaphela kodwana njengepahla umuntu anayo.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula imikhumbulo yabantu bethu khona bazakuthoma ukuqala izindlu ezinikelwa mbuso ingasi njengemikhiqizo kuphela, kodwana njengepahla.   
Kufanele sitjhugulule lokhu okucatjangwa babantu bona bangathathi izindlu zesabsidi njengemikhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla. 
Kufanele sitjhugulule imikhumbulo yabantu bethu ukuze bakghone ukuqala izindlu ezisekelwa mbuso ngeemali ingasi njengemikhiqizo kwaphela kodwana njengepahla umuntu anayo.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula imikhumbulo yabantu bethu khona bazakuthoma ukuqala izindlu ezinikelwa mbuso ingasi njengemikhiqizo kuphela, kodwana njengepahla.   
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze bathome ukuqala izindlu ebasizwa ngurhulunde ngazo, ingasi njengomkhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla yesikhathi eside.
Kufanele sitjhugulule imikhumbulo yabantu bethu ukuze bakghone ukuqala izindlu ezisekelwa mbuso ngeemali ingasi njengemikhiqizo kwaphela kodwana njengepahla umuntu anayo.
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula imikhumbulo yabantu bethu khona bazakuthoma ukuqala izindlu ezinikelwa mbuso ingasi njengemikhiqizo kuphela, kodwana njengepahla.   
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze bathome ukuqala izindlu ebasizwa ngurhulunde ngazo, ingasi njengomkhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla yesikhathi eside.
Kufanele sitjhugulule lokhu okucatjangwa babantu bona bangathathi izindlu zesabsidi njengemikhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla. 
Sitlhoga ukutjhugulula imikhumbulo yabantu bethu khona bazakuthoma ukuqala izindlu ezinikelwa mbuso ingasi njengemikhiqizo kuphela, kodwana njengepahla.   
Sitlhoga bona sitjhugulule iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze bathome ukuqala izindlu ebasizwa ngurhulunde ngazo, ingasi njengomkhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla yesikhathi eside.
Kufanele sitjhugulule lokhu okucatjangwa babantu bona bangathathi izindlu zesabsidi njengemikhiqizo nje, kodwana njengepahla. 
Kufanele sitjhugulule imikhumbulo yabantu bethu ukuze bakghone ukuqala izindlu ezisekelwa mbuso ngeemali ingasi njengemikhiqizo kwaphela kodwana njengepahla umuntu anayo.

IMISEBENZI YESIPHOLISA IYASEBENZA EENDAWENI ZEENGODI
IKORO YEZOKUVIKELA IYASEBENZA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LELAWULO LAMAPHOLISA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LOKULAWULA
IKORO YEZOKUVIKELA IYASEBENZA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LELAWULO LAMAPHOLISA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LOKULAWULA

IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LELAWULO LAMAPHOLISA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LOKULAWULA
IMISEBENZI YESIPHOLISA IYASEBENZA EENDAWENI ZEENGODI
IKORO YEZOKUVIKELA IYASEBENZA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LOKULAWULA
IMISEBENZI YESIPHOLISA IYASEBENZA EENDAWENI ZEENGODI
IKORO YEZOKUVIKELA IYASEBENZA
IMISEBENZI YEPHIKO LELAWULO LAMAPHOLISA
Kwaba lithabo elikhulu kumma lokha nakahlanganiswa nomntwanakhe weengazi godi onamalanga ali-16 ubudala uJames Busakwe  ngomhlaka 7 kuSihlabantanga 2006.
Umthwalo omkhulu owasukako emahlombe kamma nomntwana kulokha uJames Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 abuyiselwa kunina weengazi ngezi-7 Sihlabantangana 2006. 
Umma nomntwana bakhululeka khulu lokha umntwana ongu-James Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 ubudala nakahlanganiswa nonina ombelethako ngomhlaka-7 kusiHlabantangana 2006.
Kwaba nokuzigedla okukhulu kunina nomntwana lokha u-James Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 ubudala nakahlanganiswa butjha nonina wamabeletho ngomhlaka 7 Apreli 2006.  
Umthwalo omkhulu owasukako emahlombe kamma nomntwana kulokha uJames Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 abuyiselwa kunina weengazi ngezi-7 Sihlabantangana 2006. 
Umma nomntwana bakhululeka khulu lokha umntwana ongu-James Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 ubudala nakahlanganiswa nonina ombelethako ngomhlaka-7 kusiHlabantangana 2006.
Kwaba nokuzigedla okukhulu kunina nomntwana lokha u-James Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 ubudala nakahlanganiswa butjha nonina wamabeletho ngomhlaka 7 Apreli 2006.

Kwaba lithabo elikhulu kumma lokha nakahlanganiswa nomntwanakhe weengazi godi onamalanga ali-16 ubudala uJames Busakwe  ngomhlaka 7 kuSihlabantanga 2006.
Umthwalo omkhulu owasukako emahlombe kamma nomntwana kulokha uJames Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 abuyiselwa kunina weengazi ngezi-7 Sihlabantangana 2006. 
Umma nomntwana bakhululeka khulu lokha umntwana ongu-James Busakwe onamalanga ali-16 ubudala nakahlanganiswa nonina ombelethako ngomhlaka-7 kusiHlabantangana 2006.
Into embi le yathoma lokha unina lomntwana uJames nakafika esiBhedlela i-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 kuSihlabantangana nakayokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, abasebenzi abamanesi bayelela bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, owathi ungumma weengazi womntwana ngayizolo kwakhona. 
Umtlhago uthome lokha unina lomntwana onguJames afika esiBhedlela seKlerksdorp ngezi-6 Sihlabantangana avakatjhela umntwanakhe womsana, umhlengikazi wegumbelo wayelela bona elangeni eligadungileko umntwana unikelwe omunye umma ozithethe njengomma weengazi womntwana. 
Umtlhago wathoma lokha unina lomntwanyana uJames nakafika esibhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana azokuvakatjhela indodana yakhe, begodu isisebenzi esingunese salemuka bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, othe ungunina ombelethako elangeni eligadungileko.
Umraro wathoma lokha unina laka-James nakazakufika esiBhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 Apreli ukuzokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, begodu abonesi babona bonyana umntwana wayenikelwe omunye umma, owathi nguye unina lomntwana wamabeletho ngelanga eladlulako.  
Umtlhago uthome lokha unina lomntwana onguJames afika esiBhedlela seKlerksdorp ngezi-6 Sihlabantangana avakatjhela umntwanakhe womsana, umhlengikazi wegumbelo wayelela bona elangeni eligadungileko umntwana unikelwe omunye umma ozithethe njengomma weengazi womntwana. 
Umtlhago wathoma lokha unina lomntwanyana uJames nakafika esibhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana azokuvakatjhela indodana yakhe, begodu isisebenzi esingunese salemuka bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, othe ungunina ombelethako elangeni eligadungileko.
Umraro wathoma lokha unina laka-James nakazakufika esiBhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 Apreli ukuzokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, begodu abonesi babona bonyana umntwana wayenikelwe omunye umma, owathi nguye unina lomntwana wamabeletho ngelanga eladlulako.  
Into embi le yathoma lokha unina lomntwana uJames nakafika esiBhedlela i-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 kuSihlabantangana nakayokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, abasebenzi abamanesi bayelela bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, owathi ungumma weengazi womntwana ngayizolo kwakhona. 
Umtlhago wathoma lokha unina lomntwanyana uJames nakafika esibhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana azokuvakatjhela indodana yakhe, begodu isisebenzi esingunese salemuka bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, othe ungunina ombelethako elangeni eligadungileko.
Umraro wathoma lokha unina laka-James nakazakufika esiBhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 Apreli ukuzokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, begodu abonesi babona bonyana umntwana wayenikelwe omunye umma, owathi nguye unina lomntwana wamabeletho ngelanga eladlulako.  
Into embi le yathoma lokha unina lomntwana uJames nakafika esiBhedlela i-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 kuSihlabantangana nakayokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, abasebenzi abamanesi bayelela bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, owathi ungumma weengazi womntwana ngayizolo kwakhona. 
Umtlhago uthome lokha unina lomntwana onguJames afika esiBhedlela seKlerksdorp ngezi-6 Sihlabantangana avakatjhela umntwanakhe womsana, umhlengikazi wegumbelo wayelela bona elangeni eligadungileko umntwana unikelwe omunye umma ozithethe njengomma weengazi womntwana. 
Umraro wathoma lokha unina laka-James nakazakufika esiBhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 Apreli ukuzokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, begodu abonesi babona bonyana umntwana wayenikelwe omunye umma, owathi nguye unina lomntwana wamabeletho ngelanga eladlulako.  
Into embi le yathoma lokha unina lomntwana uJames nakafika esiBhedlela i-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka 6 kuSihlabantangana nakayokuvakatjhela indodanakhe, abasebenzi abamanesi bayelela bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, owathi ungumma weengazi womntwana ngayizolo kwakhona. 
Umtlhago uthome lokha unina lomntwana onguJames afika esiBhedlela seKlerksdorp ngezi-6 Sihlabantangana avakatjhela umntwanakhe womsana, umhlengikazi wegumbelo wayelela bona elangeni eligadungileko umntwana unikelwe omunye umma ozithethe njengomma weengazi womntwana. 
Umtlhago wathoma lokha unina lomntwanyana uJames nakafika esibhedlela se-Klerksdorp ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana azokuvakatjhela indodana yakhe, begodu isisebenzi esingunese salemuka bona umntwana unikelwe omunye umma, othe ungunina ombelethako elangeni eligadungileko.
Khonokho ngemva kokuyelela lokho, amanesi azisa iSitetjhi samaPholisa seKanana, njengoba umma othethe uJames wanikela nge-adresi yeKanana. 
Ngemva kobana umntwana atholwe, abahlengikazi babika umlandu esiTetjhini samaPholisa seKanana, njengobana umma othethe uJames anikele ngesiphande seKanana.
Msinyazana nje nasele bakubonile lokho, abonese bazisa isiTetjhi samaPholisa weKanana, njengombana umma uze wazokuthatha uJames anikele isiphande seKanana.
Msinyana ngemva kokufumana lokhu, abonesi bazisa isiTetjhi samaPholisa seKanana, ngombana umma owayethethe u-James wanikela i-adresi eseKanana.
Ngemva kobana umntwana atholwe, abahlengikazi babika umlandu esiTetjhini samaPholisa seKanana, njengobana umma othethe uJames anikele ngesiphande seKanana.

Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana akhange kusize lokho.
Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana azange kube netlha.
Isiphande lesi sahlolwa kodwana akhange saziwe.
I-adresi yahlolwa kodwana ngaphandle kwepumelelo. 
Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana azange kube netlha.
Isiphande lesi sahlolwa kodwana akhange saziwe.

Isiphande lesi sahlolwa kodwana akhange saziwe.
I-adresi yahlolwa kodwana ngaphandle kwepumelelo. 
Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana akhange kusize lokho.
Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana azange kube netlha.
I-adresi yahlolwa kodwana ngaphandle kwepumelelo. 
Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana akhange kusize lokho.
Isiphande sahlolwa kodwana azange kube netlha.
Isiphande lesi sahlolwa kodwana akhange saziwe.
Akunamuntu obekanegama nofana ofaniseke nehlathululo yomfazi lo kile i-adresi.
Akunamuntu wegama elinjalo nofana ohlathululwa njengomma onjalo kilesosiphande.
Akekho umuntu webizo nanyana wehlathululo kamma lo obekaziwa kilesi siphande.
Akunamuntu owayenebizo namkha ihlathululo yomma owayesaziwa kile-adresi. 
Akunamuntu wegama elinjalo nofana ohlathululwa njengomma onjalo kilesosiphande.
Akekho umuntu webizo nanyana wehlathululo kamma lo obekaziwa kilesi siphande.
Akunamuntu owayenebizo namkha ihlathululo yomma owayesaziwa kile-adresi.

Akekho umuntu webizo nanyana wehlathululo kamma lo obekaziwa kilesi siphande.

Akunamuntu obekanegama nofana ofaniseke nehlathululo yomfazi lo kile i-adresi.
Akunamuntu wegama elinjalo nofana ohlathululwa njengomma onjalo kilesosiphande.
Akunamuntu owayenebizo namkha ihlathululo yomma owayesaziwa kile-adresi.

Akunamuntu wegama elinjalo nofana ohlathululwa njengomma onjalo kilesosiphande.
Akekho umuntu webizo nanyana wehlathululo kamma lo obekaziwa kilesi siphande.
Ebusuku bangomhlaka-6 kuSihlabantana i-CPF yeKanana yaba nomhlangano. 
Ngomhlaka-6 Sihlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku bangomhlaka 6 Apreli i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano. 
Ngomhlaka-6 Sihlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku bangomhlaka 6 Apreli i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano. 
Ebusuku bangomhlaka-6 kuSihlabantana i-CPF yeKanana yaba nomhlangano. 
Ebusuku ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku bangomhlaka 6 Apreli i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano. 
Ebusuku bangomhlaka-6 kuSihlabantana i-CPF yeKanana yaba nomhlangano. 
Ngomhlaka-6 Sihlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku bangomhlaka 6 Apreli i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano. 
Ebusuku bangomhlaka-6 kuSihlabantana i-CPF yeKanana yaba nomhlangano. 
Ngomhlaka-6 Sihlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ebusuku ngomhlaka-6 kusiHlabantangana i-CPF yeKanana yabamba umhlangano.
Ibambela lakakomitjhinara lazisa labo ebebasemhlanganweni ngokuthunjwa komntwana begodu wakhombela boke abantu bona bahlale bavule amehlo neendlebe. 
Ukhomtjhinara wesitetjhini nongumjaphethe watjela umhlangano ngomntwana othunjiweko begodu wakhombela bona omunye nomunye umuntu ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.
Umjaphethe  kakomitjhinari wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngomntwana owetjiweko wakhombela bona woke umuntu kufanele avule amehlo begodu alalele.
Umjaphethe kakomitjhinara wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa komntwana bewabawa woke umuntu ukobana ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.  
Ukhomtjhinara wesitetjhini nongumjaphethe watjela umhlangano ngomntwana othunjiweko begodu wakhombela bona omunye nomunye umuntu ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.
Umjaphethe  kakomitjhinari wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngomntwana owetjiweko wakhombela bona woke umuntu kufanele avule amehlo begodu alalele.
Umjaphethe kakomitjhinara wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa komntwana bewabawa woke umuntu ukobana ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.  
Ibambela lakakomitjhinara lazisa labo ebebasemhlanganweni ngokuthunjwa komntwana begodu wakhombela boke abantu bona bahlale bavule amehlo neendlebe. 
Umjaphethe  kakomitjhinari wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngomntwana owetjiweko wakhombela bona woke umuntu kufanele avule amehlo begodu alalele.
Umjaphethe kakomitjhinara wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa komntwana bewabawa woke umuntu ukobana ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.  
Ibambela lakakomitjhinara lazisa labo ebebasemhlanganweni ngokuthunjwa komntwana begodu wakhombela boke abantu bona bahlale bavule amehlo neendlebe. 
Ukhomtjhinara wesitetjhini nongumjaphethe watjela umhlangano ngomntwana othunjiweko begodu wakhombela bona omunye nomunye umuntu ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.
Umjaphethe kakomitjhinara wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngokuthunjwa komntwana bewabawa woke umuntu ukobana ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.  
Ibambela lakakomitjhinara lazisa labo ebebasemhlanganweni ngokuthunjwa komntwana begodu wakhombela boke abantu bona bahlale bavule amehlo neendlebe. 
Ukhomtjhinara wesitetjhini nongumjaphethe watjela umhlangano ngomntwana othunjiweko begodu wakhombela bona omunye nomunye umuntu ahlale avule amehlo neendlebe.
Umjaphethe  kakomitjhinari wesitetjhi wazisa umhlangano ngomntwana owetjiweko wakhombela bona woke umuntu kufanele avule amehlo begodu alalele.
Ngabo 23:00 ngobusuku lobo, elinye ilunga lomphakathi ladosela amapholisa umtato ngelwazi lokuthi omunye umfazi ohlala esigodini sakhe, obekangaziwa njengozithweleko, ngokungakalindeleki uvele waba nomntwana womsana.
Ngeenkhathi zabo-23:00 kubo ubusukobo, omunye wamalunga womphakathi wabiza amapholisa watjela amapholisa bona omunye umma ohlala ngebhlogweni lakhe, nowazeka njengomuntu ozithweleko, msinyazana nje sele anomntwana womsana .
Pheze ngesikhathi se-iri le-23:00 ebusuku bamhlokho, omunye wamalunga womphakathi wabethela amapholisa umtato anelwazi lokobana umma ohlala endaweni yakhe, begodu ebebangamazi bona usidisi, msinyazana nje sekanomntwana womsana kuye.
Pheze ngo-23:00 ebusuku bamhlokho, elinye lamalunga womphakathi ladosela amapholisa ngelwazi bona umma ohlala ekorweni yakhe, begodu nokwaziwa bona wayezithwele, msinyana wayephethe umsanyana.

Amapholisa alandelela ilwazelo nangembala bathola umma lowo nomntwana.
Amapholisa alandelela ilwazi begodu kwamambala athola umma nomntwana.

Abasebenzi besibhedlela babizwa begodu khonokho bakhomba umntwana kanye nomfazi obegade athumbe umntwana esibhedlela. 
Abasebenzi besibhedlela baye babizwa msinyana nangembala bamfanisa umntwana, nomma omthumbe esibhedlela.
Iinsebenzi zesibhedlela zabizwa nazo begodu msinyazana nje zambona umntwana, kanye nomma omebe esibhedlela.
Abasebenzi besibhedlela babizwa  begodu msinyana bafanisa umntwana kanye nomma owayemthumbe esibhedlela.  
Abasebenzi besibhedlela baye babizwa msinyana nangembala bamfanisa umntwana, nomma omthumbe esibhedlela.

Abasebenzi besibhedlela babizwa begodu khonokho bakhomba umntwana kanye nomfazi obegade athumbe umntwana esibhedlela. 
Abasebenzi besibhedlela baye babizwa msinyana nangembala bamfanisa umntwana, nomma omthumbe esibhedlela.
Iinsebenzi zesibhedlela zabizwa nazo begodu msinyazana nje zambona umntwana, kanye nomma omebe esibhedlela.
Ubufakazi obuhlukileko, okufakahlangana nebhengele yeplastiki yesibhedlela, yatholwa endlini yomsolwa.
Ubufakazi obahlukahlukeneko, obufaka hlangana ibhengele leplastiki lesibhedlela, litholakale kiyo indlu yomsolwa.
Ubufakazi obuhlukeneko, kufakwe hlangana idzila yesibhedlela yeplastiki, yatholwa endlini yomsolwa.
Ubufakazi obuhlukeneko, kufaka ibhengele yesibhedlela yeplastiki, bafunyanwa ngendlini yomsolwa.  
Ubufakazi obahlukahlukeneko, obufaka hlangana ibhengele leplastiki lesibhedlela, litholakale kiyo indlu yomsolwa.

Umfazi loyo wabotjhwa begodu umntwana obekangakalinyazwa wabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho ahlanganiswa nonina wamambala ekuseni ngelanga elilandelako.
Umma uye wabotjhwa bese umntwana ongakalimali wathathwa wasiwa esibhedlela, lapho ahlanganiswe nonina weengazi elangeni elilandelako.
Umma wabotjhwa begodu umntwana ongakalinyazwa wathathwa wasiwa esibhedlela, lapha ahlanganiswa nonina wamambala elangeni elilandelako ekuseni.
Umma lo wabotjhwa begodu umntwana ongakalimali wabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho ahlanganiswa butjha nonina wamambala ngakusasa ekuseni.
Umma uye wabotjhwa bese umntwana ongakalimali wathathwa wasiwa esibhedlela, lapho ahlanganiswe nonina weengazi elangeni elilandelako.
Umma wabotjhwa begodu umntwana ongakalinyazwa wathathwa wasiwa esibhedlela, lapha ahlanganiswa nonina wamambala elangeni elilandelako ekuseni.
Umma lo wabotjhwa begodu umntwana ongakalimali wabuyiselwa esibhedlela, lapho ahlanganiswa butjha nonina wamambala ngakusasa ekuseni.

Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana kufanele kubethelwe ihlombe, njengombana kutjengise ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini zabantu. 
Imisebenzi yamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana, kufanele ikwakwazelelwe, njengobana itjengisa ubugugu bezokuVikela bomPhakathi.
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi egade ubandakanyeka ekutholeni umntwana, kufanele ubethelwe izandla, njengombana zitjengisa ukuqakatheka  kokuTjheja umPhakathi. 
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi athinteka ekufunyanweni komntwana kufuze zibethelwe isandla ngombana zatjengisa ukuqakatheka kwesiPholisa somPhakathi. 
Imisebenzi yamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana, kufanele ikwakwazelelwe, njengobana itjengisa ubugugu bezokuVikela bomPhakathi.
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi egade ubandakanyeka ekutholeni umntwana, kufanele ubethelwe izandla, njengombana zitjengisa ukuqakatheka  kokuTjheja umPhakathi. 
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi athinteka ekufunyanweni komntwana kufuze zibethelwe isandla ngombana zatjengisa ukuqakatheka kwesiPholisa somPhakathi. 
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana kufanele kubethelwe ihlombe, njengombana kutjengise ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini zabantu. 
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi egade ubandakanyeka ekutholeni umntwana, kufanele ubethelwe izandla, njengombana zitjengisa ukuqakatheka  kokuTjheja umPhakathi. 
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi athinteka ekufunyanweni komntwana kufuze zibethelwe isandla ngombana zatjengisa ukuqakatheka kwesiPholisa somPhakathi.
