Imisebenzi yamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana, kufanele ikwakwazelelwe, njengobana itjengisa ubugugu bezokuVikela bomPhakathi.
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi athinteka ekufunyanweni komntwana kufuze zibethelwe isandla ngombana zatjengisa ukuqakatheka kwesiPholisa somPhakathi. 
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana kufanele kubethelwe ihlombe, njengombana kutjengise ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini zabantu. 
Imisebenzi yamalunga womphakathi abandakanyeka ekutholweni komntwana, kufanele ikwakwazelelwe, njengobana itjengisa ubugugu bezokuVikela bomPhakathi.
Izenzo zamalunga womphakathi egade ubandakanyeka ekutholeni umntwana, kufanele ubethelwe izandla, njengombana zitjengisa ukuqakatheka  kokuTjheja umPhakathi. 
Ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini nawenziwa bewugcinwe kuhle, kufanele ungaqalelwa phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kweKoro yezokuVikela ekghonakalisiweko nelawulwe kuhle, akukafaneli bona ithathelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko lamaPholisa elisetjenziswako begodu elitjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli linyazwe. 
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko eliLawulako esele lisebenza begodu litjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli bona kuqalelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kweKoro yezokuVikela ekghonakalisiweko nelawulwe kuhle, akukafaneli bona ithathelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko lamaPholisa elisetjenziswako begodu elitjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli linyazwe. 
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko eliLawulako esele lisebenza begodu litjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli bona kuqalelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini nawenziwa bewugcinwe kuhle, kufanele ungaqalelwa phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko lamaPholisa elisetjenziswako begodu elitjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli linyazwe. 
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko eliLawulako esele lisebenza begodu litjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli bona kuqalelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini nawenziwa bewugcinwe kuhle, kufanele ungaqalelwa phasi.

Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko eliLawulako esele lisebenza begodu litjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli bona kuqalelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka komsebenzi wamaPholisa eenGodini nawenziwa bewugcinwe kuhle, kufanele ungaqalelwa phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kweKoro yezokuVikela ekghonakalisiweko nelawulwe kuhle, akukafaneli bona ithathelwe phasi.
Ukuqakatheka kwePhiko lamaPholisa elisetjenziswako begodu elitjhejwa kuhle, akukafaneli linyazwe.

Ngithatha ukuthi bekulitjhudu  ukuthi ngidlule esitetjheni senu samapholisa eMondeor, begodu ngithole iJenali ye-SAPS. 
Ngidlumbana kube litjhudu nofana into ehle ngombana ngithe nangidlula ngesitetjhini samapholisa eMondeor, ngazithela ku-Jenali ye-SAPS.
Ngikholwa bona kube litjhudu nanyana mhlamunye litjhudu elihle lokobana ngidlule esitetjhini senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neJenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngicabanga bona kwase kwaba litjhudu namkha mhlamunye litjhudu elihle ukobana ngizithole ngidlula esitetjhi senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neNcwajana yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngidlumbana kube litjhudu nofana into ehle ngombana ngithe nangidlula ngesitetjhini samapholisa eMondeor, ngazithela ku-Jenali ye-SAPS.
Ngikholwa bona kube litjhudu nanyana mhlamunye litjhudu elihle lokobana ngidlule esitetjhini senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neJenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngicabanga bona kwase kwaba litjhudu namkha mhlamunye litjhudu elihle ukobana ngizithole ngidlula esitetjhi senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neNcwajana yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngithatha ukuthi bekulitjhudu  ukuthi ngidlule esitetjheni senu samapholisa eMondeor, begodu ngithole iJenali ye-SAPS. 
Ngikholwa bona kube litjhudu nanyana mhlamunye litjhudu elihle lokobana ngidlule esitetjhini senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neJenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngicabanga bona kwase kwaba litjhudu namkha mhlamunye litjhudu elihle ukobana ngizithole ngidlula esitetjhi senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neNcwajana yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngithatha ukuthi bekulitjhudu  ukuthi ngidlule esitetjheni senu samapholisa eMondeor, begodu ngithole iJenali ye-SAPS. 
Ngidlumbana kube litjhudu nofana into ehle ngombana ngithe nangidlula ngesitetjhini samapholisa eMondeor, ngazithela ku-Jenali ye-SAPS.
Ngicabanga bona kwase kwaba litjhudu namkha mhlamunye litjhudu elihle ukobana ngizithole ngidlula esitetjhi senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neNcwajana yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngithatha ukuthi bekulitjhudu  ukuthi ngidlule esitetjheni senu samapholisa eMondeor, begodu ngithole iJenali ye-SAPS. 
Ngidlumbana kube litjhudu nofana into ehle ngombana ngithe nangidlula ngesitetjhini samapholisa eMondeor, ngazithela ku-Jenali ye-SAPS.
Ngikholwa bona kube litjhudu nanyana mhlamunye litjhudu elihle lokobana ngidlule esitetjhini senu samapholisa e-Mondeor, begodu ngihlangane neJenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ngithatha ukuthi ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole kukarisa ukuyifunda.
Ngidlumbana iyatholakala qobe nyanga, begodu ngathola ingithabisa khulu nangiyifundako.
Ngikholwa bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bona kumnandi tle ukuyifunda.
Ngicabanga bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bonyana kuyakarisa ukuyifunda.   
Ngidlumbana iyatholakala qobe nyanga, begodu ngathola ingithabisa khulu nangiyifundako.
Ngikholwa bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bona kumnandi tle ukuyifunda.
Ngicabanga bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bonyana kuyakarisa ukuyifunda.   
Ngithatha ukuthi ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole kukarisa ukuyifunda.
Ngikholwa bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bona kumnandi tle ukuyifunda.
Ngicabanga bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bonyana kuyakarisa ukuyifunda.   
Ngithatha ukuthi ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole kukarisa ukuyifunda.
Ngidlumbana iyatholakala qobe nyanga, begodu ngathola ingithabisa khulu nangiyifundako.
Ngicabanga bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bonyana kuyakarisa ukuyifunda.   
Ngithatha ukuthi ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole kukarisa ukuyifunda.
Ngidlumbana iyatholakala qobe nyanga, begodu ngathola ingithabisa khulu nangiyifundako.
Ngikholwa bona ikhutjhwa kanye ngenyanga, begodu ngithole bona kumnandi tle ukuyifunda.
Mina nomkami sisanda ukuthoma ibhizinisi etja begodu sithanda ukumema nanyana ngiziphi iinsebenzi zakho zoke nabakhambele ngendaweni yethu, bangene bathole ikopi yekofi nofana yetiye yasimahla begodu ngithemba bona sizakuba namakuke abazokusela ngawo itiye.
Mina nomma wakwami sithome irhwebo elitjha begodu sithanda ukumema woke, nofana omunye nomunye wabasebenzi bakho nabaseduze endawenethu le, beze bazokusela ikhofi nofana itiye begodu ngicabanga bona namabhiskiti azabe akhona nawo.
Umkami name siqeda ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha begodu singathanda ukumema boke, nanyana omunye nomunye weensebenzi zakho lokha nabasendaweni yethu , ukobana beze bazokuthola ikopi lekofi nanyana letiye simahla begodu ngethemba bona sizabe sinekuke linye nanyana amabili akhona esizabapha wona.
Mina nomkami sisanda ukuthoma ibhizinisi etjha begodu sithanda ukunimema noke, namkha omunye nomunye wabasebenzi benu lokha nabasendaweni yethu, ukobana nivele nizokusela itiye namkha ikofi yasimahla godu ngithemba bona singadla ibhisikidi linye namkha mabili atholakala ngokunjalo kibo.     
Mina nomma wakwami sithome irhwebo elitjha begodu sithanda ukumema woke, nofana omunye nomunye wabasebenzi bakho nabaseduze endawenethu le, beze bazokusela ikhofi nofana itiye begodu ngicabanga bona namabhiskiti azabe akhona nawo.
Umkami name siqeda ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha begodu singathanda ukumema boke, nanyana omunye nomunye weensebenzi zakho lokha nabasendaweni yethu , ukobana beze bazokuthola ikopi lekofi nanyana letiye simahla begodu ngethemba bona sizabe sinekuke linye nanyana amabili akhona esizabapha wona.
Mina nomkami sisanda ukuthoma ibhizinisi etjha begodu sithanda ukunimema noke, namkha omunye nomunye wabasebenzi benu lokha nabasendaweni yethu, ukobana nivele nizokusela itiye namkha ikofi yasimahla godu ngithemba bona singadla ibhisikidi linye namkha mabili atholakala ngokunjalo kibo.     
Mina nomkami sisanda ukuthoma ibhizinisi etja begodu sithanda ukumema nanyana ngiziphi iinsebenzi zakho zoke nabakhambele ngendaweni yethu, bangene bathole ikopi yekofi nofana yetiye yasimahla begodu ngithemba bona sizakuba namakuke abazokusela ngawo itiye.

Mina nomkami sisanda ukuthoma ibhizinisi etjha begodu sithanda ukunimema noke, namkha omunye nomunye wabasebenzi benu lokha nabasendaweni yethu, ukobana nivele nizokusela itiye namkha ikofi yasimahla godu ngithemba bona singadla ibhisikidi linye namkha mabili atholakala ngokunjalo kibo.

Mina nomkami sisanda ukuthoma ibhizinisi etjha begodu sithanda ukunimema noke, namkha omunye nomunye wabasebenzi benu lokha nabasendaweni yethu, ukobana nivele nizokusela itiye namkha ikofi yasimahla godu ngithemba bona singadla ibhisikidi linye namkha mabili atholakala ngokunjalo kibo.

Umkami name siqeda ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha begodu singathanda ukumema boke, nanyana omunye nomunye weensebenzi zakho lokha nabasendaweni yethu , ukobana beze bazokuthola ikopi lekofi nanyana letiye simahla begodu ngethemba bona sizabe sinekuke linye nanyana amabili akhona esizabapha wona.
Ngiyathemba uzakuzwisisa bona ukuthoma ibhizinisi elitjha akusilula begodu kubanga umsebenzi omnengi kuthatha nemali enengi. 
Ngicabanga bona uyazwisisa bona ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusiyinto elula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi nemalisisekelo.
Njengombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uzakuzwisisa, ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusilula begodu kuthatha isikhathi eside kanye nemali.
Ngombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uyazwisisa, ukuthoma ibhizinisi  etjha akusilula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi kanye nemali.   
Ngicabanga bona uyazwisisa bona ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusiyinto elula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi nemalisisekelo.
Njengombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uzakuzwisisa, ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusilula begodu kuthatha isikhathi eside kanye nemali.
Ngombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uyazwisisa, ukuthoma ibhizinisi  etjha akusilula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi kanye nemali.   
Ngiyathemba uzakuzwisisa bona ukuthoma ibhizinisi elitjha akusilula begodu kubanga umsebenzi omnengi kuthatha nemali enengi. 
Njengombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uzakuzwisisa, ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusilula begodu kuthatha isikhathi eside kanye nemali.
Ngombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uyazwisisa, ukuthoma ibhizinisi  etjha akusilula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi kanye nemali.   
Ngiyathemba uzakuzwisisa bona ukuthoma ibhizinisi elitjha akusilula begodu kubanga umsebenzi omnengi kuthatha nemali enengi. 
Ngicabanga bona uyazwisisa bona ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusiyinto elula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi nemalisisekelo.
Ngombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uyazwisisa, ukuthoma ibhizinisi  etjha akusilula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi kanye nemali.   
Ngiyathemba uzakuzwisisa bona ukuthoma ibhizinisi elitjha akusilula begodu kubanga umsebenzi omnengi kuthatha nemali enengi. 
Ngicabanga bona uyazwisisa bona ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusiyinto elula begodu kuthatha umsebenzi omnengi nemalisisekelo.
Njengombana nginesiqiniseko sokobana uzakuzwisisa, ukuthoma irhwebo elitjha akusilula begodu kuthatha isikhathi eside kanye nemali.
Kodwana, sisathemba bona amapholisa neminye iminyango egandelela umthetho iqakatheke khulu ezakhamuzini zeSewula Afrika.
Nanyana kunjalo, sisese nethemba lokobana amapholisa neminye iminyango ekatelela ngokuthobela umthetho iqakatheke khulu kiwo woke umphakathi wamaSewula Afrika.
Yeke, sisakholwa bona amapholisa neminye iminyango eqinisekisa bona umthetho  usebenza kuhle baqakatheke khulu kizo zoke izakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika.
Kodwana, sisakholwa bonyana amapholisa nayo yoke iminyango yokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho iqakatheke khulu kuzakhamizi zeSewula Afrika. 
Nanyana kunjalo, sisese nethemba lokobana amapholisa neminye iminyango ekatelela ngokuthobela umthetho iqakatheke khulu kiwo woke umphakathi wamaSewula Afrika.
Yeke, sisakholwa bona amapholisa neminye iminyango eqinisekisa bona umthetho  usebenza kuhle baqakatheke khulu kizo zoke izakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika.
Kodwana, sisakholwa bonyana amapholisa nayo yoke iminyango yokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho iqakatheke khulu kuzakhamizi zeSewula Afrika.

Kodwana, sisakholwa bonyana amapholisa nayo yoke iminyango yokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho iqakatheke khulu kuzakhamizi zeSewula Afrika.

Nanyana kunjalo, sisese nethemba lokobana amapholisa neminye iminyango ekatelela ngokuthobela umthetho iqakatheke khulu kiwo woke umphakathi wamaSewula Afrika.
Kodwana, sisakholwa bonyana amapholisa nayo yoke iminyango yokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho iqakatheke khulu kuzakhamizi zeSewula Afrika. 
Kodwana, sisathemba bona amapholisa neminye iminyango egandelela umthetho iqakatheke khulu ezakhamuzini zeSewula Afrika.

Yeke, sisakholwa bona amapholisa neminye iminyango eqinisekisa bona umthetho  usebenza kuhle baqakatheke khulu kizo zoke izakhamuzi zeSewula Afrika.
Lokhu yinto encani nje esithanda ukunipha yona noke ukunithokoza ngakho koke enikudelileko ukuqinisekisa bona thina njengezakhamuzi sikghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu.
Lokhu yinto encani esithanda ukukupha yona yokukuthokoza ngakho koke onikele ngakho kokuqinisekisa bona, thina miphakathi, singaragela phambili ngepilwethu yangemihla.
Lokhu kuyinto nje encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukobana sikuthokoze ngokuzidela kwakho uqinisekisa bona thina, zakhamuzi, singakghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.
Lokhu ngenye yento encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukukuthokoza ngalokho okunikeleko ukuqinisekisa bona, thina, njengezakhamizi siragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.  
Lokhu yinto encani esithanda ukukupha yona yokukuthokoza ngakho koke onikele ngakho kokuqinisekisa bona, thina miphakathi, singaragela phambili ngepilwethu yangemihla.
Lokhu kuyinto nje encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukobana sikuthokoze ngokuzidela kwakho uqinisekisa bona thina, zakhamuzi, singakghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.
Lokhu ngenye yento encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukukuthokoza ngalokho okunikeleko ukuqinisekisa bona, thina, njengezakhamizi siragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.  
Lokhu yinto encani nje esithanda ukunipha yona noke ukunithokoza ngakho koke enikudelileko ukuqinisekisa bona thina njengezakhamuzi sikghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu.
Lokhu kuyinto nje encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukobana sikuthokoze ngokuzidela kwakho uqinisekisa bona thina, zakhamuzi, singakghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.

Lokhu yinto encani nje esithanda ukunipha yona noke ukunithokoza ngakho koke enikudelileko ukuqinisekisa bona thina njengezakhamuzi sikghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu.
Lokhu yinto encani esithanda ukukupha yona yokukuthokoza ngakho koke onikele ngakho kokuqinisekisa bona, thina miphakathi, singaragela phambili ngepilwethu yangemihla.
Lokhu ngenye yento encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukukuthokoza ngalokho okunikeleko ukuqinisekisa bona, thina, njengezakhamizi siragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.  
Lokhu yinto encani nje esithanda ukunipha yona noke ukunithokoza ngakho koke enikudelileko ukuqinisekisa bona thina njengezakhamuzi sikghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu.
Lokhu yinto encani esithanda ukukupha yona yokukuthokoza ngakho koke onikele ngakho kokuqinisekisa bona, thina miphakathi, singaragela phambili ngepilwethu yangemihla.
Lokhu kuyinto nje encani esingathanda ukukunikela yona ukobana sikuthokoze ngokuzidela kwakho uqinisekisa bona thina, zakhamuzi, singakghona ukuragela phambili namaphilo wethu wangamalanga.
Silindele ukuzwa ngawe nofana okungcono, sibone ezinye zeensebenzi zakho zembethe ijinifomu, zifika esitolo sethu sikghone ukwazana nabo ngcono.
Silindele ukuzwa okuvela kini, nofana okuncono ukubona abasebenzi benu baphelele ngeyunifomu, bangena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikwazi ukubazi ncono.
Sizakulinda ukuzwa kuwe, nanyana  okhunye okungcono, ukubona ezinye zeensebenzi zakho ngejinifomu, zingena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikghone ukuzazi ngconywana.
Silindele ukuzwa kibo, namkha okungcono khulu, ukubona abasebenzi benu abambatha iyunifomu, bavela esitolo sethu esincani begodu sithome ukubazi ngconywana.  
Silindele ukuzwa okuvela kini, nofana okuncono ukubona abasebenzi benu baphelele ngeyunifomu, bangena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikwazi ukubazi ncono.
Sizakulinda ukuzwa kuwe, nanyana  okhunye okungcono, ukubona ezinye zeensebenzi zakho ngejinifomu, zingena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikghone ukuzazi ngconywana.
Silindele ukuzwa kibo, namkha okungcono khulu, ukubona abasebenzi benu abambatha iyunifomu, bavela esitolo sethu esincani begodu sithome ukubazi ngconywana.  
Silindele ukuzwa ngawe nofana okungcono, sibone ezinye zeensebenzi zakho zembethe ijinifomu, zifika esitolo sethu sikghone ukwazana nabo ngcono.

Silindele ukuzwa kibo, namkha okungcono khulu, ukubona abasebenzi benu abambatha iyunifomu, bavela esitolo sethu esincani begodu sithome ukubazi ngconywana.  
Silindele ukuzwa ngawe nofana okungcono, sibone ezinye zeensebenzi zakho zembethe ijinifomu, zifika esitolo sethu sikghone ukwazana nabo ngcono.
Silindele ukuzwa okuvela kini, nofana okuncono ukubona abasebenzi benu baphelele ngeyunifomu, bangena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikwazi ukubazi ncono.
Silindele ukuzwa kibo, namkha okungcono khulu, ukubona abasebenzi benu abambatha iyunifomu, bavela esitolo sethu esincani begodu sithome ukubazi ngconywana.  
Silindele ukuzwa ngawe nofana okungcono, sibone ezinye zeensebenzi zakho zembethe ijinifomu, zifika esitolo sethu sikghone ukwazana nabo ngcono.
Silindele ukuzwa okuvela kini, nofana okuncono ukubona abasebenzi benu baphelele ngeyunifomu, bangena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikwazi ukubazi ncono.
Sizakulinda ukuzwa kuwe, nanyana  okhunye okungcono, ukubona ezinye zeensebenzi zakho ngejinifomu, zingena esitodlwaneni sethu begodu sikghone ukuzazi ngconywana.
Sithokoza asiqedi kuwe, abasebenzi bezokugandelelwa komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngokusebenza budisi kwenu nangokuzinikela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.
Angithokoze godu, basebenzi abakatelela ngomthetho beSewula Afrika, ngomsebenzenu obudisi nekuzinikeleni ekuvikeleni iSewula Afrika.
Sithanda ukukuthokoza godu, wena osisebenzi seSewula Afrika esiqinisekisa bona umthetho uyalandelwa, sikuthokoza ngokusebenza ngamandla kwakho nokuzinikela kwakho ekwenzeni iSewula Afrika iphephe.
Siyakuthokoza godu, abasebenzi bokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngawo woke umsebenzi wenu onamandla kanye nokuzimisela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.   
Angithokoze godu, basebenzi abakatelela ngomthetho beSewula Afrika, ngomsebenzenu obudisi nekuzinikeleni ekuvikeleni iSewula Afrika.
Sithanda ukukuthokoza godu, wena osisebenzi seSewula Afrika esiqinisekisa bona umthetho uyalandelwa, sikuthokoza ngokusebenza ngamandla kwakho nokuzinikela kwakho ekwenzeni iSewula Afrika iphephe.
Siyakuthokoza godu, abasebenzi bokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngawo woke umsebenzi wenu onamandla kanye nokuzimisela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.   
Sithokoza asiqedi kuwe, abasebenzi bezokugandelelwa komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngokusebenza budisi kwenu nangokuzinikela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.
Sithanda ukukuthokoza godu, wena osisebenzi seSewula Afrika esiqinisekisa bona umthetho uyalandelwa, sikuthokoza ngokusebenza ngamandla kwakho nokuzinikela kwakho ekwenzeni iSewula Afrika iphephe.
Siyakuthokoza godu, abasebenzi bokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngawo woke umsebenzi wenu onamandla kanye nokuzimisela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.   
Sithokoza asiqedi kuwe, abasebenzi bezokugandelelwa komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngokusebenza budisi kwenu nangokuzinikela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.
Angithokoze godu, basebenzi abakatelela ngomthetho beSewula Afrika, ngomsebenzenu obudisi nekuzinikeleni ekuvikeleni iSewula Afrika.
Siyakuthokoza godu, abasebenzi bokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngawo woke umsebenzi wenu onamandla kanye nokuzimisela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.   
Sithokoza asiqedi kuwe, abasebenzi bezokugandelelwa komthetho beSewula Afrika, ngokusebenza budisi kwenu nangokuzinikela ekugcineni iSewula Afrika iphephile.
Angithokoze godu, basebenzi abakatelela ngomthetho beSewula Afrika, ngomsebenzenu obudisi nekuzinikeleni ekuvikeleni iSewula Afrika.
Sithanda ukukuthokoza godu, wena osisebenzi seSewula Afrika esiqinisekisa bona umthetho uyalandelwa, sikuthokoza ngokusebenza ngamandla kwakho nokuzinikela kwakho ekwenzeni iSewula Afrika iphephe.
Iincwadi ezifitjhani nezinqophileko zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe u-Editha.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaphuzu zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe kuMhleli.
Iincwadi ezifitjhani, ezinamaphuzu zingafekswa nanyana zi-imeyilwe kumHleli.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaqiniso zingafekselwa namkha zi-imeyilelwe kumHleli. 
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaphuzu zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe kuMhleli.
Iincwadi ezifitjhani, ezinamaphuzu zingafekswa nanyana zi-imeyilwe kumHleli.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaqiniso zingafekselwa namkha zi-imeyilelwe kumHleli. 
Iincwadi ezifitjhani nezinqophileko zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe u-Editha.
Iincwadi ezifitjhani, ezinamaphuzu zingafekswa nanyana zi-imeyilwe kumHleli.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaqiniso zingafekselwa namkha zi-imeyilelwe kumHleli. 
Iincwadi ezifitjhani nezinqophileko zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe u-Editha.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaphuzu zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe kuMhleli.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaqiniso zingafekselwa namkha zi-imeyilelwe kumHleli. 
Iincwadi ezifitjhani nezinqophileko zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe u-Editha.
Kafitjhani, iincwadi zamaphuzu zingafekselwa nofana zi-imeyilelwe kuMhleli.
Iincwadi ezifitjhani, ezinamaphuzu zingafekswa nanyana zi-imeyilwe kumHleli.
Sifumbethe ilungelo loku-editha nofana lokunciphisa iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokulungisa nofana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Siphethe ilungelo lokulungisa iimphoso nanyana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela ngokwelimi namkha lokurhunyeza iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokulungisa nofana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Siphethe ilungelo lokulungisa iimphoso nanyana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela ngokwelimi namkha lokurhunyeza iincwadi.
Sifumbethe ilungelo loku-editha nofana lokunciphisa iincwadi.
Siphethe ilungelo lokulungisa iimphoso nanyana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela ngokwelimi namkha lokurhunyeza iincwadi.
Sifumbethe ilungelo loku-editha nofana lokunciphisa iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokulungisa nofana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela ngokwelimi namkha lokurhunyeza iincwadi.
Sifumbethe ilungelo loku-editha nofana lokunciphisa iincwadi.
Sinelungelo lokulungisa nofana sirhunyeze iincwadi.
Siphethe ilungelo lokulungisa iimphoso nanyana sirhunyeze iincwadi.

ISIBAWO SALOKHO OKUFANELE KWENZIWE
Ngomhlaka-14 kuMgwengweni 2007, enye yama atikili akuJenali eseThungelelwaneni     le-SAPS (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) yahlathulula bona amapholisa amabili wePhiko eliKhomba iinKoloyi le-Welkom abotjhwa njani mayelana nekohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.
Ngomhlaka-14 kuMgwengweni 2007, elinye lama-athikili le-Inthanede leJenali ye-SAPS (www.sapsjournalonline-.gov.za) lihlathulule ngeendlela abasebenzi bangeZiko eliPhathelene nokuTholwa kweeModere babanjwe ngayo mayelana nekohlakalo nobukhwabanisi. 
Ngomhlaka-14 kuMgwengweni 2007, enye yama-athikili kuJenali ye-SAPS ye-Onlayini (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) ihlathulule indlela iinsebenzi zeenkhulu zamapholisa ezimbili zesiGaba se-Welkom sokuFanisa iinKoloyi zibanjelwe ubukhohlakali kanye nobulelesi.
Ngomhlaka-14 kuMgwengweni 2007, enye yama-athikili aseNcwajaneni eku-inthanethi ye-SAPS (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) yahlathulula ukobana iimphathiswa ezimbili zamapholisa zePhiko lokuFaniswa kweenKoloyi e-Welkom zabotjhwa njani ngemilandu yekohlakalo nokukhwabanisa.

Kube nombiko ongakaqinisekiswa wokuthi ababilaba, usupuritende kanye no-inspektha, abathengisa iinkoloyi ezitholwe mapholisa, ukuze kuzuze bona. 
Ngokubikwa kwayo indaba le, ababilaba umphathi nomhloli weemodere, bathengise iimodere abazithole ekwetjiweni, bazenzela inzuzo yabo.
Kuthiwa ababili laba, usupuritende nomhloli, bathengisa iinkoloyi ezitholwe mapholisa, bazenzela yabo inzuzo.
Nakubikwako, ababilaba, okungusupharintende no-inspektha, bathengisa iinkoloyi ebezitholwe  mapholisa njengezetjiweko, ukuze bazuze.

Ngemva kwelanga linye, ngomhlaka-15 kuMgwengweni 2007, isihloko sephephandaba i-News24 sathi: "Amapholisa amabili adlelezele ahlomile". 
Emva kwelanga elilodwa, ngezi-15 Mgwengweni 2007, iinhlokwana zeendaba zephepha News24 zamemezela: Amapholisa amabili abandakanyeka ekudlelezeleni.   
Elangeni elilandelako, ngomhlaka-15 kuMgwengweni 2007, ezitjhujileko ku-News24 zaveza bona: Amapholisa amabili afunelwa ukusahlela uhlomile.
Ilanga ngemva kwalokho, ngomhlaka-15 kuMgwengweni 2007, isihloko se-News24 sathi: Amapholisa amabili abanjelwe ukukhuthuza ahlomile.
Emva kwelanga elilodwa, ngezi-15 Mgwengweni 2007, iinhlokwana zeendaba zephepha News24 zamemezela: Amapholisa amabili abandakanyeka ekudlelezeleni.   
Elangeni elilandelako, ngomhlaka-15 kuMgwengweni 2007, ezitjhujileko ku-News24 zaveza bona: Amapholisa amabili afunelwa ukusahlela uhlomile.

Kilesi isehlakalo kwakungu konstabuli osafundako kanye no-inspektha ekubikwe bona babambe isitolo sezembatho eMabulolo ikunzi, beba imali, amabhrugu kanye neyembe.
Ngalesisikhathi bekungukonstabula osafundako kanye nomhloli okuzwakele bona bagcekeze esitolo sezembatho eMable Hall beba imali, amabhrugu nerhembhe. 
Ngesikhathesi bekungukonstabula osafundako kanye nomhloli okubikwe bona bangenele isitolo sezambatho e-Marble Holo, beba iimali, amabhrugu kanye nesikerde.
Kilesi sikhathi kwakungukonstabula osafundako kanye no-inspektha okwabikwa bona babambe isitolo sezambatho e-Marble Hall, beba imali, amabhrugu nehembe.    
Ngalesisikhathi bekungukonstabula osafundako kanye nomhloli okuzwakele bona bagcekeze esitolo sezembatho eMable Hall beba imali, amabhrugu nerhembhe. 
Ngesikhathesi bekungukonstabula osafundako kanye nomhloli okubikwe bona bangenele isitolo sezambatho e-Marble Holo, beba iimali, amabhrugu kanye nesikerde.
Kilesi sikhathi kwakungukonstabula osafundako kanye no-inspektha okwabikwa bona babambe isitolo sezambatho e-Marble Hall, beba imali, amabhrugu nehembe.

Ikohlakalo emapholiseni kufanele iphele. 
Ikohlakalo yamapholisa kufanele iphele.

Ubukhohlakali emapholiseni sebuphelile.
Ikohlakalo emapholiseni kufanele iphele. 
Ikohlakalo emapholiseni kufanele iphele. 
Ikohlakalo yamapholisa kufanele iphele.
Ikohlakalo emapholiseni kufanele iphele. 
Ikohlakalo emapholiseni kufanele iphele. 
Ikohlakalo yamapholisa kufanele iphele.
Ubukhohlakali emapholiseni sebuphelile.
Abanye bethu bathembekile, izakhamuzi ezisebenza budisi, iimphathiswa ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha, ukuhlonipha ijinifomu yabo, kanye neNdlela yokuziPhatha yesiPholisa. 
Njengobana abanye bethu bathembekile nje, begodu bamiphakathi esebenza budisi, kodwana imbijana yabasebenzi besipholiseni abazihloniphi, abahloniphi nejinifomabo namtjhana umthetho wokuziPhatha wamaPholisa.
Lokha inengi lethu nalithembekako, lizizakhamuzi ezisebenza ngamandla, iinkhulu ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha zona, ijinifomu yazo neNdlela yokuziPhatha kwePholisa.
Ngesikhathi inengi lethu limapholisa athembekileko, izakhamizi ezisebenza budisi, amapholisa ambalwa atjengisa ukungazihloniphi, iyunifomu yawo namkha iNdlela yokuziPhatha yamaPholisa.  
Njengobana abanye bethu bathembekile nje, begodu bamiphakathi esebenza budisi, kodwana imbijana yabasebenzi besipholiseni abazihloniphi, abahloniphi nejinifomabo namtjhana umthetho wokuziPhatha wamaPholisa.
Lokha inengi lethu nalithembekako, lizizakhamuzi ezisebenza ngamandla, iinkhulu ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha zona, ijinifomu yazo neNdlela yokuziPhatha kwePholisa.
Ngesikhathi inengi lethu limapholisa athembekileko, izakhamizi ezisebenza budisi, amapholisa ambalwa atjengisa ukungazihloniphi, iyunifomu yawo namkha iNdlela yokuziPhatha yamaPholisa.  
Abanye bethu bathembekile, izakhamuzi ezisebenza budisi, iimphathiswa ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha, ukuhlonipha ijinifomu yabo, kanye neNdlela yokuziPhatha yesiPholisa. 
Lokha inengi lethu nalithembekako, lizizakhamuzi ezisebenza ngamandla, iinkhulu ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha zona, ijinifomu yazo neNdlela yokuziPhatha kwePholisa.
Ngesikhathi inengi lethu limapholisa athembekileko, izakhamizi ezisebenza budisi, amapholisa ambalwa atjengisa ukungazihloniphi, iyunifomu yawo namkha iNdlela yokuziPhatha yamaPholisa.  
Abanye bethu bathembekile, izakhamuzi ezisebenza budisi, iimphathiswa ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha, ukuhlonipha ijinifomu yabo, kanye neNdlela yokuziPhatha yesiPholisa. 
Njengobana abanye bethu bathembekile nje, begodu bamiphakathi esebenza budisi, kodwana imbijana yabasebenzi besipholiseni abazihloniphi, abahloniphi nejinifomabo namtjhana umthetho wokuziPhatha wamaPholisa.
Ngesikhathi inengi lethu limapholisa athembekileko, izakhamizi ezisebenza budisi, amapholisa ambalwa atjengisa ukungazihloniphi, iyunifomu yawo namkha iNdlela yokuziPhatha yamaPholisa.  
Abanye bethu bathembekile, izakhamuzi ezisebenza budisi, iimphathiswa ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha, ukuhlonipha ijinifomu yabo, kanye neNdlela yokuziPhatha yesiPholisa. 
Njengobana abanye bethu bathembekile nje, begodu bamiphakathi esebenza budisi, kodwana imbijana yabasebenzi besipholiseni abazihloniphi, abahloniphi nejinifomabo namtjhana umthetho wokuziPhatha wamaPholisa.
Lokha inengi lethu nalithembekako, lizizakhamuzi ezisebenza ngamandla, iinkhulu ezimbalwa zamapholisa azitjengisi ukuzihlonipha zona, ijinifomu yazo neNdlela yokuziPhatha kwePholisa.
Nje sekusikhathi sokuthi sikhuphe koke okungafunekiko e-SAPS. 
Sekusikhathi sokususa ubukhohlakali kwa-SAPS kizo zoke izinto ezibukhohlakali.
Sekusikhathi sokobana sitjhaphulule ama-SAPS ngezinto ezimbi lezi.
Sekusikhathi sokobana siruthule amapholisa amambi ku-SAPS.   
Sekusikhathi sokususa ubukhohlakali kwa-SAPS kizo zoke izinto ezibukhohlakali.
Sekusikhathi sokobana sitjhaphulule ama-SAPS ngezinto ezimbi lezi.
Sekusikhathi sokobana siruthule amapholisa amambi ku-SAPS.   
Nje sekusikhathi sokuthi sikhuphe koke okungafunekiko e-SAPS. 
Sekusikhathi sokobana sitjhaphulule ama-SAPS ngezinto ezimbi lezi.
Sekusikhathi sokobana siruthule amapholisa amambi ku-SAPS.   
Nje sekusikhathi sokuthi sikhuphe koke okungafunekiko e-SAPS. 
Sekusikhathi sokususa ubukhohlakali kwa-SAPS kizo zoke izinto ezibukhohlakali.
Sekusikhathi sokobana siruthule amapholisa amambi ku-SAPS.   
Nje sekusikhathi sokuthi sikhuphe koke okungafunekiko e-SAPS. 
Sekusikhathi sokususa ubukhohlakali kwa-SAPS kizo zoke izinto ezibukhohlakali.
Sekusikhathi sokobana sitjhaphulule ama-SAPS ngezinto ezimbi lezi.
Nje sewungasiza ukukhupha amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuthi uwabike ngokudosela umrhala omutjha wokubika ubulelesi. 
Njeke ungaba lisizo ekuvezeni ubukhohlakali bamapholisa sibuveze emrhaleni omutjha wobulelesi.
Begodu njenganje ungasiza ukulahla amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuwaveza epepeneneni emtatweni wemilandu emitjha.
Begodu manje ungasiza ukuveza amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuwaveza enomborweni yethu etjha yomtato yokubika ubulelesi. 
Njeke ungaba lisizo ekuvezeni ubukhohlakali bamapholisa sibuveze emrhaleni omutjha wobulelesi.
Begodu njenganje ungasiza ukulahla amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuwaveza epepeneneni emtatweni wemilandu emitjha.
Begodu manje ungasiza ukuveza amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuwaveza enomborweni yethu etjha yomtato yokubika ubulelesi. 
Nje sewungasiza ukukhupha amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuthi uwabike ngokudosela umrhala omutjha wokubika ubulelesi. 
Begodu njenganje ungasiza ukulahla amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuwaveza epepeneneni emtatweni wemilandu emitjha.
Begodu manje ungasiza ukuveza amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuwaveza enomborweni yethu etjha yomtato yokubika ubulelesi. 
Nje sewungasiza ukukhupha amapholisa akhohlakeleko ngokuthi uwabike ngokudosela umrhala omutjha wokubika ubulelesi. 
Njeke ungaba lisizo ekuvezeni ubukhohlakali bamapholisa sibuveze emrhaleni omutjha wobulelesi.

Nangabe usola bona omunye wabalingani bakho wenza izinto ezimbi, nofana wazi omunye umuntu, mhlambe ipholisa, ilunga lomndeni, abasebenzisani, abomakhelwana nofana omunye umuntu ongamaziko obandakanyeka  nofana ohlela ukubandakanyeka ezintweni zobulelesi, okufanele ukwenze sekuthumumela i-SMS     ku-32211. 
Nangabe usola sengathi omunye enisebenza naye uhlela ukwenza okumbi, nofana nawazi omunye nje, kungaba basebenzi bamapholisa, amalunga womndeni, abantu osebenza nabo, abomakhelani nofana iimvakatjhi, ababandakanyeka nofana bahlela imisebenzi yobulelesi, ongakwenza kuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.
Nangabe urhonona bona munye wabalingani bakho kunento engasi yihle aphezu kwayo, nanyana nangabe wazi omunye umuntu, kungaba ziinkhulu zamapholisa, malunga womndeni, abalingani, abomakhelwani nanyana abantu ongabaziko, ababandakanyekako nanyana abatlama ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini yobulelesi, koke ekufanele ukwenze, kuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.
Nayikuthi usola omunye wabasebenzisani bakho bonyana wenza izenzo ezingakalungi, namkha nayikuthi wazi omunye, kungaba lipholisa, amalunga womndeni, abasebenzisani, abomakhelwana namkha abantu ongabaziko, abazibandakanya namkha abahlose ukuzibandakanya ezenzweni zobulelesi, koke okufanele ukwenze kuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.    
Nangabe usola sengathi omunye enisebenza naye uhlela ukwenza okumbi, nofana nawazi omunye nje, kungaba basebenzi bamapholisa, amalunga womndeni, abantu osebenza nabo, abomakhelani nofana iimvakatjhi, ababandakanyeka nofana bahlela imisebenzi yobulelesi, ongakwenza kuthumela i-SMS ku-32211.

Leyo yinomboro etja yenarha yokubika ubulelesi esanda ukuhlonywa yi-Primedia        e-Sandton. 
Leyo inomboro etja kazweloke yokubika ubulelesi ehlonywe mhlapha nje yi-Primedia eSandton.
Le yinomboro etja yomtato welizwe yokubika ubulelesi eqeda ukuhlonywa mhlapha nje ye-Primedia e-Sandton. 
Leyo yinomboro yesitjhaba etjha yokubika ubulelesi eyahlonywa muva nje yi-Primedia e-Sandton.

Iinsebenzi ezibandulelwe ukwamukela umlayezo owuthumelako, zilindele ukudlulisela ilwazelo emapholiseni azokusebenza ngalo khonokho! 
Imitjhini ebandululelwe ukubamba idatha ilindele ukuthumela ilwazi ilise epholiseni, okungilo elizokusebenza ngelwazi ngokurhabako!
Ababandulelwe ukufaka imininingwana balindele ukudlulisela ilwazi emapholiseni, azalisikimela msinya!
Amadathakheptjhara abanduliweko alindele ukudlulisela ilwazi khonokho emapholiseni, okungiwo azakuthatha igadango msinyana!
Imitjhini ebandululelwe ukubamba idatha ilindele ukuthumela ilwazi ilise epholiseni, okungilo elizokusebenza ngelwazi ngokurhabako!
Ababandulelwe ukufaka imininingwana balindele ukudlulisela ilwazi emapholiseni, azalisikimela msinya!
Amadathakheptjhara abanduliweko alindele ukudlulisela ilwazi khonokho emapholiseni, okungiwo azakuthatha igadango msinyana!

Amadathakheptjhara abanduliweko alindele ukudlulisela ilwazi khonokho emapholiseni, okungiwo azakuthatha igadango msinyana!
Iinsebenzi ezibandulelwe ukwamukela umlayezo owuthumelako, zilindele ukudlulisela ilwazelo emapholiseni azokusebenza ngalo khonokho! 
Imitjhini ebandululelwe ukubamba idatha ilindele ukuthumela ilwazi ilise epholiseni, okungilo elizokusebenza ngelwazi ngokurhabako!
Amadathakheptjhara abanduliweko alindele ukudlulisela ilwazi khonokho emapholiseni, okungiwo azakuthatha igadango msinyana!
Iinsebenzi ezibandulelwe ukwamukela umlayezo owuthumelako, zilindele ukudlulisela ilwazelo emapholiseni azokusebenza ngalo khonokho! 
Imitjhini ebandululelwe ukubamba idatha ilindele ukuthumela ilwazi ilise epholiseni, okungilo elizokusebenza ngelwazi ngokurhabako!
Ababandulelwe ukufaka imininingwana balindele ukudlulisela ilwazi emapholiseni, azalisikimela msinya!
Okuhle kukuthi uzokuhlala ungaziwa. 
Ingcenye ekungiyo ehle ngeyokobana ibizo lakho alizokudalulwa.
Ingcenye eqakathekileko kukobana wena uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Ingcenye ehle khulu kukobana uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Ingcenye ekungiyo ehle ngeyokobana ibizo lakho alizokudalulwa.
Ingcenye eqakathekileko kukobana wena uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Ingcenye ehle khulu kukobana uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Okuhle kukuthi uzokuhlala ungaziwa. 
Ingcenye eqakathekileko kukobana wena uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Ingcenye ehle khulu kukobana uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Okuhle kukuthi uzokuhlala ungaziwa. 
Ingcenye ekungiyo ehle ngeyokobana ibizo lakho alizokudalulwa.
Ingcenye ehle khulu kukobana uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Okuhle kukuthi uzokuhlala ungaziwa. 
Ingcenye ekungiyo ehle ngeyokobana ibizo lakho alizokudalulwa.
Ingcenye eqakathekileko kukobana wena uzakuhlala ungaziwa.
Njenganje unamandla wokusiza ekulweni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini.   
Njeke unamandla wokusiza ukulwa nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuba sengozini.
Njenganje sewunamandla wokusiza ekulwisaneni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokufaka ipilo yakho endleleni.
Manje unamandla wokusiza ukulwisa ubulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Njeke unamandla wokusiza ukulwa nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuba sengozini.
Njenganje sewunamandla wokusiza ekulwisaneni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokufaka ipilo yakho endleleni.
Manje unamandla wokusiza ukulwisa ubulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Njenganje unamandla wokusiza ekulweni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini.   
Njenganje sewunamandla wokusiza ekulwisaneni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokufaka ipilo yakho endleleni.
Manje unamandla wokusiza ukulwisa ubulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Njenganje unamandla wokusiza ekulweni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini.   
Njeke unamandla wokusiza ukulwa nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuba sengozini.
Manje unamandla wokusiza ukulwisa ubulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini. 
Njenganje unamandla wokusiza ekulweni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini.   
Njeke unamandla wokusiza ukulwa nobulelesi ngaphandle kokuba sengozini.
Njenganje sewunamandla wokusiza ekulwisaneni nobulelesi ngaphandle kokufaka ipilo yakho endleleni.
Igadango lePhrayimidiya lithembisa bona angekhe kube nento ebuya kuwe. 
Ijima lePrimedia lithembise ukungabuyi lingakavuni.
Umzamo we-Primedia uthembisa bona angeze kwaba neempendulo.
Isisungulo se-Primedia asithembisi ukubuyela kuwe msinyana. 
Ijima lePrimedia lithembise ukungabuyi lingakavuni.
Umzamo we-Primedia uthembisa bona angeze kwaba neempendulo.
Isisungulo se-Primedia asithembisi ukubuyela kuwe msinyana. 
Igadango lePhrayimidiya lithembisa bona angekhe kube nento ebuya kuwe. 
Umzamo we-Primedia uthembisa bona angeze kwaba neempendulo.
Isisungulo se-Primedia asithembisi ukubuyela kuwe msinyana. 
Igadango lePhrayimidiya lithembisa bona angekhe kube nento ebuya kuwe. 
Ijima lePrimedia lithembise ukungabuyi lingakavuni.
Isisungulo se-Primedia asithembisi ukubuyela kuwe msinyana. 
Igadango lePhrayimidiya lithembisa bona angekhe kube nento ebuya kuwe. 
Ijima lePrimedia lithembise ukungabuyi lingakavuni.
Umzamo we-Primedia uthembisa bona angeze kwaba neempendulo.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, omThintanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobulelesi ovela kwaPhrayimidiya, uthe : "Asifuni ibizo lakho nofana i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena uthanda ukusinikela begodu akunasidingo sokwenza iintatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho. 
UmLawuli wePhrojekthi elwisana nobulelesi yePrimedia, uYusuf Abramjee, uthe: "Asidingi ibizo lakho nofana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena ngokwakho usinikela lona begodu akudingi nokobana unikele ngeentatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umPhathi wePhrojekthi ye-Primedia engaKhambisaniko nobuLelesi , wathi: Asilifuni ibizo lakho nanyana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha nangabe uyazinikela ekutheni usinikele lona begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende nanyana ukuyokuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umkhambelanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobuLelesi ye-Primedia wathi: Asifuni ibizo namkha i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha nawusinikela zona ngokuzithandela begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende namkha ukuvela ekhotho. 
UmLawuli wePhrojekthi elwisana nobulelesi yePrimedia, uYusuf Abramjee, uthe: "Asidingi ibizo lakho nofana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena ngokwakho usinikela lona begodu akudingi nokobana unikele ngeentatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umPhathi wePhrojekthi ye-Primedia engaKhambisaniko nobuLelesi , wathi: Asilifuni ibizo lakho nanyana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha nangabe uyazinikela ekutheni usinikele lona begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende nanyana ukuyokuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umkhambelanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobuLelesi ye-Primedia wathi: Asifuni ibizo namkha i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha nawusinikela zona ngokuzithandela begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende namkha ukuvela ekhotho. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, omThintanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobulelesi ovela kwaPhrayimidiya, uthe : "Asifuni ibizo lakho nofana i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena uthanda ukusinikela begodu akunasidingo sokwenza iintatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umPhathi wePhrojekthi ye-Primedia engaKhambisaniko nobuLelesi , wathi: Asilifuni ibizo lakho nanyana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha nangabe uyazinikela ekutheni usinikele lona begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende nanyana ukuyokuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umkhambelanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobuLelesi ye-Primedia wathi: Asifuni ibizo namkha i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha nawusinikela zona ngokuzithandela begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende namkha ukuvela ekhotho. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, omThintanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobulelesi ovela kwaPhrayimidiya, uthe : "Asifuni ibizo lakho nofana i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena uthanda ukusinikela begodu akunasidingo sokwenza iintatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho. 
UmLawuli wePhrojekthi elwisana nobulelesi yePrimedia, uYusuf Abramjee, uthe: "Asidingi ibizo lakho nofana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena ngokwakho usinikela lona begodu akudingi nokobana unikele ngeentatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umkhambelanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobuLelesi ye-Primedia wathi: Asifuni ibizo namkha i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha nawusinikela zona ngokuzithandela begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende namkha ukuvela ekhotho. 
U-Yusuf Abramjee, omThintanisi wePhrojekthi yokuLwisana nobulelesi ovela kwaPhrayimidiya, uthe : "Asifuni ibizo lakho nofana i-adresi yakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena uthanda ukusinikela begodu akunasidingo sokwenza iintatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho. 
UmLawuli wePhrojekthi elwisana nobulelesi yePrimedia, uYusuf Abramjee, uthe: "Asidingi ibizo lakho nofana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha wena ngokwakho usinikela lona begodu akudingi nokobana unikele ngeentatimende nofana ukuvela ekhotho.
U-Yusuf Abramjee, umPhathi wePhrojekthi ye-Primedia engaKhambisaniko nobuLelesi , wathi: Asilifuni ibizo lakho nanyana isiphande sakho ngaphandle kwalokha nangabe uyazinikela ekutheni usinikele lona begodu akutlhogeki iintatimende nanyana ukuyokuvela ekhotho.
Esikufunako lilwazi ngabotsotsi ukuze amapholisa asebenze ngalo."
Esikudingako kukobana unikele ngelwazi elimayelana nobulelesi ukuze ipholisa lisebenze ngalo."
Koke esikufunako lilwazi mayelana neenlelesi ukuze amapholisa akghone ukuzibamba.
Esikufunako kuphela lilwazi ngeenlelesi khona amapholisa azakuthatha igadango ngalo. 
Esikudingako kukobana unikele ngelwazi elimayelana nobulelesi ukuze ipholisa lisebenze ngalo."
Koke esikufunako lilwazi mayelana neenlelesi ukuze amapholisa akghone ukuzibamba.

Koke esikufunako lilwazi mayelana neenlelesi ukuze amapholisa akghone ukuzibamba.

Esikufunako lilwazi ngabotsotsi ukuze amapholisa asebenze ngalo."

Koke esikufunako lilwazi mayelana neenlelesi ukuze amapholisa akghone ukuzibamba.
Ijima elitjheli leengidigidi zamaranda lokulwisana nobulelesi  ngenarheni lahlonywa yiPhrayimidiya e-Sandton ngomhlaka-7 kuMgwengweni 2007. 
Ijima elitja, lamamiliyoni, lakazweloke elilwisana nobulelesi lahlonywa yi-Primedia eSandton ngezi-7 Mgwengweni 2007.
Ijima elitjha leengidigidi zamaranda, elingakhambisaniko nobulelesi elizweni lahlonywa yi-Primedia eSandton ngomhlaka-7 kuMgwengweni 2007.
Ijimeli lesitjhaba elitjha, elibiza iingidigidi zamaranda, lokulwisana nobulelesi lahlonywa yi-Primedia e-Sandton ngomhlaka 7 Juni 2007.
Ijima elitja, lamamiliyoni, lakazweloke elilwisana nobulelesi lahlonywa yi-Primedia eSandton ngezi-7 Mgwengweni 2007.

Lidzimelele erherhweni leenTjhabatjhaba lokuLwisana nobuLelesi. 
Lidzimelele erherhweni leenTjhabatjhaba lokuKhandela ubuLelesi.
Liyame erhelweni lokuJamisa ubuLelesi eenarheni mazombe.

Ijima lokuLwisana nobuLelesi lathoma              e-Albuquerque, eNew Mexico, ngenyanga kaKhukhulamungu 1976. 
AbaKhandeli bobuLelesi bathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngoKhukhulamungu 1976.
AbaJamisi bobuLelesi bathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngenyanga kaKhukhulamungu 1976.
Ihlangano yabaKhandeli bobuLelesi yathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngoSeptemba 1976.
AbaKhandeli bobuLelesi bathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngoKhukhulamungu 1976.
AbaJamisi bobuLelesi bathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngenyanga kaKhukhulamungu 1976.

AbaKhandeli bobuLelesi bathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngoKhukhulamungu 1976.
AbaJamisi bobuLelesi bathoma e-Albuquerque, e-New Mexico, ngenyanga kaKhukhulamungu 1976.
Isebenziswano hlangana nomphakathi, imidiya nama-ejensi agandelela umthetho begodu yatlanyelwa ukulwisana nobulelesi nokuthi abahlali bahlale baphephile. 
Yihlanganyela phakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba nama-ejensi akatelela ngokuthobela umthetho begodu yenzelwa ukuqeda ubulelesi bese yenza abahlali bavikeleke.
Kulitjhebiswano eliphakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba, ama-ejensi aqinisekisa ukulandelwa komthetho begodu belitlanyelwe ukuqeda ubulelesi nokwenza izakhamuzi zihlale ziphephile.
Kuyisebenziswano ephakathi komphakathi imidiya kanye namaziko wokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho begodu yenzelwa ukukhandela ubulelesi nokugcina izakhamizi ziphephile.  
Yihlanganyela phakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba nama-ejensi akatelela ngokuthobela umthetho begodu yenzelwa ukuqeda ubulelesi bese yenza abahlali bavikeleke.
Kulitjhebiswano eliphakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba, ama-ejensi aqinisekisa ukulandelwa komthetho begodu belitlanyelwe ukuqeda ubulelesi nokwenza izakhamuzi zihlale ziphephile.
Kuyisebenziswano ephakathi komphakathi imidiya kanye namaziko wokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho begodu yenzelwa ukukhandela ubulelesi nokugcina izakhamizi ziphephile.  
Isebenziswano hlangana nomphakathi, imidiya nama-ejensi agandelela umthetho begodu yatlanyelwa ukulwisana nobulelesi nokuthi abahlali bahlale baphephile. 
Kulitjhebiswano eliphakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba, ama-ejensi aqinisekisa ukulandelwa komthetho begodu belitlanyelwe ukuqeda ubulelesi nokwenza izakhamuzi zihlale ziphephile.
Kuyisebenziswano ephakathi komphakathi imidiya kanye namaziko wokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho begodu yenzelwa ukukhandela ubulelesi nokugcina izakhamizi ziphephile.  
Isebenziswano hlangana nomphakathi, imidiya nama-ejensi agandelela umthetho begodu yatlanyelwa ukulwisana nobulelesi nokuthi abahlali bahlale baphephile. 
Yihlanganyela phakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba nama-ejensi akatelela ngokuthobela umthetho begodu yenzelwa ukuqeda ubulelesi bese yenza abahlali bavikeleke.
Kuyisebenziswano ephakathi komphakathi imidiya kanye namaziko wokugandelelwa kokusebenza komthetho begodu yenzelwa ukukhandela ubulelesi nokugcina izakhamizi ziphephile.  
Isebenziswano hlangana nomphakathi, imidiya nama-ejensi agandelela umthetho begodu yatlanyelwa ukulwisana nobulelesi nokuthi abahlali bahlale baphephile. 
Yihlanganyela phakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba nama-ejensi akatelela ngokuthobela umthetho begodu yenzelwa ukuqeda ubulelesi bese yenza abahlali bavikeleke.
Kulitjhebiswano eliphakathi komphakathi, iimbikiindaba, ama-ejensi aqinisekisa ukulandelwa komthetho begodu belitlanyelwe ukuqeda ubulelesi nokwenza izakhamuzi zihlale ziphephile.
Namhlanje, kunamahlelo ayi-1200 weJima lokuLwisana nobuLelesi ephasini mazombe asebenza eenarheni ezima-20 ezisebenzisa ilwazi elinikelwa mphakathi ukusiza ngokusombulula amacala. 
Namhlanjesi, kunamahlelo ayi-1200 wokuKhandela ubuLelesi iphasi mazombe eenarheni ezima-20 ezisebenzisa ilwazi elinikelwa mphakathi ukurarulula imiraro yobulelesi.
Namhlanjesi, kunamahlelo wabaJamisa ubuLelesi pheze abazi-1 200 ephasini mazombe abasebenza eenarheni ezima-20 abasebenzisa ilwazi abalinikelwa mphakathi ukusiza ukulungisa ubulelesi.
Namhlanjesi pheze kunabaKhandeli bobuLelesi abayi-1 200 iphasi loke abasebenza eenarheni ezima-20 abasebezisa ilwazi elinikelwe mphakathi ukurarulula ubulelesi. 
Namhlanjesi, kunamahlelo ayi-1200 wokuKhandela ubuLelesi iphasi mazombe eenarheni ezima-20 ezisebenzisa ilwazi elinikelwa mphakathi ukurarulula imiraro yobulelesi.
Namhlanjesi, kunamahlelo wabaJamisa ubuLelesi pheze abazi-1 200 ephasini mazombe abasebenza eenarheni ezima-20 abasebenzisa ilwazi abalinikelwa mphakathi ukusiza ukulungisa ubulelesi.
Namhlanjesi pheze kunabaKhandeli bobuLelesi abayi-1 200 iphasi loke abasebenza eenarheni ezima-20 abasebezisa ilwazi elinikelwe mphakathi ukurarulula ubulelesi. 
Namhlanje, kunamahlelo ayi-1200 weJima lokuLwisana nobuLelesi ephasini mazombe asebenza eenarheni ezima-20 ezisebenzisa ilwazi elinikelwa mphakathi ukusiza ngokusombulula amacala.

Namhlanjesi, kunamahlelo ayi-1200 wokuKhandela ubuLelesi iphasi mazombe eenarheni ezima-20 ezisebenzisa ilwazi elinikelwa mphakathi ukurarulula imiraro yobulelesi.

Ukuya ngokwe-CEO ye-Primedia Ltd, uNom William Kirsh, amahlelo la asize ekubopheni abotsotsi aba-600 000!
Ngokuya ngokwe-CEO yePrimedia Ltd, uNom. William Kirsh, uthi amahlelo la asize ekubotjhweni kweenlelesi ezizii-600 000!
Ngokutjho kuka-CEO we-Primedia Ltd, uNom. William Kirsh, amahlelo la asize ekubambeni iinlelesi ezima-600 000!
Ngokuya kwaka-CEO we-Primedia Ltd, uNomzana William Kirsh, lamahlelo asize ekubotjhweni kweenlelesi ezima-600 000!
Ngokuya ngokwe-CEO yePrimedia Ltd, uNom. William Kirsh, uthi amahlelo la asize ekubotjhweni kweenlelesi ezizii-600 000!
Ngokutjho kuka-CEO we-Primedia Ltd, uNom. William Kirsh, amahlelo la asize ekubambeni iinlelesi ezima-600 000!

Ngokuya kwaka-CEO we-Primedia Ltd, uNomzana William Kirsh, lamahlelo asize ekubotjhweni kweenlelesi ezima-600 000!
Ukuya ngokwe-CEO ye-Primedia Ltd, uNom William Kirsh, amahlelo la asize ekubopheni abotsotsi aba-600 000!
Ngokuya ngokwe-CEO yePrimedia Ltd, uNom. William Kirsh, uthi amahlelo la asize ekubotjhweni kweenlelesi ezizii-600 000!
Ngokutjho kuka-CEO we-Primedia Ltd, uNom. William Kirsh, amahlelo la asize ekubambeni iinlelesi ezima-600 000!
Okufanele kwaziwe ngelinye nelinye ipholisa ngejima elitjheli lokulwisana nobulelesi, kukuthi lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha neVikeleko, uNom. Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomitjhinara we-SAPS, uKhomitjhinara uJackie Selebi. 
Okufanele kwaziwe sisebenzi esinye nesinye esilipholisa mayelana nejima elilwisana nobulelesi, kukobana ijimeli lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuVikela nokuPhepha, uNom Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomitjhinara kaZweloke we-SAPS, uKhomitjhinara uJackie Selebi.
Lokho isikhulu ngasinye sepholisa ekufanele sikwazi ngejima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, kukobana lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha nokuVikeleka, uNom. Charles Nqakula noKomitjhinara we-SAPS weliZwe, uKomitjhinara uJackie Selebi.
Okufuze esinye nesinye isiphathiswa sepholisa sikwazi ngejima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi kukobana linesekelo lakaNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha nokuVikeleka, uNomzana Charles Nqakula kanye noKomitjhinara wamaPholisa we-SAPS, uKomitjhinara Jackie Selebi.  
Okufanele kwaziwe sisebenzi esinye nesinye esilipholisa mayelana nejima elilwisana nobulelesi, kukobana ijimeli lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuVikela nokuPhepha, uNom Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomitjhinara kaZweloke we-SAPS, uKhomitjhinara uJackie Selebi.
Lokho isikhulu ngasinye sepholisa ekufanele sikwazi ngejima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, kukobana lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha nokuVikeleka, uNom. Charles Nqakula noKomitjhinara we-SAPS weliZwe, uKomitjhinara uJackie Selebi.
Okufuze esinye nesinye isiphathiswa sepholisa sikwazi ngejima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi kukobana linesekelo lakaNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha nokuVikeleka, uNomzana Charles Nqakula kanye noKomitjhinara wamaPholisa we-SAPS, uKomitjhinara Jackie Selebi.  
Okufanele kwaziwe ngelinye nelinye ipholisa ngejima elitjheli lokulwisana nobulelesi, kukuthi lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha neVikeleko, uNom. Charles Nqakula kanye noKhomitjhinara we-SAPS, uKhomitjhinara uJackie Selebi. 
Lokho isikhulu ngasinye sepholisa ekufanele sikwazi ngejima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, kukobana lisekelwa ngokuzeleko nguNgqongqotjhe wezokuPhepha nokuVikeleka, uNom. Charles Nqakula noKomitjhinara we-SAPS weliZwe, uKomitjhinara uJackie Selebi.

UKhomitjhinara uSelebi uthembise bona "njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukuthi iphrojekthi le isebenze." 
UKhomtjhinara uSelebi uthembise wathi njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni bona iphrojekthi isebenze.
UKomitjhinara u-Selebi wathembisa bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza yoke into esemandleni wethu ukwenza bona iphrojekthi le isebenze.
UKomitjhinara Jackie Selebi uthembise bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukwenza lephrojekthi isebenze.  
UKhomtjhinara uSelebi uthembise wathi njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni bona iphrojekthi isebenze.
UKomitjhinara u-Selebi wathembisa bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza yoke into esemandleni wethu ukwenza bona iphrojekthi le isebenze.
UKomitjhinara Jackie Selebi uthembise bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukwenza lephrojekthi isebenze.  
UKhomitjhinara uSelebi uthembise bona "njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukuthi iphrojekthi le isebenze." 
UKomitjhinara u-Selebi wathembisa bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza yoke into esemandleni wethu ukwenza bona iphrojekthi le isebenze.
UKomitjhinara Jackie Selebi uthembise bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukwenza lephrojekthi isebenze.  
UKhomitjhinara uSelebi uthembise bona "njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukuthi iphrojekthi le isebenze." 
UKhomtjhinara uSelebi uthembise wathi njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni bona iphrojekthi isebenze.
UKomitjhinara Jackie Selebi uthembise bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukwenza lephrojekthi isebenze.  
UKhomitjhinara uSelebi uthembise bona "njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni wethu ukuthi iphrojekthi le isebenze." 
UKhomtjhinara uSelebi uthembise wathi njengehlangano, sizokwenza koke okusemandleni bona iphrojekthi isebenze.
UKomitjhinara u-Selebi wathembisa bona njengehlangano, sizokwenza yoke into esemandleni wethu ukwenza bona iphrojekthi le isebenze.
Umbuzo kukuthi wena uzokwenzani? 
Umbuzo kukobana uzokwenzani ngayo?
Umbuzo ngothi wena uzokwenza ini ngayo?
Umbuzo kukobana khuyini ozokwenza ngalokho?

Kukhonjelwa isekelo lawo woke umuntu, ingasi ukuthi uphendule khonokho kwaphela nawuthola ilwazi elivela esentha eyamukela imitato ebika ubulelesi, kodwana wazise abanye abantu ngejimeli. 
Isekelo lomuntu omunye nomunye liyadingakala, ingasi ukusiza msinyana lokha nawuthola ilwazi ezikweni lomrhala wobulelesi kwaphela, kodwana nokukhangisa ngejimeli kuphi nakuphi lapha ukhamba khona.
Isekelo elizeleko labo boke abantu liyafuneka, ingasi kwaphela ukweqa msinya nakungenzeka  nawungathola ilwazi kusentha yomtato wobulelesi, kodwana okhunye godu ukumaketha okusungulwako lokhu ngendlela ongakghona ngayo.
Isekelo lawo woke umuntu liyafuneka, ingasi kuphela ukuphendula msinyana nakungenzeka ufumane ilwazi elibuya esentha yomtato wokulwisana nobulelesi, kodwana godu ukumaketha isisungulwesi nanyana kunini lapho ungakghona khona. 
Isekelo lomuntu omunye nomunye liyadingakala, ingasi ukusiza msinyana lokha nawuthola ilwazi ezikweni lomrhala wobulelesi kwaphela, kodwana nokukhangisa ngejimeli kuphi nakuphi lapha ukhamba khona.
Isekelo elizeleko labo boke abantu liyafuneka, ingasi kwaphela ukweqa msinya nakungenzeka  nawungathola ilwazi kusentha yomtato wobulelesi, kodwana okhunye godu ukumaketha okusungulwako lokhu ngendlela ongakghona ngayo.
Isekelo lawo woke umuntu liyafuneka, ingasi kuphela ukuphendula msinyana nakungenzeka ufumane ilwazi elibuya esentha yomtato wokulwisana nobulelesi, kodwana godu ukumaketha isisungulwesi nanyana kunini lapho ungakghona khona.

Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngenjimeli. 
Tjela boke abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngejimeli.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani bakho ngalokhu okusungulwako.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani ngesisungulwesi. 
Tjela boke abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngejimeli.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani bakho ngalokhu okusungulwako.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani ngesisungulwesi. 
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngenjimeli. 
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani bakho ngalokhu okusungulwako.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani ngesisungulwesi. 
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngenjimeli. 
Tjela boke abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngejimeli.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani ngesisungulwesi. 
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngenjimeli. 
Tjela boke abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni nabangani bakho ngejimeli.
Tjela abantu, ama-CPF, iinkolo, umndeni wakho nabangani bakho ngalokhu okusungulwako.
Qinisekisa bona bayazwisisa ukuthi ijima leli lithembisa bona ayikho into ezokubuyela kibo, ukuthi bazokuhlala bangaziwa noma kungenzekani. 
Baqinisekise bona ijimeli lithembisa bona angeze labuya lingakavuni, nokobana bazokuhlala bangaziwa amabizwabo nanyana njani.
Wenze isiqiniseko sokobana bayazwisisa bona ijima lithembisa ukungafuni iimpendulo, ukobana bazakuhlala bangaziwa nanyana kunjani.
Qinisekisa bona bazwisisa ukobana ijima alithembisi ukubuya msinyana nependulo kibo, ukobana bazakuhlala bangaziwa nanyana kungenzekani.  
Baqinisekise bona ijimeli lithembisa bona angeze labuya lingakavuni, nokobana bazokuhlala bangaziwa amabizwabo nanyana njani.
Wenze isiqiniseko sokobana bayazwisisa bona ijima lithembisa ukungafuni iimpendulo, ukobana bazakuhlala bangaziwa nanyana kunjani.

Baqinisekise bona ijimeli lithembisa bona angeze labuya lingakavuni, nokobana bazokuhlala bangaziwa amabizwabo nanyana njani.
Wenze isiqiniseko sokobana bayazwisisa bona ijima lithembisa ukungafuni iimpendulo, ukobana bazakuhlala bangaziwa nanyana kunjani.
Khumbula bona umtato lo akusiwo wokufuna isizo elirhabako. 
Khumbula bona umrhala lo akusiwo wesizo elirhabako.
Okhunye godu ukhumbule bona umtato lo akusiwo umtato orhabako
Godu khumbula bona le akusi yinomboro yomtato orhabekileko. 
Khumbula bona umrhala lo akusiwo wesizo elirhabako.
Okhunye godu ukhumbule bona umtato lo akusiwo umtato orhabako
Godu khumbula bona le akusi yinomboro yomtato orhabekileko. 
Khumbula bona umtato lo akusiwo wokufuna isizo elirhabako. 
Okhunye godu ukhumbule bona umtato lo akusiwo umtato orhabako
Godu khumbula bona le akusi yinomboro yomtato orhabekileko. 
Khumbula bona umtato lo akusiwo wokufuna isizo elirhabako. 
Khumbula bona umrhala lo akusiwo wesizo elirhabako.
Godu khumbula bona le akusi yinomboro yomtato orhabekileko. 
Khumbula bona umtato lo akusiwo wokufuna isizo elirhabako. 
Khumbula bona umrhala lo akusiwo wesizo elirhabako.
Okhunye godu ukhumbule bona umtato lo akusiwo umtato orhabako
Abantu bangaragela phambili nokubika izinto ezirhabekileko ku-10111 nofana esitetjhini samapholisa esiseduze nabo.
Abantu abahlale babika izehlakalo zesizo elirhabako ku-10111 nofana eentetjhini zamapholisa eziseduze.
Abantu kusesenetlhogeko yokobana babike  imibiko erhabako ku-10111 nanyana esitetjhini samapholisa esiseduze nabo.
Abantu kusafanele babike ubujamo oburhabekileko ku-10111 namkha eentetjhini eziseduze zamapholisa.  
Abantu abahlale babika izehlakalo zesizo elirhabako ku-10111 nofana eentetjhini zamapholisa eziseduze.

Ngejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, imidiya isize amapholisa. 
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi, iimbikiindaba sizinikele ekusizeni amapholisa.
Ngokwejima lokulwisana nobulelesi iimbikiindaba zisizana namapholisa.
Ngokusebenzisa lelijima lokulwisana nobulelesi imidiya inabisele isandla emapholiseni. 
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi, iimbikiindaba sizinikele ekusizeni amapholisa.
Ngokwejima lokulwisana nobulelesi iimbikiindaba zisizana namapholisa.
Ngokusebenzisa lelijima lokulwisana nobulelesi imidiya inabisele isandla emapholiseni. 
Ngejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, imidiya isize amapholisa. 
Ngokwejima lokulwisana nobulelesi iimbikiindaba zisizana namapholisa.
Ngokusebenzisa lelijima lokulwisana nobulelesi imidiya inabisele isandla emapholiseni. 
Ngejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, imidiya isize amapholisa. 
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi, iimbikiindaba sizinikele ekusizeni amapholisa.
Ngokusebenzisa lelijima lokulwisana nobulelesi imidiya inabisele isandla emapholiseni. 
Ngejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, imidiya isize amapholisa. 
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi, iimbikiindaba sizinikele ekusizeni amapholisa.
Ngokwejima lokulwisana nobulelesi iimbikiindaba zisizana namapholisa.
Bafuna ukusisiza bona senze iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kiwo woke umuntu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona benze iSewula Afrika indawo ephephileko yawo woke umuntu.
Zifuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kithi soke.
Bafuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kibo boke abantu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona benze iSewula Afrika indawo ephephileko yawo woke umuntu.
Zifuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kithi soke.
Bafuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kibo boke abantu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona senze iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kiwo woke umuntu. 
Zifuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kithi soke.
Bafuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kibo boke abantu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona senze iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kiwo woke umuntu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona benze iSewula Afrika indawo ephephileko yawo woke umuntu.
Bafuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kibo boke abantu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona senze iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kiwo woke umuntu. 
Bafuna ukusisiza bona benze iSewula Afrika indawo ephephileko yawo woke umuntu.
Zifuna ukusisiza ukwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yindawo ephephileko kithi soke.
Ekuhlonyweni kwemitato yejima leli, u-John Robbie, omrhatjhi wehlelo lekuseni ku- Talk Radio 702, wanikela ngemitjhini yamathulusi we-ID ama-65  ku-SAPS. 
Ngesikhathi kuhlonywa ijima lomrhala lokulwisana nobulelesi, uJohn Robbie, wehlelo lekuseni leTalk Radio 702, unikele ngemitjhini ye-Thulusi le-ID  ema-65 ku-SAPS.
Nakuhlonywa umtato  osungulwako wobulelesi, u-John Robbie, ophethe ihlelo lekuseni lomrhatjho i-Talk Radio 702, waletha ama-ID weensetjenziswa zomtjhini ezima-65 ku-SAPS.
Ekuhlonyweni kwesisungulo sokulwisana nobulelesi, u-John Robbie, omrhatjhi wehlelo lekuseni emrhatjhweni wokukhulumisana i-Talk Radio 702 wanikela ngemitjhini eyi-65 ye-yesiSetejnziswa se-ID emapholiseni we-SAPS.
Ngesikhathi kuhlonywa ijima lomrhala lokulwisana nobulelesi, uJohn Robbie, wehlelo lekuseni leTalk Radio 702, unikele ngemitjhini ye-Thulusi le-ID  ema-65 ku-SAPS.
Nakuhlonywa umtato  osungulwako wobulelesi, u-John Robbie, ophethe ihlelo lekuseni lomrhatjho i-Talk Radio 702, waletha ama-ID weensetjenziswa zomtjhini ezima-65 ku-SAPS.
Ekuhlonyweni kwesisungulo sokulwisana nobulelesi, u-John Robbie, omrhatjhi wehlelo lekuseni emrhatjhweni wokukhulumisana i-Talk Radio 702 wanikela ngemitjhini eyi-65 ye-yesiSetejnziswa se-ID emapholiseni we-SAPS.
Ekuhlonyweni kwemitato yejima leli, u-John Robbie, omrhatjhi wehlelo lekuseni ku- Talk Radio 702, wanikela ngemitjhini yamathulusi we-ID ama-65  ku-SAPS. 
Nakuhlonywa umtato  osungulwako wobulelesi, u-John Robbie, ophethe ihlelo lekuseni lomrhatjho i-Talk Radio 702, waletha ama-ID weensetjenziswa zomtjhini ezima-65 ku-SAPS.

UNom  Robbie mhlapha wenze isibawo emmoyeni kubalaleli bona bakulege malungana nemitjhini yamathulusi we-ID la. 
UNom Robbie mhlaphanje urhatjhe emmoyeni abawa abalaleli bona banikele emitjhinini yeThulusi le-ID.
uNom. Robbie mhlapha nje wabawa abalaleli emmoyeni ukobana benze isithembeso ngeensetjenziswa zemitjhini zama-ID.
UNomzana Robbie muva nje wenza isibawo emmoyeni sokobana abalaleli banikele ekuthengeni lemitjhini yesiSetjenziswa ku-ID.
UNom Robbie mhlaphanje urhatjhe emmoyeni abawa abalaleli bona banikele emitjhinini yeThulusi le-ID.

Isitolo esithengisa imitjhini, iFeyisi Theknoloji, nayo yavela, yehlisa intengo yemitjhini, okwenza bona amakhamphani egade akulegele umtjhini munye ekuthomeni, akghone ukuthenga imitjhini emibili.
Imitjhini yabanikazirhwebo, iFeyisi yeTheknoloji, nayo seyingene elimukweni, ngokwehliswa kwemali yemitjhini yaba phasi ukwenzelela bona amakhamphani akwazileko ukuthenga munye ekuthomeni akghone ukuthenga mibili.
Umnikazirhwebo lemitjhini, iThekhnoloji yoBuso, nayo yasiza yaphungula intengo yomtjhini yaya phasi ngeendleko, okwenza bona amkhamphani wokuthoma ebekathembise imali eyaneleko emtjhinini owodwa bakghone ukuthenga emibili.
Umthengisi wemitjhini, iFeyisi Theknoloji, godu wahlanganyela nathi, wehlisa intengo yemitjhini ukufika kundleko, okwakghonakalisa amakhamphani ebesele azibophelele ekunikeleni ngemali yomtjhini munye ukobana athenge mibili. 
Imitjhini yabanikazirhwebo, iFeyisi yeTheknoloji, nayo seyingene elimukweni, ngokwehliswa kwemali yemitjhini yaba phasi ukwenzelela bona amakhamphani akwazileko ukuthenga munye ekuthomeni akghone ukuthenga mibili.

I-Primedia kanye noJohn Robbie akusibo bodwa abasiza amapholisa ukulwisana nobulelesi. 
IPremedia noJohn Robbie akusibo kwaphela abasiza amapholisa bona alwisane nobulelesi.
I-Primedia kanye no-John Robbie akusibo kwaphela  abasiza amapholisa ekulwisaneni nobulelesi.
I-Primedia no-John Robbie akusi ngibo bodwa abasiza amapholisa ekulwiseni ubulelesi.

I-Primedia kanye no-John Robbie akusibo kwaphela  abasiza amapholisa ekulwisaneni nobulelesi.
Funda nanyanangisiphi istori esiku Jenali        ye-SAPS nofana kuJenali eseThungelelwaneni le-SAPS begodu uzakubona bona amacala asonjululwa njani ngokuthola isizo lamalunga womphakathi.
Funda esinye seentori zepumelelo ezitholakala eJenalini ye-SAPS eku-Inthanede uzokubona bonyana amacala ararululwe njani ngesizo lamalunga womphakathi. 
Funda ezinye nezinye iindatjana  eziyipumelelo kuJenali ye-SAPS nanyana kuJenali ye-SAPS e-Onlayini begodu uzakubona  indlela imilandu  eyararululwa ngakhona ngesizo lamalunga womphakathi.
Funda ngezinye nezinye iindaba zepumelelo eNcwadini ye-SAPS namkha eNcwadini eku-inthanethi ye-SAPS  begodu uzakubona ukobana imilandu irarululwe njani ngesizo lamalunga womphakathi. 
Funda esinye seentori zepumelelo ezitholakala eJenalini ye-SAPS eku-Inthanede uzokubona bonyana amacala ararululwe njani ngesizo lamalunga womphakathi. 
Funda ezinye nezinye iindatjana  eziyipumelelo kuJenali ye-SAPS nanyana kuJenali ye-SAPS e-Onlayini begodu uzakubona  indlela imilandu  eyararululwa ngakhona ngesizo lamalunga womphakathi.
Funda ngezinye nezinye iindaba zepumelelo eNcwadini ye-SAPS namkha eNcwadini eku-inthanethi ye-SAPS  begodu uzakubona ukobana imilandu irarululwe njani ngesizo lamalunga womphakathi.

Njengoba sele kunejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, abotsotsi, okufakahlangana labo abambalwa abasese semsebenzini abenza ikohlakalo, kumele bazi into yinye ...ukuthi amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi elitjha, iinlelesi, nokufaka hlangana nembijana enobukhohlakali esemsebenzini, kufanele bazi into yinye nje amalangabo abaliwe.
Ngejima elitjha leli lokulwisana nobulelesi elikhona, iinlelesi, kufakwe hlangana naleyo mbijana ekhohlakeleko emsebenzini, kufanele bazi into eyodwa amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngalelijima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi, izelelesi, kufaka abambalwa abakhohlakeleko abasesipholiseni, zingazi into yinye  ukobana amalanga wazo aphelile. 
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi elitjha, iinlelesi, nokufaka hlangana nembijana enobukhohlakali esemsebenzini, kufanele bazi into yinye nje amalangabo abaliwe.
Ngejima elitjha leli lokulwisana nobulelesi elikhona, iinlelesi, kufakwe hlangana naleyo mbijana ekhohlakeleko emsebenzini, kufanele bazi into eyodwa amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngalelijima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi, izelelesi, kufaka abambalwa abakhohlakeleko abasesipholiseni, zingazi into yinye  ukobana amalanga wazo aphelile. 
Njengoba sele kunejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, abotsotsi, okufakahlangana labo abambalwa abasese semsebenzini abenza ikohlakalo, kumele bazi into yinye ...ukuthi amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngejima elitjha leli lokulwisana nobulelesi elikhona, iinlelesi, kufakwe hlangana naleyo mbijana ekhohlakeleko emsebenzini, kufanele bazi into eyodwa amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngalelijima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi, izelelesi, kufaka abambalwa abakhohlakeleko abasesipholiseni, zingazi into yinye  ukobana amalanga wazo aphelile. 
Njengoba sele kunejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, abotsotsi, okufakahlangana labo abambalwa abasese semsebenzini abenza ikohlakalo, kumele bazi into yinye ...ukuthi amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi elitjha, iinlelesi, nokufaka hlangana nembijana enobukhohlakali esemsebenzini, kufanele bazi into yinye nje amalangabo abaliwe.
Ngalelijima elitjha lokulwisana nobulelesi, izelelesi, kufaka abambalwa abakhohlakeleko abasesipholiseni, zingazi into yinye  ukobana amalanga wazo aphelile. 
Njengoba sele kunejima lokulwisana nobulelesi leli, abotsotsi, okufakahlangana labo abambalwa abasese semsebenzini abenza ikohlakalo, kumele bazi into yinye ...ukuthi amalanga wabo abaliwe.
Ngejimeli lokulwisana nobulelesi elitjha, iinlelesi, nokufaka hlangana nembijana enobukhohlakali esemsebenzini, kufanele bazi into yinye nje amalangabo abaliwe.
Ngejima elitjha leli lokulwisana nobulelesi elikhona, iinlelesi, kufakwe hlangana naleyo mbijana ekhohlakeleko emsebenzini, kufanele bazi into eyodwa amalanga wabo abaliwe.

Imvumo yokwenza imisebenzi ngaphasi      kwe-ETQA 
Ukunikelwa kwamandla nelungelo komnikeli ngemisebenzi yi-ETQA
Umnikeli wemisebenzi egunyaziweko i-ETQA
Ukunikelwa kweemfanelofundo kubanikelimsebenzi ngokwe-ETQA 
Ukunikelwa kwamandla nelungelo komnikeli ngemisebenzi yi-ETQA

ImiSebenzi yomBuso eSewula Afrika
Isibawo esiya ku-ETQA semvumo yokwenza imisebenzi yezefundo nokubandula.
Isibawo esenziwa ku-ETQA esimayelana namandla nelungelo njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Ukufaka isibawo ku-ETQA mayelana nokugunyazwa njengomnikeli wezefundo kanye nebandulo.
Isibawo sokufumana iimfanelofundo ku-ETQA njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Isibawo esenziwa ku-ETQA esimayelana namandla nelungelo njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Ukufaka isibawo ku-ETQA mayelana nokugunyazwa njengomnikeli wezefundo kanye nebandulo.
Isibawo sokufumana iimfanelofundo ku-ETQA njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Isibawo esiya ku-ETQA semvumo yokwenza imisebenzi yezefundo nokubandula.
Ukufaka isibawo ku-ETQA mayelana nokugunyazwa njengomnikeli wezefundo kanye nebandulo.
Isibawo sokufumana iimfanelofundo ku-ETQA njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Isibawo esiya ku-ETQA semvumo yokwenza imisebenzi yezefundo nokubandula.
Isibawo esenziwa ku-ETQA esimayelana namandla nelungelo njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Isibawo sokufumana iimfanelofundo ku-ETQA njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Isibawo esiya ku-ETQA semvumo yokwenza imisebenzi yezefundo nokubandula.
Isibawo esenziwa ku-ETQA esimayelana namandla nelungelo njengomnikeli wefundo nebandulo
Ukufaka isibawo ku-ETQA mayelana nokugunyazwa njengomnikeli wezefundo kanye nebandulo.

Ihlathululo 
Imithetjhwana esebenza kuBaqinisekisi beKhwalithi yeFundo nokuBandula (i-ETQA) ekusingungu esingaphasi kweBandla leemFanelofundo leSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bafake iimbawo zemvumo        ku-ETQA. 
Imithetholawulo esebenza eenhlanganweni eziQinisekisa ngeKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yokuPhunyelelweko yamaSewula Afrika (SAQA) idinga bona abanikeli ngemisebenzi yefundo nebandulo benze isibawo sokuphunyelelweko ku-ETQA.
Imithetho esetjenziswa  mikhakha yokuQinisekisa iziNga lezeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA)  ngaphasi kweGunya leziQu eSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikela ngefundo nebandulo bafaka isibawo sokugunyazwa ku-ETQA.
Imithetjhwana esebenza eenhlanganweni zokuQinisekiswa kweKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yeemFanelofundo yeSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo benze iimbawo zokufaneleka ku-ETQA. 
Imithetholawulo esebenza eenhlanganweni eziQinisekisa ngeKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yokuPhunyelelweko yamaSewula Afrika (SAQA) idinga bona abanikeli ngemisebenzi yefundo nebandulo benze isibawo sokuphunyelelweko ku-ETQA.
Imithetho esetjenziswa  mikhakha yokuQinisekisa iziNga lezeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA)  ngaphasi kweGunya leziQu eSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikela ngefundo nebandulo bafaka isibawo sokugunyazwa ku-ETQA.
Imithetjhwana esebenza eenhlanganweni zokuQinisekiswa kweKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yeemFanelofundo yeSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo benze iimbawo zokufaneleka ku-ETQA. 
Imithetjhwana esebenza kuBaqinisekisi beKhwalithi yeFundo nokuBandula (i-ETQA) ekusingungu esingaphasi kweBandla leemFanelofundo leSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bafake iimbawo zemvumo        ku-ETQA. 
Imithetho esetjenziswa  mikhakha yokuQinisekisa iziNga lezeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA)  ngaphasi kweGunya leziQu eSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikela ngefundo nebandulo bafaka isibawo sokugunyazwa ku-ETQA.
Imithetjhwana esebenza eenhlanganweni zokuQinisekiswa kweKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yeemFanelofundo yeSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo benze iimbawo zokufaneleka ku-ETQA. 
Imithetjhwana esebenza kuBaqinisekisi beKhwalithi yeFundo nokuBandula (i-ETQA) ekusingungu esingaphasi kweBandla leemFanelofundo leSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bafake iimbawo zemvumo        ku-ETQA. 
Imithetholawulo esebenza eenhlanganweni eziQinisekisa ngeKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yokuPhunyelelweko yamaSewula Afrika (SAQA) idinga bona abanikeli ngemisebenzi yefundo nebandulo benze isibawo sokuphunyelelweko ku-ETQA.
Imithetjhwana esebenza eenhlanganweni zokuQinisekiswa kweKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yeemFanelofundo yeSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo benze iimbawo zokufaneleka ku-ETQA. 
Imithetjhwana esebenza kuBaqinisekisi beKhwalithi yeFundo nokuBandula (i-ETQA) ekusingungu esingaphasi kweBandla leemFanelofundo leSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bafake iimbawo zemvumo        ku-ETQA. 
Imithetholawulo esebenza eenhlanganweni eziQinisekisa ngeKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) ngaphasi kweHlangano yokuPhunyelelweko yamaSewula Afrika (SAQA) idinga bona abanikeli ngemisebenzi yefundo nebandulo benze isibawo sokuphunyelelweko ku-ETQA.
Imithetho esetjenziswa  mikhakha yokuQinisekisa iziNga lezeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA)  ngaphasi kweGunya leziQu eSewula Afrika (i-SAQA) ifuna bona abanikela ngefundo nebandulo bafaka isibawo sokugunyazwa ku-ETQA.
Ukuze banikelwe imvumo, labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bakhonjelwa bona bazitlolise ukuya ngokomthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze unikelwe amandla nelungelo ngokomthetho, abanikeli ngemisebenzi bezefundo nebandulo badinga bona batloliswe ngokuya ngokwemithetholawulo efaneleko.
Ukuba negunya, abanikeli befundo nebandulo kufuneka bazitlolise ngokutjho kwemithetho esetjenziswako.
Ukuze bafumane ukufaneleka, abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo kufuneka batloliswe ngokuya komthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze unikelwe amandla nelungelo ngokomthetho, abanikeli ngemisebenzi bezefundo nebandulo badinga bona batloliswe ngokuya ngokwemithetholawulo efaneleko.
Ukuba negunya, abanikeli befundo nebandulo kufuneka bazitlolise ngokutjho kwemithetho esetjenziswako.
Ukuze bafumane ukufaneleka, abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo kufuneka batloliswe ngokuya komthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze banikelwe imvumo, labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bakhonjelwa bona bazitlolise ukuya ngokomthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuba negunya, abanikeli befundo nebandulo kufuneka bazitlolise ngokutjho kwemithetho esetjenziswako.
Ukuze bafumane ukufaneleka, abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo kufuneka batloliswe ngokuya komthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze banikelwe imvumo, labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bakhonjelwa bona bazitlolise ukuya ngokomthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze unikelwe amandla nelungelo ngokomthetho, abanikeli ngemisebenzi bezefundo nebandulo badinga bona batloliswe ngokuya ngokwemithetholawulo efaneleko.
Ukuze bafumane ukufaneleka, abanikeli bezefundo nebandulo kufuneka batloliswe ngokuya komthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze banikelwe imvumo, labo abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula bakhonjelwa bona bazitlolise ukuya ngokomthetho osebenzako. 
Ukuze unikelwe amandla nelungelo ngokomthetho, abanikeli ngemisebenzi bezefundo nebandulo badinga bona batloliswe ngokuya ngokwemithetholawulo efaneleko.
Ukuba negunya, abanikeli befundo nebandulo kufuneka bazitlolise ngokutjho kwemithetho esetjenziswako.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye nokuFunda okuRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abanikela ngeemfanelofundo ezizeleko batloliswe ngaphasi komNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetholawulo omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko udinga boke abanikeli ngemisebenzi yezefundo nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu batloliswe nomNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko  ufuna bona boke abanikela ngefundo kanye nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu ezipheleleko bazitlolise nomNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakamileko neFundo eRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikeli befundo nebandulo abanikela ngokufaneleka okuzeleko batloliswe nomNyango wezeFundo.  
Umthetholawulo omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko udinga boke abanikeli ngemisebenzi yezefundo nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu batloliswe nomNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko  ufuna bona boke abanikela ngefundo kanye nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu ezipheleleko bazitlolise nomNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakamileko neFundo eRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikeli befundo nebandulo abanikela ngokufaneleka okuzeleko batloliswe nomNyango wezeFundo.  
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye nokuFunda okuRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abanikela ngeemfanelofundo ezizeleko batloliswe ngaphasi komNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko  ufuna bona boke abanikela ngefundo kanye nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu ezipheleleko bazitlolise nomNyango wezeFundo.

Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye nokuFunda okuRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abanikela ngeemfanelofundo ezizeleko batloliswe ngaphasi komNyango wezeFundo.
