Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakamileko neFundo eRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikeli befundo nebandulo abanikela ngokufaneleka okuzeleko batloliswe nomNyango wezeFundo.  
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye nokuFunda okuRagela Phambili ufuna bona boke abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abanikela ngeemfanelofundo ezizeleko batloliswe ngaphasi komNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetholawulo omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko udinga boke abanikeli ngemisebenzi yezefundo nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu batloliswe nomNyango wezeFundo.
Umthetho omayelana neFundo ePhakemeko kanye neFundo eNgezelelweko  ufuna bona boke abanikela ngefundo kanye nebandulo abanikela ngeziqu ezipheleleko bazitlolise nomNyango wezeFundo.
Abanikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula kufanele banikele ngamazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana nangeemfanelofundo eziwela ngaphasi kwekundla emnqopho wokuthoma wabaBaqinisekisi beKhwalithi yeFundo nokuBandula (i-ETQA) wePhiko lezeFundo neGunya lokuBandula (i-SETA) nanyana uMkhakha oPhrofetjhinali.
Umnikeli ngemisebenzi wezefundo nebandulo kufanele athule amazinga wokufunda abekiweko kanye/nofana iziqu eziwela ngaphasi komnqopho osisekelo wehlangano yokuQinisekisa iKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) kanye neKoro yezeFundo kanye neGunya lokuBandula (i-SETA) nofana iHlangano yobuPhrofetjhinari.
Umnikeli wefundo kanye nebandulo kufanele anikele ngamayunidi wamazinga begodu/ nanyana iziqu eziwela ngaphasi kwendawo yomkhakha wokuQinisekisa Izinga lezeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA)  wePhiko lezeFundo neGunya lokuBandula (i-SETA) nanyana uMkhakha oPhrofetjhinali.
Umnikeli wefundo nebandulo kufanele anikele ngamazinga weyunithi kanye/namkha iimfanelofundo eziwela ngaphasi kwendawo eqalwe yihlangano yokuQinisekiswa kweKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) yePhiko leKoro yezeFundo neBandulo (i-SETA)) namkha iHlangano yesiPhrofetjhinali. 
Umnikeli ngemisebenzi wezefundo nebandulo kufanele athule amazinga wokufunda abekiweko kanye/nofana iziqu eziwela ngaphasi komnqopho osisekelo wehlangano yokuQinisekisa iKhwalithi yeFundo neBandulo (i-ETQA) kanye neKoro yezeFundo kanye neGunya lokuBandula (i-SETA) nofana iHlangano yobuPhrofetjhinari.

Iimfuneko zokuba namandla nelungelo:
Iindingo zokugunyazwa:
Iimfuneko zokufaneleka: 
Iimfuneko zokuba namandla nelungelo:
Iindingo zokugunyazwa:
Iimfuneko zokufaneleka: 
Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo:
Iindingo zokugunyazwa:
Iimfuneko zokufaneleka: 
Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo:
Iimfuneko zokuba namandla nelungelo:
Iimfuneko zokufaneleka: 
Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo:
Iimfuneko zokuba namandla nelungelo:
Iindingo zokugunyazwa:
* Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo zimumethwe mtlolo wesihloko esithi Iindlela nemiHlahlandlela yaBenzimsebenzi begodu uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* iimfuneko zokuba namandla namalungelo zimunyethwe edokhumendeni yesihloko esithi iiNdlela nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli ngemisebenzi itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iindingo zokugunyazwa zimunyethwe emtlolweni wesihloko esithi iinKambiso nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli begodu itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokufaneleka zitholakala emtlolweni wesihloko esithi IsiLinganiso nemiHlahlandlela eqaliswe kubaNikelimisebenzi begodu zitholakala kuwebhusayidi ye-SAQA.
* iimfuneko zokuba namandla namalungelo zimunyethwe edokhumendeni yesihloko esithi iiNdlela nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli ngemisebenzi itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iindingo zokugunyazwa zimunyethwe emtlolweni wesihloko esithi iinKambiso nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli begodu itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokufaneleka zitholakala emtlolweni wesihloko esithi IsiLinganiso nemiHlahlandlela eqaliswe kubaNikelimisebenzi begodu zitholakala kuwebhusayidi ye-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo zimumethwe mtlolo wesihloko esithi Iindlela nemiHlahlandlela yaBenzimsebenzi begodu uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iindingo zokugunyazwa zimunyethwe emtlolweni wesihloko esithi iinKambiso nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli begodu itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokufaneleka zitholakala emtlolweni wesihloko esithi IsiLinganiso nemiHlahlandlela eqaliswe kubaNikelimisebenzi begodu zitholakala kuwebhusayidi ye-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo zimumethwe mtlolo wesihloko esithi Iindlela nemiHlahlandlela yaBenzimsebenzi begodu uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* iimfuneko zokuba namandla namalungelo zimunyethwe edokhumendeni yesihloko esithi iiNdlela nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli ngemisebenzi itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokufaneleka zitholakala emtlolweni wesihloko esithi IsiLinganiso nemiHlahlandlela eqaliswe kubaNikelimisebenzi begodu zitholakala kuwebhusayidi ye-SAQA.
* Iimfuneko zokuthola imvumo zimumethwe mtlolo wesihloko esithi Iindlela nemiHlahlandlela yaBenzimsebenzi begodu uyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* iimfuneko zokuba namandla namalungelo zimunyethwe edokhumendeni yesihloko esithi iiNdlela nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli ngemisebenzi itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Iindingo zokugunyazwa zimunyethwe emtlolweni wesihloko esithi iinKambiso nemiHlahlandlela yabaNikeli begodu itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
*Amahlelo weemfundo (kanye/nofana nokuhlowa) ethulwa ngiloyo onikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abakhona ngemva kokuthi kube namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo ezitloliswe ngaphasi komLeyo  weemFanelofundo  zeNarha (NQF).
* Amahlelo (begodu/nofana iinhlolo) ezethulwa banikeli ngemisebenzi wefundo nebandulo afinyelela eqophelweni eliphezulu lamazinga wokuhlola abekiweko begodu/nofana iziqu ezitloliswa ePhahleni lokuPhunyelelweko leZweloke (i-NQF). 
* Amahlelo (begodu/nanyana ukuhlolwa) okunikelwa mnikeli wefundo  kanye nebandulo kugcina kumayunidi  wamazinga begodu/nanyana kileziziqu ezitloliswe kuPhahla leziQu zeliZwe (i-NQF).
* Amahlelo (kanye/namkha ukuhlolwa)  anikelwa banikeli befundo nebandulo aphela ngamazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka okutloliswe kumLeyo wesiTjhaba weemFanelofundo (i-NQF).
* Amahlelo (begodu/nofana iinhlolo) ezethulwa banikeli ngemisebenzi wefundo nebandulo afinyelela eqophelweni eliphezulu lamazinga wokuhlola abekiweko begodu/nofana iziqu ezitloliswa ePhahleni lokuPhunyelelweko leZweloke (i-NQF). 
* Amahlelo (begodu/nanyana ukuhlolwa) okunikelwa mnikeli wefundo  kanye nebandulo kugcina kumayunidi  wamazinga begodu/nanyana kileziziqu ezitloliswe kuPhahla leziQu zeliZwe (i-NQF).
* Amahlelo (kanye/namkha ukuhlolwa)  anikelwa banikeli befundo nebandulo aphela ngamazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka okutloliswe kumLeyo wesiTjhaba weemFanelofundo (i-NQF).
*Amahlelo weemfundo (kanye/nofana nokuhlowa) ethulwa ngiloyo onikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abakhona ngemva kokuthi kube namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo ezitloliswe ngaphasi komLeyo  weemFanelofundo  zeNarha (NQF).
* Amahlelo (begodu/nanyana ukuhlolwa) okunikelwa mnikeli wefundo  kanye nebandulo kugcina kumayunidi  wamazinga begodu/nanyana kileziziqu ezitloliswe kuPhahla leziQu zeliZwe (i-NQF).
* Amahlelo (kanye/namkha ukuhlolwa)  anikelwa banikeli befundo nebandulo aphela ngamazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka okutloliswe kumLeyo wesiTjhaba weemFanelofundo (i-NQF).
*Amahlelo weemfundo (kanye/nofana nokuhlowa) ethulwa ngiloyo onikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abakhona ngemva kokuthi kube namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo ezitloliswe ngaphasi komLeyo  weemFanelofundo  zeNarha (NQF).
* Amahlelo (begodu/nofana iinhlolo) ezethulwa banikeli ngemisebenzi wefundo nebandulo afinyelela eqophelweni eliphezulu lamazinga wokuhlola abekiweko begodu/nofana iziqu ezitloliswa ePhahleni lokuPhunyelelweko leZweloke (i-NQF). 
* Amahlelo (kanye/namkha ukuhlolwa)  anikelwa banikeli befundo nebandulo aphela ngamazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka okutloliswe kumLeyo wesiTjhaba weemFanelofundo (i-NQF).
*Amahlelo weemfundo (kanye/nofana nokuhlowa) ethulwa ngiloyo onikela ngomsebenzi wezefundo nokubandula abakhona ngemva kokuthi kube namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo ezitloliswe ngaphasi komLeyo  weemFanelofundo  zeNarha (NQF).
* Amahlelo (begodu/nofana iinhlolo) ezethulwa banikeli ngemisebenzi wefundo nebandulo afinyelela eqophelweni eliphezulu lamazinga wokuhlola abekiweko begodu/nofana iziqu ezitloliswa ePhahleni lokuPhunyelelweko leZweloke (i-NQF). 
* Amahlelo (begodu/nanyana ukuhlolwa) okunikelwa mnikeli wefundo  kanye nebandulo kugcina kumayunidi  wamazinga begodu/nanyana kileziziqu ezitloliswe kuPhahla leziQu zeliZwe (i-NQF).
* Ikharikhyulamu (umtlamo, okumumethweko nematheriyali yokufunda) inqotjhaniswe namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo.
Ikharikhyulamu (ukwakhiwa, ingaphakathi namamatheriyali wokufunda) ikhambisana namazinga wokufunda begodu/nofana iziqu.
Ikharikhyulamu (itlama, okumunyethweko neensetjenziswa zokufunda) zikhambisana namayunidi wamazinga begodu/ nanyana iziqu.
* Ikharikhyulamu (izinto zokutlama, zokumumethweko nokufunda) ikhanjelaniswa namazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka. 
Ikharikhyulamu (ukwakhiwa, ingaphakathi namamatheriyali wokufunda) ikhambisana namazinga wokufunda begodu/nofana iziqu.
Ikharikhyulamu (itlama, okumunyethweko neensetjenziswa zokufunda) zikhambisana namayunidi wamazinga begodu/ nanyana iziqu.
* Ikharikhyulamu (izinto zokutlama, zokumumethweko nokufunda) ikhanjelaniswa namazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka. 
* Ikharikhyulamu (umtlamo, okumumethweko nematheriyali yokufunda) inqotjhaniswe namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo.
Ikharikhyulamu (itlama, okumunyethweko neensetjenziswa zokufunda) zikhambisana namayunidi wamazinga begodu/ nanyana iziqu.
* Ikharikhyulamu (izinto zokutlama, zokumumethweko nokufunda) ikhanjelaniswa namazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka. 
* Ikharikhyulamu (umtlamo, okumumethweko nematheriyali yokufunda) inqotjhaniswe namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo.
Ikharikhyulamu (ukwakhiwa, ingaphakathi namamatheriyali wokufunda) ikhambisana namazinga wokufunda begodu/nofana iziqu.
* Ikharikhyulamu (izinto zokutlama, zokumumethweko nokufunda) ikhanjelaniswa namazinga wamayunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka. 
* Ikharikhyulamu (umtlamo, okumumethweko nematheriyali yokufunda) inqotjhaniswe namazinga wamayunidi kanye/nofana neemfanelofundo.
Ikharikhyulamu (ukwakhiwa, ingaphakathi namamatheriyali wokufunda) ikhambisana namazinga wokufunda begodu/nofana iziqu.
Ikharikhyulamu (itlama, okumunyethweko neensetjenziswa zokufunda) zikhambisana namayunidi wamazinga begodu/ nanyana iziqu.
* Kunabasebenzi abaneemfuneko zokusebenza ezifaneleko (abafundisi nabahlolako).
* Kunabasebenzi abafundileko abanelungelo (abakghonakalisi nabahlungi abatlolisiweko).
* Kuneensebenzi ezineziqu ezifaneleko                (abakghonakalisi kanye nabasizi abatlolisiweko).
* Kunabasebenzi abafaneleka kuhle (abakghonakalisi nabahloli abatlolisiweko). 
* Kunabasebenzi abafundileko abanelungelo (abakghonakalisi nabahlungi abatlolisiweko).

* Kunabasebenzi abafundileko abanelungelo (abakghonakalisi nabahlungi abatlolisiweko).
* Kuneensebenzi ezineziqu ezifaneleko                (abakghonakalisi kanye nabasizi abatlolisiweko).

* Abafundi banelungelo lemisebenzi eyaneleko yokusekelwa ngokufunda.

* Iindlela zokuhlola kanye neensetjenziswa ezisetjenzisiweko ukulinganisa iimfuneko malungana namazinga weyunidi kanye /nofana weemfanelofundo zifeya begodu ziyathembeka, begodu zisetjenziselwa ukuthuthukisa ukufunda.
* Iindlela zokuhlola namathulusi asetjenziselwa ukulinganisa iimfuneko zamazinga wokufunda abekiweko begodu/nofana iziqu azithathihlangothi, aqinisile begodu athembekile, begodu zisetjenziselwa ukuqinisa ukufunda.
* Iindlela zokuhlola kanye neensetjenziswa ezisetjenziselwa ukumeda iindingo ezimayelana neyunidi lezinga begodu/ nanyana iziqu zingezifaneleko, zisemthethweni begodu ziyathembeka, begodu zisetjenziselwa ukwenza ngcono ukufunda.
* Iindlela neensetjenziswa zokuhlola ezisetjenziswa ukulinganisa amazinga weyunithi kanye/namkha ukufaneleka zilungile, ziyasebenza begodu zithembekile, begodu zisetjenziselwa ukwenza ngcono ukufunda.
* Iindlela zokuhlola namathulusi asetjenziselwa ukulinganisa iimfuneko zamazinga wokufunda abekiweko begodu/nofana iziqu azithathihlangothi, aqinisile begodu athembekile, begodu zisetjenziselwa ukuqinisa ukufunda.

* Nawudinywe imvumo begodu ubona ngasuthi ihlelo belingasi feya, unelungelo loku lokuzibilayeza.
* Nangabe azange uphiwe amandla namalungelo begodu uyabona bonyana indlela esetjenzisiweko beyingakalungi, unelungelo lokunghonghoyila.
* Nangabe awukanikelwa igunya begodu uthatha bona indlela yekambiso bekungasiyo efaneleko, unelungelo lokufaka isililo.
* Nayikuthi awunikelwa ukufaneleka begodu ubona kwangathi ikambiso beyingakalungi, unelungelo lokuzibilayeza ngesiqunto.

* Irhelo lama-ETQA nemininingwana ongawathinta kiyo ayatholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Irhelo lama-ETQA nemininingwana yokuthintana itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.
* Irhelo lama-ETQA kanye nemininingwana ongasithinta kiyo iyatholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-ETQA.
* Irhemo lama-ETQA kanye nemininingwana yokuthintana itholakala kuwebhusayidi ye-SAQA. 
* Irhelo lama-ETQA nemininingwana yokuthintana itholakala kubunzinzolwazi be-SAQA.

Amaforomo ekufanele uwazalise

Amaforomo ekufanele azaliswe.

Amaforomo okufanele uwazalise
Amaforomo ekufanele azaliswe.
Amaforomo ongawazalisa
Amaforomo okufanele uwazalise
Amaforomo ekufanele azaliswe.
Amaforomo ongawazalisa
Amaforomo ekufanele uwazalise
Amaforomo wokufaka isibawo semvumo yaloyo onikela ngomsebenzi kanye nemitlolo ehlobene nalokho iyatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wokunikelwa amandla namalungelo nemitlolo efaneleko engatholwa ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Iforomo lesibawo sokunikelwa igunya lokuba mnikeli kanye neminye imitlolo ekhambelana nayo ingatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wabanikeli wesibawo sokunikelwa kokufaneleka kanye nemitlolo ehlobeneko angafunyanwa ku-ETQA efaneleko. 
Amaforomo wokunikelwa amandla namalungelo nemitlolo efaneleko engatholwa ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Iforomo lesibawo sokunikelwa igunya lokuba mnikeli kanye neminye imitlolo ekhambelana nayo ingatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wabanikeli wesibawo sokunikelwa kokufaneleka kanye nemitlolo ehlobeneko angafunyanwa ku-ETQA efaneleko. 
Amaforomo wokufaka isibawo semvumo yaloyo onikela ngomsebenzi kanye nemitlolo ehlobene nalokho iyatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Iforomo lesibawo sokunikelwa igunya lokuba mnikeli kanye neminye imitlolo ekhambelana nayo ingatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wabanikeli wesibawo sokunikelwa kokufaneleka kanye nemitlolo ehlobeneko angafunyanwa ku-ETQA efaneleko. 
Amaforomo wokufaka isibawo semvumo yaloyo onikela ngomsebenzi kanye nemitlolo ehlobene nalokho iyatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wokunikelwa amandla namalungelo nemitlolo efaneleko engatholwa ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wabanikeli wesibawo sokunikelwa kokufaneleka kanye nemitlolo ehlobeneko angafunyanwa ku-ETQA efaneleko. 
Amaforomo wokufaka isibawo semvumo yaloyo onikela ngomsebenzi kanye nemitlolo ehlobene nalokho iyatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Amaforomo wokunikelwa amandla namalungelo nemitlolo efaneleko engatholwa ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Iforomo lesibawo sokunikelwa igunya lokuba mnikeli kanye neminye imitlolo ekhambelana nayo ingatholakala ku-ETQA efaneleko.
Imininingwana yokubathinta - Ukhonjelwa bona ukhethe munye:
Imininingwana yokuthintana - Ngibawa ukhethe okukodwa:
Imininingwana ongasithinta kiyo - Sibawa ukhethe okukodwa:
Imininingwana yokuthintana  Sibawa ukhethe kunye:
